Hueninahue. Caresscatannon benahue. Hea bihmahi jahui ta nea nocoscaiqui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jato yohihiyabi jahuen haxenica huesti jahui, Judas. Hahbetan rihbi hicha becani, caibo machitoya, caibo chantiya. Sacerdote hapobaan raanah becani, judio hapobaan raanah becani.
Jato betan joriyamaxon ca Judasen jato yohihah: —Hen meraxon betsohahquin hicotanai joni tah qui. Hen betsohahquin hicotanai bihtannahue.
Nocotax sca ponte res Jesus qui jahuex, Min jascabi jayamahin hahxon, betsohahxon hicotanquin. Hicotanahbi:
—¿Jahuejahi min jahuin, amigon? —Jesusen jaa jaquin. Jaatian nihquirani joxon bihxon Jesus menexcanquin.
Jasca jaibaan bi huesti jahuen haxenicaton machito tsecaxon sacerdote hapon joni marequin bi cahnexon jahuen pabinqui paxtebahinquin.
—Miin machito bexojahue. Machitonen rehtenanaibo ta jahanbi mahuatihiqui.
¿Heen Papa hean yocacah jan jahuen yonotibo sesenta mil raantihiqui min honanyamahin?
Hea nescajayaxihquibo ta Papan huishani joi jaiqui. ¿Hen yocacaiya jenquetsahpax jan yohini quesca jatihiquin? —Jesusen jaa jaquin.
Yahtannicabo sca yohiquin: —¿Jahua copi man rehtemis joni yahtanquin hahcajahin, machitoyaxon chantiyaxon hea chibanbenahin? Netetihibi Papan xoboho tsahoxon haxemahi bi tah man hea bihyamahipiqui.
Papan huishani joi jai quesca janon tah man nescajahi —hahquin jato. Jaatianbi jahuen haxenicabo jatihibi jabacani. Jesus yahtanahbo jenebahini bocani.
Menexxonsca sacerdote hapo Caifas janin Jesus bocanquin. Jaa xoboho jaton huisha hapobo jaton hanibo tsinquiquihranscai.
Jano Jesus hiohiboya hocho sca jato chibanquin Pedronen. Sacerdote hapon xoboho jaabo mapenon, jeman res Pedro nihnichi. Jaton sontaro tocan jano tsahoti, jahueja janoxihcanihquin hihquish manati.
Chicho cahen sacerdote hapoboya texe judio hapobo yohuancani. Jaa copi rehteti janon hahqui yohuanai quesabo quenamacanquin.
Hicha quesabo jano mapetai bi jahua copi rehteti merayamacanquin. Chini sca huetsa quesa rabe nocoti.
—Toa joni tah non yohuanai nincaquipiqui. Papan xobo tah hen potojaquetanxon quimisha neten hahquirihbi jaa xahnen xobojati hahtipahi hih ta jaipishqui —hihcani.
Jaton quiquin sacerdote sca huenicahinxon Jesus yocaquin: —¿Min jahuabi yohiyamahin? ¿Jaabo mihqui yohuanai bi min jahuabi yohiti yamahin?
Yocacah bi jahuahihyamahi. Jahuabi yohiyamahiya, hapon yohirihbiquin: —Quiquin Dioscoinyaxon tah hen mia hihti yohihi quesaxonma min yohicoinnon. ¿Mia min Diosen baque Cristo quin? Noque yohihue.
—Min yohihi quesca rahan. Hashoan rihbi tah hen mato yohihi: Papan mecayaho jahuen quiquin hapo tsahotai tah man hea noquebaque jisyaxihqui. Nai cohiman jahui tah man hea jisyaxihqui —Jesusen jaquin sacerdote hapo.
Nincaxon, jahuen coton huaxabahinxon, jato yohiquin: —Dios qui ta tiromahi yohuanihqui. ¿Jahua hashoan non nincati pishinain? Jan tiromahi yohuanai tah man nincascai.
¿Jahua shinan man jain? —Jan yohuanai copi non rehteti jai rahan —hahcanquin.
Jahuen bemanan qui toshbanhahxon, copasxon beshrishquicanquin.
Rishquixon yocacanquin: —Yohihue, Criston. ¿Tsoan mia rishquihiquin?
Jasca jaabo jai bi jemanhihti janin Pedro tsahoti. Jano tsahotaiton huesti haibaan joxon yohiquin: —Mia rihbi tah min hoa Galilea mai meha Jesus betan nihrasihi.
Jano jaibaan sca jatihixonbi nincanon jahuen joni hihtima yohiscaquin: —Min yohuanai tah hen honanyamabiresai —Pedronen jaquin.
Nichibo tocan mehax huetsa haibo rihbi joxon, Pedro jisquin sirijaxon, jato yohiquin: —Nea coin ta Jesus Nazareno betan nihcachihiqui.
Hahquirihbi jahuen joni hihtima Pedronen yohiquin. Dios quenaxon: —Jaa joni tah hen honanyamabiresai —hahquin.
Basiyamahax jano nichibosca joxon: —Hihcoini. Mia rihbi tah min jahuen haxenica qui. Min yohuanai tah non honanai. Janoha joni quescapah tah non mia nincacai —Pedro jacanquin.
Dios quenaxon, hihcoinyamahax hea mahuapahinon hihxon jascajaribiquin: —Jaa joni tah hen honanyamabiresai —Pedronen jaquin. Jaatianbi sca hatapa queoti.
Jesusen yohiha joi shinanrenenscaquin. Hatapa queorihyama jai bi tah min quimisha coti heen joni hihtima min yohixihqui. Jesus jascari yohuanah shinanax, picocahini cahax coshin huaohihscai.
Xaba paquescaiya sca sacerdote hapobo betan judio hapobo tsinquirihbixon sesion hahxon sca Jesus rehteti yohicanquin jatihibichin.
Menexrihbixon jaton gobernador janin sca Jesus hiocanquin Pilato janeya gobernador janin.
Jaan bihmahah Jesus rehtenoxihquibohi jisxon, masa shinanxon sca Judasen jahuen treinta coriqui hinanrihbihi caxon, sacerdote hapoboya judio hapobo hinanrihbiquin.
—Hohchajoma joni mato bihmahi tah hen hohchatai —jato jaquin. —¿Min jascahah bi jahueja non noquen jatihin? Mianbi jise —hahcanquin.
Papan xoboho jaa coriqui potaquin potojaquetanbahini Judas caresscai. Cahax risbipan tenexentax rontamehscai.
Jahuen coriqui topihax sca sacerdote hapobo yohuani: —Hahan mahuamati coriqui tah qui. Papa hinanti bohnanti qui tah non nanetimahi —hihcani.
Jaa copi ta jahanbi mai maroti yohinannishqui. Caxon sca huesti quentijanicaton mai maroncanquin, jano nahuabo mihinti janon.
Jaa copi ta jaa mai jimin mai hahcanihqui, rahma caman.
Jasca ta janishqui Papan joi yohinica Jeremiasnen yohini quescabi: Joni ta jaatihi copitihqui hih Israelibo hapobo jaiya ta treinta coriqui bihcanihqui.
Jahanbi ta quentijanicaton mai marocaniqui, heen hihbaan hea yohini quescabijaquin hihqui Jeremiasnen huishani joi.
Jaatian gobernador bebon Jesus nichi. Jano hihuehahbo Gobernador yocacahti Jesus: —¿Mia min judiobaan quiquin hapo quin? —hahquin. —Min yohihi quescari rahan —hahquin Jesusen.
Judio hapobo rihbi hahqui chanihah bi Jesus jahuabi yohuanyamascai.
Pilatonen sca yocarihbiquin: —¿Mihqui hicha chanihibo min nincayamahin? —hahquin.
Jabi ni huesti jaton joi qui Jesus yohuanyamahi. Jaa copi ta gobernador rahtenishqui.
Jaa fiesta hahqui nocotai tihibi ta gobernadornen sipo xoboho tsahonnibo huesti jato picoxonpahonishqui, fiestajahibaan caisxon jaa jane yohihiya jaa jato picoxonquin.
Jan jano tsahonni ta tiroma shinanya joni janishqui jatihixonbi honanaibo. Jahuen jane cahen, Barrabas.
Fiestajahibo tsinquijaquetaiton sca Pilatonen jato yocaquin. —¿Tsoa hen mato picoxonti man queenain? ¿Barrabas nan? ¿Jesus, Cristo hahcaibo nan? —jato jaquin.
Notsixon copi judiobaan Jesus hinanah ta Pilatonen honannishqui. Honanxon copi ta jonibo jascajaquin yocanishqui.
Janoxon joni ponteti sca Pilato tsahoscai. Jano tsahotai bi ta joni raanxon jahuen haibaan yohinishqui: —Siri joni tah qui. Jahuabi jahua hahyamahue. Rahma jaya namaxon tah hen hihti masa shinanai.
Jascajaquin jahuen haibaan Pilato yohinon bi ta judio hapobaan tsamajaquetaibo nescajanishqui: Barrabas mato picoxonnon Jesus rehteti yocanahue, hahcanquin.
Quenataibo nincaxon sca gobernadornen jato yocaquin: —¿Rabe jai bi jahuemeha hen mato picoxonti man queenain? —Barrabas rahan —hihcani.
—¿Cristo hahcaibo Jesus cahran? Jaa hen jahuejati man queenain? —Pilatonen jato jaquin. —Jihui qui hueonhue —hahcanquin jatihixonbi.
—¿Jahua copi nan? ¿Jahua tiroma janishquin? —jato jaquin. Jato jascahah bi hashoan sca quenacani: —Jihuin hueonnue.
Jan jano jahuabi hahyamahi bi hashoan sca corocanahibo jai jisxon, jeneya benahue jaax jaton jisnon bi mechoquihti. —Jahuen jimi ta hehqui hueoyamahiqui. Mato quibi ta paquetihqui, jisnahue —jato jaquin.
Tsinquijaquetaibo jatihibi sca nescari coshin yohuani: —Noque qui jahuen jimi paquenon, noquen baquebo qui rihbi jahuen jimi paquenon —hihcani.
Jaatian Barrabas jato picoxonxon, Jesus rishquihahbo jahuen sontarobo yohixon jato hinanquin jihuin hueonahbo.
Jahuen sontarobaan sca Jesus bihxon, gobernador xobo chicho hioxon, jaton hahbe sontarobo quenacanquin.
Jahuen chopa potamaxon joshin coton sca sahuemacanquin.
Moxa maitijaxon, maimaxon, tahua xecomaxon, jaa bebon raboxonen nihxon hosan hosancanquin. —Jee, judiobaan quiquin hapon —hahcanquin.
Jascajaxon, hahqui toshbanhahxon, jahuen tahua bichinxon hahanbi mashrishquiquin.
Hosan hosanxon jaa joshin coton pecaxon jahuen coton sahuemaribixon, jihuin hueonnoxon sca Jesus bocanquin.
Jemama qui picoti caxon sca Simon janeya joni meracanquin, Cirene mai meha joni. Jaa jahuen coros hiamacanquin.
Manan qui nococani, Golgota janeya manan. Golgota ta mapo xao manan hihcatsihquiqui.
Xehati mocani xehanon hinanahbo bi tanahax queenyamahi.
Jihui qui tasaxon rontanxon sca jahuen chopa metisahnoxon tsoan bihtihiquin hihxon borasa qui macan bero nanexon chicohah, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan bihnon, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan bihquin.
Coirani sca sontarobo tsahopaqueti.
Jaa bochihori ta quirica hueoncannishqui, jaa copi rehteha joibo jano janon. Nea ta Jesus qui, Judiobaan quiquin hapo, hihqui jaa quirica.
Yometso rabe rihbi sca tasaxon rontancanquin jaa senenbi. Ramiho huetsa, ramiho huetsa.
Jano huinotaibaan ta hosan hosancannishqui, jaton mapo bose bosehihcanaxon.
—Papan xobo potojaquetanxon quimisha neten jaa xahnen hahquirihbi xobojanica hihquish, janohax siri sca johue Papan baque hihquish, jaa jihui janinhax botoquihranhue —hahcanquin.
Sacerdote hapobo betan texe judio hapobaan ta jascajaquin rihbi hosancannishqui.
—Huetsabo jihuemati hahtipahxon bi ta hahri jihuemati hahtipahyamahiqui. Israelibaan quiquin hapo hihquish, jan coros janinhax botopaquenon. Jaatian tah non nincacointihi.
Papa Diosen baque hihqui ta shinannishqui. Queenxon, Papan jaa botonxon rohajascanon. Hea tah hen Diosen baque qui jan jaipi hih ca hen ja hisen —hihcani.
Jascajaquin rihbi ta hahbe hueonahbaan hichaquin hosannishqui.
Barin manan tsahcahiya sca ta yamecahinnishqui, jatihibi mai janin. Nai pohapaque bari janon caman bahquishihpi.
Bari nai pohapaquetaiya sca ta coshin bi res Jesus yohuannishqui: —Elí Elí lama sabactani. Papan, Papan, ¿jahua copi min hea jenebahinain? hihcatsihqui.
Nincacax: —Elías ta quenahiqui —hihcani jano nichibo.
Huesti bishquihihcanahi caxon, taco quescapa bihxon, xehati cachaqui maosahxon tahua qui queonxon sananhihnixon xehamaquin.
Caibaan sca: —Jenehue. Jaa botoni Elías jotihiquin non tah non jiscatsihqui —hahcanquin.
Hahquirihbi coshin bi res quenatax sca Jesus mahuati.
Jaatianbi ta Papan xoboho hahan chiqueti chopa rontamehtai huaxacahinnishqui, bochiquihax naman caman, rabe teque sca janon. Mai rihbi ta mihuannishqui. Macamahnhuanbo rihbi ta caxquecahinnishqui.
Cristo hihquipish bi teehihribihi pecaho ta tsahonbo rihbi quehpemehnishqui, neateman hihni Papan baquebo yorayabi teehihribihax huenihihnatax bocani.
Jaabo ta jaa jema janin nichi bocannishqui, hihti caibaan jisnonbi.
Jesus mahuataiya jascapa huinotai jisish ta jano coiranai sontaro capitan hihti raquenishqui, jahuen sontarobo rihbi hihti raqueti. —Jaa ta Papan baque coin hihnishqui —hihcani.
Hochoxon rihbi ta hichaxon haibobaan coiranxon jisnishqui. Jaabaan ta Galilea mai janinhax Jesus betan jahui haibobo janishqui, pitijaxonaibo.
Huetsa ta María Magdalena janeya janishqui. Huetsa cahen María Jacobon mama, Josepan mama. Huetsa cahen Zebedeon baquebaan mama.
Bepi sca Arimatea jema janinhax coriquiyahpa patoro jahui, José janeya. Jesusen haxemaha nincacoinni joni.
Pilato janin caxon sca ¿Jesusen yora hean bihtimahin hahca, Pilatonen Bihhue hahquin.
Jahuen yora botonxon sca sabana pahtsacah siripan rahcoquin.
Rahcoxon boxon, tsahomehyanoxon jano jan macan manan xanqueman poquinipi janin mihinquin. Heen tsahonti janinbi tsahonpan hihxon jano Jesus mihinquin. Tsahon xehponoxon sca hihtihosi macan taranbohanxon xehpoquin. Macaman xehpobahini sca caresscai.
Jaa tsahon patax sca María Magdalena betan huetsa María manati tsahoti.
Jaton tantiti nete janon jaa nete queyotaiya sca sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobo Pilato janin bocani.
Nocoxon: —Hapon, hoa paranmis bihyamaparixon tah non yohuanai nincaquipiqui. Jaa tah non rahma shinanai. Quimisha neten hihquipish tah hen teehihribiyaxihqui hih ta jaipishqui.
Jaa copi yohihue, jahuen quimisha neten caman jahuen tsahon coiranahbo. Jonetax jahuen yora yometsohtax teehihrihbi ta jaipishqui —hih jahuen haxenicabo jamis, jonibo parani. Jascajaquin paranah ta jan jato paranmenopahoni mentan hashoan tiroma jatihiqui —Pilato jacanquin.
—Hoa cahisen, sontarobo. Jato boxon, man honanai quescajaquin jato coiranmatannahue —jato jaquin.
Caxon sca, hahan xehpoti macan boyacanquin. Boyaxon honantijaxon coiranahbo sontarobo quenimacanquin.
Jascahipibo pecaho jaton tantiti nete huino sca jaipi quen xaba paqueti hochoma sca María Magdalena betan huetsa María cahi, tsahon jisi.
Cahiboyabi naihoh quehax Papan yonoti huesti botopaqueti jahuiya coshin bi res mai mihuani. Botopaquexon hahan xehpoti macamahnhuan taranbohanax jaa cahtsahoscai.
Jahuen yora cana bacahi quescari xabati. Jahuen chopa cahen joxo bi res joxo.
Jaa jisish ca hihti raquetax tastahihcanahax sontarobo racareneni mahuataibo quescapahax.
Haibobo nocotaiya: —Raqueyamanahue. Rehtepibo Jesus benahi man jahui tah hen honani.
Nenoma ta qui. Jan yohipi quescari ta teehihribihaxqui. Jano racanipibo jahuen tsahon jisi benahue.
Histon caxon sca jahuen haxenicabo yohitannahue. Hihquipish bi ta hahquiribi teehihquishqui. Mato bebohi ta Galilea main cahiqui. Jano tah man jaa jisi catihi. Mato tah hen yohiscai, jato jascajaquin yohitannahue —Papan yonotinin jato jaquin.
Histon sca bocani. Tsahon janinhax hishtocanahi cahi, raqueya jenimahax jahuen haxenicabo yohihi bocani.
Cahitonbi jato behchihi Jesus jahui. —¿Man jascabi jayamahin? —jato jaquin. Jato jascahah bi pontecahini caxon jaa bebon betihihpaquexon taxecocanquin.
—Raqueyamanahue. Galilea main bohábo heen huetsabo yohitannahue. Jano ta hea jisyaxihcanihqui.
Jato yohihi haibobo bohiboyabi sca tsahon janinhax sontarobo rihbi bocani. Jeman caxon rahma huinotah jatihibi sacerdote hapobo yohicanquin.
Judiobaan hapobo betan tsinquixon sca jahueja sca non jatihin hihquish yohinanxon sontarobo hicha coriqui hinancanquin.
Coriqui hinanxon: —Non yame hoxahiya ta jahuen haxenicabo joxon jahuen yora bichincanaxqui hihnahue.
Man jascari yohuani jai chanihah noquen gobernador sinataiya tah non jaa rihbi raejatihi, mato jahuejayamanon —sontarobo jacanquin sacerdotebaan.
Jaa coriqui bichish sca jascari yohuani bocani, sacerdotebaan yohihah quescari. Jascari yohuannihbo copi ta rahma caman jatihibi Judea mai janin jascari yohuanchanicaniqui.
Galilea main sca ta jahuen haxenicabo bocanishqui, once joni. Jano nocoyaxahnahue Jesusen jato yohipi manan janin nococani.
Jano Jesus meraxon, hahqui raboxonen tisquihahpaquehcanquin. Jesus tah qui hih caibo janon bi jaa hin Hen tah hen honancoinyamahi hih caibo jaribihi.
Jato qui joxon sca: —Papan ta hea jatihibi hihbomascaiqui, naiho jai jatihibi, main jaibo jatihibi rihbi.
Jaa copi jatihibi mai janin caxon jano jaibo haxematannahue. Heen Papan janen, jahuen baquen janen rihbi, jahuen yoshin siripan janen rihbi jato nashimatannahue, heen jihuetahbo.
Jascajanahue hahquin hen mato yohipahoni joibo jatihibi jato haxemanahue, jascajahabo. Nete queyonon caman hen mato betan jascabihi jayaxihqui honannahue.
Papan baque Jesucristo joi siri ta nescari pehocohnishqui.
Papan joi yohinica Isaiasnen pari ta nescajaquin huishanishqui: Jise. Mia bahixonnon hihxon tah hen heen joi yohinica pari raanai.
Jaa ta cahchiho jano tsoa jihueyamahiton nichish coshin yohuanyaxihquiqui: Bahixonnahue jahan hihbo jonon. Jahuen bahi najisti chaibo hahxonnahue hih ta jaa jayaxihquiqui hihqui Isaiasnen huishani joi.
Isaiasnen yohini quescajaquin nashimahi ta Juan cahchiho jano tsoa jihueyamahiton canishqui. Cahax coshin yohuani: —Papan maton hohcha sohuanon maton shinan pontenahue hen mato nashimanon —hahquin.
Jascajahiya ta Judea mai mehabo, Jerusalen jema janinhahbo rihbi Juan qui bocannishqui jatihibi. Jaton hohcha Papa Dios yohihiya cahen Juaman jato nashimaquin Jordan huean janinxon.
Juaman ta camello rani chopa sahuepahonishqui. Bichi cinturonen chinexehti. Champo pipahoni. Bona jaene rihbi xehapahoni.
—Hehchon ta hea mentan hashoan shinanya noque joyaxihquiqui. Jaa hihti siri copi tah hen chiquerehue tsahopaquexon jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti betan hea senenyamahi.
Hean hen mato jenen nashimahi bi ta jahuen jonibo man jai honanahbo hihxon Papan mato jahuen Yoshin hinanyaxihquiqui, nashimaquin hahcajaquin hicha hinanquin —Juaman jato jaquin.
Jascascaiya Galilea mai meha Nazaret jema janinhax Jesus jahui. Jahuiya ta Juaman jaa nashimanishqui Jordan huean janinxon.
Nashimaha cahen jene janinhax mapexon nai huiso quehpemehtai Jesusen jisquin. Dios Yoshin nobex quescapah hahqui botopaquetai jisquin.
Jaatian: —Mia tah min hen hihti queenai heen baque qui. Mihon ta hen jenimahi —hihqui naihoh quehax yohuanai joi.
Jaa pecaho ta Dios Yoshiman Jesus cahchiho camanishqui.
Cuarenta neten cahchiho Jesus nichi yohinahbo tocan. Jano nichiton ta Satanasnen hohchamacatsihquin tananishqui. Papan yonotibaan sca ta Jesus pimanishqui.
Jaatian sca Juan sipojahipibo pecaho sca Jesus caribihi Galilea main. Papan joi siri yohibonahi cahi.
—Papan mato hahxonti nete ta nocoscaiqui. Papan jihuemahi joti ta nea pishca sca jaonahiqui. Maton shinan pontenahue. Papan joi siri bihcoinnahue —jato jaquin.
Galilea hian quexa sca quetanbonahi cahi. Caquin bi Simon jahuen huetsa Andres betan jisbonaquin. Tarrafa potahiton jato jisbonaquin, yapa bihnica rabe.
—Hehbe bonahue, joni hionica sca hen mato hihmanon —jato jaquin.
Jascaha jaton tarrafa potabahini sca hahbe bocani.
Jaatian caribiquin bi Zebedeon baque Jacobo jisbonaquin. Jahuen huetsa Juan betan nontinxon jaton tarrafa honahiton jisbonaquin.
Jisxon jato quenaquin. Quenaha jahuen jonibo betan jaton papa nontinbi banenon Jesus betan sca bocani.
Capernaum jema janin sca nococani. Tantiti neten sca haho tsinquiti xoboho hihcoxon Jesusen jato haxemaquin.
Haxemaha rahtecani. Huishani honanbaan haxemahi quescajaquinma bi hapon hahcai quescajaquin jato haxemaha ta rahtecannishqui.
Jaa xoboho rihbi cahen tiroma yoshinyahpa joni huesti jai. Jaan cahen joi coshin yocaquin:
—¿Min noque jahuejatihin, Nazaret janinha Jesusen? ¿Min noque queyohi jahuin? Min tsoa quin hen ta hen honanai. Diosen raanai tah min qui —hahquin yoshiman.
Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —Netetax jahuen yora janinhax picohue —hahquin.
Jan jascaha jaa joni tastahihmahax sai saihihquish tiroma yoshin picoti.
Jatihibi sca rahtetax yocacahanani: —¿Teeee, jahua joni hin? Honanmati joi behna tah qui. Hapon hahcai quescajaquin ta haxemahiqui. Yoshin tiromabo ta yohihiqui. Jaan catanhue hahca ta bocanihqui —hihcani.
Janohax cahen histon bi res Jesus qui yohuanscacani Galilea mai jatihibi janinhahbo.
Jaatian sca haho tsinquiti xobohoh quehax cainax Andres betan Simoman xoboho hihcocani Jesus, Jacobo, Juan.
Simoman haita cahen yonatax racati. Jesus yohiscacanquin, Jaa ta hisinihqui, hahquin.
Yohihahbo metsontanxon hueniquin. Huenihah rohacahinxon jato pimascaquin.
Jaa bepi bari hihquiscaiya sca ta hisinyahpabo, tiroma yoshinyahpabo rihbi jato jatihibi Jesus qui hiocannishqui.
Jaa jema janinhahbo jatihibi Jesus janin xehqui patax tsamajaqueti.
Jano cahen mesco hisinyahpabo Jesusen rohajaquin hihti caibo. Hicha tiroma yoshinbo rihbi netemaxon picoquin. Jaa honanaibo copi jato netemaquin.
Mohiyahtax hihari sca xaba paqueri jaima huenitax Jesus cahi jano tsoabi yamahiton. Janoxon sca jahuen Papa yocaquin.
Jaatian sca Simon, jaabo, Jesus benahi cahi.
Meraxon yohicanquin: —Jatihixonbi ta mia benacaniqui —hahcanquin.
—Huetsa jemabo janin sca canon bonahue, jano rihbi Papan joi yohinon. Jaa copi tah hen jahuequi —jato jaquin.
Jato jascahax Galilea janin sca Jesus nihnichi jatihibinco. Haho tsinquiti xobohoxon Papan joi yohibonahi cahi. Tiroma yoshinbo rihbi picoquin.
Jaatian cahen huesti sipiyahpa joni Jesus qui joxon hihti yocaquin. Raboxonen tisquihahpaquexon yocaquin: —Queenxon ta mian hea rohajatihi —hahquin.
Jahan hihti shinanxon mehancahinxon mehexon Jesusen sca yohiquin: —Queen tah hen jai. Rohascahue —hahquin.
Jan jascahah hisinyamascai, rohascai.
Jaatianbi jaa catannon sca Jesusen hihti yohiquin:
—Tsoabi yohihaxma sacerdote qui catanhue, min rohascai jismahi. Min rohahi copi Moisesnin yohini hinanti hinantanhue min rohascai honanahbo —hahquin.
Jesusen jascahah bi cahi. Jan rohascai yohibonahi cahi. Yohibonahiya cahen jema janin jahuibo hichahiya jeman cati Jesusen hahtipahyamascaquin, jaa yocacatsihquibo hichahiya. Hueneman res cahi. Jatihibi janinhax sca Jesus qui bocani.
Huetsa neten sca cahen Capernaum janin hahquirihbi Jesus nocoti cahi. Jahuen xobon jaa nocoscai cahen nincacanquin janohahbaan.
Hicha joni tsamajaquetaiya cahen xobo senenyamascai, xehqui pataxbi jahuenbi nihcahuantimahi. Jaan ca Papan joi jato yohiquin.
Jahuen yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca hihuehi becani, chosco joni.
Joni tsamajaquetaiboya Jesus pataxti hahtipahyamaxon Jesus mahchi xobo pemacanya tsecaquin. Quinijaxon jahuen cacajatiyabi jaa joni botonpaquecanquin. Yora honanyamajaquetai joni hahan racatai bi botonpaquecanquin.
Rohajatihi shinancoinaibo jisxon yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca Jesusen yohiquin: —Miin hohcha ta sohuá scah qui, baquen —hahquin.
Jano rihbi cahen jaton jointinin shinani tsahocani huishani joi honanbo.
—¿Jahua jenquetsahin nea jonin jascajaquin yohihiquin? Tiromahi ta yohuanihqui. Papa huestichin ta hohcha sohuati hahtipahiqui —hihcani jaton jointinin.
Jaton jointinin jascajaquin shinanaiboya jahuen shinaman honanscaxon Jesusen jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man jascajaquin shinanain maton jointinin?
¿Jahue meha joi nea yora honanyamajaquetai joni yohiti hashoan teema quin? ¿Miin hohcha ta sohuá scah qui hihqui nan? ¿Hueníhue, miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue hihqui nan? ¿Jahue meha hashoan yohiti teema quin nan?
Nai nequebihoxon hohcha sohuati hihbo hea jai man honannon hihxon tah hen nea sca yohihi —jato jaxon yora honanyamajaquetai joni sca yohiquin:
—Mia ta hen yohihi. Huenihue. Miin cacajati bichish miin xobon caresscatanhue —hahquin.
Yohihah huenixon jahuen cacajati bichish res sca jaton jisnonbi caini. Jatihixonbi jisish rahtetax siripi Papa qui yohuancani: —Jahuentianbi tah non jascajahi jisyamaniqui —hihcani.
Hian quexa sca cahen Jesus caribihi. Jatihibi jonibo hahqui tsamajaqueti, jaan jato haxemanon.
Jano huinoquin bi Leví sca meraquin Alfeonen baque. Janoxon coriqui cobranti janin hapobaana cobranxoni tsahotai meraquin. Meraxon: —Hehbe cahue —hahquin. Jan jascahah huenicahuanax hahbetan cahi.
Pihi benahue hahca Levin xoboho sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus cahi. Jesus betan hicha joni bocani. Nocotax pihi tsahoti hicha cobranxonaiboya hicha hohchayahpabo rihbi jano tsahoti.
Hohchayahpaboya cobranxonaibo betan Jesusen pihi jisxon huishani joi honan fariseobaan jahuen haxenicabo yocacanquin: —¿Jahuejanoxon cobranxonaiboya hohchayahpabo betan pihiquin? —hahcanquin.
Jascajaquin yocacaibo nincaxon Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Hisinjomabo pishinaima bi ta hisinyahpabo rahonica pishinihqui. Hohchajoma jonibo quenahima bi tah hen hohchayahpabo quenahi joniqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca cahen Juaman haxematibaan piti tenenish. Fariseobaan rihbi piti tenequin. Jesus qui caxon fariseobaan Jesus yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin Juaman haxenicabaan piti tenenon fariseobaan haxenicabaan rihbi tenehi bi minabaan piti teneyamahihquin? —hahcanquin.
Jesusen jato yohiquin: —¿Jato betan huanohi joni hihparihiya huanoquin quenamahibaan piti tenetihiquin? Jato betan huanohi joni hihparihiya ta piti tenetimahihqui.
Huetsatian ta jatoma qui huanohi joni hionyaxihcanihqui. Jaatian pari ta piti teneyaxihcanihqui quenamahibaan.
Tsoanbi ta hotsinica chopan chopa payo honayamahihqui. Jascajaquin honahah ta hona teresihqui hashoan huaxascai.
Tsoan rihbi ta hompa rahma nehsehihqui bichi borasa xeni qui mahneyamahihqui. Jascahah ta hompa pohtoshihmatihiqui, xehati yohyocohnon borasa rihbi masascanon. Hompa rahma nehsehihqui ta borasa behna qui mahneti qui —hahquin Jesusen.
Huesti tantiti neten sca cahen trigo huai nabebacahini cahi. Hahbetan caquin jahuen haxenicabaan trigo bimi tesabonaquin.
Fariseobaan sca Jesus yohiquin: —Jise. ¿Jahua jenquetsahin jaabaan jascajahiquin, tantiti neten jascajatima joi jai bi? —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua pitimahiya hahbe cahibo rihbi pihan hihquiya jaa rihbi pihan hihxon Davidinin hahni man jisyamaniquin huishani joi janin?
Abiatar sacerdotebaan hapo hihqui tian ta Papan xoboho David hihconishqui. Jaa paan sacerdotebaan res piti que bi jaan piquin. Jahuen jonibo rihbi piquihinquin —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon yohirihbiquin: —Tantiti nete copi joni jaima bi ta joni copi tantiti nete jaiqui.
Jaa copi ta hea noque baque tantiti nete hihbo qui —jato jaquin.
Jaton haho tsinquiti xoboho cahen Jesus hihcorihbihi. Meyosmahi noque jano rihbi jai.
Jesus jisquin sirijascacanquin. —Rohaja ra ta jatihiqui tantiti neten hihqui bi —hihxon jiscanquin jaya yohuanti janoxon cahecatsihquin.
Jesusen sca meyosmahi yohiquin: —Noque tocanbi johue —hahquin.
Jascajaxon tsahotaibo yocaquin: —¿Tantiti neten sirijati joi jaiquin? ¿Masajati joi jaiquin? ¿Teehihmati joi jaiquin? ¿Rehteti joi jaiquin? —jan jascahah bi jahua hihyamacani.
Benaya bi sinaxon sca Jesusen jato bejispaquequin. Jointi chahomayabo copi benati. Meyosmahi sca yohiquin: —Miin mequen sanahihnihue —hahquin. Sanahihnihax rohascai.
Jaa rohajahi jisish cainax herodianobo betan sca fariseobo hahqui yohuancani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non Jesus mahuamatihin? —hihcani yohuani.
Hian janin sca jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus caresscai. Hahchon bocani hicha jonibo tsama bi res. Galilea mai mehax, Judea mai mehax.
Jerusalen janinhax, Idumea janinhax, Jordan hoque quexa quehax, Tiro janinbohax, Sidon janinbohax. Tsama bi res hahqui cahax tsamajaqueti. Jatihibi jan hahcaibo nincacax tsamajaqueti hashoan nincacatsihqui.
Main tsamajaquetaibo hahqui tsehquesihquiboya jahuen haxenicabo sca yohiquin: —Nonti jistannahue non hahan canon —hahquin.
Jan hicha rohajahipi copi hisinyahpabaan jatihixonbi Jesus mehecatsihquish hahqui tsamajaquetax tsehquesihqui.
Yoshin tiromabaan rihbi Jesus jisish hahqui betihipaquetax joi coshin yohuani: —Mia tah min Diosen baque qui —hihcani.
Jonibaan yoshin jascari yohuanai nincayamanon hihxon, jato hihti yohiquin: —Yohuanyamanahue —hahquin.
Mananahbo sca cahi. Caxon jan caisaibo quenaquin. Quenahah hahqui bocani.
Doce joni cahen caisquin, hahbetan nihnon. Papan joi yohinicabo raannoxon jato caisquin.
Tiroma yoshin potati hihbobo hihnon jato caisquin.
Huetsa cahen Simon. Jaa cahen Pedro janequin.
Huetsa cahen Jacobo, Zebedeon baque. Huetsa cahen Juan Jacobonen huetsa. Jabo rabe Jesusen Boanerges janequin. Boanerges cahen terenhihca baquebo hihcatsihqui.
Huetsa cahen Andres, huetsa cahen Felipe, huetsa cahen Bartolomé, huetsa cahen Mateo, huetsa cahen Tomas, huetsa cahen Alfeon baque Jacobo, huetsa cahen Tadeo, huetsa cahen Simon Celador,
huetsa cahen Judas Iscariote, Jesus bihmanica. Jaa rahsi caisquin, doce joni.
Xobon sca Jesus cahi. Hahquirihbi tsamajaquetaiboya piti hahtipahyamascaquin.
Jascascai nincacax jaa bichi sca jahuen jenabo cahi. —Tehquehih sca ta jaiqui —hihxon jaa bichi bocani.
Jerusalen janinhax jahuex huishani joi honanbo rihbi yohuani: —Tiroma yoshin hapon yanapana ta tiroma yoshin picohihqui. Beelcebunen ta jaa hihbojascaiqui —hihcani.
Jascahiton: —Benahue —jato jaquin. Jahuiboya sca jaa patax queha joibo sca jato yohiquin: —¿Jenquetsahaxon Satanasnen Satanas picotihiquin?
Huesti mai mehax jaabo rahsibi rehtenananax ta queyoscatihiqui.
Huesti xobo mehabo jaabo rahsibi rehtenananax ta jaabo queyoscatihiqui.
Satanas hahbe Satanas betan rehtehahax cahen jaabo queyoscaan, hahri queyocani.
Coshi jonin xoboho ta tsoabi yometsohti hihcoti hahtipahyamahiqui, hihbo nexayamahax. Hihbo nexaxon pari ta jahuen jahuaborabo bichintihiqui, jatihibi queyobahinnoxon.
Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: jatihibi hohcha ta jonibo sohuatihiqui. Papa qui tiromahi yohuanaibo rahsi rihbi ta sohuatihiqui.
Jascapahbo sohuaxon bi ta Dios Yoshin qui tiromahi yohuanaibo Papan jahuentianbi sohuatimahiqui. Jascapa hohcha ta jascabihi sca banetihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaa ta tiroma yoshinyahpa qui jaabo jai copi cahen jato jascajaquin.
Jahuen mama betan jahuen huetsabo sca nocoti. Jemanhihti janin nihxon Jesus quenamacanquin.
Tsamajaquetax tsahotaibaan sca yohixonquin: —Miin mamaya miin huetsabo ta jeman qui. Mia ta quenamacaniqui —hahcanquin.
Jaan sca joi bichinquin: —¿Tsoa heen mama quin? ¿Tsoa heen huetsabo quin? —hahquin.
Tsahohahtancahuanaibo bejispaquexon sca: —Neabo ta heen mama heen huetsabo qui.
Papa queenai quescajanicahbo ta heen huetsa, heen choca, heen mama qui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca cahen hian quexaxon Jesusen jato haxemaribiquin. Hicha joni hahqui tsamajaquetaiya nontin nanetax tsahoti tsamajaquetaibo hian quexa banenon.
Janoxon sca hicha jaa patax queha joi jato haxemaquin.
—Nincanahue. Mihsahahnicahton cahen jahuen bimi bero mihsahahbonahi cahan.
Jan mihsahahca can caibo bero bahinbi paqueti. Jano paquetaibo topibonahi sca hihsabo cahi queyobonahi.
Mai chahoma janin caibo rihbi paqueti. Hihquiyamahax histon joconi.
Joconai bi barin hahca hashoan xanahax jahuen tapon chicho cayamahax pehuahax res sca xanahi.
Moxa tocan rihbi caibo bero paqueti. Moxa pari hanixon rishquihah bimi yamahi.
Mai siri janin rihbi caibo paqueti. Hanihax bimihi siripi. Jaa bero hanihax bimihi caibo quiha treinta bero, caibo quiha sesenta bero, caibo quiha cien bero sca jai.
Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue —jato jaquin.
Tsamajaquetai jonibo boresscaiya Jesus qui banejaquetax jahuen doce jaabo yocacahcani. Jan yohiha jaa patax queha joibo honancoincatsihqui yocacahcani.
Yocaca jato yohiquin: —Papan jihuemahi jone joi mato honanmaxon tah hen jaa patax queha joi rahsi jaabo nincamahi nincayosmabo quen.
Jis jisxon bi jisyamahabo, ninca nincaxon bi nincayamahahbo, jaton shinan pontehax jaton hohcha yamamis hihxon nincayamahibo copi tah hen jaa patax queha joi rahsi jato nincamahi —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Hen rahma yohiha jaa patax queha joi man honanyamahin? ¿Jenquetsahaxon sca man jatihibi jaa patax queha joi honantihin?
Bero mihsahahquin hahcajaquin ta mihsahahnicahton joi yohibonahihqui.
Bahinxon nincacaibo ta nescapah qui. Yohibonahi joi nincacaibaan bi ta Satanas joresscaxon jaa joi jato bichinihqui.
Jascajaquin rihbi ta mai chahoma janinxon joi nincamaha jenimarenenscacaniqui. Nincacoinax, jenimacani.
Jenimahax bi jaton tapon chicho cayamahax quescaxon basimaxon jenescacanquin. Jaa joi jaiton caibaan jato hosan hosana jenescacanquin. Nincacaibo copi caibaan tiromajacatsihquin chibana jenescacanquin.
Caibo rihbi ta yohibonahi joi moxa tocanxon nincacaibo qui.
Jahuen teebo jan shinanai ta moxa quesca qui. Coriquiyahpati shinanax paramehti, jahuaborabo jan hashoan queenyorahi rihbi ta moxa quesca qui. Jaan rishquihah bimiyamascai.
Mai siri janin joi nincamaha ta nincacoinnicabo qui. Bimihi siripi. Huesti bero joconax caichi, caibo quiha treinta, caibo quiha sesenta, caibo quiha cien bero —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuejahi non johueyahpa chiqueho jotihin? ¿Quenti behonbohana naman tsahonih nan? ¿Jano hoxati tapo naman tsahonih nan? ¿Jano johue tsahonti janin tsahoni non jaaya joyamahin?
Yohiyamayaxihqui jone joi ta yama qui. Joneha jismayamayaxihquibo yamarihbihi.
Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue.
Man nincacai nincaquin sirijanahue. Man hinannoxon toponaitihi ta jatíhi rihbi mato hinantihiqui. Hashoan rihbi sca ta mato hinantihiqui.
Jaibo bi ta hashoan jaan hinantihiqui. Yamahibo bi ta jaabo jai pishca jato bichintihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Papan jihuemahi ta nescapah qui. Huesti jonin cahen bimi bero main mihsahahbonahan.
Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax, jasca jan hicha neten jaiya, jan mihsahahbonahipi bero joconscaax hanihi. Jenquetsahax hanihiquin jaan honanyamaquin.
Main joconaibo ta hahmebi bimihihqui. Pehi pari caini, bimihax res sca bero caniscai.
Canihiton ta tsinquiscanoxon xatebonacaniqui —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —¿Papan jihuemahi ta nescapah qui hihxon non jahua yohuan jatihin? ¿Jahua jaa patax queha joi non jatihin, Papan jihuemahi joi nincamanoxon?
Papan jihuemahi ta moxo bero quescapah qui. Main banahah bi ta jatihibi jihui bero mentan moxo bero hashoan hexti romishin qui.
Jascapah cahen banahipi joconi. Hanihi. Jatihibi banabo mentan hashoan hanihi. Hihtihosi mebihi, hotahi joxon hihsabaan sca jano nahajanon —jato jaquin.
Jascajaquin hicha jaa patax queha joi yohixon Papan joi jato nincamaquin jaabaan nincati hahtipahi tihi.
Jaa patax queha joi rahsi jato yohiquin. Huetsa jonibo jato betan hihyamascaiya cahen jahuen haxenicabo rahsi jatihibi yohiquin sirijascaquin.
Jaa neten bari hihquiscaiya cahen jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin: —Hoque quexa pohquejaqueti bonahue —hahquin.
Tsamajaquetaibo jenebahinax res sca hahan jan tsahotai nontin Jesusyabi pohquejaquecani. Huetsa nontibo rihbi hahchon pohquejaqueti.
Nihuehnhuan sca jahui. Behchoman nonti tsahcaquin. Nonti qui nachicohti jene bochonon.
Jascarai bi Jesus nonti chishqui quiri hoxahi. Nonti tsahotinin racatax tepitinin tepihax hoxahi. Mohinxon sca yocacanquin: —Maestron, ¿non mahuataiya mia jahua hihtimahin? —hahcanquin.
Mohinah nihueyahpa hian yohiquin: —Tantiscahue. Behchonyamascahue —jan jascahah nihue tantihi, behchon yamascai.
—¿Jahua jenquetsi man raquetain? ¿Man shinancoinyamahin? —jato jaquin.
Jan jascahah rahtetax yohinanancani: —¿Jahua hihxon yohihah nihuen bocabi nincaquihquin? ¿Hiaman bocabi nincaquihquin? —hihcani.
Hian hoque quexa Gadara mai qui sca nococani.
Nonti janinhax mapetaiton yoshin tiromayahpa joni Jesus behchihi jahui. Tsahonnihbo janin cahuan cahuani jihuetax joxon behchiquin.
Tsahonnihbo janin jaa cahuan cahuani nihrasihi. Tsoanbi nexati hahtipahyamahi joni, cadenanen bocabi nexatimahi.
Hicha coti cadenanen tanexxon menexahbaan bi jaan cadenabo tehcaquin, hahan tanexahbo tehcapaquequin. Jaa xecoti tsoabi coshi yamahi.
Jascabi tsahon tocan nichish mahchi rihbi manichish sai saihihshinahax sai saihihbahinahax hahmebi macaman tsehuérahsihi.
Jaan cahen hochoxon Jesus jisish hishtoquihrani jahuex hahqui betihihpaqueti.
Picohue Jesusen jaá bi betihihpaquexon coshin bi res yohiquin: —¿Hea min jahuejatihin, Jesusen, queya queha Diosen baquen? Diosen noque jisnon tah hen mia hihti yocacai: hea tiromajayamahue —hahquin.
—Jahuen yora mehax picohue, yoshin tiroman —Jesusen jaá jascajaquin.
Jesusen sca yocaquin: —¿Mia min jahua jane quin? —hahquin. —Heen jane ta Legion qui, noque non hichahi copi —hahquin.
Jascajaxon yoshiman hihti yocaquin, huetsa main jato camayamanon.
Jano rihbi ta hicha repinica cochi janishqui mananan pibonahibo.
—Cochi qui sca noque camahue, jato qui non hihquinon —hahquin yoshiman hihti yocaquin.
Jascajaha Jesus jeenhihqui. Yoshin tiromabo picotax res sca cochi qui sca hihquihi. Hihquihiboya jaa repinica dos mil rocohihcanahax quempe janinhax cayahax jenenencanya hihquihax hahsatax mahuati.
Cochi coirannicahbo sca jabaxon yohibonaquin jema janinxon, huenemanxon rihbi. Jaabaan yohihah cahen jahuahi jacanaxquin hihquish honani sca bocani jano jihuetaibo.
Jesus qui nocoxon yoshinyahpa hihrasihi joni jiscanquin. Yoshiman hichaxon hihbojani bi jano siripi tsahotai jiscanquin. Chopayahpahax res sca tsahotai jahuen shinan siriscai jiscanquin. Jisish raquecani.
Jan cochi qui yoshin mahnebohanxon yoshinyahpa joni rohajahi jisibaan ja to yohihah hihti raquecani.
Nincacax raquexon sca Jesus hihti yocascacanquin. Noquen mai mehax catanhue hahcanquin.
Nontin Jesus nanetaiton cahen yoshinyahpa hihrasihiton hihti yocascaquin, hahbetan cacatsihquin.
Jan jascahah bi Jesus jeenhihyamahi. —Miin caibo yohihi miin xoboho catanhue. Mihon shinanxon miin hihbaan mia hahxonai jatihibi yohitanhue —hahquin.
Jan jascahah yohihi caxon yohibonaquin. Decápolis jemabo janinhahbo yohiquin. Jatihibi Jesusen jaa hahxonai yohibonaquin. Jan yohibonaha jatihibi rahtecani.
Jaatian sca Jesus hoque quexa nontin pohquerihbihiya hicha joni hahqui tsamajaqueti. Hian quexa sca cahen jaa nichi.
Hapo sca nocoti. Jairo janeya, haho tsinquiti xobo hapo. Jesus jisish jahuen tahe qui betihipaquexon hihti yocaquin:
—Heen baque haibo pishca ta mahuacatsihquiqui, hapon. Miin mequeman mehexoni cahue. Rohahax jihuenon —hahquin.
Hahbetan sca Jesus cahi. Cahiya hichaxon Jesus chibancanquin. Tsehquesihcanahi bocani.
Jato betan rihbi huesti haibo cahi, doce bari sca jimihi hisinish.
Hicha rahonnicabaan rahonah bi rohayamahi, hohmis hohmisi, jahuen coriqui queyoquin. Rahonahbaan bi jascabi hisini, nanocohcanaribihi.
Jesusen hahcai nincacax tsamajaquetaibo tocan nichish hahchon cahi. Hahchon caquin sca jahuen chopa mehequin.
Jahuen yora meheyamaxon bi jahuen chopa pishca mehehax tah hen rohascatihi, hihxon mehequin.
Mehehax jimi tantiscai. Jahuen hisin rohascai jahuen jointinin honanquin.
Jesusen sca jahuen yora janinhax coshi cahi jahuen jointinin honanxon tsamajaquetaibo tocan rabejaquecahuanxon jano nichibo yocaquin: —¿Tsoan heen chopa mehehaxquin? —jato jaquin.
Jahuen haxenicabaan sca yohiquin: —¿Nea tsamajaquetaibo mihqui tsehquesihqui jisi bi min Tsoan hea mehehaxquin hihqui yocacahtain? —hahcanquin.
Jascajahibaan bi Jesusen jisjaquehtanquin, honannoxon.
Jan hahxonah honanax raquetax tastahihcanahi jahuex Jesus qui betihihpaquexon hihcoinjaquin sca haibaan jatihibi yohiquin.
Jaa cahen Jesusen yohiquin: —Baquen, min shinancoinai copi tah min rohascai. Shinanquin sirijahax caresscatanhue, miin hisin rohascaax caresscatanhue —hahquin.
Jan yohuanai betanbi hapon xobo janinhax jahuibo nocoti. Nocoxon tsinquiti xobo hapo yohicanquin: —Moa ta miin baque mahuascaaxqui. ¿Jahuejanoxon sca min maestro jatsanjahin? —hahcanquin.
Jascajahibo nincaxon Jesusen jaa hapo yohiquin: —Raquexonma shinancoinhue —hahquin.
Caquin sca tsoabi hahbetan camayamaquin. Pedro, Jacobo, Jacobonen huetsa Juan, jaabo rahsi Jesusen boquin.
Cahi, hapon xoboho nococani, haho tsinquiti xobo coiranicahton xoboho. Nocoxon corotaibo jisbonaquin, huaohihquiboya hihti huinihibo.
Hihcoxon Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man huaohihqui coro corotain? Mahuatihma bi ta xontaco hoxahihqui —jato jaquin.
Jascajahiton hosancanquin. Hosan hosana Jesusen jato jatihibi jeman cainmaquin. Jahuen papa, jahuen mama, hahbe jahuibo, jaabo rahsi cainmayamaquin. Jano xontaco racataiton sca jato betan Jesus hihcohi.
Xontaco metsonxon: —Talita, cumi —hahquin. Haibo pishcan, mia tah hen yohihi huenihue, hihcatsihqui.
Jan jascahah huenitax nichi. Doce bari jai xontaco. Jisish rahte rahtecani.
Jan xontaco hahxonai tsoabi yohiyamahahbo cahen Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin. Jascajaxon: —Xontaco piti hinannahue —jato jaquin.
Janohax res sca cahen jahuen mai janin sca Jesus caribihi. Jahuen haxenicabo rihbi hahbetan bocani.
Tantiti neten sca haho tsinquiti xobohoxon jato haxemaquin. Nincacax hicha jonibo rahte rahteti. —¿Jahuerahnohax nescapa yohuan haxenishquin? ¿Jenquetsahpa shinan bihnishquin? ¿Jahua coshin jahuen mequeman hahquiquin?
¿Hoa carpinteroma hin? ¿Marian baquema hin? ¿Jacobo, José, Judas, Simon jahuen jochicaboma hin? ¿Jahuen chocabo neno noque tocan jihueyamahiquin? —hihcani hahqui sinati.
—Huetsancohabo Papan joi yohinicahon queenaibaan bi ta jahuen mai janinhahbo res jahan queenyamahihqui. Jahuen jenabo, jahuen xobo janinhahbo rihbi jahan queenyamacani —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jaa jema janinxon ta jahuen coshin jato hahxonti hahtipahyamanishqui, huestibo res hisinaibo mehexon rohajaquin.
Hihcoinai jaabaan shinanyamahi copi Jesus rahteti. Jemabo janin sca haxemabonahi cahi.
Jahuen doce quenaxon yoshin tiromabo picoti jato hihbomaxon rabe rabebo jato raanquin.
Raannoxon jato hihti yohiquin, mequen botanahbo, huesti hahqui paxati mepitiya res bohabo. Piti boyamanon, borasa, jaya cati coriqui rihbi boyamanon.
Sapato sahuequin bi rabe coton sahueyamanon.
—Xoboho hihcohax janobi banenahue, jaa jema janinhax canoxon caman.
Mato Johue hahyamaxon mato nincacatsihyamahiboya janohax caquin maton sapato qui hueotai mai poto jato qui tahabahini botannahue yohitimabohi honanahbo —jato jaquin.
Jaan jascajaha boresscacani, shinan pontenahue jato jabonahi bocani.
Hicha yoshin rihbi picocanquin. Hicha hisinyahpabo rihbi xeniyaxon bemanxon rohajacanquin.
Jascajahiboya cahen Jesusen joi jatihixonbi nincacanquin. Herodes janeya quiquin hapon rihbi nincaquin. Jesus yohihi cahen caibo nescari yohuannish: —Nashimanica Juan ta mahuatipish bi teehihribihiqui. Jaa copi ta jascajaquin coshin hahquiqui —hihcani.
—Elías yamanica tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. —Papan joi yohinica tah qui. Neateman Papan joi yohipahoni quescapah tah qui —hihqui caibo sca.
Jesusen hahcai nincacax Herodes sca jascarihbihi: —Juan ta jihuerihbihihqui. Hean rehtequin textebahinhoh bi ta teehihribihiqui —hihqui.
Jascari yohuanyahnoxon ta Herodias copi Juan bihmaxon Herodesnen Juan sipojanishqui. Herodias Felipenin haibo que bi ta Herodesnen bichinnishqui. Jahuen huetsan haibo bichinquin.
Bichinaiton cahen Juaman Herodes yohiquin: —Miin huetsan haibo bichintima joi ta jaiqui, noquen nincati joi —hahquin.
Jan jascahah Herodesnen haibo Herodias Juan qui rainyamahi jihuexon rehtecatsihquin bi hahtipahyamaquin, jahuen benen pantehah.
Juan ponte jihueti hohchajomahi honanax Juan qui raquequin Herodesnen coiranquin, caibaan rehtemis hihxon. Juan nincaxon jahua shinanti honanyamaquin bi nincaquin, coin coinxon.
Jahuen bari nocotai neten sca cahen Herodesnen fiestajaquin. Pihi jahuebo jahuen tinintibo quenamaquin, jahuen sontaro hapobo quenamaxon Galilea mai meha patorobo rihbi quenamaquin. Fiestajahiboya jahuen haibaan Juan copicatsihquin shinanquin: Rahma caya tah hen Juan rehteti hahtipahscai hihqui.
Fiestajahibo qui hihcohax Herodiasnen baque xontaco jato bairahxonaiya hahan Herodes hihti jenimahi, jan quenamahabo rihbi. Jenimaxon Herodesnen yohiquin: —Min queenaibo hea yocareshue, hen mia hinannon.
Jascajaxon Papa Dios quenaxon sca xontaco yohirihbiquin: —Min hea yocacaibo tah hen mia hinantihi, heen yonotibo jatíhi hena hihnon jatíhi rihbi mina hihnon caman —hahquin.
Yohiha jahuen mama yocaqui sca caresscai. —¿Jahua yocapan? —hahquin. —Nashimanica Juaman mapo rahan —hahquin jahuen maman.
Hapo qui histon caribixon sca yohiquin: —Nashimanica Juaman mapo tah hen queenai rahmabi. Quencha qui nanexon min hea hinanti tah hen queenai —hahquin.
Yocacah sca hapon masa shinanquin. Hihtijaquin masa shinanxon bi Dios quenaxon yohixon copi jahuen joi huetsajati hahtipahyamaquin. Jan quenamahibaan nincacah copi rihbi jeenhahscaquin.
Jeenhihxon, rehtexonnica sontarobo sca raanquin, jahuen mapo bihtanahbo. Raanah caxon carcel janinxonbi Juan textecanquin.
Quencha qui jahuen mapo nanehax jaya joxon xontaco hinancanquin. Xontaconen sca jahuen mama hinanrihbiquin.
Jascajahibo nincacax ta Juaman haxenicabo jahuen yora bichi canishqui. Jahuen yora bihxon tsahoncanquin.
Jesusen jato raanah catanipish Jesus qui jahuen raantibo joribihi. Joxon jaabaan hahtanipi yohixon jaabaan haxematanipi yohirihbiquin jatihibi.
Yohihiboya Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Mato rahsibi tantihi bonahue jano tsoabi yamahiton —jato jaquin. Cahi jahuibo hichahiya ta pinoxon bocabi tantiti hahtipahyamacannishqui.
Jano tsoabi yamahiton sca nontin bocani jaabo rahsibi.
Jaabo cahi cahen hichaxon jiscanquin. Jato honancanquin. Jatihibi jema janinhax quetanpaquebahini cahax jaabo pari nocoti, jano nontin cahi janin.
Nocoxon hicha tsamascaibo Jesusen jisbonaquin. Coiranyamaha carnerobo behnocanahi quescapahbo jato jisquin. Jatohon shinanxon hicha jato haxemarihbiquin.
Bepiscaiya sca hahqui joxon jahuen haxenicabaan yohiquin: —Neno ta jahua yamahihqui. Bepi rihbi sca ta jaiqui.
Jano huaiyahpabo jaiton jato raanscahue, hochoma jemabo janinxon rihbi jaton piti marohi cahabo —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo: —Piti hinannahue, matonbi —jato jaquin. —¿Non doscientos denario copi paan marohi catihin, jato pimanoxon? —hahcanquin.
—¿Jahuentihi paan man jain? Jistannahue —jato jaquin. Jistani jahuex sca: —Pichca rahan. Rabe yapa rihbi —hihcani.
Jato jatihibi sca Jesusen yohiquin, cincuenta cincuentaboya cien joni rahsi jano huasi mipaxbihtaiton tsahonon.
Jascari tsinquitax tsahocani cincuenta cincuentabo, cien cienbo.
Jaton pichca paan bihxon jaton rabe yapa rihbi bihxon nai bejisihnixon Papa yocaxon paan tehcapaquexon jahuen haxenicabo hinanscaquin, tsamajaquetaibo hinanpaquehahbo. Yapa rabe rihbi jatihibi hinanpaquemaquin.
Hinanah jatihixonbi pihi yanicahini.
Paan tequeboya yapa tequebo tsinquirihbixon sca doce tasa bohasjacanquin.
Paan pihibo cahen cinco mil bebobo. Hichaxon bi jatihi tasa bocho texejacanquin.
Jaatian sca chini canoxon jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin, nontin nanetax Betsaida jema janin pohquejaquenon. Jaabo cahiya cahen tsamajaquetaibo Jesusen yohiquin xobon caresscatannon.
Jato yohihax manan manixon Papa yocaqui cahi.
Yamescaiya cahen nonti caresscai bi Jesus huesti main baneti.
Nihuen tsahcahah huinacasquimahibo bi jaan jato jisquin. Xaba paqueri jaima sca jato qui cahi, jene benicanahi. Jato huinobahincatsihqui bi jaabaan meraquin.
Jene benicahinquihranai jisish, Yoshin tah qui, hihquish sai saihihcani.
Jatihixonbi jisish hihti raquecani. —Jointi coshijanahue. Hea tah hen qui. Raqueyamanahue —jato jaquin.
Jato qui nontin nanetaiya cahen nihue tantiscai. Nihue tanticahinaiya hihti rahtescacani.
Paan tehcapaquexon jahuen coshi jan jato jismahipi bi honanyamacanquin, jaton shinan chahomahiya.
Pohquejaquetax Genesaret main taxnati. Taxnaxon nonti nexacanquin.
Nonti mehax bototaiton janohahbaan Jesus honancanquin.
Honanax jatihibinco hishtocahini caxon hisinyahpabo jaton cacajatinin racatai hihuecanquin. Jano Jesus jai nincaxon jano becanquin.
Jatihibinco jan cahi, hanitahma jemabo janin, hani jemabo janin, huenenaiton rihbi, hisinyahpabo bexon jano maronicabo tsinquitai hueneman jato racancanquin. Racanahbo Jesus yocacanquin jahuen chopa quechon bocabi mehenoxon. Jaa mehehibo jatihibi ta rohanishqui.
Jaatian sca huishani honanbo betan fariseobo Jesus qui tsinquicani, Jerusalen janinhax jahui honanbo. Tsinquixon jahuen haxenicabaan pihi jiscanquin.
Mechoquihxonma jaton mequen rishtayaxon texe jahuen haxenicabaan pihibo jiscanquin.
Mechoquihyamaxon ta fariseobaan piyamahiqui, jatihibi judiobaan rihbi jascajarihbiquin. Jaton xenibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin ta jacanihqui.
Jano piti maroti janinhax joxon ta nashiyamaxon piyamacaniqui. Hicha jascapahbo japahoni ta jacanihqui. Pinoxon ta posillobo, poobo, yami quentibo qui jene jasijacanihqui.
Fariseobo betan huishani joi honanbaan sca Jesus yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin miin haxenicabaan noquen xenibaan hahpahoni quescajayamahiquin? Mechoquihxonma ta picanihqui. Jaton mequen qui hueotai hohchayabi ta picanihqui —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —Ponte bi res ta mato qui yohuanquin Isaiasnen huishanishqui: Nea jonibo jaton janan siripi hehqui yohuanai bi ta jaton shinan hocho bi res qui, hehon queenyamacani.
Papan joi haxemahicamaxon bi ta jonibaan joi honanmacanihqui. Yanca bi res ta hehqui betihipaquecanihqui hah ta Isaiasnen janishqui.
Jonibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin hahnoxon tah man Papan yohini joi jenehi.
Jato jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Sirija ra tah man jai, maton xenibaan hahpahoni quescascanoxon Papan joi jenequin.
Moisesnin ta yohinishqui: Miin papahon queenhue, miin mamahon queenhue. Huetsa jan yohini ta nea qui: Tiromahi jahuen papa qui yohuanai joni tah man rehteti jai, jahuen mama qui tiromahi yohuanai rehtequin cahneyamaquin.
Jaan jascajani que bi tah man matonbi yohihi: Maton papa, maton mama yohinahue Jaa hen mia hinanpanan ta Corban qui, hahquin. Corban ta Papa qui hinanah hihcatsihquiqui.
Jascari yohuanmaxon tah man jaton mama hahxontima haxemahi, jaton papa hahxontima haxemahi.
Jascajaxon tah man Papan joi pantehi, maton xenibaan hahpahoni quescajaquin tah man maton rihbi maton baquebo haxemahi. Jascapajahi tah man jai hicha —jato jaquin.
Jonibo quenarihbixon sca jato yohiquin: —Hea nincanahue, jatihixonbi honannahue.
Jahuabi ta noque chicho quehama noque qui nanexon noque rishtajatimahiqui. Noquen jointinin non shinanaiton ta noque rishtajahiqui.
Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincahue —jato jaquin.
Jato potabahinax xobohoh hihcohiton jan jato yohiha jahuen haxenicabaan yocaquin, min yohiha jahua hihcatsihquiquin, hahquin.
Yocaca jato yohiquin: —¿Mato rihbi man honanti pishinain? Noque chicho quehamabo ta noque qui nanexon noque rishtajati hahtipahyamahiqui. ¿Man honanyamahin? —jato jaquin, jatihibi pitibo hahan jointi rishtajatima sca janon.
Jaatian sca: —Noquen jointi qui hihquihima bi ta poco janin res nanetihqui. Poco janin nanetax jaroma caini —jato jaquin.
Jato yohirihbiquin: —Noquen jointinin non shinanaiton ta noque rishtajahiqui.
Noquen jointinin tah non shinanai: tiroma shinanbo, benejomabo betan hihti, queejomabo betan hihti, yometsohti, joni rehteti, benoyahpabo betan hihti, queeyahpbo betan hihti
caibaan jahuequibo bichinti, tiromajati, paranti, tsiniti, notsi notsiti, joni qui tiromahi yohuanti, yohitimabohi, honanmabohi.
Jascapa tiromabo rahsi tah non noquen jointinin shinanxon hahcai rishtascanoxon —jato jaquin.
Jato jascahax janohax Tiro jema janinbo sca caresscai. Nocotax bi jan jano hihqui honanyamahahbo xoboho hihcocani. Hihcohax bi jenquetsahax jonetimahi.
Jesus nocotai joi nincacax huesti haibo jahui, jahuen haibo baque pishca yoshiman hihbojahi. Jahuex Jesusen tahe qui betihihpaqueti.
Jaa haibo ta judiobaan nahua hihpahonishqui, sirofeniciabaan jena. Jahuen baque janinhah yoshir picoxonti jaan hihti yocaquin.
—Baquebo pari pimanon. Baquebaan paan pihi bichinxon tah non hochitinin pinon potantimahi —hahquin Jesusen.
—Jascari rahan, Hihbon. Jaabi ta baquebaan paquehi paan tomes misa namanxon hochitinin pihiqui —hahquin haibaan.
—Jascarax tah min caresscatihi. Yoshin ta miin baque janinhax picoscaiqui —haibo jaquin.
Jan jascahah xoboho caxon jahuen baque bachiho racatai meraquin, siri scah.
Jaatian sca Tiro janinbohax cahi Sidon jema nabebacahini, Galilea hian janin carihbihi, Decapolis maibo nabebacahini cahi.
Cahiton bi pabe joni Jesus qui hiocanquin. Pabehax bi joyorihbi. Jesusen mehenon sca yocaxoncanquin.
Tsamajaquetaiboma qui pabe nihcahuancahuanquihnxon jahuen pabinqui janin jahuen metoti niaquin. Toshbanhahxon jahuen jana mehequin.
Nai bejisihnixon jointi xecahihnixon: —Efata —hahquin. Quehpemehhue hihcatsihqui.
Jascahiya jahuen pabinqui quehpemehscai, jahuen jana janpequehtax yohuani siriscai.
Jaa rohascaiya cahen Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin tsoabi yohiyamanon. Jan hihti yohihah bi hashoan hicha sca yohicanquin.
Hihti rahtetax yohuancani. —Jatihibijaquin ta sirijahiqui. Pabehibo nincamaquin. Joyobo yohuanmaquin —hihcani.
Jascasca jaiya hicha joni tsamajaquetaiya jahua pitimahiya jahuen haxenicabo quenaxon jato yohiquin:
—Nea tsamajaquetaibahon tah hen shinanai. Quimisha neten sca hehbetan hihxon bi ta jahuabi piyamacanihqui.
Pihaxma jaton xobon cahabo raanah ta bahin mehax jaton yora yosmajaquexihcanihqui, caibo rihbi hocho quehabo —jato jaquin.
Jascaha jahuen haxenicabaan: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non nea jonibo pimatihin, neno tsoabi jihueyamahiton? —hahcanquin.
—¿Jahuentihi paan man jain? —jato yocaquin. —Siete rahan —hihcani.
Tsamajaquetaibo sca jaan yohiquin, main tsahonon. Jaton siete paan bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcapaquexon jahuen haxenicabo hinanquin, jonibo sca hinannon hihxon. Bihxon sca jato hinanpaquecanquin.
Yapa romishin huestibo rihbi cahen jaabo jai. Jaa bihxon Papa yocaxon jato hinanmarihbiquin.
Hinanah pihi yanicahincani. Texehi tequebo tsinquirihbixon siete tasa bohasjacanquin.
Cuatro mil jonibo jano hihqui bi jato pimaxon cahabo jato camascaquin.
Jaatian sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi nontin nanetax Dalmanuta main sca cahi.
Fariseobo sca ta Jesus qui jonishqui. Joxon Jesus yohuanquihnquin, joi bichinnanancatsihquin. Papan hinanah hahan honanti jan jato jismanon hihxon yocacanquin.
Jascahiboya jointi hihti xecahihnixon jato yohiquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin nea rahma jihuetai jonibaan hahan honanti jiscatsihquiquin? Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: jahuabi hahan honantibi ta mato jismatimahihqui —jato jaquin.
Jato banescaax nontin nanerihbihax ramiho quexa sca cahi cahi.
Caquin bi piti boti shinanbehnocanquin. Huesti paan res nonti janin jai.
Coirametahbo jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Fariseobaan hahan paan soohihmati qui raquenahue. Herodesnen hahan paan soohihmati qui raquenahue —jato jaquin.
Jaa jan yohihi jaabo rahsibi sca yocacahcani: —Non paan yamahiya cahra noque yohihihquin —hihcani.
Jascajaquin shinanaibo honanxon Jesusen sca jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua jenquetsahin man paan yamahi yocacahnananain? ¿Man jiscoinyamaparihin? ¿Man honancoinyamaparihin? ¿Maton shinan chahoma sca quin?
¿Beroyahpaxon bi man jisyamahin? ¿Pabinquiyahpaxon bi man nincayamahin? ¿Cinco mil jonibo pimanoxon pichca paan hen tehcapaquehiya texehi teque tsinquirihbixon jahuentihi tasa man bohasjahoquin? ¿Man shinanyamahin? —jato jaquin.
—Doce rahan —hihcani.
—¿Siete paan cahran, hahan hen cuatro mil pimahiya texehi teque tsinquixon jahuentihi tasa man bohasjahipiquin? —jato jaquin. —Siete rahan —hihcani.
—¿Man honancoinyamaparihin? —jato jaquin.
Betsaida jema janin sca nococani. Nocotaiboya benche joni Jesus qui caibaan hiocanquin. Hioxon hihti yocacanquin, mehexonhue hahquin.
Yocacah benche metsonxon hiobonahi jemama qui cahi. Benchen bero qui toshbanhahxon mequeman mehexon sca yocaquin: —¿Min jisyamabiresain? —hahquin.
Jari jisxon: —Jihui nihcahuanai quescapahbo ta hen joni jisi —hahquin.
Jaatian sca jahuen bero meherihbihah coshicahinxon jisribiquin. Siriscaxon jatihibi sca jisquin sirijaquin.
Jahuen xobon sca jan catannon: —Jema janin hihquihaxma catanhue —Jesusen jaquin.
Jaatian sca jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus cahi, Cesarea de Filipo mai meha jemabo janin sca. Caquin jato yocaquin: —¿Hea tsoa hihqui shinancaniquin? —jato jaquin.
—Nashimanica Juan yamanica tah qui hih ta caibo jaiqui. Elías yamanica tah qui hih ta caibo rihbi jaiqui. Papan joi yohipahoni yamanica tah qui hih ta huetsabo rihbi jaiqui —hihcani jahuen haxenicabo.
Jaan sca jato yocarihbiquin: —¿Maton cahran? ¿Hea tsoa hihqui shinan man jain? —jato jaquin. —Mia tah min Cristo qui —hahquin Pedronen.
—Tsoabi jascajaquin yohiyamanahue —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jaatian sca jato sirijaquin yohiquin: —Hea noque baque ta tiromajayaxihcanihqui. Hehon ta queenyamayaxihcanihqui hanibo, sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo. Hea ta rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehipibo bi tah hen quimisha netenax hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Jahuabi joi jonexonma jato jascajaquin. Jesus quenabohanxon sca Pedronen yohiquin: —Jascari yohuanyamahue —hahquin.
Rabejaquexon jahuen haxenicabo jisxon Pedro yohiquin: —Jascayamahue. Hea janinhax catanhue, Satanas. Papan shinanai quescajaquinma bi jonin shinanai quescajaquin tah min shinanai —hahquin.
Jahuen haxenicaboya tsamajaquetai jonibo nincaqui jonon sca jato quenaquin. Jato quenaxon: —Hehchon jocatsihxon tah man matobi man queenaima sca man hahtihi. Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen heen Hihbo jenetimahi hihnahue, nete tihibi jascanahue. Jaatian tah man heen jihuetahbo jatihi.
Non mahuamis hihquibo ta mahuatihiqui. Hehqui hinamehxon heen joi siri nincacoinaibo ta rehtehah bi jihuetihiqui.
¿Mai jatihobi hihbojahax bi mahuatax jahuaya sca man banetihin?
¿Hahquirihbi teehihnoxon non copijaquin jahua hinantihin?
Rahma jaibo ta tsini tsinihibo qui, hohchapan baquebo. Hehqui hihtimahpai joni qui tah hen hea rihbi hihtimahyaxihqui. Heen joi qui hihtimahpai joni qui rihbi tah hen hea noquebaque hihtimahyaxihqui Papan yonotibo betan Papan shinanya jahuex jato qui hihtimahpi —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon: —Mato ta hen yohicoinai: jahuen coshin Papan jihuemahi joresscai jisyanoxon caman ta texe neno nichibo mahuayamayaxihquiqui.
Jato jascahax seis neten sca hihxon Pedro, Jacobo, Juan jaabo rahsi Jesusen boquin. Hani mahchi jato maniquihnquin jaabo rahsibi. Jatoyabi maniscaax jaton jisnonbi huetsapahcahini.
Jahuen chopa xabareneni joxoshamani. Jascapa joxojahti ta tsoanbi main jihuetai pahtsanicaton hahtipahyamahiqui.
Elías yamanica betan Moises yamanica sca jato qui cainax Jesus betan yohuan yohuani.
Yohuanaibaan bi Pedronen sca Jesus yohiquin: —Maestron, noque neno hihqui ta siri qui. Quimisha tapasnonhue. Mina huesti, Moisesnina huesti rihbi, Eliasnena huesti rihbi —hahquin.
Jahua yohiti honanyamahax jascari yohuani. Hihti rahtecani.
Jato bochiqui cahen nai cohin maracahti. Nai cohin chicho quehax sca yohuani jai: —Nea ta hen hihti queenai heen baque qui. Jaa nincanahue —hihqui.
Nincaxon jisbohanrenenxon bi tsoabi jisyamacanquin. Jesus huesti jano jai meracanquin.
Jaa pecaho sca mahchi mehax botopaquexon Jesusen jato hihti yohiquin: —Man rahma jisí tsoabi yohiyamanahue. Hea noquebaque hihquipish bi hahquirihbi hueninon caman yohiyamanahue —jato jaquin.
Jan jascahah tsoabi yohiyamacanquin. Hihquipish bi hahquirihbi huenitihi jan hihqui bi jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihquish jaabo rahsibi yocacahanancani.
Jesus sca yocacanquin: —¿Jahua copi Elías pari ta jotihiqui huishani honanbaan jaiquin? —hahcanquin.
Jaan sca: —Hihcoini. Elías pari joti jai. Jatihibi rohajahi jahui. Hean sca hen mato yocanon: ¿Jahua yohihi nea huishani joi jaiquin? Noquebaque ta hihti tiromajayaxihcanihqui, hosan hosan rihbi ta jayaxihcanihqui.
Mato ta hen yohihi. Elías ta moa joresscanishqui. Jahuiton bi ta jaabo queenai quescajaquin jaabaan janishqui jayaxihquibo Papan huishani quescajaquin —jato jaquin.
Jahuen haxenicabo qui nocoxon sca jato qui hicha tsamajaquetaibo meracanquin. Huishani honanbo jato betan joi bichinanaiton jiscanquin.
Jesus jahui jisish rahtetax jatihibi tsamajaquetai jonibo sca hahqui bishquihihcahinxon hicotancanquin.
Jaatian sca jaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua yohuan man jato betan jain?
Yocacah sca tsamajaquetaibo meha huestichin yohiquin: —Heen baque ta hen mihqui hihuehahqui, Maestron, joyo yoshiman hihbojani quen.
Jan janoxon shinanaiton bi ta hueran paquehihqui. Bacox jancharahicahini. Jahuen xeta yeres yeres hahquin. Jahuen yora jestancahini. Picoxonhue hah hen miin haxenicabo jaah bi ta hahtipahyamacanaxqui —hahquin.
—Nincayosmabon, jascapahbo tah man qui. ¿Jahuentiho basi hen mato betan jatihin? ¿Jahuentiho basi hen mato tenetihin? Neno hehqui hihuenahue —jato jaquin.
Hahqui hihuescacanquin. Jesus meraxon cahen tiroma yoshiman beronan tastahihmaquin. Tastahihquish maihi taramehcanahi, bacox jancharahiquish.
Jahuen papa Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Jahuentiho basi nescari jihuescaiquin? —hahquin. —Baque pishcabihaxbi rahan.
Hicha coti ta chihi janin hueranrahsihiqui, jenenencanya rihbi hueranquin rehtecatsihquin. Hahtipahxon noque yanapanhue noquehon shinanxon —hahquin jahuen papan.
—¿Hahtipahxon nan? Shinancoinai jonin jisi ta jatihibi jati hahtipahti qui —hahquin Jesusen.
Yoshinyahpaton papa sca coshin yohuani: —Hen ta hen shinancoinai. Hen hashoan sca nincacoinnon hea yanapanhue —hahquin.
Hicha bishquihihcahinquiranax jahuex tsamajaquetaibo jisxon tiroma yoshin Jesusen yohiquin: —Joyo yoshiman, pabe yoshiman. Mia ta hen yohihi. Jahuen yora mehax picohue, jahuentianbi hahqui joyamascanoxon —hahquin Jesusen.
Sai saihihquish coshin tastahihmahax picoti. Beronan mahuati quescapi racati. Jatihibi sca yohuanquehancani: —Mahua sca ta jaiqui —hihcani.
Jesusen sca metsonxon huenihihnihah hueniscai.
Xoboho Jesus mapescaiya sca jahuen haxenicabaan jaabo rahsichin yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsahpahin non picoti hahtipahyamahaquin? —hahcanquin.
—Jascapa tah man Papa yocaxon res picotihi. Huetsajaxon tah man jenquetsahaxon bi picotimahi.
Janohax Galilea mai nabebacahini bocani. Jaabo jano cahi tsamajaquetaibaan honanti Jesus queenyamahi.
Jahuen haxenicabo res haxemabonanoxon jaabo rahsi nihquihinquin. Jato nihquihinquin yohiquin: —Jaton jonibaan hea bihnon ta hea hinanyaxihcanihqui. Bihxon sca tah hea rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehahbo sca tah hen quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascahah bi honancoinyamacanquin. Yocacahcatsihqui bi raquecani.
Capernaum jeman sca nococani. Xobohoxon sca Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua yohuan man jaonahin? —hahquin.
Yocacah bi jahua hihyamacani. Tsoa non hashoan coshi quin yocacahnananhonahax bi rahma jahua hihyamascai.
Tsahoxon jahuen doce joni quenaxon sca jato yohiquin: —Bebocatsihqui joni ta chiniti jaiqui, jatihixon bi yononica —hahquin.
Huesti baque pishca bihxon naponbi nichinxon hicobehnanxon jato yohiquin:
—Nescapa baque pishca heen janen johue hahcai jonin ta hea rihbi johue hahquiqui. Hea johue hahcai jonin ta hea que ma bi hea raanni johue hahquiqui —jato jaquin.
Juaman sca yohiquin: —Huesti joni tah non merahipiqui, Hihbon. Miin jane yohixon tiroma yoshinbo picohi. Noque betan ta nihyamahiqui. Noque chibanyamahiya ta non jascajayamahue hahquipiqui —hihscai Juan.
Jesusen yohiquin: —Jascajaquin yohiyamanahue. Heen jane yohixon coshin hahcai joni ta hahcax res sca hehqui tiromahi yohuantimahihqui.
Noque panteyamahibaan ta noque yanapanihqui.
Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: mia Criston joni copi hahxoncatsihquin mia jene pishca xehamahi joni ta copijacoinyaxihquiqui.
Nescapa hea nincacoinai baque pishca hohchamahibo ta Papan hihti tiromajayaxihquiqui. Jascapahbo macanya tenexxon jenenencanya potahah sirijaquin shinantimahi bi ta Papan casticana hihti tiromajaquin shinanyaxihquiqui.
Miin mequeman tiromajanicahax mextehihhue. Mento jihuenish bi queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe mequenyabi nocayosma chihi janin potahah hihti tiroma bi res qui.
Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui. Jaa chihi rihbi ta jahuentianbi nocayamahiqui.
Miin tahen tiromajanicahax taxtehihhue. Tanto jihuenish bi queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe taheya chihi janin potahah mia hihti tiromascatihi.
Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui. Chihi rihbi jahuentianbi nocayamahi.
Miin beron tiromajanicaxon miin bero tsecahue. Huesti beroya jihuenish queyoyamanox manatah tiroma que ma bi ta rabe beroya chihi janin potahah mia hihti tiromascatihi.
Jano ta jaton xena jahuentianbi mahuayamahiqui, chihi rihbi jahuentianbi nocayamahi.
Tashi nepocah quesca ta jatihibi jonibo chihin jatiqui.
Tashi ta siri qui. ¿Tashi jahuíyamascaiton jahuínon hihxon jenquetsahaxon man hahquirihbi jahuíjatihin? Tashiyahpa jihuenahue. Joni huetsa betan siripi jihuenahue.
Janohax caresscai Judea mai janin, Jordan hoque quexa rihbi. Jano rihbi hahqui tsamajaquecani. Jan hahrasihi quescajaquin sca jato haxemarihbiquin.
Hahqui joxon sca tanacatsihquin fariseobaan yocaquin: —¿Bebaan jahuen haibo potati joi yama quin? —hahcanquin.
—¿Jahua Moisesnin huishanishquin, man jascajanon? —jato jaquin.
—Jascajati queenaibo ta Moisesnin yohinishqui: Bebaan ta jahan jahuen haibo potati quirica huishaxon jahuen haibo potatihiqui —hihcani.
Jesusen sca: —Man jointi chahomahi copi ta jascajaquin huishanishqui.
Nete jamenohi tian ta bebo betan haibo Papan jato jonijanishqui.
Jaa copi ta jahuen papaya jahuen mama jenebahinax jahuen haibo betan sca bebo jihueti canicah qui.
Jaabo rabehax bi huesti yora sca jihueti. Rabe hihyamascai, huesti yora sca jai.
Jaa copi jaabo rabe Papan huestijaha tsoanbi potamayamaxahtahi man —jato jaquin.
Xoboho sca jahuen haxenicabo jaa joi hahquirihbi yocacahti.
Jaan sca jato yohiquin: —Jahuen haibo potaxon huetsa haibo bichi joni ta jahuen haibo qui hohchati jihuetihqui, tsinihi.
Jahuen bene potaxon huetsa bebo bichi haibo rihbi ta jahuen bene qui hohchati jihuetihqui, tsinihi —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca Jesus qui baquebo hihuecanquin jato mehexonnon. Hihuehiton jahuen haxenicabaan yohiquin: —Jascapahya joyamanahue —hahcanquin.
Jascajahibo jisish sinaxon jato yohiquin: —Panteyamanahue, hehqui baquebo behabo. Jascapah ta Papan jihuemati qui.
Nincanahue hen mato yohinon: baque pishcaten Papa Dios hihbojamahi quescajayamahax tah man Papan jihue janin jahuentianbi catimahi.
Jato jascajaxon baquebo hicotanxon mehexon Papa yocaxonquin.
Carihbihi bi huesti joni bishquihihcahinxon hahqui raboxonen tisquihahpaquexon yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsahax hen queyoyamanox manatihin, maestro siripan? —hahquin.
Jesusen sca yohiquin: —¿Jahua copi min hea siripan hahcain? Tsoabi ta sirima qui. Papa huesti ta siri qui.
Papan joi tah min honanai. Rehteyamahue. Tsiniyamahue. Yometsohyamahue. Caibo qui quesahi yohuanyamahue. Paranxon bichinyamahue. Miin papa, miin mama nincacoinhue —hahquin.
—Beronan pishcahax bi ta hen jascari jihuescai —hihqui yocanica.
Sirijaquin bejisxon sca jahan queenxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Huesti tah min pishinparihi. Jatihibi miin jahuequibo maromaxon jahuabijomabo coriqui hinantanhue naihoh quehax bi sca min hicha bi res jayaxahnon. Jascajatanax joribihue hehbe canoxon —hahquin.
Jan jascajaha jahuen jahuequibo hichahi copi metsamarenenax masa shinanbahini caresscai.
Jato jispaquexon sca jahuen haxenicabo Jesusen yohiquin: —Jahuequi hichayahpa joni jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti ta tee bi res qui —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jan jascajaha jahuen haxenicabo rahtecani. Rahtetaiton Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti ta tee bi res qui, heen baquebaan.
Hahua xohmox bero chirehuinti tee que bi ta jahuequi hichayahpa joni jano Papan jihuemahi janin hihquiti hashoan tee qui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascajaha hihti rahtetax yohuancani: —¿Jascahiya tsoa non queyoyamanox manatihin? —hihcani.
Jato jisxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Jonibaan hahtipahyamahi bi ta Papan hahtipahiqui. Papan ta jatihibijati hahtipahiqui —jato jaquin.
—Jise. Jatihibi jenebahinax tah non mihbetan sca cahi —hihscai Pedro.
—Hen mato yohinon nincanahue. Jahuen xobo, jahuen huetsabo, jahuen chocabo, jahuen mama, jahuen papa, jahuen baquebo, jahuen huaibo, jaa rahsi hea copi, heen joi siri copi rihbi jenebahinai jonin ta jan potabahinai quescahpabo rihbi bihyaxihquiqui.
Bih ta jatihiqui xobobo, huetsabo, chocabo, mamabo, baquebo, huaibo. Huesti jenebahinnixon ta cien sca bihribiyaxihquiqui. Rahma tahni ta jascapahbo bihyaxihquiqui, caibaan sca jato tiromajacatsihquin jatsanjanon. Papan jihuemahitian rihbi ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui.
Hicha bebocanahibo ta chinijaqueyaxihquiqui. Chinitaibo ta beboyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca bahin cahax, Jerusalen janin bocani. Jesus bebohi. Jano cahiya ta jan honanmahibo rahtecannishqui. Chibanaibo rihbi raquecani. Hahquirihbi jahuen doce joni quenabohanxon jaa huinoyaxihquibo jato yohiquin.
—Jisnahue. Jerusalen janin tah non cahi. Jano ta sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo rihbi hea hinanyaxihcanihqui. Hinanahbo ta Rehteti ta jaiqui hihxon nahuabo jaabaan sca hinanyaxihquiqui.
Hea hosanxon ta hehqui toshbanhahxon rishquixon rehteyaxihcanihqui. Rehtehipi bi tah hen quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca Zebedeon baque rabe Jacobo betan Juan Jesus betanbi pecantaba cahi, yohuancanahi: —Non mia yocacai noque hahxonhue, Maestron —hahcanquin.
Jaan sca: —¿Jahueja mato jaxonti man queenain? —jato jaquin.
—Min jihuemahi tian noque tsahomaxahnhue, huetsa mia mecayaho, huetsa mia memiho —hahcanquin.
Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Man yocacai tah man honanyamahi. ¿Hean xehahi mocani man maton rihbi xehati hahtipahin? ¿Hahan hea nashimahiton mato rihbi nashimaha man teneti hahtipahin? —jato jaquin.
—Tenequin rahan —hihcani. —Hean xehahi mocani tah man maton rihbi xehatihi. Hahan hea nashimahiton ta mato rihbi nashimayaxihcanihqui.
Hea mecayaho tsahomati hihboma tah hen qui, hea memiho rihbi. Jano tsahonica rahsi ta jano tsahotihqui —jato jaquin.
Jacobo betan Juan jascaraiya nincaxon jahuen diez jonibo jato qui rainyamacani.
Jato quenaxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Nahua hapobaan ta jaton jonibo jihuematihi bi yono yonohihqui man tah man honanai. Jaton patorobaan rihbi jato coshin yonohi ta man honanrihbihi.
Mato tah man jascahpabo jatimahi. Maton hapocatsihqui ta maton yonoti jatihiqui.
Maton cacannicacatsihqui ta jatihibichin teexonnica jatihiqui.
Jascarihbihi tah hen hahxoni joníqui, yonohima. Hicha jihuetahbo tah hen mahuati joníqui, jaton ribin copijaxoni quescari.
Jericó jema janin sca nococani. Jahuen haxenicaboyabi cahax hicha joniboya rihbi janohax cahiya, bahimahhuan hihquicahuanax Timeon baque Bartimeo tsahoti. Bartimeo cahen benche joni, coriqui yocanica joni.
Jesus jano huinotai yohihahbo coshin quenaquin: —Hehon shinanhue, Jesus, Davidinin baquen —hahquin.
Jascaraiton: —Jascayamahue. Netehue —hahcanquin hichaxon. Jascahahbo hashoan coshin sca yohuani: —Hehon shinanhue, Davidinin baquen —hahquin.
Nihrenenxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Jaa quenanahue —jato jaquin. Benche joni sca quenacanquin: —Jenimahax huenihue. Mia ta quenamahiqui —hahcanquin.
Jahuen rahcoti potabahinax histon huenicahuanax Jesus qui cahi.
Nocotaiton Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Mia jahuejaxonti min queenain? —hahquin. —Heen bero hea rohajahue, Hihbon —hahquin benche jonin.
—Caresscatanhue. Hihcoinjaquin shinanax tah min rohascai —hahscaquin Jesusen. Rohascaxon Jesus chibanbonascaquin.
Jerusalen hochoma sca Betfagé jema patax Betania jema patax rihbi Olivos mahchi janin nocoxon Jesusen jahuen haxenica rabe raanquin.
—Man jano nichi hoque jema janin catannahue. Nocoxon tah man cabacho baque nexa meraxihqui, hahan tsoabi cahtsahoyamaparihi. Pecahax jaya jonoxahnahue.
Jahuejanoxon man jascajahin jaiboya, Noquen Hihbo ta nea pishinihqui. Rahmabi ta mihqui raanrihbinoxihquiqui, hahnahue —jato jaquin.
Caxon cabacho baque xehqui patax nexa meracanquin. Janibi bahin nichi meracanquin. Meraxon pecacanquin.
Pecahiton jano nichibaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahua man jain? ¿Jahuejanoxon man cabacho baque pecahin? —hahcanquin.
Hihbaan yohiha quescajaquin sca jato yohicanquin. Yohiha jeenhihscacani, jaabo jaya catannon.
Cabacho baque sca Jesus qui hihuecanquin. Cabacho jaton chopabo cajanxon sca Jesus cahtsahoncanquin.
Caibaan rihbi jaton chopa bahinbi cacajaquin. Caibaan rihbi nahue chian pehi bihtanxon bahinbi cacajaquin.
Bebohibo betan chini cahibo coshin yohuanbonacani: —Hahxonhue, Papan. Nete Hihbaan raanah ta jahuiqui. Miin shinan siri jaa hinanhue, Papan.
Noquen xohta Davidinin jahuen jihuetahbo jihuemapahoni quescajaribiquin ta janoxihquiqui, jahuen shinan Papan hinanah. Jaa hahxonhue, Naihoh quehan.
Jerusalen jema janin hihquihax sca Papan xoboho Jesus hihcohi. Jatihibi jispaquehax moa bepiscaiya Betania jema janin caribihi jahuen doce joniyabi.
Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax sca Betania janinhax cahax pihan hihqui.
Hochoxon bimi jihui pehiyahpa jisxon bimijoma hin hihquish jisi cahi. Jihui qui nocoxon jahuabi merayamaquin pehi rahsi, jahuen bimiti tian nocorihyamahiya.
—Jahuentianbi sca miin bimi tsoanbi piyamanoxihnon —hahscaquin. Jihui yohiquin jan jascajahi jahuen haxenicabaan nincaquin.
Jerusalen janin nocorihbihax Papan xoboho hihcohi. Hihcoxon janoxon marohibo cainmaquin. Maromahibo picomaquin. Coriqui mahnenanaibaan misabo behonjanaquin. Nobex maromahibaan tsahotibo rihbi behonjanaquin.
Jaa xobon tsoabi jaton jahuabora papihibo huinomayamaquin.
Honanmaquin sca jato yohiquin: —Jatihibi mai mehabaan janoxon yocati xobo ta heen xobo jayaxihquiqui. ¿Jascapa huisha yama quin? Jai bi tah man jano yometsohtaibo joneti xobo man heen xobo jai —jato jaquin.
Jan jascajahi sacerdote hapobo betan huishani honanbaan nincaquin. Jatihibi tsamajaquetai jonibo jahuen honanmati joi qui rahtetaiya hahqui raquexon jenquetsahaxon non jaa rehtetihin hihxon shinancanquin.
Bepiscaiya jema janinhax bocani.
Yamequirihbi huinonbahinxon tapon caman bimi jihui xanascai meracanquin.
Jan yohuanipi shinanrihbixon sca Pedronen yohiquin: —Jise, Hihbon. Hoa bimi jihui min hahqui yohuanipi ta pehua sca jaiqui —hahquin.
Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Papahon shinancoinnahue.
Hen mato yohinon nincanahue: jahuen jointinin shinancoinyamaxonma bi shinancoinai jonin nea mahchi nescajaquin yohihiya, Huenitax, hian janin hueramehhue, jan yohihi quescabijaquin ta Papan hahxontihiqui. Jan yohihi Papan jascascajatihi shinancoinaiya ta Papan hahxontihiqui.
Jaa copi tah hen mato yohihi. Papa yocaxon man yocacaibobi man bihtihi shinancoinnahue. Jascajaquin yocaxon ta man bihtihi.
Nihxon Papa yocaxon mato qui hohchataibo shinanyamascanahue. Maton Papan rihbi naihohxon man hohchataibo shinanyamascanon.
Jascapa man shinanyamascatihi bi man shinanparihiya ta maton Papan rihbi naihohxon man hohchataibo shinanbehnotimahihqui —jato jaquin.
Jerusalen janin sca boribicani. Papan xoboho Jesus nichiya hahqui bocani sacerdote hapobo, huishani honanbo, judiobaan hanibo.
Hahqui caxon yocacanquin: —¿Jahuaxon min jascajahin? ¿Tsoan jascajahue hahca min jascajahin? —hahcanquin.
—Mato rihbi ta hen yocacai. Man hea yohihiya tah hen jahuaxon hen nescajahi hean rihbi mato yohitihi.
¿Tsoan raana Juaman nashimapahonishquin? ¿Papan nan? ¿Jonibaan nan? Hea yohinahue —jato jaquin.
Jaabo rahsi sca yocacahnanancani: —Papan rahan, hih non jaiya ta jaan sca noque yocatihiqui, Papan raana Juaman nashimahiya jahua jenquetsahin sca man jaa nincacoinyamanihquin?
¿Jonibaan rahan, hih cahra non jatihin? —hihcani tsamajaquetai jonibo qui raquetax. Papan joi yohinica Juan jai jatihixonbi shinanai copi jato qui raquecani.
Yocacahnananxon Jesus yohicanquin: —Non tah non honanyamahi —hihcani. —Hean rihbi ta hen mato yohiyamahi, jahuaxon hen nescajahi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jaa patax queha joi sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen huai banahan. Banaxon chiquequin. Chiquexon macan quenchajaquin, bimibo jentsinnoxon. Janoxon huai coirannoxon sca tapojascaquin. Banaquin queyoxon sca caibo jahuen huai hinantahquin. Huai hihbo sca huetsa main cahi.
Bimi tian jan hinantaho hihbobo qui jahuen joni raanquin, bimi texe hinanahbo.
Nocotaiton rishquixon jahuabi bimijoma raanscacanquin.
Mequen bi res nocotaiya huetsa jahuen joni sca raanrihbiquin. Nocotaiton mapo qui tsehuejaxon tiromajacanquin.
Huetsa jahuen joni rihbi hapon raanrihbiquin. Jaa rehtecanquin. Huetsa rihbi jascajacanquin, caibo rishquixon caibo rehtequin.
Huesti sca jai, hahan jan shinanai jahuen baque huesti sca. Chini sca jaa jato qui raanquin, heen baque ta nincatihcaniqui, hihxon.
Nocotaiya hinantaho hihbobo yohinani: Nea ta jahuen papan huai hihboyaxihquiqui. Jaa rehtehi canon bonahue jahuen huai noquenah sca janon, hihcani.
Jaa bihxon rehtexon huai behro potacanquin.
¿Jahueja jascapahbo huai hihbaan jatihiquin? Joxon ta hinantaho hihbobo rehteyaxihquiqui, huetsabo sca huai hinantahnoxon.
¿Nescajaquin huishani joi man jisyamaniquin? Tiroma ta jaiqui hihxon xobojahibaan potabohannihbo jihui ta hahqui xobojati jihui qui.
Papan ta jascajahiqui. Jan jascajahi jisish tah non rahtetai —jato jaquin.
Jahuen huai joi jan yohihi jatoya jan joihi honanxon jaa xecotancatsihquibo bi tsamajaquetaibo qui raquetax jaa janinhax boresscacani.
Yohuanquihnahbo jaamahi yohuanaiton bihnon fariseoboya herodianobo sca raancanquin.
Raanahbo hahqui caxon yohicanquin: —Mian ta min ponte yohihi, Maestron. Non tah non honanai. Rabinxonma tah min honanmahi. Tsohqui raquexonma tah min jatihibi jonibo min yohihi. Jahuabi joi huetsajaxonma tah min ponte res noque yohihi. Papan joi ta min honanmacoinai. Cesaronen noque cobranah noquen copijati joi jaiquin? ¿Yamahihquin? ¿Non copijatihin? ¿Non copijatimahin? —hahcanquin.
Jaabo hihcoinicamahi yohuanai honanxon jato yohiquin: —¿Jahuejanoxon man hea tanahin? Huesti coriquiya benahue hen jisnon —jato jaquin.
Huesti bohiboya jato yocaquin: —¿Tsoana hin, nea mapo? ¿Nea huisha cahran? —jato jaquin. —Cesarona rahan —hihcani.
—Cesaronabo Cesaro hinanrihbinahue. Papanahbo Papa hinannahue —jato jaquin Jesusen. Jan jascaraiya hahqui raquecani.
Saduceobo sca Jesus qui bocani. Tsoabi ta hahquirihbi huenitimahiqui hihquibo. Nocotax yocacahcani:
—Moisesnin ta noque huishaxonnishqui, Maestron. Jahuen huetsa baquejahaxma mahuataiya ta jahuen yononma jahuen chinipan bihtihiqui, jahuen bochan baque janon hahqui baquejanoxon hahquin huishaquin.
Siete huetsabo ta janishqui. Beboquihahnen ta haibo bihnishqui. Bichish bi mahuati, baquejahaxma.
Jahuen chinipan sca ta jahuen yononma bihnishqui. Bichish bi mahuati, baquejahaxma. Jahuen jochica jascarihbihi.
Siete rahsi jascari mahuati, baquejahaxma. Chini sca haibo rihbi mahuati.
¿Papan noque hahquirihbi huenihi tian jahuemehatona jaa haibo hihyaxihquiquin, siete jatihixonbi haibojani? —hahcanquin.
Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Papan huishamani joi honanyamahax tah man jascarai, jahuen coshi rihbi honanyamahax tah man ponte yohuanyamahi.
Mahuataibo hahquirihbi huenihi tian ta Papan yonotibo naihoh queha jai quescapahbo bebobo jayaxihquiqui huanohahmabo. Haibobo rihbi ta beneyahpatimahiqui.
¿Mahuanihbo hahquirihbi huenitimahiquin? ¿Papan Moises yohini man jisyamaniquin, Moisesnin huishani janin hoa jihui namantiha pishca joibo jaiton? Papan ta Moises yohinishqui: Abrahanen Papa Dios tah hen qui, Isaaquen Papa Dios, Jacobon Papa Dios hahquin.
Mahuataibaanama bi jihuetaibaan Papa Dios ta jaa qui. Jaamajaquin tah man shinanai —hahquin jato.
Jaatian sca huishani honan huesti jato pataxi jahui. Jaabo yohinanai nincaquin. Jesusen jato yohiquin sirijahi jisxon Jesus yocaquin: —¿Papan yohini joi non jahuemeha hihti nincatihin? —hahquin.
Jesusen sca yohiquin: —Hihti nincati joi ta nea qui. Nincanahue, Israelibaan. Noquen hihbo Papa Dios ta jaa huesti hihbo qui.
Miin Hihbohon shinanhue miin jointiboyaxonbi, miin yoshinboyaxonbi, miin shinanboyaxonbi, miin coshiboyaxonbi.
Jaa pecaho ta nea qui. Mihbe jihuetaibohon shinanhue, mihmebi min shinamehti hihqui quescarihbijaquin. Nea rabe joi mentan ta hashoan hani joi yama qui —hahquin.
Jascajaha huishani honan joni sca yohuani: —Ponte ta min jai, Maestron. Papa Dios huesti tah qui. Huetsa yamahi, jaa huesti. Hihcoin tah min jai.
Noquen jointiboyaxonbi noquen shinanboyaxonbi noquen coshiboyaxonbi noquen Papahon shinantixon, non noquebi shinamehti hihqui quescarihbijaquin noquen hahbe jihuetaibohon shinanti ta Papa qui hinanti jatihibi mentan hashoan siri qui. Jatihibi hinábo rehtexon Papa qui hinanti mentan hashoan siri —hihqui.
Jan honanax yohuanai jisxon Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —Papan jihuemati hochoma ta mia qui —hahquin. Jaa pecaho yocati qui raquecani jatihibi.
Papan xobohoxon honanmahahnan Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jenquetsapahin huishani honanbaan nescajahiquin: Cristo ta David xohta qui hahquin?
Dios Yoshiman shinanmaha ta Davidininbi yohinishqui: Papan ta heen hihbo yohinishqui: Hea mecayaho tsahohue, miin rahuibo hen mia namanjaxonnon caman.
Jaa yohihi, Heen hihbo, ta Davidininbi janishqui, jaanbi. ¿Jenquetsahax sca jahuen xohta hihtihiquin? —jato jaquin. Coin coinxon hicha tsamajaquetaibaan nincacanquin.
Honanmaquin jato yohirihbiquin: —Huishani honanbo qui raquenahue. Chopa nenque sahuehax ta nihniti costancaniqui. Janoxon maroti janin caibaan jato hapon hahti rihbi ta costancaniqui.
Jaho tsinquiti xoboho ta hashoan siribo tsahotibo rihbi queencaniqui. Fiesta tian ta jano hashoan cacannicabo tsahotai janin tsahocatsihcanihqui.
Haibo yononmanen xobo ta jahuen jahuequiboyabi bichincaniqui. Caibaan jato jisnon hihxon res ta chaijaquin Papa yocacaniqui. Jascapahbo ta hashoan casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jano Papa Dios hinanti coriqui naneti hoque tsahoxon jaton coriqui nanehibo Jesusen jisquin. Coriquiyahpa jonibaan ta hichaxon hicha coriqui nanecannishqui.
Jahuabijoma haibo yononma huesti joxon cahen nanequin, rabe coriqui pishca huesti soro copitai.
Jahuen haxenicabo quenaxon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Nincanahue, mato yohinon. Jatihibi coriqui nanehibo mentan ta nea yononmanen hashoan nanehiqui.
Hicha jaxon ta jaabaan nanecaniqui. Jahuabi jaxonma bi ta neatohon jan jai pishca queyobahinihqui nanequin —jato jaquin.
Papan xobohoh quehax cainaiton sca jahuen haxenica huestichin yohiquin: —Maestron, yotihoparahbo macanbo, yotihoparahbo xobo jise —hahquin.
Jesusen sca jaa yohiquin: —¿Nea hihtihosi xobobo min jisin? Ni huesti macanbi ta huetsa cahchian cahtsahoyamascatihiqui. Jatihibi ta potapaqueyaxihcanihqui —Jesusen jaquin.
Picotax sca Papan xobo hoque tocan Olivos manan janin tsahotaiton Jesus yocacanquin Pedro, Jacobo, Juan, Andres, jaabo rahsichin.
—Noque yohihue. ¿Jahuentian jascajayaxihcanihquin? ¿Jahua hahan honanti jayaxihquiquin, min noque yohiha quescabi janon? —hahcanquin.
Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Mato parancanmis.
Jaa ta hen qui hihquish ta heen janen joyaxihcanihqui hicha. Hicha jonibo ta paranyaxihcanihqui.
Rehtenanaibo nincacax, hocho rehtenanaibo joi rihbi nincacax raqueyamanahue. Nete queyorihyamanon ta jascatihiqui.
Nahuabo ta hahbe nahuabo betan rehtenantihiqui. Quiquin hapon jonibo ta huetsa quiquin hapon jonibo betan rehtenantihiqui. Huetsancobo ta mai mihuanyaxihquiqui. Piti ta yamayaxihquiqui pihan hihquibo. Jascaraiboya ta hohmis hohmisti pehocohtiqui.
