—Botannahue —hahca sca jaa joni jenebahini bohax cochi qui sca hihquihi bocani. Yoshin jato qui hihquihah sca mapoho rocohihcanahi cahi, jene qui paquetax hahsacani cochibo.
Jascahibo jisish cochi coirannicahbo jacahini caresscai. Caxon jema janin jihuetaibo yohi yohixon hocho jihuetaibo rihbi nincamacanquin.
Yohihah sca jisi becani. Jahua jaaxquin hihquish becani. Jesus qui nocoxon sca jaa patax tsahotai jaa joni meracanquin, jahuen yoshin tiroma yamascai. Chopayahpahax res sca sirijaquin shinani tsahotaiton meracanquin. Jaa jisish rahte rahtecani.
Raqueya sca jaibo bi caibaan sca jan rohajahi jisxon yohirihbicanquin: —Jascajaquin ta yoshinyahpa joni rohajahaxqui —hahcanquin.
Jaatian tsinquijaquexon Gadara janinbo jihuetaibaan sca Jesus yohiquin, Noque jenebahini catanhue, hahcanquin. Hihti raquexon Jesus camati shinanxon jascajacanquin.
Jaatian nanetax cacatsihqui bi yoshin tiroma potamaha joni rihbi hahbetan cacatsihqui. —Hea rihbi hiohue —hahca bi jeenhahyamaquin.
—Miin xobon caxon Papan mia hahxona jato yohihue —hahquin. Jascajaha jatihibi janin sca yohibonahi cahi, Jesusen ta hea rohajahaxqui, hihcanahi.
Hoque quexa Jesus nocotaiton sca janohahbaan johue hahquin sirijaquin. Jaa joti manarahsihibaan jaa bihquin sirijaquin.
Jaatian jaton tsinquiti xobo hihbo jahui, Jairo janeya. Jesus bebon miracahpaquexon, Heen xoboho johue, hihxon hihti yocaquin.
Jaa huesti jahuen baque haibo hisinai quen hihti yocaquin. Doce bari jahuen baque jai mahuacatsihscai. Jeenhihquish hahbetan caresscai bi jonibo hichahi. Tsinquitax hueranhahnanax Jesus qui tsehquesihcanahi bocani.
Jaatian jano rihbi huesti haibo jai, hisinax jahui. Doce bari sca jimi pota potahi haibo. Tsoanbi jaa rohajati hahtipahyamahiya, hahchon nihxon Jesusen coton quexa mehequin.
Mehehax rohacahin sca jai, jimi tanticahinscai.
—¿Tsoan man hea mehehahquin? —hahscaquin Jesusen. —Hen tah hen hahyamahaqui —hahcaibo rahsi jaiya sca Pedronen yohiquin: —Hichaxon ta mia tejabohanxon mia tsahca tsahcahahbonacaniqui, maestron —hahquin.
—Tsoan rah ta hea mehehaxqui. Heen coshi hahqui cainai tah hen honanahqui —hahquin.
Joneti hahtipahyamahax, raqueyahax saqui saquihihquish, jahuex jaa bebon raboxonen nihxon sca, Hisinnixon tah hean mia mehehahqui, Hihbon, hahquin haibaan yohiquin sirijaquin. Jatihixonbi nincanon sca yohiquin, jan rahma rohacahinscai yohiquin sirijaquin.
—Shinancoinax copi tah min roha sca jai, baquen. Jascabi roha sca jahue —hahquin Jesusen sca.
Jaa jan jascajaquin yohiparihiya bi tsinquiti xobo hihbo yohihi jahuen joni nocoti jahui. —Miin baque ta mahuascaaxqui. Noquen haxemanica jatsanjayamascahue —hahquin.
Jaa yohihi nincaxon tsinquiti xobo hihbo jisanan: —Masa shinanyamahue. Shinancoinreshue. Roha ta jatihiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
Jahuen xoboho mapexon sca hahbe nichibo Jesusen mapemayamaquin. Pedro, Juan, Jacobo, xontaconen papa, jahuen mama, jaabo rahsi res hahbetan hihcomaquin.
Texe jano tsamataibo cahen jaya huinihi. Jaya huaohihqui. —Huaohihyamanahue. Mahuatihma bi ta hoxaresiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
Jascajaha bi xontaco mahua sca jai honanxon Jesus hosancanquin.
Xontaco mehuetanxon sca coshin yohiquin: —Huenihue, baquen —hahquin Jesusen.
Jahuen yoshin joribiscaax xontaco huenicahuanscai. —Piti hinanhue, jan pinon —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jahuen papa betan jahuen mama rahte rahteti. Jenquetsahaquin rohajahaxquin yohiyamahahbo sca jahuen papaya jahuen mama hihti yohiquin: —Tsoabi yohiyamanahue —hahquin Jesusen.
Jahuen doce raantibo sca quenamaxon cahen coshi shinan jato hinanquin. Jatihibi tiroma yoshinyahpabo rohajati, jatihibi hisin rihbi rohajati coshi hinanquin.
Hinanxon Papan jihuemati joi yohihahnan hisinaibo rohajabonanon hihxon jato raanquin.
—Jaya catibo bichishma botannahue. Mepiti tah man botimahi, borasa boyamaribiquin. Ni piti ni coriqui boyamaribiquin. Rabe cotonya rihbi tah man catimahi.
Xobon mato mapemaha janobinahue. Caribinoxon caman tah man jaa xoboho hoxatihi.
Mato mapenahue hahyamahiboya tah man jaton jema potabahini caquin sca maton sapato qui hueotai jaton mai poto jato qui tahabahintihi, nincayosmabohi honanahbo hihxon —jato jaquin.
Cahax sca jema tihibi qui nocoxon Papan joi siri yohihahnan hisinaibo rohajacanquin.
Herodes janeya quiquin hapo sca caibaan yohiquin, Jasca roqui Jesus jaiqui hahquin, jatihibi yohixon. —Caibaan shinanah ta Juan mahuanish bi jihuerihbiscaiqui —hihquiboya caibo sca:
—Elías yamanica rah ta noque qui caini joribiscaiqui —hihcani, Jesus jaa hihqui shinanax. —Neateman jihuepahonish bi teehihribiscai Papan joi yohixonnicah ra tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi sca. Jascapa nincaxon Herodesnin masa shinanquin.
—Juan tah hen textenihqui. ¿Nea yohihibo Jesus jahua joni jatihiquin? ¿Jenquetsahaxon hen jaa jistihin? —hihxon shinanquin.
Jesusen raanipi hahqui beribixon sca jaabaan caxon hahtanipi jatihibi yohicanquin. Jato canon benahue hahxon sca jaabo rahsibi sca hahbetan canon Betsaida jema janin jato hioquin.
Jahuen bocanaxquin honanax texe rihbi jano bocani. Nocotaiton jato Benahue hahxon Papan jihuemati joi Jesusen jato honanmaquin. Hisinaibo rihbi rohajaquin jatihibi.
Bepiscaiya jahuen raantibo joxon yohicanquin: —Nea jonibo camahue, Hihbon, nenobo jai jemabo janin caxon huaiyahpabo janin rihbi caxon jano hoxati sca benahahbo. Jano jaton piti benahahbo. Neno ta jahuabi yamahihqui —hahcanquin.
Jascajahahbo bi: —Maton caya jato piti hinannahue —hahquin. —Noque tah non piti yamahi. Pichca paan pishca, rabe yapa rihbi, jaa res. Jahua hashoan tah non yamahi. ¿Yotihixon piti marohi non catihin? —hahcanquin. Cinco mil bebobo jano jai quen jascajacanquin.
—Cincuentabo rahsi tsahojaquetannon jato mitsahohmanahue —hahquin jahuen haxenicabo.
Yohihah sca jascajacanquin mitsahohmaquin.
Jaton pichca paanya rabe yapa bihxon sca nai bejisihnixon Papa yohixon tehcaxon jahuen haxenicabo metisahpaquequin. Hinanah, jaabi rihbi jonibo sca hinanpaquecanquin.
Bihxon yaninoxon caman jatihixonbi picanquin. Pixon bi texejaribicanquin. Yapaya paan tequebo piquin texejahiboya sca doce tasa bocho tsinquirihbicanquin.
Jaa pecaho sca Papa yohihi jaa huesti cahiya jahuen haxenicabo sca hahqui bocani. Noco sca jaiboya sca jato yocaquin: —¿Hea jahua joni hihqui shinancaniquin? —hahquin.
—Mia roqui Juan yamanica qui, hoa nashimapahoni. Caibaan shinanah cah min mia Elías yamanica. Caibaan rihbi jisí cah min neateman japahoni Papan joi nincamanicah, hahquirihbi teehihqui —hihcani.
—¿Maton shinanah cahran? ¿Hea tsoa quin? —jato jaquin. —Mia tah min Papan raanai qui, min jotihi jan neateman yohini tah min qui —hahquin Pedronen sca.
—Tsoabi jascajaquin honanmayamanahue.
Hicha pari tah hen teneti jai, noquebaque hen jai copi. Hapobo rihbi ta Jaa ta tiroma qui hihyaxihquiqui, hea yohihi. Jaton haxemanicahbaan rihbi ta jascajaribiyaxihquiqui. Jascajaxon ta hea rehtescayaxihcanihqui. Rehtehipibaan bi tah hen quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi teehihtihi —jahuen haxemanicabo jaquin.
Jano jaibo rahsi sca yohirihbiquin: —Hehchon jocatsihxon tah man matobi man queenaima sca man hahtihi. Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen heen Hihbo jenetimahi hihnahue nete tihibi. Jaatian tah man heen jihuetahbo jatihi.
Mahuati qui raquetaibo ta mahuatihiqui. Jascapa jihuetimahi bi ta hea copi mahuataibo queyoyamanox manatihiqui.
¿Nea mai jatihobi hihbojahax bi mahuatax sca jahuaya man banetihin? ¿Jaabiyahpa queyoscaxon man jahua jatihin?
Hea hihbomacatsihyamahibo tah hen noquebaque hihxon Mia tah min henama rihbi qui hah hen jatihi. Heen joi qui hihtimahpaibo rihbi tah hen jascajatihi. Coshi shinanya joxon tah hen jascajatihi, noquebaque hihxon. Papan xabaya joxon, hicha naihoh queha yonotibo rihbiya joxon tah hen jascapa jascajatihi.
Hihcoinja tah hen mato jai. Caibo neno nichibaan tah man mahuaxonma Papan jihuemati man jistihi —hahquin.
Jato jascahipixon ocho netebo hihxon Pedro, Juan, Jacobo jaabo quimisha hioquin. Papa yohinoxon mahchi janin cahi.
Janoxon Papa yohihahnan sca jahuen bemanan huetsapahcahini. Jahuen chopa rihbi pehnecahini, cana bacahi quescapi.
Jaatian rabe joni hahbetan yohuani sanareneni jahui, huetsa cahen Moises yamanica, huetsa cahen Elías yamanica.
Jaabo rabe rihbi xabayahpahax hahbetan yohuani. Jerusalen janin jan mahuayaxihqui yohuancani.
Yohuan yohuanaiboya bi Pedro jaabaan hoxan hihxon bi tenexon jahuen xaba jisquin. Hahbe yohuanai xabayahpa rabe rihbi jiscanquin.
Yamanica rabe caresscacatsihquiya sca Pedronen Jesus yohiquin. —Noque neno jaah ta siri qui, maestron. Quimisha tapasnonhue, mina huesti, Moisesnina huesti rihbi, Eliasnena huesti rihbi —hahquin, jahua yohuanti honanxonma jascajaquin.
Pedro jascari yohuanaiya bi nai cohiman jato mahporenenquin. Cohiman mahpobahinah raquecani.
Jaatian cohiman mehax yohuanai sca nincacanquin: —Nea ta hen caisni heen baque qui. Jaa nincanahue.
Jascari yohuanai nincaxon jisibaan bi Jesus huesti sca jai. Jascapa jisipixon bi ta tsoabi yohiyamacannishqui. Jisyamahicamacani. Chiní sca ta yohicannishqui.
Jaa mahchi janinhax bototipish hoxashinahax mohiyahtax cahiton sca jato behchihi tsama jonibo becani.
Jato tocan huesti joni coshin yohuanhonahi jahui. —Maestron, mia tah hen hihti yocacai. Heen baque jisxonhue. Jaa huesti heen baque tah qui.
Yoshiman hihbojaha ta sai saihihcahinax jomi jomihax bacox jancharahihquiqui, hihbon. Jenexonma ta yoshiman rishqui rishquihihqui.
Jahuen tiroma yoshin potamaxonnahue hen jaah bi ta miin haxenicabaan hahtipahyamahipicanaxqui —hahquin.
—¡Nincacoinyosmabon! ¿Jenquetsahpahi man shinancoinyamahin? ¿Jahuentiho basi hen mato betan hihquiya pari man pontetihin? ¿Jahuentiho basi cahran hen mato teneti jain? Miin baqueya johue —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jan jaya jahuiyabi yoshiman sca main hueranbohanxon jomimaribiquin. Jascaraiton sca yohixon tiroma yoshin jenemabahinxon: —Nea ta miin baque qui, bihhue —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jan jascajaxonai jisish rahte rahtecani jano jaibo jatihibi. —¿Jahuentiho coshi Papan shinanyaxon noque hahxonihquin? —hihcani. Jan jato hahxonai jatihibi jisish rahte rahtetaibo rahsi. Jaatian sca jahuen haxenicabo jaan yohiquin.
—Hen mato yohinon nincaquin sirijanahue. Jaabaan hea jahuejara janon ta jonibaan hea bihmayaxihcanihqui. Jaabaan hea bihti ta hochomascaiqui —jato jaquin.
Jan yohihah jahua hihcatsihquiquin cahen honanyamacannish. Jaton jointi xehpotaiya cahen honancasquimacannish. Jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihxon hihbo yocatihi bi yocati qui raquecani.
Jaa pecaho sca jaabo rahsibi yocacahanani. Tsoa non hashoan hapotihin hihcani.
Jaton jointi chicho yohuanaibo joi honanxon, jano nichi baque pishca bihxon jaa pataxxon jato yohiquin:
—Nea baque pishca heen janen bichi jonin ta jascajaquin hea bichiqui. Hea bichi jonin ta hea raanni rihbi bichiqui. Mato tocan hashoan hahxonnica joni ta hihti shinanya joni qui —hahquin.
—Maestron, tiroma yoshinbo miin jane yohixon camahi joni tah non jisiqui. Jaa tah non Jascajayamahue hahbenanai, jan noque betanbi nihyamahi copi —hahscaquin Juaman.
Jascajaha: —Jascapa panteyamanahue. Mato panteyamahibaan ta mato yanapaniqui —hahquin Jesusen.
Jahuen Papa qui cati hochoma sca jaonahiya sca Jerusalen janin cati shinanax, jano res cahi cahi.
Jano jan nihnoxihqui janin pari canon, jonibo raanquin. Jaan raanah bocani. Samaritano jema qui nocoscaxon noquen hihbo jano hoxati benaxonabo bi jano hoxati hinancatsihyamacani, samaritanobo.
Jerusalen janin jan cahi honanax jano hoxamati queenyamacani.
Jano nocoscaxon jascapahbohi jisxon rabe jahuen haxenicabaan yocaquin: —¿Naihoh quehax jato qui chihi paquexon jato queyobahinti non Papa yocatimahin, hihbon? —hahquin Jacobo betan Juaman.
Jato qui rabejaquexon: —Hahyamaquin rahan —hahxon pontequin jato hihti yohiquin.
Yohiquin sirijaxon jaa jema huinobahini caresscaax cahi. Huetsa jema qui sca nococani.
Janohax boribicani. Huinotaiton sca huesti jonin Jesus yohiquin: —Jano mia cahi tihibi tah hen mia manahi catihi, miin joi yohinicanoxon —hahquin.
Jascahiya: —Caman hinobo ta jaton mai quini jaiqui. Pehiyahpabo rihbi ta nahayahpa qui. Hea noquebaque tah hen jascayamahi. Hea noquebaque tah hen jahuenbi hoxati yamahi —hahxon, huetsa sca yohiquin:
—Heen joi yohinicanoxon hehbe johue —hahquin. Hehbe johue hahcá bi: —Heen papa pari hen mihintahyaxahnnon, hihbon —hahquin.
—Mahuataibaan hahbe mahuataibo mihinnon jenehue. Papan jihuemahi joi yohibonahi cahi johue mia —hahscaquin noquen Hihbaan.
Huetsa sca yohuani: —Mihbetan tah hen catihi, hihbon. Heen jenabo pari hen yohitannon manatahhue —hahquin.
Jaa sca yohiquin: —Miin tee queyoyamaxon bi min japahoni janin sca miin shinan camahax tah min Papan teexonnicah mia jatimahi —hahquin.
Jasca jaipixon sca huetsa jonibo sca joi yohibonatannahue hahquin. Jascajaxon setenta raanquin, rabe rabe bohábo hihxon. Jano jaabi nocoyaxihqui xobo jatihibi qui canon jato raanquin, jano jan nocoyaxihqui jema tihibi.
Jato raannoxon yohiquin: —Banaho huai johuescaax tsinquiti hicha jai bi ta teexonnicahbo huestibohiqui. Jaa copi huai hihbo yocanahue, tsinquixonnicahbo jahuen huai chian jan raannon.
Jistahi man. Hinobo tocan man carnerobo canon quesca tah hen mato coiranhanan raanai.
Coriqui boyamanahue. Ni borasabi, ni sapatobi, boyamanahue. Bahin caxon jonibo behchixon yohuanquihnxonma huinóbahintannahue.
Xobo qui nocoxon tihibi, Papan hahxonah man neno jascabihi jayamahin, hahnahue sirijaquin.
Mato sirijaquin bichiboya ta man yohihah quesca sca Papan jato hahxonyaxihquiqui. Mato sirijaquin johue hahyamahiboya ta man jato sirijaquin yohiyamahah quescatihiqui.
Mapetax tah man jaa xoboho sca jihuetahtihi. Jano jihuetahxon jaton piti mato hinanahbo pinahue. Jaton xehati xehaquin. Teexonnicah copijaha tah qui. Jaa copi jatona pinahue. Xobo tihibi tah man piquin betsatimahi.
Jemabo janin rihbi nocotaiton mato sirijaquin benahue hahca jaa xoboho hoxanahue. Mato hinanai pitibo pinahue.
Jano jaibo rohajaxon, Papan mato jihuemati ta nocoscaiqui, jato janahue.
Jemabo qui nocotaiton bi mato benahue hahyamahiboya tah man jaton jemanhihtibo janin nihxon man yohitihi:
Noquen tahe qui hueotai mai poto tah non mato qui tahabahinai man jascapahbo copi. Jaabi honannahue. Papan jihuemati ta hochoma sca jaonahiqui.
Mato tah hen yohihi. Casticanti neten ta sodomitobo Papan casticanai mentan hashoan coshin jaton jema jaan casticanyaxihquiqui.
¡Hahrai hih tah man jayaxihqui, corazino jonibon! Jascarihbi tah man jayaxihqui, Betsaida jonibon. Mato tocanxon heen coshiyaxon hen hahní quescajaribiquin hen Tiro jema janinxon hahcaiya cahen neateman jaton hohcha copi benaxon hahan benati chopa sahuehax chihi mapo mapocohtax tsahoxon jaton shinan pontehan.
Tiro joniboya Sidono jonibo jan casticanyaxihqui bi ta hashoan hihtijaquin sca Papan mato casticanyaxihquiqui.
¡Capernaum jonibon! ¿Naihoh jihuetax quescari man maton jema janin siripi jihueti shinanain? Maton jema ta maton tsahon baneyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon jahuen raantibo yohirihbiquin: —Man yohihah nincacaibaan ta hea nincaquihqui. Man yohihah bi nincacatsihyamahibo ta hea rihbi nincacatsihyamahiqui. Hea nincacatsihyamahibo ta hea raanni heen papa rihbi nincacatsihyamacaniqui —hahquin.
Raanah, botanipish, jahuen setentabo jenimahonahi beribicani. Nocoxon: —Yoshinbobi tah non miin janen yonohipiqui, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
—Naihoh quehax cana bacahihcamahi tah hen Satanas potahah paquetai jisniqui.
Nincanahue. Hean raanah caquin man rono jamabahinti coshi tah hen mato hinanipiqui. Nibo jamabahinti rihbi. Satanasnen yoshinbaan mato jahuejati hahtipahyamanon tah hen mato coshi hinanipiqui. Ni jahuatohonbi ta mato tiromajatimahiqui.
Tiroma yoshinbo man camati hahtipahi bi tah man jaa copi jenimatimahi. Naihohxon maton jane huishá sca jai copi jenimanahue —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon Dios Yoshiman hahan jenimati hinanah hihti jenimaxon noquen Papa sca yohiquin: —Hahxon tah min hea jai, Papan. Mia tah min naiyahpa mai Hihbo qui. Shinamanhuanyahpabo betan honanbaan honancasquimanon tah min jato pantexon, miin baquebaan sca honannon min jato honanmahi, Papan. Mian jisí jascapa siri quen tah min jascajaxonai, Papan.
Papan ta hea jatihibi hinanihqui. Jahuen baque tsoa hin ta tsoanbi honanyamahihqui. Papa huestichin ta honanihqui. Tsoa heen Papa quin tah hen jahuen baque hihxon hea huestichin hen honanai. Caibaan ta honanyamahihqui. Hean yohihah res ta caibaan rihbi honanscaiqui —hahquin.
Jascaxon jahuen haxenicabo rahsi sca yohirihbiquin: —Man jisibo jisish jenimanahue.
Man rahma jisi ta Papan joi yohixonnicahbo betan quiquin hapobo hichaxon jiscatsihxon bi hahtipahyamacannishqui. Man nincacai ta nincacatsihxon bi nincayamacanpahonishqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian nihxon judiobaan haxemanicahton jenquetsahaxon yocaxon non Jesus tiromahi yohuanmatihin hihxon yocascaquin: —Maestron, ¿jenquetsahax hen queyoyamanox manatihin? —hahquin.
—¿Papan joi janin jahua huisha jaiquin? ¿Jahua min jano jisin? —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jaan yocacah sca: —Miin Hihbo Diosohon tah min miin jointiboyabi queentihi, miin yoshinboyabi, miin coshiboyabi, miin shinanboyabi tah min jahan queentihi. Mihbe jihuetaibohon tah min queenrihbitihi, miabi min queemehti hihqui quescarih —hahquin.
—Hihcoini. Jihuenox hihqui jascahue —hahscaquin.
Jascajanicah sca jan hihqui Jesus shinanmacatsihxon sca Jesus yocarihbiquin: —¿Tsoa heen hahbe jihuetahbo quin nan? —hahquin.
—Nesca tah qui. Huesti joni cahen Jerusalen janinhax Jericó jema janin cahi cahpaquehti. Cahiton sca cahen tiromabaan bihxon jahuen chopa bichinxon, rishqui rishquixon hahan mahuati tsehueya sca potabahincanquin.
Sacerdote huesti sca jano huinoti jahui. Bahin joxon jahuen caibo jano miracahtai merahax tecayacahini caresscai.
Levito baquebo huesti sca jascarihbihi, jahuen caibo. Jano nocoxon merahax tecayacahini caresscai.
Samaritano huesti sca hocho quehax jahui, jahuen nahua sca. Hahqui nocoxon jahan shinanxon bihtanxon, rahonquin.
Olivo bimi xeniya vino rahojaxon jayaxon jahuen tsehue rahonquin. Jahuen cabacho cahracanxon sca jano hoxati xobo janin sca hioquin. Janoxon sca rahonxon coiranshinarihbiquin.
Xaba paque sca jaiya sca rabe neten teexon cananai tihi coriqui hinanxon sca xobo hihbo yohiquin: Jaa hea coiranxonhue. Jaa coiranquin min hashoan sca coriqui castanaiya tah hen joribixon mia copijatihi.
Jascajaquin yohixon sca Jesusen yocaquin: —Yometsohbaan tsehuejaha racatai qui cahen quimisha joni nocoti. Mian shinanah, jahuemeha jahuen hahbe jihuetah quesca janishquin? Hea yohihue —hahquin haxemanica yocaquin.
—Hoa jahan shinanxon hahxonai rahan —hahscaquin. —Mian rihbi jascajatanhue —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Janohax Jesus, jaabo, boresscaax huetsa jema janin nococani. Jano cahen Marta janeya haibo jihuenish. Jaan Mapehue hahquin jahuen xobon Jesus mapenon.
Jahuen shara rihbi cahen jano jihuepahonish, María janeya. Jesusen haxemahi nincacatsihqui cahen jaa patax tatsahoxon jan yohihi Marian nincaquin sirijaquin.
Jahuen tee hichahiya Marta tee teeti. Piti qui jaa mehca mehcatai bi Marian nincaresquin. Martan sca yocaquin: —¿Hea huesti hen tee teenon heen sharan hea yanapanyamahi min jisyamahin, Hihbon? Yohihue, jan hea yanapannon —hahquin Martan.
—Hicha tah min masa shinanai, baquen. Miin tee hichahi tah min jatsanai.
Huesti shinanyati ta jaiqui, Papan joi nincati res. Marian ta sirijaquin shinanax nincati queenihqui. Jan queenai ta tsoanbi bichintimahiqui —hahquin.
Huetsa neten sca cahen huetsa janin caxon janoxon Papa yocanish. Papa yocaquin queyoscaiya huesti jahuen haxenicaton yohiquin: —Juaman ta jahuen haxenicabo Papa yocati haxemanishqui, Hihbon. Jascajaquin rihbi noque haxemahue, non Papa yocanon.
Haxemahue hahcá jato haxemaquin nescajaquin: —Papa yocacatsihquin nescajanahue. Papan, mia Papa Dios jai honanahbo jahue. Miin jihuetahbo non janon noque hihbojahue. Min naihoh hahcai quescajaribiquin neno rihbi hahhue.
Nea neten piti noque hinanhue, Hihbon.
Noquen hohcha sohuahue. Mihqui non hohchani min shinanyamascai quescajaribiquin tah non joni huetsa tenexon noque qui tiromahibaan bi jato sirijaquin yohuanquihnai. Jascajaquin rihbi noquen hohcha sohuaxon jaa shinanyamascahue, Papan. Satanasnen noquen coshi tanatihi janin noque hioyamahue, Papan. Satanas noque bihmayamahue hahquin yocanahue —jato jaquin.
Jascajaquin haxemaxon sca jato yohiscaquin: —Mihqui nocotaibo pimacatsihquish rah tah min yame pochinicon miin huetsan xobo janin caxon min yocatihi: Huetsan, quimisha pichanti pishca hea hinanhue, huetsan.
Noquen jenabo ta hocho quehax jahuex hehqui nocotaxqui. Jahuabi tah hen jato pimati yamahi.
Chichoxon sca cahen mia yohihan: Hea jatsanjayamahue. Heen xehpoti tah hen moa xehposcai. Heen baquebo rihbi ta moa hoxascaiqui. Mia hinantihi bi tah hen picotimahi ¿hah mia jatihiquin?
Nincatahi man. Mia jahuen huetsa que bi hinanti queenyamaxon bi ta min hihti yocacai copi mia hinantihiqui, min yocacai tihi.
Man honannon hihxon tah hen mato yohihi. Papa yocanahue. Mato ta hinantihiqui. Benanahue. Papan ta mato meramatihiqui. Xehpoti ton ton hahnahue. Papan ta mato quehpenxontihiqui.
Yocacai tihibichin ta bihtihiqui. Benahi tihibichin ta meratihiqui. Ton ton hahcai tihibi ta mapetihiqui.
¿Miin baquebo mihqui caxon min mishquitanai yapa pishca mia yocacah bi min rono hinantihin?
¿Hatapa bachi yocacah bi min nibo hinantihin?
Honannahue. Tiromaboxon bi tah man maton baquebo qui siribo hinanti honanai. ¿Man yocacah maton naihoh queha Papan hashoan rihbi sca jahuen yoshin siri mato hinantimahiquin? —jato jaquin.
Huetsa tian sca ta yoshiman bihni joni rihbi jahuen tiroma yoshin camaxon rohajanishqui. Tiroma yoshiman hihbojaha joyo sca banenish. Joyo banenish bi jahuen tiroma yoshin camaha yohuanscai. Jan yohuanai jisish rahte rahtecani tsamajaquetaibo.
Caibo rihbi hahqui yohuani: —Quiquin yoshin Beelzebunen coshi hinanah ta tiroma yoshinbo camahiqui —hihcani.
Caibaan rihbi sca jahuen coshi tanacatsihquin: —Miin naihoh queha coshin hahxon noque jismahue —hahcanquin.
Yocacahbo bi jaton shinan honanxon Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Jahuen jihuetahbo jaabo rahsi bi rehtenanaiya ta hapon yonoti queyotihiqui. Jaton caibo betan rehtenancanahibo ta queyonicabo qui, jahuabi yamascanon. Jaa copi honannahue. Satanasnen ta jahuentianbi jahuen hahbe yoshin tiromabo picotimahiqui.
Satanas hahbe Satanas betan rehtenanxon cahen jenquetsahxon bi sca jahuen yonotibo yonoyamahan. Jascama ta qui. Satanasnen coshiyaxon hen tiroma yoshinbo camahi hih man jai copi tah hen mato yohihi.
¿Tiroma yoshiman coshiyaxon hean tiroma yoshinbo camahi man jaiya, jahuatohon cahran maton baquebaan jato camahiquin? ¿Jenquetsahpa shinanya man quin? Jaabaanbi ta mato yohiyaxihquiqui.
Papan coshiyaxon tah hen hean yoshinbo camahi. Jaa copi honannahue: Papan jihuemati nete ta mato qui noco sca jaiqui.
Nesca tah qui, jisnahue. Coshi jonin cahen jahuen toohahtiyahpaxon jahuen xobo coiranan. Coiranah cahen jaho jaibo tsoanbi meheyamahan.
Hashoan coshi joni pari joxon ta xobo hihbo bihxon jahuen toohahti bichinnica qui, jayaxon coiranti jaa xobo hihbaan shinanah bi. Jahuen jahuaborabo rihbi bichinxon ta jahuenahbi jahuen jonibo qui sca jaan metisahpaquenica qui. Jascapah tah hen qui.
Hehbe hihyamahax tah man henaboma qui. Hea tsinquixonyamaquin tah man jabismahi.
Tiroma yoshin ta joni jenebahini cahax jano jahuabi jaitonma cahax jano jihueti benahi cahuan cahuani caxon bi merayamahax janohax hen jahui janin caribitanpan hihcahini cahiqui.
Caxon ta matso siri sca jahuen xobo merascaiqui, bexojaxonah sca.
Jaatian ta caxon hashoan tiromabo hahbe yoshin rihbi benatihiqui, siete hahbe yoshinbo. Jatihibi sca jahuex ta jaa jonin jointi janin sca jihuetihiqui. Jaa copi ta jaa joni hashoan tiromacanahi sca jatihiqui, hicha yoshiman hihbojaha sca.
Jato jascajaquin yohi yohihiya sca ta tsinquijaquetaibo tocanxon huesti haibaan coshin yohinishqui: —Mia baquexo bihni haibo ta hihti jenimati jaiqui. Mia chocho hahmani ta hihti jenimati jaiqui —hahquin.
Jascajaha sca: —Jaama bi ta Papan joi nincaxon bihcoinaibo caya, hahan jenimati jaiqui —hahquin.
Hihti caibo sca nocohihnataiya jato yohiquin nescajaquin: —Rahma ta jonibo shinan tiromayahpabo qui. Non mia nincanon hahan honanti noque jismahue hah tah man jai. Man jascarai bi ta huestijaquin res hahan honanti Papan mato jismatihiqui, Jonas janí quescapah res tah man jistihi, jaa jisxon honanti.
Jonas jisxon ta ninevitobaan honannishqui. Jaa Jonasbi ta hahan honanti janishqui. Jascapahribihi tah hen hea noquebaque hahan honanti qui.
Jonibo casticanpaqueti nete noco sca jaiya ta chiponquiha quiquin hapo yamanica nihxon rahma jai jonibo yohiyaxihquiqui: Mato tah man nincayosmabo qui hahquin. Jaa ta hocho quehax jonishqui, shinanyahpahax Salomon yohuanai nincaqui jahui. Salomon hihpahoni mentan hashoan coshi shinanya rahma neno jai bi tah man nincacatsihyamahi.
Papan casticanti neten ta Níneve jema janin jihuepahonihbaan mato metoyaxihquiqui, Jonasen yohihah jaton shinan pontenihxon. Mato tah man noque mentan hashoan nincayosmabo qui. Jonas mentan hashoan nincati jonin mato yohihah bi tah man nincayamanihqui hah ta jayaxihcanihqui, mato yohiquin.
Tsoanbi tah non johue quetejaxon joneyamahi. Quetejaxon tah non quentipan mahpoyamarihbihi. Quetejaxon tah non jahuen tsahotinin tsahonai mapetaibo rahsichin jahuen xaba jisnon.
Noquen yoran johue ta noquen bero qui. Miin bero siripaiya tah min xabapan nichi. Miin bero tiromahiya tah min bahquish chian nichi.
Jistahi man. Maton shinan janin xaba jai man shinanah bi bahquishcahinmis.
Miin shinan xabayahpa hihquish, jahuabi miin shinan bahquishihyamaha tah min sirijaquin xabajaxonah sca min jatihi, johuepan xabajaha quescapi —hahquin.
Jascajaquin jan yohihiya, fariseo jonin sca: —Heen xobon pihi cahue —hahquin. Jascahah hahbetan cahax mapetax pihi tsahopaqueti.
Piríyamahax jan mechoquihyamahi quen fariseo rahteti.
Rahtetaiton: —Mato fariseobaan tah man chichoma maton tasonbo rahchoxon maton platobo rahchocai. Maton jointi nahpamehtan; jano tah man tiroma shinanbo bochohi, yometsohti shinanya hihti tiromabo shinanbo.
¿Maton mequen mato hinanxon maton jointi rihbi Papan mato hinanyamanishquin, honanmabon?
Maton jointiboyaxonbi jahuaborajomabo yanapancoinnahue. Jaatian tah man jahuabi sca rishtaya hihqui man shinanyamascatihi.
¡Hahrai! hih tah man jatihi, fariseobon. Maton haxe pehi romishin tah man texe Papa jahuena hinanxon, cahua meso rihbi texe pishca hinanxon, huai bimi rihbi texe hinanxon bi Papan yohihi quescajati man pishinmahi. Joni huetsa yanapantihi bi tah man tiromajahi. Joni huetsahon shinanti Papan mato yohihah bi tah man hahyamahi. Man hinanaibo Papa hinanquin jenebahinxonma caibo rihbi yanapantihi bi tah man hahyamahi.
¡Hahrai! hih tah man jayaxihqui, fariseobon. Tsinquiti xobo janin tah man hapobo tsahotai janin tsahoti queenbiresai. Jemanhihti janin tsinquijaquetaibaan mato saludanti rihbi tah man queenyorahi.
¡Hahrai, hahrai! hih tah man jayaxihqui. Mato tah man tsahonipibo quescapahbo qui. Tsahonipi maníxon bi tah non jenquetsahpa pisi chicho jaiquin non honanyamahi —jato jaquin.
Noquen Hihbaan jascajaquin yohihiya sca Moisesnin joi haxemanica huesti jano tsahoxon yohiquin: —Maestron, jascajaquin yohiquin tah min noque rihbi cahehi —hahquin.
—¡Hahrai! hih tah man mato rihbi jayaxihqui, haxemanicahbon. Jonibo hihuehhuan papima papimaquin hahcajaquin tah man joi tsamanxon jato yohihi. Yohixon bi tah man maton metotinin bocabi mehexon jato yanapanyamahi.
¡Hahrai! hihnoxihnahue. Maton papabaan ta Papan joi yohinicabo rehtepahonishqui, maton sca man Papan joi yohinicabaan tsahon qui tsahonxobojanon.
Jascajaquin tah man maton shinanbo noque jismahi. Maton papabaan hahpahoni quescajaribiquin tah man shinanai. Jaabaan rehtenihbo tah man maton sca man tsahonxobojaxonai, hahbe rehtemisboxon.
Jaa copi ta honanxon Papan yohihiqui: Jato qui tah hen heen joi yohixonnicaboya heen raantibo hean raanai. Hen raanah cahiton ta texe rehtexon texe rihbi tiromajayaxihcanihqui, hahquin.
Rahma jihuetaibo yohihi sca ta Papan nescajaquin yohihiqui: Maton tah man heen joi yohixonnicahbo rehtennihqui. Hen raanmenoni rehtennixon tah man rahma caman jato jatihibi rehtenpaquehi, hahquin.
Abel rehtennixon tah man caibo sca rehtexon, jato rehtepaquehi. Janoxon Papa yocaxonti janin jan nichi que bi Zacarías sca rehtenoxon caman tah man jato rehtenpaquehi. Mato ta Papan casticanyaxihqui, hih ca hen jai sen, jaton jimi man potamani copi.
¡Hahrai! hih tah man jayaxihqui, haxemanicahbon. Jayaxon Papa honanti huisha joiyahpaxon bi tah man honancatsihyamahi. Jascaxon tah man caibo rihbi sca man pantehi, honanpanan —jato jaquin.
Jascajabahini caressca jan jaiya cahen jaton haxemanicahbo betan jaton fariseobo sina sinati.
Hashoan sca yocacanquin. Jahuemeha jahuen yohuan copi non rehteti hahtipahtihin hihxon hicha yocacanquin.
Quexehibaan bi hicha bi res jonibo jano tsinquijaqueti. Hihti caibo tsamatax, joni huetsa qui tsehquesihcanahi bohiboya jahuen haxenicabo Jesusen yohiquin, behna joi sca: —Coirametahi man. Fariseobaan coro pahe mato qui mahnemis —hahquin, fariseobaan hahcoinicamati shinan yohiquin.
—Rahma jonexon hahcaibo jatihibi ta Papan janibijaquin yohiyaxihquiqui. Jonetax hihquibo jatihibi ta jaan yohipaqueyaxihquiqui jatihixonbi nincacahbo.
Tsoanbi nincayamanon hihquish man bahquish chian yohuanni joibo ta xaba chianxon jaan jato nincamayaxihquiqui. Maton xobo chicho baxexai joibo ta xobo manixon coshin nincamaquin hahcajaquin jatihibi nincamayaxihquiqui.
Caibaan ta mato rehtexon bi jahua hashoan mato tiromajati hahtipahyamahiqui, hea huetsabaan. Jascapahbo qui raqueyamanahue.
Huetsan ta mato rehtexon mato casticanti rihbi hahtipahiqui. Hahqui raquenahue, bihxon chihi janin mato potamis. Hahqui caya raquenahue.
¿Rabe soro copi non pichca hihsa romishin maroyamahin? Copi que ma bi ta jascapa mahuataiya mi huestibi Papan jato shinanbehnoyamahihqui.
Maton boo rihbi ta jahuentihi jaiquin Papan honanihqui. Raqueyamanahue hah ca hen mato jai sen. Mato tah man hicha hihsa mentan hashoan copi qui.
Jonibaan nincanon hihquish Hea ta Cristonah qui hihquibo jatihibi tah hen hean rihbi Papan yonotibo tocanxon rihbi Jaabo ta hena qui, hen jatihi, jaabo yohihi.
Jonibaan nincanon hihquish Hea ta Cristonahma qui hihquibo rihbi tah hen Papan yonotibaan nincanonbi Jaabo ta henama qui hen jatihi.
Man hehqui tiromahi yohuanai bi tah hen jaa mato sohuaxonti hahtipahtihi. Dios Yoshin qui man tiromahi yohuanai ta jascayamahi qui. Jaa ta hen mato sohuaxontimahi.
Jaton tsinquiti xobo janin mato hiohax, jaton hapobaan mato casticannon hihquish quesahiboya, jahua yohuan japan, jahua hen yohitihin hihyamayaxahnnahue.
Jaatianbi ta Dios Yoshiman mato yohuan hinantihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian, tsinquijaquetaibo tocan nihxon, huesti jonin yohiquin: —Maestron, heen bocha yohihue, noquen papa yamanicaton jahuaborabo jan hea texe hinannon —hahquin.
—Maton jahuaborabo hinannicama tah hen qui. Mato jascajaquin ponteti ta Papan hea yohiyamahiqui —jaa jascajaxon tsamataibo sca yohirihbiquin:
—Jistahi man. Coiramenahue, jahuaborabo tsinquiti shinan man bihmis. Maton jahuaborabo hichahax jihueti siriti shinanyamanahue —hahquin.
Jahan haxeti joi sca jato yohiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen huai banahoxon tsama bi res bimibo tsinquiscaan.
Tsinqui tsinquihax ¿Jahuejascapan? Heen bimibo hichahi copi tah hen jahuerahnon bexojatimascai, hihqui.
Shinanax sca, Heen jano bexojati xobobo huaxepaquexon hihtihosi xoboja sca janoxahpan. Jascajati ta jaiqui. Jano sca heen beroboya heen bimibo tsamanquin bochojascaax tah hen jenimatihi.
Hicha bari jihuexon piti tah hen tsinqui sca jai. Tanti tantihahnan pipi pipixon xeha xehascapan, coin coini, hih tah hen jatihi, hihqui shinamehti.
Jahuen jointinin jan jascari yohuanaiya bi ta Papan yohinishqui: Shinanjoman, nea yamebi tah hen mia mahuamanoxihqui. Min bexojahibo tsoa sca hihbotihiquin? hahquin.
Man jascapa honanma jamis, main jihuexon, hahan jihuexahpan hihxon tsinqui tsinquixon bi Papa janin hicha tsinquiyamahi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jahuen haxenicabo sca yohiquin: —Masa shinanyamanahue, hih ca hen jai sen. Jahua pitima ta jaiqui, jahua pipan hihyamanahue. Chopa tah hen yamahi, jahua hen sahuetihin hihyamarihbinahue.
¿Pinoxon res non jihuetain? ¿Chopa sahuenoxon res non yora jain?
Hihsabaan hahcai shinannahue. Jaabaan ta banayamahihqui. Bimi ta tsinquiyamarihbicaniqui. Piyanoxon bexojacatsihxon bi cahen jahuerahnobi bexojati yamahi. Jaton bexojati xobo yamahi bi ta Papan jato piti pishinmayamahiqui. Mato tah man hihsabo mentan hashoan copi qui, hah ca hen mato jai sen. Papan ta mato jistihiqui.
Heen shinaman bi hashoan queyanihpan hihquish bi tah min min queyanihtimahi.
¿Jascati hahtipahyamaxon jahuejanoxon man texe copi man masa shinantihin?
Joabo rihbi jenquetsahpabo hin hihxon shinannahue. Jaabaan ta yomenjayamahiqui. Chopa rihbi hahyamahax bi ta hihti siri rajotiyahpa qui. Salomon hicha chopa siribo japahonish bi cahen huesti joa betan senenyamanish.
Joa ta nihi naman hicha jaiqui. Siripi hanihi bi tah non huaijaxon jato mapojahi, copima quen. Copi que ma bi ta Papan jato hihti siri rajotibo hinanihqui. ¿Hashoan sca jan mato coirantihi man shinanyamahin? Shinancoinnahue.
Jaa copi, Jahua pipan, jahua xehapan jayamanahue. Jahua copi bi masa shinanyamanahue.
Man jascapa pishinai ta Papan jisiqui, hah ca hen mato jai sen. Piti benahi, chopa rihbi benahi ta jatihibi nahuabo nihnichiqui.
Maton tah man Papa queenai quescajaquin hahtihi, pitiya chopabo jaan mato hinannon.
Masa shinanyamanahue, baquebon. Mato man hicha jihuetaima bi ta Papan mato jahuen jihue hinanihqui.
Maton jahuaborabo maromaxon yomanahtaibo yanapannahue. Queyoyosma coriqui quescapa bihquin hahcajaquin Papa janin queyoyosma jahuaborabo bexojanahue. Jano ta yometsohtimahiqui. Champon rihbi ta jano pihantimahiqui.
Jahua ra hihti queenxon cah man jano res shinanah.
Maton Hihbo manati shinan bihnahue. Chopa sahuexon johue quetejahax manatihcamahi quescanahue.
Huanomahi catani jaton patoro yame jonoxihqui honanax ta jan nocoxon quenahi nincaxon manataibaan histon jahuen xobo xehpoti quehpenbohanxontihiqui.
Hoxahaxma manataiton jaton patoronen jato merahah ta hihti jenimacantihiqui. Jaton hihbaanbi ta jato hahxonquin pitijaxonquin jato pimatihiqui, jaanbi jato metexpaquexonquin.
Yame pochinicon joyamahax xaba paqueti hochoma sca joxon jato jascari manataiton merahah ta hihti jenimati jaabo jatihiqui, jahuerohahi tah non hoxayamahahqui hihqui.
Man honannon hihxon tah hen huetsa sca mato yohihi: Jahua hora yometso jotihiquin honanxon cahen coiranxon xobo hihbaan yometso hihquimayamahan.
Jascapa hoxan hihtima shinanya janahue. Hea nocotihi man shinanyamahi tianbi tah hen hea noquebaque mato qui nocotihi —jato jaquin.
—¿Jaa jaa patax queha joi yohuani min hihqui bi min noquebi yohihin, Hihbon? ¿Caibo rihbi min yohihin? —hahscaquin Pedronen.
Jascahah Jesusen yohiquin: —Shinanyahpa ta jahuen hihbaan yohihi quescabijaquin hahxonai joni qui. Jascapah ta jahuen hihbaan yohitihiqui, jahuen jonibo jisxonti. Jato jisxonquin jaton pitibo jato hinanxonnon hihxon ta jato jisxonnahue hahbahintihiqui.
Jahuen hihbo joxon sca jascajahiton merahah ta hahan jenimati jaresscatihiqui.
Jascapa ta jahuen hihbaan yohitihiqui, jatihibi jahuen joniboya jahuen jahuabora jan jisxonscanon.
Shinanyahpa hihyamahax ta heen hihbo ta basihi cahiqui hihxon jahuen hihbaan jonibo rishqui rishquixon jahuen teexonnicah haibobo rihbi rishquixon, pixon, xehahax pahenscaiton sca jahuen hihbaan jisbenatihiqui.
Joriyama ta jatihiqui hih jan jai tianbi ta hihbo sanarenentihiqui, hihbo nocorihtimahi jan shinanah bi. Joxon sca cahen caxquepaquexon nincayosmabo janin jaa potatihiqui.
Jahuen hihbaan yohini quescabijati honanxon bi hahxonyamahi quen ta jahuen hihbaan hihti casticantihiqui.
Honanyamaxon tiromajahibo ta hashoan hichama rishqui rishquiyaxihquiqui, hihti hahtihi bi. Hicha mia hinannixon ta hicha rihbi mia hahquirihbi yocayaxihquiqui. Hicha mia hinantahnixon ta hicha rihbi mia bichinyaxihcanihqui.
Chihi potahi tah hen main joniqui. Quetetax perehihna sca japahinon hih tah hen jai.
Hihti tiromabo hen tenetihi tah hen honanai. Histon huinopahinon hihxon tah hen tene tenehi.
¿Huesti shinanyahax siripi jihuetaibo rahsi sca janon hea joní shinan man jain? Huetsajaquin shinanaibo qui huetsa shinanyabo rainyamanon tah hen joníqui.
Huesti xoboho pichca joni jihuetax bi ta texe qui rabe rainyamatihiqui. Jascayamahiya ta rabe qui texe rainyamatihiqui.
Huetsa ta jahuen baque qui rainyamatihiqui. Huetsa rihbi ta jahuen papa qui rainyamatihiqui. Huetsa haibo ta jahuen baque qui rainyamatihiqui. Huetsa rihbi jahuen mama qui rainyamahi. Yaya rihbi jahuen hihni qui rainyamahi. Hihni rihbi jahuen yaya qui rainyamahi —hahquin noquen hihbaan.
Jahuen haxenicabo jascajaxon, tsinquijaquetaibo sca yohirihbiquin: —Jano bari hihquihi quiri jisxon nai cohin hanicanahi merahax tah man Hoi ta jahuiqui hihqui. Hihcoini. Jasca ta jatihiqui.
Chiponquihax nihue jahuiya tah man Rahma ta barinoxihquiqui hihqui. Jascacoinrihbihi.
Honanihcamahibon, ¿nihueya cohinbo jisxon jahua jatihiquin honanxon jahua copi sca man Papan yohihah jahua jatihiquin man honanyamahin, jan mato yohihah bi?
¿Jahua jenquetsahaxon man matonbi shinanxon ponte res jihueti shinanyamahin?
Mia demandana juez janin caquin bahinxon bi mia demandanai betan bexohue. ¡Juez janin mia ninitana juezin sca jahuen porisia yohixon mia sipo xoboho rehuinmamis!
Chicho tsahonah tah min copijabahinquin queyoyamahax janohax picotimahi —jato jaquin.
Jaatian Pilatonen hahni sca caibaan yohiquin. Galilea mai mehabaan roqui jaton yohinahbo rehtexonquin Papa mapojaxoncannish, Papa Dios hinancatsihquin. Jaton yohinahbo mapojahiton bi roqui Pilatonen jato rehtenish. Rehtexon qui jaton jimin qui jaton yohinahbo nashimaquin, jonin jimiya sca maponon.
Jaa chanihibo sca Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Jatihibi jonibo mentan hashoan hohchayahpabo quen Papan jato jascajani shinan man jain?
Jascayama ta jaiqui. Maton shinan ponteyamahax tah man mato rihbi jascapahbo rihbi jayaxihqui, queyocahinscaibo rahsi.
¿Hoa dieciocho jonibo, jato qui jaton xobohhuanen paquequin bishtaxni cahran? Jatihibi ta mahuacannishqui. ¿Jatihibi Jerusalen janin jihuetaibo mentan jaabo hashoan hohchayahpabo hi shinan man jain?
Jascayamahi rahan. Maton shinan ponteyamahax tah man mato rihbi queyocahinyaxihqui.
Jato jascajaxon jaa patax queha joi sca jato nincamaribiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen bimi jihui bananish. Bananish, bimiyahpa sca rah ta qui hihquish, cari carixon jisi bi jahuen bimi yamahi.
Bimi yamahiya sca jahuen huai teexonnica yohiquin: Jise. Quimisha bari sca tah hen bimi bihcatsihquish jori jorichai. Jahuabi ta yamahihqui, rahma caman. Rerascahue. ¿Jahua janon jaa nihtihiquin? hahquin.
Huesti bari pari jenetahhue, hihbon, mai cahuenbohanxon hen jaa naman tara payobo tsamanbohantannon.
Jascajaha bimihiya jascabiscanon. Jascajahah bi bimiyamahiya tah non rerascatihi hahquin jahuen huai teexonnicahton —hahquin.
Jato jascajahipish huetsa neten sca jaton tsinquiti xoboho Jesus mapexon jato haxemarihbiquin, jaton tantiti neten.
Jano tiroma yoshinyahpa haibo rihbi mapeti. Yoshiman hihbojaha dieciocho bari sca hisini. Cahcopaquecanahi nihnica. Jenquetsahax bi pontetimahi.
Jaa meraxon mequeman mehehax Jesus coshin yohuani: —Rohascahue, chocan —hahquin.
Jan yohihah, pontecahin sca jai. Jascari rohacahinscaax Hahxon tah min hea jai, Papan, hihqui Papa Dios yohihi.
Jaton tantiti netenbi Jesusen jaa rohajahiya jaton tsinquiti hihbo rainyamacahini. Rainyamaxon jano tsinquitaibo sinajaquin: —Seis nete ta hahan teeti netebo qui. Jaa netebaan rahomehti benahue. Tantiti neten tah man rahomehtimahi —hahquin.
Jato jascajahiton Jesusen sca pontejaquin yohiquin: —Quesan, ¿xehpohipixon tantiti netenbi man maton vaca pecaxon, jaa hihyamahiya maton cabacho pishca pecaxon, hioxon man jene xehamayamahin?
¿Satanasnen nea haibo jisxon nexahah dieciocho bari nexá sca nichi quen non tantiti neten jaa rohajatimahin? ¿Maton caibo que bi nexá bi res janon man rohajamacatsihyamahin?
Jato jascajaha jano tsahobehcoinaibo hihtimahcahinscai. Jaabo hihtimanon bi texe tsinquijaquetaibo jenimahi. Jahuen coshi shinaman jan jato hahxonah quen hihti jenimacani.
Jaa copi ta jato yohinishqui: —Papan jihuemati jenquetsahpa quin, Jenquetsahpa hin hihxon tah hen mato yohihi.
Huesti moxo bero pishca quesca tah qui. Jascapah non noquen huai chian banahah cahen hanicahuanscaax jihuiscai. Jihui tihopa sca jaiya cahen jahuen mebibo romishin janin hihsabaan nahajaquin.
Hahquirihbi sca jato yohiquin: —¿Papan jihuemati jenquetsahpa quin?
Jaa ta hahan paan soohihmati quescapa qui. Jascapa bihxon cahen tasa bocho misi janin haibobaan niahan. Jano niahah ta tasa bocho jatihobi soohihcahuaniqui —hahquin.
Jaatian sca cahi. Jerusalen janin cahi caquin janobo jai jemabo janin banehuanax caribihiton sca:
—Hihbon, ¿Papan jihuemahibo hichatahmabo quin? —hahquin huetsan.
—Papan hani tahma xehqui huesti janin hihcoti shinannahue. Hicha ta Hihcopan hihxon bi hihcoti shinanyamahiqui.
Xobo hihbaan jahuen xehqui xehpobohanscai bi tah man jeman nihxon sca xehpoti ton ton hahxon Noque quehpenxonhue Hihbon man jatihi. Man jascaraiton ta Mato tah hen honanyamahi, jahuerahnohahbo ra tah man qui hah ta mato jatihiqui.
Jaatian tah man Mihbetan tah non pipahoniqui, mihbetan rihbi tah non xehapahonihqui, noquen jemabo janinxon tah min haxemapahonihqui hah man jatihi.
Jaatian ta mato yohiyaxihquiqui: ¿Jahuerahnohahbo mato quin? Hen tah hen mato honanyamahi. Nenohax botannahue, tiromabon.
Jascajaha tah man huaohihyaxihqui. Abraham, Isaaque, Jacobo, Papan joi yohixonnicahbo jatihibi rihbi, jaabo jatihibi Papan jihuetahbohax jaa janin jihuetai jisxon tah man hihti masa shinanbahinscatihi. Jato qui tah man hihcotimahi. Jatoma qui ta mato potayaxihquiqui.
Caibo caya ta hocho quehax nocohihnayaxihcanihqui. Bari cainai quirihax, bari hihquihi quirihax, reboquihax, chiponquihax, janobohax nocohihnaxon ta Papan jihuetahboxon jaa janinxon fiestajayaxihcanihqui, benahue Papan jato jaah.
Jaatian ta rahma chini chinitaibo bebonicabo sca jatihiqui. Caibo rihbi rahma bebonicabo ta chinitaibo sca jayaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajahiya bi fariseobo sca nocoxon: —Nenohax catanhue. Herodesnin ta mia rehtecatsihquiqui —hahcanquin.
—Hoa quexenica yohitannahue. Tiroma yoshinbo camaxon tah hen hisinaibo rahma rohajaxon, bahquish rihbi rohajaxon hoqueha bahquish sca hen janquenjayaxihqui.
Jaabi tah hen rahma jari caparihi. Bahquish rihbi tah hen caparinoxihqui, hoqueha bahquish rihbi tah hen capariyaxihqui. Maton quiquin jema janinbi tah man tiromaboxon Papan joi yohinica rehtematihi.
Jerusalen janinhahbon. Man hea nincacoinpahinon, Jerusalen janinhahbon. Papan joi yohinicabo rehtemisboxon tah man mato qui Papan raannihbo rihbi macaman tsacaquin rehtepahoniqui. Jahuentihi coti sca hen mato tsinquímaha bi tah man queenyamahi. Hatapanen jahuen baque romishin tsinquixon jahuen pehi naman jato paxajaquin hahcajaquin hen mato tsinquímaha bi tah man queenyamahi.
Jistahi man. Jahuen baquemabo sca man janon ta Papan mato jenehihqui. Man tah man hea jisyamascatihi, hen joribinon caman. Jaatian pari tah man yohuanyaxihqui, Papan baque ta hihti shinanya nete hihbo jahuiqui hihqui —jato jaquin.
Jaa pecaho sca quenamaha huesti fariseo hapon xoboho pihi cahi, jaton tantiti neten. Jaa piquihinxon jahua hahxon non cahetihin hihxon jis jiscanquin.
Jascapa tocanxon pihanan jisi bi huesti tahsóhihqui joni rihbi jaa bebon tsahotai jai.
Jaton joi xeni haxemanicahboya jano jai fariseobo sca Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Tantiti neten non rohajatihin? ¿Non rohajatimahin? Hea yohinahue —jato jaquin.
Yocacah bi jahua hihyamacani. Jahua hihyamahiboya sca tahsóhihqui mehexon rohajaxon, caresscahue hahquin Jesusen.
Tsahohahtanaibo sca yohiquin: —¿Maton baque mai poquin chicho paquetaiya, jaa hihyamahiya maton ganado mai poquin chicho paquetaiya tantiti neten que bi man histon bihtimahin?
Yocacah bi jahua yohiti honanyamacanquin.
Quenamahabo ta pihi tsahocatsihquin hapobaan tsahotibo bihcatsihquibo rahsi jano janishqui. Jascapahbo rahsihi jisxon, jaa patax queha joi sca jato yohiquin:
—Heen xobo janin pihi cahue hahca cahax jano jahuen hanibo tsahotihi janin tsahopaqueyamanahue. Mia mentan hashoan hapo rihbi quenamaxon mihqui sca caxon, Hori cahue, jaa neno tsahonon, hah mia jamis.
Jan mia jascahah tah min hihtimahpax chini chini sca tsahoti catihi.
Jaa copi quenamaha cahax jano chinibo jaiton tsahopaquehue. Jaatian rah ta piti hihbo joxon sca mia Jari hapobo quiri tsahohihnarohahue mia jatihiqui. Jan jascajahiya ta mihbe quenamahabo jatihibichin mia shinanya hihqui mia jistihiqui.
Hea rah tah hen caibo mentan hashoan shinanyahpa qui hihquibo jatihibi ta hihtimahyaxihquiqui. Hea rah tah hen caibo mentan hashoan jahuama qui hihquibo ta shinan siri Papan hinanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca jaton piti hihbo sca yohiquin: —Pihi benahue hahnoxon pitijaxon miin hamicobo quenamayamahue. Miin huetsabo rihbi quenaxonma, miin jenabo rihbi quenaxonma, mihbe coriquiyahpabo rihbi quenamayamahue. Mia pimanoxon copiquin sca mia quenamaribicanmis.
Hichaxon pitijacatsihquin, jahuaborajomabo, tobi pishcabo, chantobo, benchebo, jascapahbo quenamanoxahnhue.
Jaabaan mia pimaquin copiti hahtipahyamahi quen tah min hahan jenimati jaresscatihi. Jahuen baquebo Papan huenihihnixon ta mia hahan jenimati hinanyaxihquiqui —hahquin.
Jato tocan pihi tsahotax huetsa joni sca yohuani: —Papan jihue janinxon pihibo ta hihti jenimatihiqui —hihqui.
Jascahah: —Piti fiestajayanoxon cahen huesti jonin hicha jonibo quenamahan.
Jahuen piti hihres sca jaiya sca jahuen joni raanquin, jan quenamahipibo yohinon hihxon. Raanah, Benahue hih ta jaiqui, Ma ta hihresscaiqui hahquin jato yohibonaquin.
Yohihah bi huesti cacatsihyamahi. Jaa cacatsihyamahiya jatihibi sca cacatsihyamascacani. Jan yohimenohah cacatsihyamaxon joi bichinscaquin: Huai tah hen marohipiqui. Pihi catahin tah hen heen huai jisi cahi. Pihi cati tah hen hahtipahyamascai hahquin hea yohixontanhue hahquin.
Huetsan sca: Hean tah hen diez toro marohipiqui, rabexon nininicabo. Pihi catahin tah hen rahma jato tanahi cahi. Pihi cati hen hahtipahyamascai piti hihbo yohixonhue hahquin.
Huetsan rihbi sca: Hen tah hen haibo bichipiqui. Jaa copi tah hen cati hahtipahyamascai hahquin.
Jato yohitani nocoxon sca, jaabo yohuanai jahuen patoro yohiquin. Yohiha jahuen patoro rainyamascai: Rahmabi caribitanhue. Bahin nichibo janin sca caxon jano jaibo, jema quexabi nichibo rihbi yohitanhue. Jahuaborajomabo, tobi pishcabo, benchebo, chantobo jaabo sca yohixon hihuetanhue hahquin.
Jascajatani joxon sca: Min yohihah quescajaquin non hihuehah bi ta piti hicha pari jaiqui, hihbon, hahquin jahuen jonin.
Jemama qui sca caxon, min bahinxon behchihibo sca bihxon tapasoho jihuetaibo rihbi hihuetanhue heen xobo bochoscanon.
Non quenamamenohibaan ta jahuabi noquen piti tanatimabiresiqui hihca hen jai sen hahquin.
Jascajaquin jano tsahotaibo Jesusen yohihiya hihti caibo sca hahqui nocohihnati. Nocotaibo sca jaan yohiquin:
—Maton papabo jistahihmahaxma hehqui jahuibo ta heen haxenicabo jatimahiqui. Maton papa, maton mama, maton haibo, maton baquebo, maton huetsabo, maton chocabo jistahihmahaxma, maton yoshin rihbi jistahihmahaxma tah man heen haxenicabo jatimabiresai.
Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen heen Hihbo jenetimahi hihnahue. Jascaxon nincacoinnahue. Jascajayamaxon tah man heen haxetibo jatimahi. Man shinannon hihxon tah hen yohihi.
¿Xobojacatsihxon, jahuentihi copitihiquin, heen coriqui senentihiquin hihxon man shinanquin sirijaxon pari xobojayamahin?
Shinanquin sirijayamaxon xobo jihuibo nichinxon bi janquenjati min hahtipahyamahiya ta jisibaan sca mia hosantihiqui.
Hoa jonin ta xobojacatsihxon bi janquenjati hahtipahyamahiqui hih ta jaticaniqui.
¿Quiquin hapobo rihbi hahbe quiquin hapo betan rehtenani canoxon tsahotahxon veinte mil sontaroyahpa hahqui jahui bi diez mil pishcayaxon jaa tenetihin hihxon sirijaquin shinanyamaparihiquin?
Tenetimahi shinanxon ta hoa huetsa hocho pari jahui bi comision hahqui raantihiqui jenquetsahax non bexotihin hihxon.
Jascajaquin rihbi shinanquin sirijaxon maton jihue jatihibi jenebahinyamahax tah man heen haxetibo jatimabirestihi.
Tashi ta siri qui. ¿Hahan non pitijacatsihqui bi noquen tashi jahuiyamascaiya, jahuatohon sca non noquen piti jahuijatihin. Non tah non hahtipahyamascatihi.
Jascapa tashi tah non hahquiribi mai sca hihnon hihxon noquen banabo janin minchintimahi. Non payomacatsihquin piti huecax potahi janin rihbi tah non jascapa tashi tsamantimahi. Jascapa tashi tah non potaresai. Hahan nincati pabinquiyahpaxon nincanahue.
Jaatian sca cobranmisbo betan hohchayahpabo rahsi sca becani. Jesus yohuanai nincaqui becani.
Jascapa hahqui nocotaiya fariseobo betan jaton xenibaan joi haxemanicahbo hahqui yohuanscai. Hohchayahpabo sirijaquin bihxon ta jascapa betan pihiqui, hihcani.
Jaa copi ta jaa patax queha joi jato yohinishqui:
—¿Cien carnero jaax bi huesti manotaiya, jaa manotai huesti benahi canoxon man texe noventinueve janobi jenebahini caquin, man benahi sca cayamahin?
¿Meranoxon caman man benahi cayamahin? ¿Meraxon man jenimahanan papibehnantimahin?
¿Xoboho nocoxon sca maton jenaboya mahbe jihuetaibo quenaxon, Jahuerohajaquin tah hen heen carnero baque manotai bi merahahqui, Jenimanonhue hah man jatimahin?
Jascarihbihi ta naihoh quehax jenimacaniqui. Huesti hohchaya jonin mainxon jahuen shinan pontehiya ta jenimacaniqui. Noventinueve jaton shinan ponteti pishinyamahi shinanaibohon jenimayamahax bi huestichin jahuen shinan pontehiya jenimacani.
¿Jascarihbihi ta huesti haibaan diez libra jaxon bi huesti manomaxon, johue quetejaxon xobo matsoquin sirijaxon meranoxon caman benabonatimahiquin?
Meraxon sca jahuen jenaboya jahuen hahbe jihuetaibo quenaxon Jahuerohajaquin tah hen hen manomaha coriqui hen merahahqui, jan jatimahiquin?
Jascarihbihi ta mainxon huesti hohchaya jonin jahuen shinan pontehiya Papan yonotibo jenimacaniqui —jato jaquin.
Huetsa rihbi sca jato yohiquin: —Huesti joni cahen rabe bebo baque janish.
Haniscaxon cahen jahuen chini baquen jahuen papa yohiquin: Papan, texe hena hihnon min mahuaquin potabahinyaxihquibo hea rahmabi hinanscahue. Jascajaha jahuen baquebo hinantijaxon jaa sca jahuena hinanscaquin.
Jahuenahbo jatihibi bichipish jaabiyahpa caresscai, hocho sca huetsa main cahi cahi. Cahi nocoxon sca bexnanbo maroquin. Haibobo copi rihbi jahuen coriqui potaquin queyobahinquin, jahuabi yamascanon.
Jaa maibo janin piti pishin sca jaiboya, jaa rihbi pihan hihscai.
Pihan hihxon janoha joni patorojascaquin. Jahuen patoronen sca jaan jahuen cochibo pimahi canon jahuen pasto chian sca raanquin, cochi coirantanhue hahxon.
Tsoanbi piti hinanyamahah, pihan hihquish cochin piti bimi romishin piti shinanbahinquin. Jascapah que bi yanicahinnoxon caman piti shinanquin.
Jaatian sca shinanquin sirijahax, Heen papan jonibo hichahi bi ta jaton piti pishinyamahiqui. Neno ca hen pitin mahuacatsih sca jai.
Rahma ran heen papa janin hea caresscatihi. Nocoxon tah hen yohitihi: Papan, noquen Papa Dios qui hohchatax tah hen mihqui rihbi hohchatai.
Tiroma copi tah min hea Baquen hahtimascai. Miin joni quesca sca hea jahue.
Jascatanpan hihcahini sca caresscai, jahuen papa janin cahi cahi. Nocoti jahui bi hocho pari hihquiya manan huinoquihrani jahuiton jahuen papan meraquin. Jointi xecahihnixon hahan hihti shinanax bishquihihcanahi caxon jahuen baque hicotanxon betsohahquin.
Hicotanah sca: Papan, noquen Papa Dios qui hohchatax tah hen mihqui rihbi hohchanihqui. Hea tiroma quen tah min hea Baquen jatimascai hahscaquin jahuen baquen.
Jascahah bi yosibaan jahuen jonibo yohiquin: Sahuemanoxon tari siriya berinahue. Mehesehtiya joxon mehesennahue. Sapato rihbi bexonnahue jan sahuenon.
Non xoamarasihi toro baque bihtannahue rehtenoxon. Hicha pitijaxon pihi non coin coinnon.
Nea heen baque ta mahuanish bi jihuerihbiscaiqui. Manonish hen shinanah bi tah hen heen baque merahahqui, jato jaquin. Jenimascai, jahuen papa.
Jahuen baque bebo quihah teeti. Huai chian teetanax joresscaquin bi xobo hochomaxon sca rehuen behua behuáhibo nincaquin.
Jahuen papan joni huesti quenaxon sca yocaquin: ¿Jahua copi jascacaniquin? hahquin.
Jochica ta nocotaxqui. Jaa copi ta toro xoa pishca papan rehtehaxqui, jaa siripi nocotai quen hahquin.
Honanscaax jahuen bocha rainyamahax xoboho hihcocatsihyamascai. Picoxon jahuen papan Johue, Johue hahca bi joi bichinquin:
Jahuentihi bari sca hen mia teexonai bi tah min heen hahbe rabetibo betan hen jenimanon jahuentianbi hea chibo baque bocabi hinanyamanihqui. Basi teexonquin bi tah hen jahuentianbi mia nincayama yamanihqui. Hea teemis que bi tah min hea jahuabi rehtexonyamaniqui.
Hoa miin baque jahuen hahresti haibobo janin caxon miin coriqui queyontanax jahuiya cah min noquen toro xoa rehtexonah, hahquin.
Jaatian sca: Mia tah min jascabihi hehbetan jihuetai, baquen. Hea jai jatihibi rihbi ta mina qui.
Jan jahui quen non coin coinax jenimaha ta siri qui. Miin jochica ta mahuanish bi jihuerihbiscaiqui. Manonish bi ta rahma hahquirihbi merahah sca qui.
Jascajaxon jahuen haxenicabo sca Jesusen yohirihbiquin: —Huesti coriquiyahpa joni cahen janish, jahuaborayahpa joni. Huesti neten sca ta chanicannishqui: Miin jahuabora coirannicahton ta miin coriqui mia queyonihqui.
Jascaraiboya jahuen coirannica quenamaxon jahuen hihbaan cahescaquin. ¿Hihcoini yohuancaniquin? Hen mia hinantahni coriqui toponpaquehue non jisnon. Heen coiranxonnica tah min jatimascai hahquin.
Jascahah shinamehti: ¿Jahuejascapan? Heen patoronen ta hea heen tee hea bichinihqui. Yosmaxon tah hen horo horoti hahtipahyamahi. Yocamis sca hihtihi bi tah hen yocati hihtimahpai.
Hen honanai quescajaquin hahpan, heen tee jan hea bichinai bi caibaan sca sirijaquin jaton xoboho hea jihuemahabo hihcahini sca caxon jahuen patoro ribinai jonibo sca quenamaquin.
Jahuen patoro ribinaibo quenamapaquexon sca: ¿Jahuentihi min heen patoro ribinain? hahquin, jan quenamamenohi.
Cinco mil botella olivo xeni tah hen ribinai hahquin. Tsahohue, miin hahan huishati bihxon tres mil botella min copijascai huishahue hahquin.
Huetsa rihbi sca yocaquin: ¿Mian cahran? ¿Jahuentihi min ribinain? hahquin. Hean tah hen mil tasa trigo ribinai hahquin. Miin huishati bihxon ochenta res min ribinai huishahue hahscaquin.
Jan jascajahi chanihibo nincacax sca jahuen patoro yohuani: Jaa ta yometsohti honan qui hihqui, coirannica yohihi jascari. Jascapahbo rihbi ta mai mehabo qui. Jaton caibo jatohon queennon hihxon ta nea mai mehabaan hahquiqui, xaba baquebo mentan hashoan honan ta jacaniqui.
Maton rihbi rah tah man yometsohxon, jaa coriquinin sca jonibo hesetihi, maton coriqui queyo sca jaiya jaabaan sca jaton queyoyosma jihue janin mato jihuemanon —hahquin fariseobo yohiquin.
Hicha tahma hinanah, jayaxon sirijaquin hahxon tah man hicha hinanah jayaxon sca sirijaquin hahtihi. Hicha tahma hinanah bi jayaxon tiromajaquin hahxon tah man hicha hinanah sca jayaxon rihbi tiromajatihi.
¿Nea mai meha jahuaborayaxon man sirijaquin hahyamahiya tsoan sca mato naihoh queha jahuaborabo hinantahtihiquin?
¿Caibaana man jaton jahuaborabo coiranxonquin sirijayamahiya tsoan sca mato matonah hinantihiquin?
Patoroyahpaxon tah man jaa sirijaquin teexonhanan huetsa patoro rihbi sirijaquin teexontimahi. Huetsa queenxon tah man huetsa sca jistahihmatihi. Huetsa hahxonquin sirijaxon tah man huetsa sca nincayamascatihi. Maton Papa Dios hahxonquin tah man jahuaborabo rihbi tsinqui tsinquiti hahtipahyamascatihi —jato jaquin.
Jan yohihi jatihibi nincaxon bi yohuashihboxon hosancanquin fariseobaan.
Hosanaibo sca jaan yohiquin: —Man siribo hihqui jonibaan shinanahbo hihquish tah man siripihcamahi yohuanai. Siripi yohuanihcama man jai bi ta maton shinanbo Papan honanihqui. Hihti siri tah qui hih jonibo jai que bi ta jascapahbo shinanyabo Papan jistahihmahiqui.
Juan jonon caman ta Moisesnin huishani joibo janishqui, Papan joi yohixonnicahbaan yohini joibo rihbi. Juan joní pecaho tah non Papan jihuetahboti joi siri sca non yohihi. Jaa copi ta histon sca jahuen jihuetahbo sca jacahincaniqui. Nincati queenaibo rahsi.
Papan joi ta queyotimahiqui. Naiya mai queyócahinyaxihqui bi ta ni huesti teque pishcabi jahuen joi manotimahiqui.
Miin haibo potaxon huetsa sca bichish tah min hohchayahpa sca jai, noquen Papa qui tiromahi. Huetsa jonin potahah haibo bichish tah min jascarihbihi, noquen Papa qui hohchayahpa sca jai.
Huesti joni cahen coriqui hicha bi res janish. Yanconihboya joxonihbo jahuen quiquin chopabo sahuexon cahen jatihibi neten hihti nohuenihbo pipipahonish. Jenimahanan jihueti can.
Jahuen xoboho jaa jascari jihuenon cahen jemanhihti hoque huesti yocamis janish. Patoronen xobo xehqui janin cahi bahin potahahbo racati, jahuen yora nobepan rahbojocotax hisini racati.
Racatax sca: Haitara, jahuen misa janinhax paquetai teque romishin hea hinanpahinnon, hahan hen pihi yanicahinnon, hihqui pihan hihquish.
Jascari jaax mahuascai. Papan yonotibo sca joxon jano Abraham siripi jihuetai janin jaa hioscaquin, jano sca siripi jihuenon. Coriquiyahpa rihbi sca mahuati. Mahuatai mihincanquin jonibaan.
Jano jascapa bexojati janinxon sca hihti hisin hisinxon hoque jisxon hocho Abraham meraquin. Lázaro rihbi hahbetan pihi tsahoti.
Abraham quenaxon sca: Hehon shinanhue, Papan. Lázaro raanrohahue, jahuen metoti rebo pishca jenen mehchajaxon jan heen jana matsijaxonnon. Nea chihin ta hea jeneyamahiqui. Hihti tiroma hisin tah hen jai, hahquin.
Shinanhue, baquen. Jihueparihax tah min siriboyahpa janiqui. Lázaro cahen tiromabo rahsi. Rahma cahen pihihue hahca nenoxon pihi jihueti. Mia cah min hisin jaroma teneti jai.
Hono naponbi rihbi ta hihtihosi xanquen jaiqui, jenquetsahax bi nenohax jari tsoabi botopaquetimahi. Jarihax rihbi tsoabi neno pohquequihrani jotimahi, hahquin Abrahanen.
Jaatian hihti yocaribiscaquin: ¡Hahrai, Papan! Jascahiya heen papan xobo janin jaa raanrohahue.
Pichca ta heen huetsabo jaiqui. Raanrohahue, caxon jan jato yohi yohinon, nea hihti tiroma janin joyamahabo, hahquin coriquiyahpa hihpahoniton.
Moisesnin huishani joibo ta jaabo jaiqui, Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joi rihbi. Jaa joibo jaabaan nincacoinnon, hahquin Abrahanen.
Jascahah: Jaa joi ta nincayamacaniqui, Papan. Mahuatipish bi jato qui huesti cahiya pari ta nincacointicaniqui, hahquin.
Moises nincayamaxon, Papan joi yohinicabo rihbi nincayosmaboxon ta huesti mahuatipish bi hahquirihbi jihuexon jato yohihah bi nincatimarihbicaniqui, hah sca Abrahanen jaa janon —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Hahan hohchati shinanya ta jotihiqui. Man jaa jotimajati hahtipahyamahi bi ta jaa jomahi joni hihti sai saihihyaxihquiqui, casticannah.
Hohchati shinan hinanyamanon macan renti tenexxon jenenencanya potahah cahen hashoan siriquehahni.
Coiramenahue. Miin huetsa hohchataiya pontejaquin yohihue. Shinanquin sirijahiya sca sirijaquin yohuanquihnhue.
Mia tiromajaxon bi Hen tah hen tiromajahahqui, huetsan. Pontejaquin sca tah hen shinanai mia jaah tah min sirijaquin yohuanquihntihi, jan mihqui tiromahah tah min shinanyamascatihi. Huesti neten mia siete coti jascajaha bi tah min hahxontihi —jato jaquin.
Jascahah: —Hahan nincacointi shinan noque hashoan hichajaxonhue, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
—Moxo berotihopa shinan pishcayahpaxon man nea huishtinanti jihui yohixon Mexecahinax hian janin cayacahintanhue man jaah cah man yohihah quesca sca jaquehahni.
Patoroboxon man yonohah, maton joni huai chian teebahinahax jascayamaxon maton hinabo pimaxonax xobon sca jahuiton sca man Johue, mapexon piresscahue ¿hah man jatihin?
Hea pitijaxoni sca johue, hahqui mehca mehcaxon hea bexonhue, hen pixon xehanon. Jascajaxon pari mian sca Pinoxahnhue, xehanoxahnhue, ¿hah man patoroboxon jatimahin?
Man yonoha jan hahcaiya, Hahxon tah min hea jai, ¿hah man jatihin?
Maton jonin mato hahxonai quescajaribiquin maton Hihbo hahxonnahue. Maton hihbaan mato yohiha jatihibi hahcax Noque tah non tiromabo teexonnicahbo qui. Jan noque yohihah res tah non hahcai, hihnahue —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca Jerusalen janin sca cahi cahi. Galilea mai senenbi cahi, samaritanobaan mai quetanpaquebahini cahi.
Jaton jema huesti qui nocoxon sca sipiyahpabo jahuibo behchiquin. Diez joni, sipiyahpabo rahsi. Jesus merahax, hocho nihxon coshin quenacanquin:
—¡Maestron, Jesusen, noquehon shinanrohahue! —hahcanquin.
Jato jisxon: —Man rohahi sacerdotenin jisnon jismatannahue —jato jaquin. Jascahah boresscacani. Bahin caquin jisi bi jaton sipi rohacahinscai.
Rohahipibo bi huesti res joribihi. —Papan ta hea hihti hahxonihqui —hihonahi jahui. Nincacahbo hihquish coshin yohuani.
Jesus qui nocoxon sca hahqui betihihpaquexon: —Hihti hahxon tah min hea jai, Hihbon —hahquin. Jaa joni cahen samaritano.
—¿Rohascaibo diez hihyamahipishquin? ¿Texe cahran?
¿Caibo jononma nea nahua huesti Hahxon tah min hea jai, Papan hihonahi jahuiquin? —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jascajaxon jaa yohiquin: —Huenitax caresscatanhue. Hihcoinjaquin shina nax copi tah min siri sca jai —hahquin.
Jaa pecaho sca ta fariseobaan yocannishqui: —¿Papan jihuemati jahuentian jotihiquin? —hahcanquin. Yocacahbo sca: —Papan jihuemati ta jistimahiqui. Maton beron tah man jaa jistimahi.
Neabi tah qui, Hoa tah qui hih tah man jatimaribihi. Papan ta mato tocanxon mato jihuematihiqui.
Fariseobo jascajaxon jahuen haxetibo sca yohiquin: —Huetsa tian tah man Noquen Hihbo noque betan hihpahinon, huesti nete pishca res jan hahquirihbi noque betan nihpahinon, hih tah man jayaxihqui. Hea jiscatsihxon bi tah man hea jisyamayaxihqui.
Hoa tah qui hihyamahax ta Neno tah qui hihyaxihcanihqui. Jascahahbo bi jano yohihibo janin boyamayaxahnahue. Jato chibanyamayaxahnahue.
Naihoh ramihoh quehax ramihoh queha cana bacatanicamahi ta hea naihoh quehax jahuiya jatihiqui.
Jascayahnoxon pari tah hen hicha teneti jai. Hea queenyamahax ta mai mehabo hea yohihi, Tiroma tah qui hihtihiqui.
Neateman Noen jihueni tian japahoni quescarihbihi ta jayaxihcanihqui hea naihoh quehax hahquirihbi joresscanon.
Jaatian ta pixon xehacanpahonishqui. Bebobaan haibo bihquin. Haibobaan rihbi bebo bihquin, jahuen xobo nontin Noen nanenon caman. Jaatian ta jenehhuahnen joxon jato queyonishqui.
Lot jihueni tian janíbo quescarihbihi ta jayaxihcanihqui. Picanquin, xehacanquin, marocanquin, maromacanquin, huaijacanquin, xobojacanquin.
Sodon jema janinhax Lot picotai betanbi ta naihoh quehax johuehihnacahinai chihi jato qui paquetah queyocahincannishqui, sodomobo.
Jascarihbihi ta jayaxihquiqui, naihoh quehax hea noquebaque sanarenenaiya.
Jaatian maton xobo cahchian tsahoxon bi maton xobo chicho jai jahuaborabo bichi cati shinanyamanahue. Huai chian teetax jascarihbihi, xobon cayamascai.
Loton haibo hihni shinannahue.
Noque rehtecanmis hihxon hea hihbomayamahibo ta queyocahinyaxihquiqui. Hea jenebahinyamahibo ta rehtehah bi jihuecoinyaxihquiqui.
Jaa yamebi huesti bachiho rabe joni hoxahi bi tah hen huetsa bihxon huetsa rihbi hean jenebahinyaxihqui.
Rabexon rene renehiboya tah hen huetsa bihxon huetsa rihbi hen potabahinyaxihqui.
Huai chian teetaibo jascajaribiquin. Huetsa bihxon bi huetsa jenebahinquin.
Jato jascajaha: —¿Jahuerahonon nan, Hihbon? —hahscacanquin. —Jano nami racatai bi ta hishmin tsinquitihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca Papa yocati jenebahinyamahahbo hihxon jaa patax queha joi sca jato haxemaquin. Jaayocaqui paxquinyamahahbo hihxon jato haxemaquin.
—Huesti tininti cahen jahuen jeman jihuetan, Papahon shinanyosma, jonihon shinanyosma.
Jano rihbi cahen huesti yononma haibo janish. Jahuen tininti yohihi sca yononma cari carichi. Hea tiromajahi joni hea casticanxonhue hahqui cari carichi.
Basi jascacahchihi bi tininti queenyamahi. Basihax res sca hahmebi shinamehti: Dios qui raquexonma tah hen jonibo qui rihbi raqueyamaxon bi nea haibaan hea jaajatsanjaha jan demandanai hean casticanxontihi, hea jatsanjayamascanon, hihqui.
<range>
Jaa joi jato nincamaxon Jesusen jato yohiscaquin: —Jaa tiroma tininti yohuanai shinannahue.
¿Man yocabahinaxon yocashinahah noquen Papan tiromajahibo pontequin mato hashoan histon hahxontimahiquin? ¿Man yocacai tenexon jaan manarestihiquin?
Histon bi res ta mato hahxontihiqui. Jan histon mato hahxonai bi ¿naihoh quehax joquin man nincacoinai hen mato jisbenayaxihquin?
Jato jascajaxon huetsa jaa patax queha joi sca jato yohiquin. Hea caya tah hen hohchajoma qui hihxon bi caibo sca jistahihmahiboya nescajaquin jato nincamaquin:
—Rabe bebo cahen janoxon Papa yocati xoboho mapexon Papa yocanish. Huetsa cahen fariseo joni, huetsa cahen coriqui cobranxonnica.
Nichish cahen fariseo nescari hahri horahi: Hahxon tah min hea jai, Papan. Hea tah hen caibo jonibo quescapahma qui. Jaabo ta yometsohbo qui, tiromabo, tsinibo. Hoa coriqui cobrannica quescayamarihbi ta hea qui.
Semanan tihibi tah hen rabe coti samacai. Hen teexon cananai tihibi tah hen texe mia hinanai.
Jaa jascari yohuannon bi hocho nichish nai bejisihniti hihtimahpax hahri xohtíhihqui nihxon cobrannicaton yohiquin: Papan Dios, hea tah hen hohchayahpa qui. Tenexon hea sohuahue, Papan, hahquin.
Man honannon hihxon tah hen mato yohihi. Papan jisí ta hoa fariseo jahuen hohchaya jascabi janishqui, hoa cobranxonnica ta hohchajoma sca jahuen xobon caresscanishqui. Hea caya ta siri qui, hihquibo jatihibi ta Papan rabinmayaxihquiqui. Hea ta jahuama qui hihquibo ta caibo mentan hashoan siri qui, Papan jisi —jato jaquin.
Baquexobo rihbi ta hihuecannishqui, jan jato mehenon. Jaya jahuibo jisxon, jahuen haxenicabaan jato yohiquin, jascapahya beyamanahue, hahquin.
Pantehibo jisxon jato quenaxon: —Baquebo hehqui jonon jenenahue. Jato panteyamanahue. Jascapa ta Papan jihuetahbo qui.
Hen mato yohinon nincanahue: Baquebaan Papan joi nincacoinai quescajayamaquin nincaresaibaan ta Papan jihuetahboti hahtipahyamahiqui —jato jaquin.
Huesti hapon sca yocaquin: —Siri Maestron, ¿jenquetsahax hen hea queyoyamanox manatihin?
—¿Jahua copi min hea siri yohihin? Tsoabi siri ta yama qui, Papa huesti res.
Papan yohini joibo tah min honanai. Tsiniyamahue. Joni huetsa rehteyamahue. Yometsohyamahue. Quesayamahue. Miin papan yohihah nincahue, miin maman rihbi yohihah nincaquin —hahquin Jesusen.
—Baque pishcaxon nincanixon tah hen rahma caman jaa min yohihi quescabijaquin hahcai —hahquin.
—Huestijati sca tah min pishinai. Miin jahuaborabo jatihibi maromabahinxon jahuajomabo jaa coriqui hinanreshue. Jaatian tah min naihoh sca siri jahuabora jatihi. Jascajatanax hehbe johue —hahquin Jesusen.
Nincaxon masa shinanscaquin, jahuen jahuabora hichahiya.
—Coriquiyahpabo Papan jihuetahbo jaah ta hihti tee qui.
Xohmox quini janin hahua huinomaha ta tee qui. Tee que bi ta coriquiyahpahhuan Papan jihue janin hihquiti hashoan tee qui —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jan jascahiya: —¿Coriquiyahpabo Papan jihuetahbotimahiya tsoabo sca non Papan jihuetahbo jatihin? —hahscacanquin.
—Jonibaan jisí jenquetsahaxon hahtimahi bi ta Papan hahtipahiqui —jato jaquin.
—Jise. Noquen tah non jatihibi jenebahinxon mia chibanai, Hihbon. ¿Non queyoyamanox jihuetimahin? —hahscaquin Pedronen.
—Papan jihuemati joi bihcoinnoxon tah man maton xobo potabahinai. Maton xobo, maton haibo, maton huetsabo, maton papabo, maton baquebo rihbi, jaabo jatihibi jenebahinxon tah man nea mainxon bi hashoan hihti caibo rihbi man bihtihi. Naihoh sca tah man queyoyamanox jihuerihbitihi. Jatihibi potabahinax bi tah man hashoan sca jatihi —jato jaquin.
<range>
Jahuen doce joni sca quenaxon: —Nincanahue. Jerusalen janin tah non cahi cahi. Jano sca ta Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joibo jai quesca sca jatihibi jaresscatihiqui, noquebaque hihqui bi hea yohihi joibo.
Hea ta nahuabo bihmayaxihcanihqui. Hosan hosanxon ta hea hicháyaxihcanihqui.
Hea betoshbanhahxon ta rishquitinin rishqui rishquixon hea rehtescayaxihcanihqui. Hea rehtehipibo bi quimisha neten hihquish tah hen hahquirihbi hueníyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Yohihah bi nincayamacanquin. Jaabaan nincacah cahen honantima joi. Jahua hihcatsihquiquin honanyamacanquin.
Jaatian sca Jericó jema janin sca nocoti bocani. Jema hihcoti bahin bocani. Jaa bahi quexabi benche joni tsahoti. Coriqui yocaqui tsahoti.
Huinojaquetai nincacax yocacahti: —¿Tsoabo man huinotain? —hihqui.
—Nazaret janinhah Jesus ta huinotihqui —hahcanquin.
—Jesusen, Davidi baquen, hehon shinanhue —hahquin, coshin.
Hahbe huinotaibaan sca: —Netehue. Netehue —hahcabo bi hashoan sca sai saihihqui: —Davidi baquen, hehon shinanrohahue —hahquin.
Nihrenenxon sca: —Jaa neno hihuenahue —hahquin Jesusen. Hihuehah, jaa senenbi nichiton sca benche yocaquin:
—¿Hen mia jahuejaxonti min queenain? —hahquin. —Heen bero hea rohajaxonhue, Hihbon —hahquin.
—Jisresscahue. Hen mia rohajati min shinancoinai quen tah hen mia rohajasca jai —hahquin.
Jaatian jahuen bero siricahin sca jai. Bero siricahinxon Jesus chibanbonahi caquin, Papa Diosen ta hea hihti hahxonihqui hihcanahi. Jaa jisish jatihibi sca jascarihbihi; Papa Dios ta hihti siri qui hihcanacani.
Jericó jema nabebacahini cahi sca bocani.
Jano Zaqueo janeya joni jai, cobrannicabaan hapo. Coriquiyahpa joni.
Jenquetsahpa hin hihxon Jesus jiscatsihqui bi jonibo tsamajaquetaiya jenquetsahaxon jistimahi. Queyanihmaxon jisti hahtipahyamaquin.
Bishquihihcanahi cahi. Jari Jesus huinoxihqui quiri cahi, jihuin hinacahini. Jesus jiscatsihqui hinacahinxon manaquin.
Hinatax manatai bi jaa jihui ponte sca nocoxon bejisihnixon bototi Jesusen yohiquin: —Botopaquehue, Zaqueon, histon. Rahma tah hen miin xoboho tantihi cacatsihqui.
Botocahinax res sca hahbetan caxon jenimahanan jahuen xobon mapemaquin.
Jan jano mapetai jisish, jatihibi reren rerenscacani. —Hohchayahpa jonin xoboho mapetax ta janobi tantihiqui —hihcani.
Reren rerenaibaan bi nihinaxon: —Hihbon, texe heen coriqui hena hihnon tah hen jatíhi rihbi jahuajomabo hinannoxihqui. Paranxon hen bichinnihbo rihbi tah hen chosco coti jatíhi rihbi tsamanxon jato hinanrihbitihi, hihbon —hahquin Zaqueonen.
—Nea netenbi ta nea xoboho jihuetai joni Papan jihuemahiqui, queyoyamanox manascanon. Nea rihbi Abrahanen baque, can.
Manonihbo benahi tah hen naihoh quehax joníqui, jato jihuemanoxon. Jaa copi tah hen queyoyamanox manati yohihahqui —jato jaquin, Jesusen.
Jato jascajahax Jerusalen hochoma sca nichiya sca: —Jaa rah ta quiquin hapo sca Papan hihmanoxihquiqui. Jaa rah tah non rahmabi jisnoxihqui —hihcani. Jascajaquin shinanaibo quen jaa patax queha joi sca jato yohiscaquin.
—Huesti hani patoro cahen hocho canish, janoxon quiquin hapo sca hihmahahbo. Quiquin haposcaax joribiyanoxon cahi.
Cariyamaxon diez jahuen jonibo quenaxon joni tihibi coriqui hinantahquin, joni tihibi diez mil soles. Hinanxon jato yohiquin: Hen joribinon caman jayaxon maroxon maromanahue hichajanoxon, jato jaquin.
Jan caresscaipi cahchiqui sca texe jahuen jihuetahbaan jaa jistahihmaxon comision raanquin. Jano jaton patoro cahi janinbi cahax nocoxon Jaa patoro noquen quiquin hapo hihti tah non queenyamahi yohihi cahabo hihxon comision raancanquin.
Jaabi, quiquin haposcaax joribixon sca jan coriqui hinantahnihbo quenamaquin. Joni tihibichin jahuentihi cananihquin hihxon jato quenamaquin.
Huesti joxon: Hihbon, min hea hinantahbahinni tah hen diez coti rihbi jatíhi rihbi hahcai, hahquin.
Min tah min sirijahi. Mia tah min siri joni qui. Hicha tahma hinanah bi tah min sirijaquin hahcai. Jaa copi tah min diez hani jemabo sca min hihbotihi hahquin jahuen hapon.
Huetsa sca jahui. Min hea hinanbahinni coriqui tah hen pichca coti rihbi jatíhiribi hahcai, Hihbon, hahquin.
Mia rihbi tah hen pichca hani jemabo sca hinanai, min hihbonon, hahscaquin.
Huetsa rihbi sca jahui. Joxon: Nea ta min hea hinantahbahinni coriqui qui, Hihbon. Chopan rahcoxon tah hen sirijaquin mia bexojaxonnihqui.
Mihqui raquexon tah hen bexojaniqui, Hihbon. Mia tah min sina qui. Mian jananihma tah min bichinai. Min banayamanih tah min tsinquirihbihi, hahquin.
Min yohuanai quescabija tah hen mia jatihi, tiroman. ¿Hea sina hihqui min honanihquin? ¿Hen jananihmabo hean bichinain? ¿Heanbi banayamanihbo tsinquinica min hea honanain?
¿Jahua copi sca min heen coriqui jaya teenica hinanyamanihquin jan jaya teenon? Joxon cah hen heen coriquinin cananai hashoan hicha bihribiquehahnai.
Jano nichibo sca yohiquin: Jahuen coriqui bichinxon, diez tsama jai joni hinannahue.
Jaatian: Ma ta diez jaresscaiqui, Hihbon, hahcanquin.
Jaa jaibo rahsi tah hen hashoan sca hinantihi. Jahuajomabo rihbi tah hen jan jai pishca hean bichintihi, hih ca hen jai sen.
Hoa hea jaton quiquin hapoti queenyamahibo sca neno hihuenahue. Heen rahuibo tah qui. Heen jisnon bi jato rehtepaquenahue. —Jascajaquin ta haxehahbo Jesusen jato jaa patax queha joi yohinishqui.
Jaa joi jato nincamahax Jerusalen janin sca cahi caribihi.
Betfagéya Betania jemabo hochoma sca Olivo janeyahpa mahchi ponte nococani. Janoxon sca rabe joni raanquin.
—Hoque racatai jema janin botannahue. Nocoxon tah man cabacho baque nexá meratihi, tsoabi jaa cahtsahonima. Pecaxon hahbenahue.
¿Jahuejanoxon man pecahin? yocacah sca, Noquen hihbo ta pishinihqui hihnahue —jato jaquin.
Raanah boresscacani. Cahi nocoxon jan yohiha quescabi meracanquin.
Cabacho baque pecahiton sca cabacho hihbaan jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuejanoxon man pecahin? —jato jaquin.
—Noquen Hihbo ta nea pishinihqui —hahscacanquin.
Jascajaxon becanquin. Jaya noco sca jaiya sca, jaton chopa hahan pohenxon tsahotijacanquin.
Jaa cahtsahotax cahiya sca caibaan rihbi jaton taribo pecaxon bahin mijanquin, hahan nihnon hihxon.
Olivoya mahchi naman sca nocotaiya jahuen haxenicabo jatihibi jenimacanahi yohuancanahi, coshin bi res: —Papan shinanyaxon ta hihti hahxonihqui —hihcani. Papan coshiyaxon Jesusen jato hahxonrahsihi jisipish jascacani.
—Quiquin hapo ta jahuiqui, Papa Diosen janen ta jahuiqui. Shinanya siri tah qui. Papan ta noquehon shinanxon hahxonihqui. Noquen naihoh queha Papa ta hihti siri bi res qui —hihcani.
Caibo fariseobo rihbi jato tocan nihxon Jesus yohiquin: —Jascayamanon miin haxenicabo netemahue, maestron —hahcanquin.
—Jaabo netetaiya ta toa minchihi macanbo coshin yohuanquehanihqui —jato jaquin.
Mahchi cahpaquehxon hori Jerusalen jema racatai jisish Jesus jaya huaohihqui.
—¡Rahmabi Papa betan siripi jihueti man honanpahinon, Jerusalen janinhahbon! Jaa honantihi bi tah man benchebo qui.
Tiromabo netebo ta mato qui nocoti jahuiqui. Mato qui tsequeti joxon ta mai tsamanxon mato chiquehahtanbohanxon mato tejatanbohanxon jatihibi janinxon mato tiromajayaxihcanihqui.
Maton xobobo potojaquetanxon ta maton baquebo rehteyaxihcanihqui. Hahan xobojaquin man tsamanni macan ta ni huestibi huetsa macan cahchian tsahoyamascatihiqui. Mato jascajayaxahnnon bi tah man Papan mato rahma sirijacatsihqui man honanyamahi —jato jaquin.
Jema janin hihcohax sca Papan xoboho mapeti. Mapexon janoxon maromahibo cainmabahinquin.
—Heen xobo ta jahoxon hea yocati xobo qui hih ta Papan joi janin jaiqui. Nenoxon Papa yocatihi bi tah man jano yometsohbo tsinquitijahi —hahxon jato jabamaquin.
Jatihibi neten sca ta jaa xobohoxon jonibo haxemanishqui. Jan haxemahiya cahen judiobaan hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbaan jaa rehteti shinannish. Judio patorobo betan rihbi jascajaquin shinanxon bi jenquetsahaxon rehteti merayamacanquin.
Jan haxemahi nincacatsihqui jonibo hashoan hicha tsinquijaquetaiya cahen jenquetsahxon rehtenoxon bihtimahi.
Huetsa neten sca Papan xobohoxon jonibo haxemahanan jan joi siri yohihiya sca judiobaan hapobo mapeti jahui. Jaton hapobo, jaton haxemanicahbo, jaton yohuan hihbobo, jaabo rahsi jano mapeti jahui.
Mapexon yocacanquin: —¿Tsoan janen min jascajahin? ¿Tsoan jascajahue hahca min jascajahin? Noque yohihue —hahcanquin.
—Hean rihbi tah hen mato huesti yocatihi, maton pari hea yohinon.
¿Tsoan yohiha Juaman nashimapahonnishquin? ¿Jonibaan yohihah nan, Papan yohihah nan? —jato jaquin.
Jascajaquin yocacah jaabo rahsibi yocacahanannancani: —¿Jahua non yohitihin? Papan yohihah rahan hah non jaiya ta jahua copi sca man jaa nincayamanihquin hah noque jatihiqui.
Jonibaan res yohihah rahan hih non jaiya ta nea tsamajaquetaibaan noque macaman tsacaxon rehtetihiquin. Papan joi yohinica ta Juan janishqui hah ta jacanihqui jatihixonbi, hih ca hen jaihsen —hihcani, jaabo rahsibi yohuani.
Jascahahnanxon sca: —Tsoan yohiha jaan nashimanishquin, non tah non honanyamahi —hihcani.
—Man hea yohiyamahi quen tah hen tsoan yohihah hean nescajahin hean rihbi hen mato yohiyamahi —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca jaa patax queha joi sca jonibo yohirihbiquin: —Huesti jonin cahen bimi huai bananish. Huaijaxon ta teexonnicahbo jahuen huai hinantahnishqui, canoxon. Hinantahbahini cahi, hocho cahi caresscai.
Basixon sca texe jahuen bimi bihxonnon hihxon hochoxon jahuen joni raanquin. Raanah nocotaiton sca hinantahnibaan rishquixon mequen sca camarihbicanquin.
Huetsa rihbi jahuen joni sca raanrihbiquin. Jaa rihbi rishqui rishquixon roaxon mequen bi res camarihbicanquin.
Huetsa rihbi sca raanquin, jahuen quimisha sca. Jaa rihbi tsehue tsehuejaxon potacanquin.
¿Jahuejascapan? Hahan hen queenai heen baque sca raanpan. Jaa rah ta nincayaxihcanihqui, hahxon raanquin.
Jaa sca nocoti jahui jisish, yohinancani jahuen hinantahnibo. Jahuen papa yama sca jaiya ta nea sca huai hihbo hihyaxihquiqui. Rehtenonhue, jahuen huai noquena sca hinon hihcani.
Jascaxon huaima qui hioxon sca rehtecanquin. ¿Huai hihbobi joxon sca jahueja jaan jato jatihiquin?
Joxon ta jahuen hinantahnibo rehtepaqueyaxihquiqui. Jato queyobahinxon sca ta huetsabo sca jahuen huai hinantihiqui —jato jaquin. —Jascajayama jacanpahinon —hihscacani, nincacax.
Jato bejispaquequin sca: —¿Nea huishani jahua hihcatsihquiquin? Jaa nahuita jihui ta tiroma qui hihxon xobojahibaan potahibaan bi ta jaabaan potahi jihui qui hean xobojacoinai hih ta jaiqui huishani joi.
Jaa nahuita jihui qui paquetaibo ta tobicahintihiqui, jatihibi. Caibo qui paquequin ta jaa jihuin jato champajabahintihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jato qui jan jaa joi yohihi honanxon ta jenquetsahaxon non jaa bihtihin hihxon jaton haxemanicahbo betan jaton hapobaan tanaxon bi bihti hahtipahyamacannishqui, jonibo qui raquexon.
Noquen Hihbo nincacoinihcamahax manahihti cahabo sca caibo copijacanquin. Jaama joi yohuanmatannahue hahxon copijacanquin. Jaama yohihiton bihxon tah non noquen hapo hinanscatihi, noquen gobernador rihbi hinanquin hahcanquin.
Nincacoinihcamaxon sca Jesus yocacanquin: —Mian tah min sirijaquin yohihi, maestron. Pontejaquin tah min haxemahi. Tsohquibi raquexonma tah min jaabijaquin jatihibi jonibo yohihi. Papa qui cahi bahi tah min honanmacoinai.
Noque yohihue: ¿Quiquin hapo Cesaronen noque cobranah non copijatihin? ¿Non copijatimahin? —hahcanquin.
Paranxon yocacaibohi honanxon:
—Coriqui huesti hea jismanahue. ¿Tsoan mapo jano jaiquin? ¿Tsoan huisha jano jaiquin? —jato jaquin. —Cesaronena rahan —hahcanquin.
—Jahuena hihquiya jaa hinannahue. Papana hihquiya tah man noquen Papa hinanrihbitihi —jato jaquin.
Tsinquitaibaan jisiya ta jenquetsahaxon yohuanquihnxon bihtima jacannishqui. Jato joi bichinah neteresscani, rahtetax.
Saduceobo sca jahui, tsoabi ta mahuatax hahquirihbi huenitimahiqui hihnicabo. Jaabaan sca tanaquin yocaquin.
—Maestron, Moisesnin ta huishanishqui, noquen bocha baquejahaxma hihxonaiya non jahuen yononma bihxon hahqui noquen huetsa yamanica non baquejaxonti.
Siete joni ta janishqui, jaa mama quiha rahsi. Bebo quihaton ta haibo bichish bi baquejahaxma mahuanishqui.
Jahuen chini jaa bichish bi jascarihbihi.
Huetsa rihbi sca jahuen chini, jascarihbihi. Jatihibi sca jascarihbihi, baquejahaxma queyocani.
Hahchon sca ta jaton haibo rihbi mahuanishqui.
Papan noque hahquirihbi huenihiya sca, ¿tsoan haibo jaa jatihiquin? Jatihibichin jaa hahuinjani —hahcanquin.
—Rahma jihuetaibo ta haibo bihmahahnaniqui.
Papan caisxon hahquirihbi jihuemahibo ta huanoyamascayaxihcanihqui. Huanomayamaribiquin.
Jaabo ta mahuayosmaboyaxihquiqui. Papan yonotibo hihqui quescarihbihi ta jayaxihcanihqui. Papan jato jihuemaha ta jahuen baquebo rahsi sca jayaxihcanihqui.
Mahuanicabo hahquirihbi hueníyosmabohi man shinanah bi ta huenínicabohi Moisesnin yohinishqui, nescajaquin: Hea tah hen Abrahanen Papa Dios qui, Isaaquena rihbi, Jacobona rihbi.
Papa Dios ta mahuanihbaan Diosma qui. Jaa ta jihuetaibaan Papa Dios qui, Jaan jisi jatihibi japarihi quen —jato jaquin.
—Hihcoini rahan —hih sca jaton haxemanica huesti jai.
Hashoan yocati qui raquescaax jascari.
Netetaiton sca: —¿Jahua jisxon Cristo ta Davidin baque hihyaxihquiqui jacanihquin?
Man jisyamahin, behua huishaquin ta jaa yohihi Davidinin yohinishqui: Xaba hihbaan ta heen hihbo yohinishqui, Hea mecayaho hihbohi tsahohihnahuea
Miin rahuibo miin hinabo sca hihnon hen jato namanjanon caman neno tsahotihue hah cahen Davidinin janish huishaquin.
Heen hihbo jan hihquiya ¿jenquetsahax res sca jahuen hihbohax bi jahuen baquetihiquin?
Jato jascajaxon jatihixonbi jonibaan nincanon sca jahuen haxenicabo yohiquin:
