—Jaton haxemanicahbo hihqui quesca man jamis. Coiramenahue. Jaton chopa siribo sahuehax jano jonibo tsinquijaquetai nihti ta costancaniqui, jisibo hihquish jano nichi. Caibaan jato Hapon hahnon hihxon ta costancaniqui. Tsinquiti xoboho ta hapobaan tsahotibo janin tsahocatsihcanihqui. Pihi johue hahca ta xobo hihbo patax bi res tsahoxon picatsihcanihqui.
Yononma meraxon ta tahtijaxon jahuen jahuaborabo jatihibi bichincaniqui. Paranquin ta Papa basi yocacaniqui, jatihixonbi nincanon hihxon. Jascapa ta Papan hihti casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian sca coriquiyahpabo jano nichi jisquin. Papa qui hinancatsihquin coriqui naneti bohnanti janin coriqui nanehi nichibo jisquin, hicha coriqui nanehibo.
Huesti yononma sca joxon jahuen coriqui yamahi bi jahuen rabe coriqui romishin nanequin. Jaan nanehi jisxon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin:
—Hoa jahuaborajoma yononmanen ta caibo mentan hashoan hicha nanehiqui.
Hoabaan ta hicha bi res jaxon texe hinanihqui. Hoa yononmanen ta jatihibi pishinxon bi jan jai jatihibi hinanihqui —jato jaquin.
Jaatian Papan xobo yohihi caibo yohuani. —Macanbo hihti siribo tah qui. Jise. Sirijaquin ta hahcannishqui, xobo siri —hihcani.
—Nea man jisi xobo ta potojaquetanyaxihcanihqui. Ni huesti macanbi ta huetsa cahtsahotimascatihiqui. Potaquin ta ni huestibi pishinmayamayaxihcanihqui —jato jaquin.
—¿Jahuentian jascajayaxihcanihquin, maestron? ¿Jahua jisxon non min yohihi quesca sca jacatsihqui non honantihin? —hahcanquin.
—Coiramenahue, mato parancanmis. Hea tah hen qui hihqui ta heen janen hicha joyaxihquiqui. Nete ta queyocatsihscaiqui hih ta jaribiyaxihcanihqui. Jascascaibaan bi jato nincayamaxahnnahue.
Rehtenanaibo joi nincacax bi rahteyamayaxahnnahue. Mai hihbocatsihxon rehtehibo joi nincacax rahteyamarihbiyaxahnnahue. Jascapahbo pari ta jatihiqui. Jascapa jai bi ta nete queyorihyamatihiqui —jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon jato yohirihbiquin: —Huetsa jonibo ta jaton nahuabo betan rehtenanyaxihcanihqui. Quiquin hapobo ta hahbe quiquin hapobo betan rehtenantihiqui.
Mai rihbi ta coshin bi res mihuanyaxihquiqui. Nahuan pahen ta hisinyaxihcanihqui, mahuati hisini. Hicha janin ta jascayaxihquiqui. Hahqui raquetibo ta jatihiqui. Naihoh rihbi ta hahan honantibo jayaxihquiqui.
Jaabi ta jascapahbo jariyamahi bi mato tiromajanoxon mato yahtanyaxihcanihqui. Tsinquixon mato tiromajanoxon ta jaton tsinquiti xoboho mato boyaxihcanihqui. Jaton sipo xoboho rihbi ta mato tsahonyaxihcanihqui. Man heen janen yohihi copi ta jaton gobernadorbo janinxon mato demandanyaxihcanihqui. Jaton quiquin hapobo janinxon jascajaribiquin.
Hioxon ta mato Hihcoini sca yohuanhue hahxon mato tana tanayaxihcanihqui.
Mato jascajahabo bi rahtexonma maton jointinin shinanquin sirijanahue. Jahua yohipan hihyamanahue.
Jaatianbi tah hen mato shinan hinantihi, hahan yohuanti hinanquin. Man hahan yohuanaiya ta mato joi bichinti hahtipahyamayaxihcanihqui. Mato joi bichincatsihquibo rahsichin ta Jascama ta qui hahti hahtipahtimahiqui.
Hahan yohuanti shinan hen mato hinanah bi ta mato qui yohuanxon caibo maton papabaan, maton mamabaan, maton huetsabaan, maton jenabaan, maton hahbe rabetibaan maton tinintibo mato bihmayaxihcanihqui. Caibo rihbi ta mato rehteyaxihcanihqui.
Man hea nincacoinai quen ta mato jistahihmayaxihcanihqui.
Jaabi tah man manotimahi, ni huestibi ta maton boo queyocahintimahiqui.
Hea jenebahinyamahax tah man queyoyamanox manatihi.
Mato jascajayaxihquibo bi nahuan sontarobo nea Jerusalen mayahahtanbohanai jisxon, nea jema tiromajabahinti nea pishca sca jai honannahue.
Jaa jisish Judea main jihuetax mahchi janin jabacahintannahue. Jerusalen janin hihquish rihbi picocahintannahue. Jemama qui nichibo rihbi jema janin joyamascanon.
Huishani joibo jai quesca sca janon ta hihti tiromabo netebo jatihiqui.
Jascapa hahqui nocotah ta tohoyabo hohmis hohmisyaxihquiqui. Xoma hahmahibo rihbi jascarihbihi. Nea main jihuetaibo ta hihti tiromabo huinoyaxihquiqui, Papan jato casticanah.
Sontarobaan ta hicha jonibo rehteyaxihquiqui. Jato bihxon rihbi ta jatihibi nahuabaan main jato borestihiqui. Nea Jerusalen rihbi ta nahuabaan hihbojayaxihquiqui, jaton nete senennon caman.
Hahan honanti rihbi ta jayaxihquiqui, bari huetsapahi. Hoxne rihbi huetsahpacahini, huishibo jascarihbihi. Quebijistima nian coshin behchon behchonax tsahca tsahcajaquetaiya ta jatihibi janin jihuetaibaan rihbi hihti masa shinanyaxihcanihqui.
Jahua sca noque huinomatihiquin hihquish ta raqueya jihuetax jaton jointi masacahinax jonibo mahuayaxihquiqui. Naihoh queha coshibo ta Papan shacon shaconyaxihquiqui.
Jaatian ta naihoh quehax hea noquebaque botopaquetai jisyaxihcanihqui, nai cohiman hihti coshi xabaya hea jahuiya.
Hen mato yohihi quescari jacatsihscaiya yobacahinnahue. Hen mato bichi joti nea pishca sca jai honanax, bejisihnibahinquin hahcajahi jihuenahue.
Jato jascajaquin yohixon, jaa patax queha joi jato yohiquin: —Banabo jihuibo jisnahue, jatihibi jihui rihbi jisnahue.
Bochocohi jisish tah man Bari tian sca ta jatihiqui hih man jai.
Jascajaquin rihbi hen mato yohihah quescari jaresscai jisxon, mato bichi hea joti nea pishca sca jai honannahue.
Hen mato yohihah quescari jatihibi jascascaiya pari ta nete queyoyaxihquiqui.
Naiya mai queyoyaxihqui bi ta heen joibo jahuentianbi queyotimahiqui.
Coiramenahue. Pahen pahenax man jointi xehpomis. Tiroma netebo huinotax, Hahrai jahueja sca non jatihin hihquish man jointi xehpomis. Huetsa janin man maton shinan camahiya hahan hea jahui nete mato qui nocorenenmis.
Jatihibi main jihuetaibo qui ta jaa nete histon nocorenenyaxihquiqui.
Hen mato yohihah quesca jaresscacatsihquiboya mato cahnehahbo hihxon jatihibi tian hoxa tenexon jaayocanahue. Hea naihoh quehax jahuiya, hea bebon nihnicahnoxon hihxon, jaayocanahue —jato jaquin.
Jato jaa joibo yohinoxon ta bariyahpan Papan xobohoxon jonibo haxemahax yamebo sca Olivoya manan janin hoxahi capahonishqui.
Xaba paquescaiya ta Papan xoboho jonibo hahquirihbi tsinquijaquepahonishqui, jan haxemahi nincaqui jahuex tsinquicani.
Jaatian pascua fiesta hochoma sca jai, chahoma paan piti fiesta.
Jesus yohihi, Jenquetsahaxon non jaa mahuamatihin hih sca jacani, judio hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbo. Jonibo qui raquetax jascacani.
Jaatian Judas Iscariote Satanasnen hihbojaquin. Jaa Judas ta Jesusen haxenica hihpahonishqui, jahuen doce joni huesti.
Caxon judio hapobo yohuanquihnxon jaton tinintibo rihbi jaan yohuanquihnquin. Jenquetsahaxon Jesus bihmatihin honanscaxon jato yohiscaquin.
Jan jato yohiha jenimacani. Jenimahanan: —Mia tah non copijatihi —hahcanquin.
—Mato tah hen bihmacointihi —hihquish, Jahua hora jonibo yamahiquin, Jaatianbi bihmahah ta siri qui hihscai Judas, shinamehti.
Fiesta hani neten sca jaton paan pinon jaton carnero baque rehteti netenbi Juanya Pedro Jesusen yohiquin: —Noquen fiesta piti hahxontannahue non pinon —hahquin.
<range>
—¿Jahuerahnoxon piti non hahtihin, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
—Jema janin caxon tah man jene bihtanax poo hiabenahi jahui joni behchinoxihqui. Jaa tah man chibantihi. Jano jaa mapetai janin rihbi tah man jaa xoboho mapetihi.
Mapexon xobo hihbo yohinahue: Jahoxon heen haxenicabo betan hen pascua piti pinon jahoxon piti chique jahuen hin hah ta maestronen jaiqui hahquin yohitannahue.
Man jascahah ta bochiquiha chique hani mato jismanoxihquiqui bexojaha siriscai bi. Janoxon pitija noque jaxontannahue —jato jaquin.
Caxon sca jan jato yohihah quescabi meracanquin. Janoxon sca pascua pitijaxoncanquin.
Ma hihresscaiya pihi tsahopaquecani, Jesus jahuen haxenicabo betan.
—Janin hea tiromajacanmis tah hen mato betan nea pascua piti hihti queenahqui.
Papan jihuetahbo janon hen jaton hohcha queyobahinnon caman tah hen pascua piti piyamascatihi —jato jaquin.
Hahqui xehati sca bihxon: —Nea bihxon hinanpaquenahue.
Nea hompa tah hen xehatimascai, mato jihuemahi jonoxon caman.
Jato jascaxon, posen sca bihxon Papa yohixon tehcaxon jato hinanrihbiquin. —Nea ta heen yora qui, man jihuenon hihxon tah hen hehrí jato rehtemahi. Mahuaquin tah hen mato hahxonai. Jaa shinanhahnan piti ta nea qui. Hen mato hahxonai shinanhahnan pinahue —jato jaquin.
Pixon xehati sca bihxon jan piti yohihah quescajaribiquin: —Nea xehati hahnahue. Hahxontijanixon mato hahxonscaxon tah hen behna sca hahquirihbi hahxontijahi. Hahxontijaxon hen jahuentianbi huetsajatimahi honanahbo tah hen heen jimi potahi. Jaa shinanhahnan xehanahue.
Jaa hen mato jascajaquin yohihi que bi ta hea bihmahi jonin hehbetanbi piti bichiqui.
Papan yohini quescabihi ta hea tiromahabo jatihiqui. Hea tiromajayaxihquibo bi ta hea jato bihmanoxihqui joni Papan hihti casticanyaxihquiqui —jato jaquin.
Jato jascahah, yohinancani. Tsoan cahra jascajatihiquin hihquish yocacahanancani, jaabo rahsibi.
Caibo sca yohinani, Tsoa non hashoan hapo hihyaxihquiquin hihquish. Jascaraibaan bi Jesusen jato yohiquin:
—Nahuabaan quiquin hapobaan ta jato hihti hihbojahiqui. Jato yono yonohah bi ta Jaa ta hapo siri qui hihcanihqui.
Mato tah man jascapahbo jatimahi. Cacannicahax bi tah man jatihibichin yonoti quesca man jatihi, jato hahxonnicah. Mato bebonica ta maton chini quesca jatihiqui, mato hahxonnicah.
Huetsan pinon ta huetsan rihbi metexoniqui. ¿Jahuemeha hashoan hapo quin? ¿Pinica hashoan hapoma quin? Maton hihbo hihxon bi tah hen mato tocan jihuexon mato hihti hahxonai.
Caibaan hea tiromajahah bi tah man jenebahinyamarahsihi.
Hea quiquin hapo hihnon heen Papan hea yohini quescajaribiquin tah hen hean sca mato rihbi yohihi, hapobo sca man janon, hea quiquin hapo quen man hea janin hehbetanbi pixon xehayaxahnnon. Hen mato hinanah tsahoxon tah man quiquin hapoboscaxon israelibaan doce jenabo man yonoyaxihqui.
<range>
—Simoman, nincahue, Simoman. Bimi bero rahsi bihcatsihquin tohaquin hahcajaquin mato tana tananoxon hihxon ta Satanasnen coshin yocacaxqui.
Jaabi tah hen mia yocaxonaqui, min nincacoinquin jeneyamanon. Hahquirihbi miin shinan pontexon sca miin huetsabo coshi hinanyaxahnhue.
—Sipo xoboho hea tsahonahbaan bi tah hen mia jahuentianbi jenebahintimahi, hihbon. Hea rehtehibaan bi tah hen mia jenebahintimahi —hahscaquin Simoman.
—Yohicoin tah hen mia jai, Pedron. Nea yamebi ta hatapa queori jaima quimisha coti min Hea tah hen jahuen jonima qui hih min jatihi hea yohihi.
Pedro jascajaxon jatihibi sca yohiquin: —Coriquijoma tah hen mato raannihqui, borasajoma rihbi, sapatojoma rihbi. Jascapa raanah bi ¿jahua man pishinnihquin? —Jahuabima rahan, hihbon —hahcanquin.
—Rahma tah hen mato yohihi. Borasayahpahax jaya cahue. Coriquiyahpahax jascarihbihi. Hahan rehtenanti machitojomaxon miin coton maromaxon machito marohue.
Hea yohihi, Hahbe yometsohbo betan ta hihquiqui hih ta hea yohihi jacanihqui, hehqui huishani joi jai quescajaquin ta hea janoxihcanihqui. Jaa copi tah hen yometsoh yohuanihcamaquin mato yohihahqui. Neateman huishaxon yohini quescabi sca ta jaresscatihiqui, hea yohihi joibo —jato jaquin.
—Jise, Hihbon. Neno tah non machito rabe jai —hihcani. —Jascabi sca janon jenenahue —hahquin.
Xobo janinhax cahax, jan hihcachihi quescari Olivoya manan manichi cahi. Hahchon bi jahuen haxenicabo rihbi manahi cahi.
Nocoxon: —Tiroma yoshiman mato tanayamanon Papa yocanahue —hahquin.
Jato jascajahax hori pishca non macan pishca potahi tihixon jaa huesti cahi. Cahax, raboxonen nihxon, Papa yocascaquin:
—Papan, rahma janoxihquibo hea cahnemahue, queenxon. Jaabi, hea queenai quescarihma bi mia queenai quesca janoxihnon —hahquin.
Jaatian Papan yonoti naihoh quehax hahqui botopaquexon coshi hinanai jiscanquin.
Jaatian bená benaxon Papa hihti yocascaquin. Yocahahnan niscani, jimi toisihquicamahi niscani. Mai qui toisihquiya mai mehchascai.
Yocati queyohax res sca huenicahuanax jahuen haxenicabo qui joxon benaya hoxahiton jato meraquin.
—¿Jahua jenquetsahax man hoxa hoxahin? Huenixon Papa yocanahue; tiroma yoshiman mato tanamis.
Jan jato yohihi betanbi jonibo nocoti. Jato betan jahuen haxenica Judas rihbi jato beboxoni jahui. Jesus qui joxon betsohahquin saludanquin.
—¿Betsohahquin min hea jato bihmahin, Judasen? —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Jaatian Jesus tejabohanaibohi jisxon sca: —¿Non jato rerascatihin, hihbon? —hahcanquin jahuen haxenicabaan.
Judio hapon yonoti sca huestichin reraquin. Reraquin bi jahuen pabinquin mecayaho paxtebahinquin.
—Jenenahue —hahxon jahuen pabinqui Jesusen mehexon rohajaquin.
Jaya tejacahuanaibo cahen porisiabo, sacerdotebo, mesco hapobo. Jato jatihibi yocaquin: —¿Yometsoh yahtanquin hahcajahi man machitoya jahuin? ¿Maton huinoboya man jahuin?
Nete tihibi Papan xobohoxon honanmahanan hen mato betan hihrasihi bi tah man hea bihyamahipiqui. Yame bihnicahbo tah man qui, yame baqueboxon.
Jato jascahah bi bihxon judio hapon xobon Jesus bocanquin. Hocho tahni cahen Pedronen jato chibanbonaquin.
Jesusyabi caibo mapenon, caibaan jemanhihtian chihi requenjaquin. Pehchihi tsahotaiboya sca Pedro rihbi jato tocan pehchihi tsahoti.
Pehchihi tsahotai jisxon, Pedro bejisxon huesti haibaan sca yohiquin: —Nea rihbi ta hahbetan nihrasihiqui —hahquin.
—Quesahi. Jaa tah hen honanyamahi joni qui —hihscai Pedro.
Jahuen hihbo jan hihbomayamahah basima sca huetsan rihbi bejisahnan yohiquin: —Mia rihbi tah min jahuen joni qui —hahquin. —Jaama tah hen qui —hihribiscai.
Basima huesti hora tihixonpahax huetsa rihbi yohuani: —Hihcoini ta jato betan nea nihcachihiqui, Galilea mai meha joni can —hihqui.
Jan jascarai bi: —Min yohihi tah hen honanyamabiresai —hihribihi Pedro. Jan yohuanai betan bi hatapa queoscai.
Xobohoxon sca rabejaquexon Jesusen Pedro bejisquin. Jaatianbi ta Jesusen yohihah joibo Pedronen shinanscanishqui, janin hatapa queonon tah min quimisha coti hehqui paranahxihqui jan yohihah shinanscaquin.
Shinanax, picotax huaohihscai. Hihti huaohihqui, Pedro.
Xobohoxon sca Jesus xecoxon hosanhahnan rishquicanquin.
Bebepoxon beshrishquixon yocacanquin: —Jisxonma yohihue. ¿Tsoan mia beshrishquihiquin? —hahcanquin.
Hicha jascapa join hosan hosancanquin.
Xaba paque sca jaiya sca, jaton hani hapobo tsinquiti becani. Sacerdote hapobo betan jaton huisha honanbo tsinquicani.
Bexon, jato tocan sca Jesus nihmacanquin. Nihmaxon: —¿Mia min noquen Cristo quin? Noque yohihue —hahcanquin. —Hen mato yohihah bi tah man nincatimahi.
Hen mato yocacah bi tah man yohitimarihbihi.
Rahma tah hen hea noquebaque Papa mecayaho tsahonoxihqui, janoxon sca jahuen coshiyaxon yononoxon.
Jato jascaha, joi bichincanquin: —¿Mia min Papa Diosen baque quin nan? —Jaa tah hen qui. Man yohihi quescabi rahan —hahquin.
—¿Jahua hashoan nincati non pishinain? Jan jascari yohuanai tah non noquenbi nincacai —hahscacanquin.
Canon benahue hahxon sca Pilato janin sca Jesus hiocanquin jatihixonbi.
Janoxon sca quesa cahecanquin. —Nea tah non noquen caibo hihbojacatsihquiton merahahquin. Quiquin hapo Cesaro copijayamahabo ta jato haxemahiqui. Quiquin hapo Cristo jan hihqui ta yohirihbihiqui —hahcanquin.
—¿Mia min judiobaan quiquin hapo quin? —hahscaquin Pilatonen. —Min yohihi quesca rahan —hahquin Jesusen.
—Hean jisi ta jahua copi nea joni demandanti yamahihqui —judio hapoboya jano tsamajaquetaibo Pilatonen jaquin.
Coshi coshixon sca: —Neatohon ta jonibo sinamaxon coromahiqui. Judea mai janin jatihibincon nihxon ta jato jascati haxemahiqui. Reboqui Galilea janin pehocohnish ta neno caman sca jahuiqui, jascati honanmabenahi —hahcanquin.
—¿Galilea mai meha joni hin? —Pilatonen jato yocaquin.
Herodesnin mai meha joni Jesus hihqui honanxon, Herodes janin sca jaya bohabo jato raanscaquin. Herodes rihbi Jerusalen janin jaatian jai quen hahqui sca jato raanquin.
Jaatian Jesus jisish, Herodes coin coinscai. Jaya joihibo nincanish basi sca jaa jiscatsihquish jenimascai. Jahuen coshiyaxon hahcai jiscatsihquish jenimahi.
Jahuen coshi jiscatsihxon sca yoca yocaquin. Yocacah bi jahua hihyamahi.
Jan jahua hihyamahi bi ta jano rihbi nihxon judio hapobo betan jaton haxemanicahbaan quesajaquin coshin bi res cahe cahecannishqui.
Jahuen sontarobo betan Herodesnin Jesus tiromajaquin yohixon hosan hosanscaquin. Quiquin hapon tari sahuemaxon sca Pilato janin raanrihbiquin.
Pilato betan Herodes rainyamapahonish bi jaatianbi raescai rabebi.
Pilatonen sca judio hapoboya jaton meyayahpabo quenamaxon, jaton jonibo rihbi quenamaxon jato yohiquin:
—Noquen jonibo noque bichincatsihqui joni tah qui hahxon tah man nea joni hihuehahqui. Maton nincanonbi tah hen sirijaquin jaa yocacahqui. Honanquin sirijaxon tah hen jahua copi caheti merayamahi.
Herodesnin ta merayamarihbihaxqui. Hen hahqui raanah bi ta noque qui raanrihbihaxqui. Jahua copi rehteti ta yamahihqui, jan tiromani yamahi.
Jaa copi tah hen rishqui rishquimaxon picoxihqui —jato jaquin Pilatonen.
Jaton fiesta tian cah qui huesti joni jato picoxonpahonnish, hahpahonibo quescajaquin.
Pilatonen jato yohihah bi coshin bi res sai saihihcani jatihibi. —Jaama rahan. Barrabas caya noque picoxonhue —hahcanquin.
Barrabasnen ta jaton jema janinhahbo sinamaxon rehtenanmanishqui. Jaa copi ta sipo xoboho jaa tsahoncannishqui, jan joni rehteni copi rihbi.
Sai saihihquiboya coshin sca Pilatonen jato yohirihbiquin: —Jesus tah hen mato picoxontihi.
Pilato coshin yohuanai bi sai saihihquin mahuincanquin. —Jihui qui hueonhue. Jihui qui hueonhue, mahuanon —hihcani.
Jato yohirihbiquin, quimisha coti sca: —¿Jahua tiroma hen janishquin nan? Hean jisi ta jahua copi rehteti yamahihqui. Jaa copi tah hen rishquimaxon jenebahintihi —hahquin Pilatonen.
Hashoan sca coshicahinxon coshin bi res yohicanquin. —Jihui qui hueonxon rehtehue —coshin yohiquin Pilato mahuincanquin, sai saihihxon.
Jaabaan yohihi quescajati ta jaiqui hihxon sca
hoa joni rehtenica sca jato picoxonquin, jaabo queenai quescajaquin. Rehtenanmanica joni picoxonxon bi Jesus jato hinanquin, jaabo queenai quescajahabo.
Jesus boxon sca jemama quirihax jahui joni behchixon bihxon jaa jahuen coros hiamacanquin. Simon janeya joni ta jaa janishqui, Cirene mai meha. Jesus chibanbonanon hiamacanquin.
Hicha jonibo rihbi hahchon bocani. Haibobo rihbi hahchon bocani, huini huinicanahi. Jaya huaohihcanacani.
Jato qui rabejaquexon sca Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Heya huaohihyamanahue, Jerusalen haibobon. Maton yoraya huaohihnahue, maton baqueya rihbi huaohihnahue.
Tiromabo netebo ta mato qui nocoti jahuiqui. Jaatian tah man masa shinanyaxihqui: Hea rihbi baquejoma japahinon, baquexo jahuentianbi bihyamaha cahen hashoan siripan. Jahuentianbi baquexo xoma hahmayamani cahen siripan hih tah man jayaxihqui.
Noque qui paquenahue mananbon. Noque mahpobahinnahue, mahchibon, hah tah man jatihi.
Xoo pari jihui jai bi nescajahibo jaiya ¿jihui xanascaiya jenquetsahpabo jatihiquin? —jato jaquin.
Huetsa joni rabe rihbi ta bocannishqui, tiroma rabe. Jesus hueonxon jaabo rabe rihbi jihuin hueonnoxon bocanquin.
Mapo xao janeya mahchi manixon sca janoxonbi jihuin hueoncanquin. Jesus naponbi janon, jaa patax tiroma joni huesti hueonxon nichinxon, ramiho sca huetsa joni tiroma.
—Jaton hohcha jato sohuaxonhue, Papan. Hea honanyamaxon ta hea nescajacanihqui —hihqui Jesus. Jihuin Jesus hueonxon sca tsoan jahuen chopa bihtihiquin hihxon macan bero pishca borasa qui nanexon chicohah huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan jahuen chopa bihnon, huetsa macan pari cainaiya huetsan sca jahuen chopa bihnon hihxon, jascajaquin jahuen chopa bihcanquin.
Jano tsinquijaquecahuani nihxon, jonibaan jis jisquin. Hosan hosancanquin, jaton hapobaan. —Caibo ta rohajapahonishqui. Papan Cristohax hahrí sca rohajahanon, Papan caisah jonihax hahri rohajahanon —hihcani jaton hapobo.
Sontarobaan rihbi sca jano nihxon hosan hosanquin. Mae cachani bexon, hinanquin.
—Judiobaan quiquin hapohax mihri rohajahahue —hahcanquin.
Jahuen mapo bochiqui quirica rihbi hueoncanquin. Nea ta judiobaan quiquin hapo qui hihqui jaa quirica.
Jaa patax hueonahbo huesti sca yohuani, yometsoh huesti: —¿Mia min Cristo quin? Mihri rohajahatax botoxon noque rihbi hahxonhue —hihqui hosani.
Ramiho quehaton sca joi bichinxon jahuen hahbe tiroma joni qui rainyamascai: —¿Mia min Dios qui raqueyamahin? Mia rihbi tah min mahuanoxihqui.
Noque rabe non tiromajani copi tah non rahma mahuatai. Non caibo hahni quescaja ta noque jacanihqui. Noque quescayamahi ta nea jahua tiromayamanishqui —hahxon, Jesus sca yohiquin:
—Quiquin haposcaxon, hehon shinanyaxahnhue, Jesusen —hahquin.
—Nea netenbi tah min hehbetanbi heen jihue janin jacoinnoxihqui —hahscaquin Jesusen.
Barin manan tsacahiya sca, jatihibi janin bahquishihcahini, bari mahpohah yamecahini, bari racapaquescanon caman bahquishihcahini.
Papa yocati xoboho rihbi chopa chique naponbi huaxacahini, quexe rabe sca janon.
Coshin bi res sca Jesus yohuani: —Hea bihhue, Papan. Mihqui tah hen hinamehtai —hihquish mahuascai.
Jatihibi jisish jano nichi sontaro capitan sca yohuani: —Papa Diosen ta jisiqui. Nea joni ta siri joni hihquishqui —hihqui.
Jisi jahuibo rihbi hen mia yohihibo jisish rahte rahteti. Masa shinanax xohpatsihtax sca boribicani.
Hahbetan nihpahonibaan rihbi hocho nihxon jatihibi jisquin. Galilea mai janinhax jaa manahi jahuipi haibobaan rihbi jatihibi jisquin, hochoxon.
Jaatian ta Jerusalen janin José janeya joni japahonishqui, Arimatea jema janinha joni. Arimatea ta judiobaan jema rihbi qui. Jaa José ta jaton cacannica rihbi janishqui, hihcax bi siri joni, pontejaquin shinanai joni. Noque jihuemanica Papan raanpahinon hihnicah. Jaan jisí cahen jahuen hahbe hapobaan tiromajaquin shinanrahsihi. Jesus rehtecatsihquibo quescayamahi ta jaa janishqui, jaabaan hahcachihi quescajayamaquin.
<range>
Jaa José sca Pilato janin caxon Jesusen yora yocaquin.
Jesusen yora bihpaxon sca, sabananen rahcoquin sirijaxon, mai xanqueman poquin quiniho sca mihinquin, jano tsoabi tsahonnihma.
Tantiti neten piyanoxon ta jaton pitijati neten jaa tsahonnishqui, tantiti nete nea pishca sca jaiya.
Galilea mai mehax Jesus betan jahuipi haibobo ta José chibanbonahi canishqui, jan tsahoni cahiya. Tsahon honanxon, jan jascajaquin racanai jisish, boresscacani.
Hahan yora hininjati mescohi bocani. Mirra janeya hahan hininjati rihbi bichi bocani. Tantiti neten sca tanticani, Moisesnin yohini quescari.
Tantiti nete huinoscaipish xaba honanax sca tsahon janin boribicani. Jaton hininjatibo rahojahipixon papibahini bocani.
Nocoxon, hahan xehpohipibo macan taranbohana sca meracanquin.
Tsahon janin hihcoxon bi noquen Hihbo Jesusen yora merayamacanquin.
Jahuen hea bohancanaxquin hihquiboya sca rabe joni jano sanareneni. Jaton chopa cahen bahri bahrichi.
Hihti raquetax, jato qui betihihpaquecani haibobo. Betihihpaquetaiton: —Mohitahpa joni tah man benahi. ¿Jahuajanoxon man neno tsahonnihbo janin man benahi jahui nan?
Nenoma ta qui. Ma ta hueniscaaxqui. Galilea mainxon jan mato yohiho shinannahue.
Hohchayahpabo qui tah hen hea noquebaque hinamehti jai, jihuin hueonxon rehtescaabo. Jaa pecaho tah hen jahuen quimisha neten sca hahquirihbi teehihtihi hah ta mato jahoxqui —hahcanquin, sanareneni jahuibaan.
Yohihah, Hihcoini, jasca ta jahoxqui hihcani.
Jacahini sca tsahon janinhax boribicani. Jahuen once haxenicabo yohitannon benahue, jato jatihibi yohinon benahue. Texe rihbi jano jaibo yohinon benahue hihcahini bocani.
Jaa ta María Magdalena qui, Juana, Jacobon mama María rihbi. Caibo haibobo rihbi jato betan bocani. Nocoxon jahuen haxenicabo yohicanquin.
Yohihah bi yohuanresaibo shinanxon jato nincayamacanquin.
Pedro sca picotax bishquihihcanahax tsahon janin nocotax cahcopaquexon jisi bi jano jahuen sabana jano huesti tsamati. Jahua jenquetsaxquin hihquish, rahtetax, xobon sca caribihi.
Jaa neten bi sca jato quiha rabe joni cahi, huetsa jema janin cahi bocani. Emaus janeya jema janin cahi bocani, Jerusalen janinhax tahen cahá cahen rabe hora.
Yohuan yohuancanahi bocani. Jisipiboya rahma nincabehnanaibo rahsi shinanax yohuan yohuancanahi cahi.
Yohinancanahi bohiboya sca, jato chibanbonahi caxon jato huinonquin bi jato manahi sca Jesus nichi.
Jaa hihqui bi bebepohah quescaxon jaa honanyamacanquin.
—¿Jahua yohuan man jain, man yohinani nihcanahin? —jato jaah, nihrenencani jaton bemanan huetsapahcahini.
Cleopas janeya sca yohuani: —¿Jerusalen janin jihuetahxon bi min mia huestichin jano jaipibo joi min honanyamahin? —hahquin.
—¿Jahua jaipishqui nan? —hahquin. —Jesus nazareno jaipibo rahan. Jaa ta Papan joi yohinica hihpahonishqui. Jatihibichin jisnon bi ta Papan coshiyaxon hahpahonishqui. Papan shinanyaxon ta noque haxemapahonishqui.
Noquen hapobo betan noquen cacannicabaan rehtenon ta hinanipicanaxqui, jihuin hueonxon rehtehahbo.
Noque israelibo jihuemanicah tah qui hih non jarasihi que bi ta rehtehipicanaxqui. Neayanish ta quimisha netescaiqui, rehtepibo.
Rahma rihbi ta noquen chocabaan noque rahtehaxqui. Hihari tsahon janin caxon roqui jahuen yora xahbanjacanax.
Merayamahax qui joquin sca Papan yonotibo jato qui cainai qui jiscanquin. Jihue ta jaiqui qui jaa yonotibo jai, yohuani.
Jaatian ta noque janinhax caibo rihbi sca jahuen tsahon janin bocanaxqui. Haibobo yohuanah quescabi roqui meracanax, jahuen yora yamascai —hihcani.
—Honanyamahibon. ¿Yotiho chahoma maton jointi quin? Papan joi yohinicabaan yohini joibo jatihibi man nincapanan.
¿Jascapa tiromabo huinoti Criston jai yohiyamacannishquin? ¿Jaa pecaho sca naihoh queha quiquin hihbo jaa jatihi yohiyamacannishquin? —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon, Moisesnin huishani joibo jato honanmaquin sirijaxon, texe Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joibo sca jato honanmapaquequin, Cristo yohihi joi rahsi.
Jano jaabo cahi jema qui sca nococani. Hojno caparihi quesca jaa jai bi hihti yocacanquin:
—Noque qui banetahhue. Bepi sca ta jaiqui. Bari ta hihquicatsihscaiqui. Jeenhihquish mapeti.
Jaabaan Pihue hahcá piti bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcaxon jato hinanquin.
Jaatian pari jaton bero quehpemehxon quescaxon jisxon jaa hihqui honanscacanquin. Jaatian jaabaan jisi bi jaa yamacahin sca jai.
—Bahinxon noque yohixon huishani joibo noque honanmaxon ¿noquen jointibo xecahihnimayamahaxquin? —hihcani.
Jaatianbi cahax, Jerusalen janin boribicani. Nocoxon jahuen once haxenicabo tsinquitaiton meracanquin. Texe rihbi jato betan tsinquiti.
—Noquen Hihbo ta teehihrihbihiqui. Hueni coin ta jaaxqui. Pedronen ta jisishqui —hihqui tsinquitaibo.
Jaatian jaabo rabechin bahinxon jisxon nincatanah yohixon, jan paan tehcaxonaiya jaa hihqui honanaibo yohicanquin.
Jato yohiparihiya bi jato tocan jaa sanareneni jahui.
Rahte rahtetax, yoshin tah qui hihquish, raquepahhuancani.
¿Jahua jenquetsain man rahtetain? ¿Jahuejahi man maton jointi janin raqueya yohuanain?
Heen mequen jisnahue. Heen tahe jisnahue. Hea tah hen qui. Mehexon jisnahue. Yoshinma tah hen qui: yoshin ta nami yamahihqui, xaobo yamarihbihi. Hea ta jascapahma qui.
Jato jascajaxon, jahuen mequen jato jismaquin. Jahuen tahe jato jismaquin.
Hihti jenimaya rahte rahtexon jaa hihqui shinanyamaparihiboya sca jato yocaquin: —¿Man piti yamahin? —jato jaquin.
Yapa xohi teque pishca hinancanquin.
Bihxon jaton jisnon bi sca piquin.
Pixon jato yohiquin: —Mato betan jihueparixon tah hen mato yohinihqui, hea yohihi Moisesnin huishani jatihibi jai quesca ta jatihiqui. Huetsa Papan joi yohinicabaan huishani joibo, Davidinin behua janin rihbi jaibo quesca sca ta jatihibi jatihiqui.
Jascajaquin yohixon jaton jointi quehpenxonquin Papan huishani joibo honancoinahbo jato yohiquin.
—Tiromahabo bi Cristo mahuatihi, jan hihquipish bi quimisha neten hihquish hahquirihbi teehihti ta huishacannishqui.
Maton shinan pontenahue jan maton hohcha sohuaxonnon hahquin Jerusalen janin yohimenohax janohax jatihibi jonibo janin sca jahuen janen jascajaquin yohiyaxihcani, jaa jatihibi ta huishaxon yohicannishqui.
Yohinihbo jai quesca sca jai jisxon tah man honanquin sirijahi.
Papan mato hinantijani tah hen mato qui raanyaxihqui. Nea jema janin banetahnahue, heen naihoh queha coshi mato qui noconon caman —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon Betania jema janin caman jato hioquin. Janoxon sca jahuen mequen sanahihnixon siri shinanya janoxihquibo sca jato yohiquin.
Jato yohihahnan sca caresscai, naihoh hinahihnati.
Jaabo sca hihti jenimahanan Jerusalen janin boribicani.
Papa yocati xoboho res mapexon Papa yocacanquin, Hahxon tah min noque jai, Papan, hahquin.
Jahuabi jaríyamanon ta Papan joi hihbo janishqui. Papa Dios betan jihueti. Papan joi hihbo ta Papan shinanyahpa qui. Dios bi res ta jaa joi qui.
Naiyahpa mai jaríyamanon ta Papa Dios betan jaa joi hihbo janishqui. Jahuen jane cahen Jesus.
Jaan ta jatihibi janishqui. Jaan hahyamani quen ta jahuabi yamaquehanihqui.
Jaan ta jatihibi yoshinyahpabojaquin jihuemanishqui. Jaa noquen jihuemanicah ta noquen xaba qui.
Bahquish chian xabatai bi cahen yamepan bahquishjayamaquin.
Noquen xaba hihbo ta jahuiqui hihqui jonon ta Juan janeya joni Papan raannishqui.
Jaa ta xaba hihbo qui hihxon yohicoini jonon. Joxon, jatihixonbi nincacoinahbo hihxon jato yohicoinquin.
Jaa Juan cahen xaba hihquishma bi xaba hihbo qui yohicoini jahui.
Jaa xaba hihbo ta jatihibi joni xabajanicah qui. Xaba hihbo hihquish bi cahen noque janin jaa jahui.
Jan hahni nete janin jaabi jahue que bi cahen jano jihuetaibaan huetsapahascaquin, jaabi que bi.
Jaton caibo que bi Johue hahyamacanquin, jaanbi hahni nete janin nocotai bi.
Caibaan res Johue hahquin. Jaa Johue hahcaibo cahen: Diosen baquebo sca janahue, mato rahsibi, hea nincacoinaibo rahsi, xabapan jato jaquin.
Jaa Johue hahcaibo Papa Diosen baquebo hihnon, jimiyahpa papa janonma bi queeyahpa papajomabo hihnon, bebaan baquejaha hihnonma bi: Papan baquebo janahue xabapan jato jaquin.
Yorayahpahax ta noque betan jaa Papan joi hihbo jihuenishqui. Jan hihti coshin hahcai tah non jisniqui. Jaa huesti jahuen papa xohtahi, nete hihbohi. Yohuani hihcoinai. Shinanyahpa siri.
Hahqui chanicoini cahen Juan coshin yohuani, nescari: —Hoa ta hen mato yohipi noque qui, hea pari jomenoni que bi ta hehchon jahui noquen hea mahuinihqui, jaa pari jihue hihbonixon —hihqui.
Jahuen shinan hihti caibohi tah non jatihixonbi bihniqui, jaan hinanresah.
Xabapan shinan non bihnon hihxon ta Papan Moises yononishqui, noquen nincati joi Moisesnin huishanon. Jaa pecaho ta Jesucriston sca jahuen shinan noque hinanresiqui, hihcoinai joi non honannon, noquehon Papan shinanai non honannon.
Tsoanbi ta noquen Papa Dios jisyamanishqui, jahuentianbi. Non jisyamani bi ta hahan jan shinanai jahuen baquen noque yohiha, jenquetsahpa noquen Papa Dios quin non honanscai.
Yocacahbo hihxon ta Jerusalen janinha judiobaan jaton sacerdoteboya levitobo Juan qui raannishqui. —¿Mia min tsoa quin? —Juan yocacahbo. Yocacahbo ta jato yohicoinnishqui.
Paranxonma jato yohicoinquin: —Hea ta hen Cristoma qui —hahquin.
Jasca jan jaiya, yocarihbicanquin: —¿Tsoa min quin? ¿Mia min Elías yamanica quin? —hahcanquin. Jascahahbo bi: —Hea ta jaama qui —hahquin. —¿Hoa Dios joi yohinica nan? —hahscacanquin. —Hea ta jaama rihbi qui —hahquin.
Jaatian yocarihbicanquin: —¿Tsoa min quin? Noque Yocatannahue hahcaibo non yohihi sca canon, Jaa ta hen qui noque jahue, mianbi —hahcanquin.
—Cahchihoxon quenahi ta hea qui, Hihbo hahan jonon bahi najisti chai jaxonnahue hahnicah. Papan joi yohinica hihxon Isaiasnen noque yohini quescabijaquin tah hean jai —jato jaquin.
Yohihahbaan bi fariseobaan sca hahquirihbi raanah, yocarihbicanquin:
—¿Jahua copi min Cristo hihxonma bi min jato nashimahin, Elías rihbi hihxonma bi, hoa Dios joi yohinica rihbi hihxonma bi min nashimahi nan? —hahcanquin Juan yocaquin.
—Hean ta hen jenen res nashimahi. Mato tocan ta man honanyamahi joni nichiqui.
Hehchon jahui que bi tah hen jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti senenyamahi, jaa hihti siri copi —Juaman jato jaquin.
Jordan huean hoque quexaxon, janoxon Juaman jato nashimahi janinxon bi ta jascajaquin yocacannishqui, Betania jema janinxon.
Huetsa bahquish sca jari Jesus jahui qui jisxon, Juaman jato yohiquin: —Jisnahue. Hoa ta Papan carnero joni qui, main jihuetaibaan hohcha copi mahuayaxihqui joni.
Hen mato yohihipi tah qui, Hehchon jahui jonin ta hea mahuinihqui, jaa pari jihue hihbonixon hahquin.
Hean rihbi jaa honannixonma bi tah hen israelibaan jaa jisxon honannon hihxon hean jenen nashimahi joníqui —Juaman jato jaquin.
Jato jascajaxon yohirihbicoinquin: —Naihoh quehax Dios Yoshin botopaquetax, nobex quescapa hahqui bototi manahi jahui tah hen hean jisoqui.
Jaa tsoa quin tah hen hean rihbi honanyamanihqui. Hen honanyamahi bi ta Papan hea yononishqui, jenen nashimahi hea jonon. Botopaquetax heen yoshin siri jaa manahi jahui min jisyaxihqui ta heen yoshin siri bichibo nashimaquin hahcajanicah qui, heen yoshin siri jato hinanquin, hih ta Papa jahoxqui.
Jan jascajahi jisoxon ta hen mato yohicoinai: Papa Diosen baque tah qui —Juaman jato jaquin.
Huetsa bahquish sca, jahuen haxenica rabe betan nihribixon,
Jesus nichi jisxon: —Jisnahue. Jaa ta Papa Diosen carnero qui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascarai nincacax rabebi jahuen haxenica cahi, Jesus chibani sca.
Rabejaquexon, chibanai jato meraxon Jesusen jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuejahi man behin? —jato jaquin. Yocacah: —¿Jahuen min jihuetain, Rabin? —hahcanquin. Rabin ta maestron hihcatsihquiqui.
—Jisi benahue —hahscaquin. Jaatian boresscaxon, jan jano jihuetai jisish, bepiscaiya jaa netenbi jahuen xoboho banecani.
Huesti ta Andres janishqui, Simon Pedro huetsa. Huetsa joni betan nihxon, Juan yohuanai nincaxon, Jesus res sca chibanquin.
Jahuen huetsa Simon benaxon meraxon: —Mesías tah non merascai —hahquin. Mesías cahen Papan raanah joni hihcatsihqui, Cristo, jaton join.
Jascajaxon, Jesus janin Simon hioquin. Nocotaiya bejisxon Jesusen yohiquin: —Mia tah min Simon qui, Juaman baque. Cefas janeya sca tah min jayaxihqui —hahquin. Cefas ta macan hihcatsihquiqui.
Huetsa bahquish sca Galilea main cacatsihquin Felipe meraxon: —Hehbe cahue —hahquin Jesusen.
Betsaida jema janin ta Felipe jihuepahonishqui, Andres betan Pedro jano jihuepahoni janin.
Natanael meraxon, Felipenin yohiquin: —Papan joi huishaquin Moisesnin yohini joni tah non meratanai. Papan joi yohinicabaan rihbi hahqui huishaxon yohini. Josepan baque Jesus tah qui, Nazaret janinhah —hahquin.
—¿Nazaret janinha jahua siri jatihiquin? —hihqui Natanael. —Jisihue —hahscaquin Felipenin.
Natanael hahqui nocoti jahui jisish Jesus yohuani: —Jisnahue. Jaa ta israeli baque coin qui, paranyosma joni —hihqui.
—¿Jenquetsahaxon min hea honanain? —hahquin Natanaelnin. —Higo jihui naman tsahotai ta hen mia jisiqui, Felipenin mia quenarihyamanon —hahquin Jesusen.
—Mia tah min Papa Diosen baque qui, Maestron. Mia tah min israelibaan quiquin hapo qui —hihscai Natanael.
Jesusen sca Natanael yohiquin: —¿Higo jihui naman tsahotai ta hen mia jisiqui hen mia jaiya min nincacoinain? Heen coshiyaxon hahcai tah qui. Hashoan rihbi heen coshiyaxon hen hahcai tah min jisyaxihqui.
Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: nai huiso quehpemehtaiya hea janinhax hinahihnatax hea noquebaque qui nocoti botopaquetai tah man Papan yonotibo man jisyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascahipi quimisha neten sca Galilea main huanomahibo jai, Caná jema janin. Quenamaha jano rihbi Jesusen mama cahi.
Jahuen haxenicaboyabi canon Jesus rihbi quenamacanquin, huanohihbo jisi canon.
Jaton xehati queyoscaiya: —Hompa ta yamascaiqui, baquen —hihqui jahuen mama.
—¿Min jascaraiya bi jahueja hen jatihin, maman? Heen coshiya teeti nete ta nocorihyamahiqui —hahquin Jesusen.
Xehamanicahbo sca: —Jaan mato yohihi quescabijanahue —jahuen maman jaquin.
Janobi rihbi cahen seis macan poo tsahoti jene paxa hahqui bexojatibo. Hanibo poo can, huesti cuñete hihyamahax rabe cuñete betan senenai tihopabo, hahan judiobo mechoquiti, tachoquiti, jaton hihti quescari.
—Poo qui jene bohasaxonnahue —jato jaquin Jesusen. Jaatian bohasabahincanquin.
—Huehaxon, fiesta hihbo nomimatannahue —Jesusen jaah sca, huehaxon nomimacanquin.
Jaa jene hompacahinscai bi fiesta hihbaan tanaquin. Tanaxon bi jahuerahnohah hin honanyamaquin. Jene bihtanaibaan honanai bi fiesta hihbaan honanyamaquin. Tanaxon jahuen huanoni quenaxon sca fiesta hihbaan yohiquin:
—Pahenscaiton jato tiroma xehati xehamanoxon tah non siri pari jato hahmanica qui. Mian tah min rahma pari hompa siri cainmahi —hahquin.
Galilea mai janinhah Caná jema janinxon ta Jesusen jascajamenoquin hahan honantijanishqui. Jahuen coshi jato jismahah cahen jahuen haxenicabaan nincacoinscaquin, Papan caisai joni hihqui honancoincanquin.
Jaa pecaho jahuen mama, jahuen jochicabo rihbi, jahuen haxenicabo rihbi Capernaum janin hahbetan cahax nocotax jahuentihi ra netebo jano baneti, basima tahni.
Judiobaan pascua fiesta nea pishcascaiya Jerusalen janin Jesus cahi.
Nocoxon Papan xobohoxon jaton ganadoya carnero maromahiton jascapa maromanicahbo meraquin. Nobex maromanica joniboya coriqui mahnenannica jonibo rihbi jano tsahotai merarihbiquin.
Jascajahiton meraxon risbipan hahan rishquitijaxon jeman jato potaquin. Jatihibi potaquin, jaton ganadaboya jaton carneroboya bi. Jaton coriqui napabohanxon coriqui misa rihbi behonjanquin.
Nobex maromanicahbo sca yohiquin: —Nescapahbo botannahue. Heen papan xobohoxon jascajayamanahue. Janoxon marotima tah qui —jato jaquin.
Jato potahi jisxon, Hea tah hen miin xobo hihti jenipahichai jaa jiscatsihqui, hihqui neateman huishani joi jahuen haxenicabaan shinanscaquin.
Jahuen haxenicabaan sirijaquin shinanai bi judiobaan sca joi bichinquin: —¿Jahua hahan honanti min noque jismahin, nescajanoxon? —hahcanquin.
—Nea xobo potojaquetannahue, quimisha nete huinoxon hen jaa xahnenenbi hahribinon —Jesusen jato jaquin.
—¿Cuarenta y seis bari teexon janquenjanibo xobo min quimisha neten xobojaquin queyotihin? —hahcanquin.
Jahuen yora yohihi jan hihqui bi janoxon Papa Dios yocati xobo yohihi shinancanquin.
Hihquipish bi teehihrihbihiya pari ta jan jascajaquin jato yohiho jahuen haxenicabaan shinanscanishqui. Shinanax, Hihcoini Papan huishamani joi ta jaa yohihi jaiqui, noquen Hihbo Jesusen rihbi ta noque jascajaquin yohinishqui, hihcani.
Pascua fiesta tian Jerusalen janinxon hahan honantibo Jesusen hahcai jisxon: —Papan caisai noque tah qui —hahcanquin hicha jonibaan.
Jascaraibaan bi jato jatihibi honanax jato tocan Jesus nihresyamahi.
Jatihibi jonibaan shinanai jaanbi jahuen jointinin honanscai copi, Jasca ta shinancaniqui hihnica pishinyamahi.
Huesti fariseo joni ta judiobaan cacannica hihpahonishqui, Nicodemo janeya joni.
Jesus qui yame caxon yohiquin: —Noque honanmahi mia jonon ta mia Papan raannishqui, Maestron. Non tah non honanai. Mian tah min hahan honantibojahi. Mihbetan Papa Dios hihyamahiya cahen min jascajati hahtipahyamahan —hahquin.
Jaatian: —Mia tah hen yohicoinai. Behnajaquin jonijahama jonin ta Papan jihue jistimabiresiqui —Jesusen jaa jaquin.
—¿Yosibohax non jenquetsahax hahquirihbi jonitihin? Noquen maman xahquin janin non hahquirihbi hihquitihin, jonirihbinoxon? —Nicodemonen Jesus jaquin.
—Mia tah hen yohicoinai: Dios Yoshiman jonijahama joni ta Papan jihue janin hihcotimabiresihqui. Jenen rihbi jonijahama joni ta jano hihcotimabiresihqui.
Namin jonijaha ta yorayahpa qui. Dios Yoshiman jonijaha ta yoshin rihbi qui.
Hahquirihbi joniti tah min jai hen mia jaah bi rahteyamahue.
Jano jan queenaiton ta nihue cahiqui. Jahuerahnohax cainax jahuen cahiquin tah min honanyamahi, xoo hihqui nincaxon bi. Dios Yoshiman jonijaha jatihibi ta jascarihbi qui —Jesusen jaquin.
—¿Jaa min yohihi jenquetsahatihiquin nan? —hihqui Nicodemo.
Jesusen sca yohiquin: —¿Israelibaan honanmanicahxon bi min hean mia yohihah min honanyamahin?
Yohicoin tah hen mia jai: Honanxon non mato yohihah bi tah man nincayamahi. Jisxon non yohihah bi tah man nincayamahi non hihcoinai bi.
Nea mai meha joi yohihah bi nincacoinyamaxon tah man jenquetsahaxon bi naihoh queha hen mato yohihi joi nincacointimahi.
Tsoabi naihoh catanni que ma bi tah hen janohax botopaquetai hea huesti jano canicah qui, hea noquebaque.
Nincacoinaibo queyoyamanox mananon ta cahchihoxon Moisesnin rono nichinhihninoxon jihuin hueonni quescajaquin hea noquebaque nichinhihninoxon hueonyaxihcanihqui.
Hea noquebaque qui hinamehxon nincacoinaibo jatihibi ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui.
Nai nequebihabo hihti queenxon ta jahuen baque hea huesti Papan raannishqui, hinamehxon nincacoinaibo jatihibi queyoyamanox mananon, tsoabi mehtexehtaxma jihuenon.
Main jihuetaibo casticani jonon hihxonma bi hen jato jihuemahi jonon hihxon ta Papan hea raannishqui.
Nincacoinai jonibo ta jahua copi casticantimabo qui. Nincayosma jonibo ta casticanscatihiqui, Papan baquen yohihah bi jahua nincayamahibo.
Mai janin xaba jahue que bi ta xaba jenipahiyamacaniqui. Yame caya ta jenipahicaniqui tiromabohax. Jaa copi ta jato casticanyaxihquiqui.
Nenoxon tiromajahibo rahsi ta johue jiscatsihyamahax xaba quiri cayosmabo qui, tiromajahibo caibaan jismis hihquish xaba quiri cayamahi.
Hihcoinaibo ta xaba quiri canicah qui. Papan jisi hah ta jaan jaiqui caibo hihnon hihquish —Jesusen Nicodemo jaquin.
Jaa pecaho ta jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus canishqui Judea mai janin. Jano jato betan banexon nincacoinaibo hihquimatanquin nashimaquin.
Enon jema janinxon Juaman rihbi nashimaquin Salim hochoma jano noayahpa huean jaiton. Juaman jato nashimanon caibo jano cahi.
Sipo xoboho Juan tsahonrihyamahiboya jano jonibo bocani.
Jascascahiya Juaman haxenicabo betan judiobo yohinani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon non noquen hohcha potatihin? —hihqui yohinani rainyamahi.
Juan qui caxon sca yohicanquin: —Jordan hoque quexa mia manatipi jonin rihbi ta nashimahiqui, maestron. Min noque yohicoinipi joni tah qui. Jise. Hahqui sca ta jatihibi bocanihqui —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo jato yohiquin: —Papan noque hinanyamahah tah non tsoanbi jenquetsahpabi bihti hahtipahtimahi.
Hea ta hen Cristoma qui. Hean pari yohixoni jonon hihxon res ta Papan hea yononishqui. Hen jascahipi tah man matonbi honancoinai.
Nesca tah qui, jisnahue. Jahuen haibo hihnon cahen bebo huanocatsihqui. Jan yohuanai ta jano rihbi nihxon jahuen hahberabetinin nincatihiqui. Jan yohuanai nincacax coincoini. Jascarihbi ta hen hea coin coini jai.
Caiti ta jaa jaiqui. Jahua hihtima ta hea jai —jato jaquin.
Bochiquihax jahui jonin ta jatihibi joni hihbojahiqui. Mainxon jonijahabo ta mainxon jisish jan jisiboya yohuanihqui. Naihoh quehax jahui joni ta jatihibi jonibaan hihbo qui.
Naihohxon jisnibo yohuancoin jan jai bi ta tsoanbi nincacoinyamahihqui. Jan nincanihbo yohuancoin rihbi jan jai bi ta tsoanbi nincacoinyamarihbihihqui.
Jan yohicoinah nincacoinaibo ta Papa Dios ta hihcoinnicah qui hihquiqui.
Papan raannica joni hihxon ta Papan joibo yohihiqui. Hahqui ta jahuen yoshin siri Papa Dios yohuashihyamahiqui.
Jaa jahuen baquehon queenxon ta Papan jatihibi jaa hinannishqui, jaan sca hihbojanon.
Jaa Papan baque qui hinamehxon nincacoinai joni ta queyoyamanox manatihiqui. Jahuen baquen yohihah bi nincayamahi joni ta jihuetimahiqui. Jascapa ta Papan hihti jistahihmahiqui, hahquin.
Juaman honanmaxon nashimahi mentan hashoan hihti caibo Jesusen honanmaxon nashimahi cahen fariseobaan nincascaquin.
Jaanbi Jesusen nashimayamahi bi ta jahuen haxenicabaan res nashimanishqui.
Jahuen nashimatibo caichai fariseobaan joi nincacai honanxon Judea mai Jesusen potabahinquin, Galilea main caribinoxon.
Galilea main canoxon cahen Samaria mai nabebacahinti jai.
Cahi, Samaria mai meha jema janin nocoti, Sicar janeya jeman. Jacobonen jahuen baque José hinanni mai hochomahi.
Jene bihnoxon ta janobi Jacobonen mai poquinnishqui. Poquinxon chiquerihbiquin. Jano sca ta Jesus noconishqui. Bahin nihnichi paxquinax, barin manan tsacahiya jaa mai poquin quexa Jesus tsahopaqueti.
Jahuen haxenicabo jema janin piti benahi canon cahen jano manati. Manahahnan, samaritano haibo jene bichi jahuiton, yocaquin: —Hen nominon jene pishca hea bihxonhue, haibon —hahquin Jesusen.
<range>
Jaatian: —¿Jenquetsahaxon min mia judio hihxon bi hea samaritano haibo jene yocacain? —samaritano haibaan Jesus yocaquin. Judiobaan samaritanobo jistahihmahi copi haibaan jascajaquin.
—Tsoan mia jene yocacai honanxon cah min mianbi jaa yocacan. Papan mia hinanai rihbi honanxon cah min yocacan. Jaatian ta mia jene mohini hinanquehanihqui —Jesusen jaquin.
—Mai poquin ta nemin qui, bebon. Hahan tsecati rihbi tah min yamahi. ¿Jahuen min jascapa jene mohini bihtihin?
Noquen xeni Jacobonen ta nea noa xehanishqui. Jahuen baqueboyaxonbi jahuen yohinabaan rihbi nea jene xehaquin. Nea noa noque jaan hinannih que bi cahran min jaa mentan hashoan coshi quin? —hahquin haibaan.
Jaatian Jesusen sca: —Nea jene hahcaibo ta hahquirihbi nomicatsihnoxihquiqui.
Hean jene hinanah xehahax ta jahuentianbi jiricatsihyamascatihiqui. Jaa chicho quehax ta hen hinanai jene mohini jahuentianbi taraxaxma jabascatihiqui —haibo jaquin.
—Jaa jene hea hinanhue, bebon, jiricatsihyamascaax hen neno jene bichi jori joriyamascanon —haibaan Jesus jaquin.
Jesusen sca: —Miin bene quenatanhue, joribinoxon —jaa haibo jaquin.
Jascahah: —Heen bene ta yamahihqui —hahquin haibaan. —Yohiquin sirija tah min jai, miin bene yamahi.
Pichca miin bene janish bi cah min rahma huetsa betan hihrihbihi, miin benema rihbi. Hihcoin tah min jai —hahquin Jesusen.
—Papan joi yohinica mia quin hen ta hen honanscai, bebon.
Nea machinxon ta noquen xenibaan betihihpaquexon Papahon shinanpahonishqui, Jerusalen janinxon non Papahon shinanti jai man maton jai bi —hihqui haibo.
Jesusen sca: —Hen mia yohihah nincacoinhue, haibon. Papahon shinanaibaan ta nea mahchinxonma bi Jerusalen janinxonma rihbi noquen Papahon man shinanyaxihqui.
Man honanyamahi naman tah man betihihpaquetai, Papahon shinancatsihqui. Non honanai naman betihihpaquexon tah non noquen shinanai. Jihuemanicah ta judio xohta qui.
Hahan Papahon shinanti nete jahuex bi ta nocoscaiqui, Papa qui betihihpaquexon shinancoinaibaan jahuen yoshin siriyaxonbi Papahon shinanbiresnon, hahan shinancoinquin. Jascapa shinanaibohon ta noquen Papa queenihqui.
Noquen Papa ta yoshin qui. Jahan shinanai noquebo ta jahuen yoshinyaxonbi shinancointi jaiqui —haibo Jesusen jaquin.
—Papa Diosen caisai joni, Cristo hahcaibo, joyaxihqui ta hen honanai. Joxon ta jatihibi joi noque yohiyaxihquiqui —hihqui haibo.
—Hea tah hen jaa qui, mia yohihi joni —hahquin Jesusen.
Jasca jan jaiya bi jahuen haxenicabo nocoti. Haibo betan yohuanaiton merahax rahtecani. Rahtexon bi ¿Jahuejahi min hahbe yohuanahquin, jahua yohuan min jain, hahbetan? Jesus yocacatsihquin bi yocayamacanquin.
Jaatian jahuen poo tsahonbahini jema janin haibo cahi cahi. Cahi nocoxon jonibo yohiquin:
—Jatihibi hean janíbo hea yohihi joni jistannahue. ¿Jaa Cristoma hin? —jato jaquin.
Jaatian jema janinhax cainax Jesus jisi bocani.
Jasca sca jaiboya: —Pihue, maestron —jahuen haxenicabaan Jesus jaquin.
Pihue jaibaan bi: —Man honanyamahi piti ta hea jai —Jesusen jaquin.
Jasca jan jaiya jahuen haxenicabo jaabo rahsibi yohuani: —¿Tsoan cahra piti bexonaxquin? —hihcani yohuani.
Jascahibo bi: —Hea yononi queenai quescajaxonti ta heen piti qui. Jahuen tee queyoxonti rihbi ta heen piti qui.
¿Chosco hoxne hihquish pari ta banabo tsinquiti siri sca jatihiqui hih man jayamahin? Man jascarai bi ta hen mato yohihi. Huai chian bana johuescai jisnahue. Tsinquiti siri sca ta jaiqui hah ta hen mato jai.
Cananhahnan ta tsinquinicaton jascabi jihuetai bimi tsinquihihqui. Bananica betan tsinquinica jenimascanon ta jaton tsinquitibo queyoyamanox manatihqui.
Huetsan tsinquixonyaxahnon ta huetsan banahihqui hih ta jacanihqui. Hihcoini.
Man bananixonma bi tsinquitannon tah hen mato yononihqui. Caibaan hahni tee tah man tsinquitihi —jato Jesusen jaquin.
Jaa jema janinha samaritanobaan ta hichaxon Jesus nincacoinnishqui. Jatihibi hean janíbo ta hea yohihaxqui hahquin haibaan jato yohicoinai copi nincacoincanquin.
Jesus qui caxon yocaquin: —Noque qui banehue. Cayama sca jahue —hahcanquin. Jascahahbo jato betan rabe neten baneti.
Jaanbi jato yohihiya nincacoincanquin hashoan tsamaxon sca.
Nincacoinxon haibo yohicanquin: —Mian noque yohihah nincacoinipixon bi tah non jaa yohuanai noquenbi nincaxon non hashoan sca nincacoinscai. Jaa coin ta nai nequebihabo jihuemanicah qui, honancoin sca tah non jai —hahcanquin.
Rabe neten jato betan banetax janohax Galilea main sca cahi caresscai.
Caquin sca ta jato yohinishqui: —Jahuen main jihuetai bi ta jahuen caibaan Papan joi yohinica nincacatsihyamahihqui —hahquin.
Jascahi bi jatihibi jan Jerusalen janinha fiesta janinxon hahcai jistanipixon Galilea main jihuetaibaan Johue hahquin jaton main nocotaiton.
Janoxon jan jato jene hompajaxonni jema janin nocorihbihi, Caná janeya jema, Galilea main. Capernaum jema janin cahen huesti tinintinin baque hisini jai.
Judea mai mehax Galilea mai janin Jesus joresscai chanihah jaa yocaqui tininti jahui. —Heen baque hea rahonxoni cahue. Hihcatsih sca ta jaiqui —hahquin.
—Hahan honanti jisyamaxon tah man nincacoinyamahi, hahqui rahtetibo rihbi jisyamaxon —tininti Jesusen jaquin.
Jan jascarai bi: —Jani heen baque mahuanon carihue, hihbon —hahquin tinintinin.
—Careshue. Miin baque ta jihuetihiqui —tininti Jesusen jaquin. Min yohihi quescabi ta jacointihiqui hihquish tininti cahi caresscai.
Cahipish cabahinahi bi jahuen jonibaan behchibenaquin. —Miin baque ta rohscaipishqui —hihcani.
Jascaraiton jato yocaquin: —¿Jahuerahnon bari racataiya jahuen yona tantihipishquin? —Bahquish bari hihpaquescaiya ta yona tantihipishqui —hihcani.
Jano bari racatai bi Miin baque ta jihuetihiqui Jesusen jaipi jahuen papan honanscaquin. Jaatian sca jahuen xobo janinhahbo betan jatihixonbi Jesus nincacoinscaquin.
Jaa ta Judea mai mehax Galilea janin joribixon sca jahuen rabe sca jahuen hahan honanti Jesusen jato hahxonnishqui.
Jaa pecaho judiobaan fiesta jaiya Jerusalen janin Jesus caribihi.
Jerusalen janin ta jema xehpoti jaiqui, carnero janeya xehpoti. Jema xehpoti hochoma cahen noa pishca racatah Betesda hahcaibo, judiobaan join. Jaa hian quexa ta pichca xobo tsahotihqui.
Jaa xoboho cahen hicha hisinaibo racati, benchebo, tobi pishcabo, yora honanyamajaquetaibo. Noa pishca bahinon jaabo manati.
Jaa noa janin roqui Papan yonoti paquepahonish. Paquexon qui jene bahimaquin. Bahihiya qui jenenencanya paquemenohi joni rohahi siripi. Jahuen hisin jatihibi rohacahini.
Jano cahen huesti joni racati, treinta y ocho bari jascabi hisini.
Racataiton jisxon hicha bari sca hisinai honanscaxon: —¿Min rohacatsihyamahin? —hahquin Jesusen.
—Jene bahihiya hea jenenencanya potanica ta yama qui, hihbon. Hea cahiya bi huetsa pari hihquihi —hihqui hisinai.
—Huenihue. Huenixon miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue —Jesusen jaquin.
Jaatianbi rohacahinxon jahuen cacajati bichish caresscai. Jaton tantiti neten ta Jesusen jascajanishqui.
Jaa copi ta jan rohajahi joni judiobaan yohinishqui: —Rahma ta tantiti nete qui. Tantiti neten tah min miin cacajati botimahi —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo bi: —Miin cacajati bichish caresscatanhue hah ta hea rohajahi jonin jaaxqui —jato jaquin.
—¿Jahua joni jaa quin, mia Miin cacajati bichish jaya catanhue hahcai? —hahcanquin.
Yocacahbo bi Jesusen jane honanyamaquin, jano jonibo hicha nichiton Jesus rebesohtai copi.
Jaa pecaho Papan xobohoxon jaa merarihbixon: —Jise. Mia tah min siriscai. Hohchayamascahue hashoan tiromamis —Jesusen jaquin.
Jaatian caresscaxon judiobo yohiquin: —Hea rohajahi joni ta Jesus qui —hahquin.
Tantiti neten jan rohajahi copi judiobo Jesus qui rainyamahiton jaan jato joi bichinquin:
—Heen papa ta rahma caman teetihqui. Hea rihbi ta hen teetai —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jascajaha hashoan sca Jesus rehtecatsihquibohi. Jan tantiti neten tantiyamahi copi rehtecatsihquibo. Papa Dios betan jasca rabe hihquish, Papa Dios ta heen papa qui jan jaiton.
Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: Papan baquexon bi tah hen hehmebi jahuejati hahtipahyamahi. Heen papan hahcai jisxon pari tah hen hahcai, jatihibi heen papan hahcai quescabijaquin hean rihbi hahquin.
Hea jahuen baquehon shinanxon ta heen papan jatihibi jan hahcai rihbi hea jahuen baque jismahihqui. Jahuen coshiyaxon hen hahcai bi ta nea mentan hashoan coshin hen hahcai rihbi hen mato jismayaxihqui, man rahtenon.
Mahuanihbo huenixon heen papan jihuemahi quescajaribiquin tah hen jahuen baque hihxon hea hen queenaibo hean jihuemahi.
Tsoabi casticanxonma ta Papan hea yonohihqui hean sca jatihibi jointi honanxon casticanyaxahnon.
Papa Dios Nete Hihbohi man honanai quescajaribiquin man jahuen baque Nete Hihbohi man jatihixonbi honannon ta jascajahiqui. Jahuen baque ta nete hihboma qui hihquibo ta Jaa raanni jahuen papa rihbi ta nete hihboma qui hihnicahbo qui.
Yohicoin tah hen mato jai: heen joi nincaxon bi hea raanni heen papa rihbi nincacoinai joni ta queyoyamanox manatihqui. Jaa casticanxonma ta Papan mahnescaiqui, mahuataibo janinhax jihuetaibo qui mahnenon.
Yohicoin ta hen mato jaribihi: mahuanihbaan ta Papan baquen yohihi nincascaiqui, nincacaibo jihuescanon.
Jahuen papa teehihmanicahi quescarihbihi tah hen hea jahuen baque jaa xohtahi, Mia rihbi jato teehihmanicahue, Papan hea janí.
Mia tah min noquebaque qui. Mian sca jato casticanhue hah ta heen papan janishqui.
Hen mato yohihah bi rahteyamanahue. Hean quenahah ta tsahon janinhahbaan jatihixonbi nincayaxihquiqui.
Sirijanibo ta cainax huenicahintihiqui, jascabi sca queyoyamanox manati jihuenoxon. Tiromajanibo rihbi ta cainax huenitihiqui, jascabijaquin casticanahbo janoxon.
Hehmebi tah hen jahuejati hahtipahyamahi. Papa nincaxon res tah hen jato casticantihi. Jaa copi tah hen pontejaquin shinanxon casticanyaxihqui. Jaan hea yononixon shinanai quescajaquin tah hen jascajatihi. Heabi hen queenaijah ta hen jayamahi.
Hehqui heabi yohuanax cahen heen yohuan jahuabi hihyamahan.
Hea jahua quin honanahbo ta huetsa yohuancoinihqui. Hea yohihi jan hihcoini yohuanai tah hen honanai.
Honancatsihquin man Juan qui raanah ta hihcoini jaa yohuancoinnishqui.
Jonibo res yohuanai joi ta hean nincayamahi. Papan mato teehihmanon hihxon res ta hen mato yohihi.
Johue quetejaha xabatai janin quescari tah man Juan qui caniqui, jahuen xaba chian sca basima jenimanoxon quescapi.
Heen papan ta hea teebo yohinishqui hean queyoxonnon. Jaa ta hen hahcai, hea papan raanni man honancoinnon hihxon. Hean hahcaibo ta hea yohihi joi quesca qui, hahan hea honanti. Juaman yohini nincaxon hahan hea honantihi bi hean hahcai jisxon hashoan sirijaquin honanti.
Hea raanni heen papan ta hehqui yohicoinihqui. Jan yohuanai tah man jahuentianbi nincayamanihqui. Beron rihbi tah man jaa jisyamaniqui jahuentianbi.
Jaan raanni joni man nincacoinyamahiya ta maton jointi janin Papan joi yamahihqui.
Papan huishani joi jisquin sirijanahue. Hea yohihi joi ta jaa qui, hahan hea honantihi bi tah man hahan mahuataxma jihueti man shinanai.
Hean mato teehihmanon hehqui jotihi bi tah man jocatsihyamahi.
Jonibaan res hea Yotiho coshi mia quin hahti tah hen queenyamahi.
Mato tah hen honanai. Noquen Papahon tah man queenyamahi.
Heen papan hea raanah hen jahui bi tah man hea Johue hahyamahi. Jaabaanbi shinanax jahuibo tah man Johue hahtihi.
¿Jenquetsahaxon man mato qui siripi yohuanaibo benaxon man noquen Papan joi nincacointihin? Papa huesti noquen Dios hihqui bi tah man jaa siripi mato qui yohuanti man queenyamahi.
Heanbi noquen Papa maton hohcha yohipaqueyaxihqui shinanyamanahue. Mato cahenica ta Moisesnin huisha qui, hahan jihueti man shinanai que bi.
Moisesnin huishani joi nincacoinxon cah man hea rihbi nincaquehanai. Hehqui ta jaan huishanishqui.
¿Jenquetsahaxon man heen joi nincacointihin, Moisesnin huisha rihbi nincacoinxonma bi? —jato Jesusen jaquin.
Jaa pecaho sca ta Galilea mai meha hian pohquejaqueti Jesus canishqui. Tiberias cahen jaa hiaman jane huetsa.
Papan coshiyaxon hisinaibo Jesusen rohajahi jisxon hichaxon Jesus chibancanquin.
Mahchi manichish jano jahuen haxenicabo betan Jesus tsahopaqueti.
Judiobaan pascua fiesta nea pishca sca jai.
Jari jisxon hihti caibo hahqui jahui meraxon Felipe yocaquin: —¿Jahuerahnon non piti marotihin jaabaan pinon?
Felipe tananoxon ta jascajanishqui, jaanbi piti caijanoxon bi yocaquin.
Jaatian: —Doscientos libras non jai bi ta hahan paan marohah jato jatihixonbi piti senentimahiqui, hexti pishca cohren huesti hinanah bi —Jesus Felipenin jaquin.
Huetsa rihbi jahuen haxenica jahui, Andres, Simon Pedron huetsa.
—Neno ta beronan jaiqui. ¿Pichca cebada paanya rabe tsatsa rihbi jan jai bi hen neatihi noquebo janon bi jaa jahuejatiquin? —Jesus jaquin Andresnin.
—Jato tsahopaquemanahue —Jesusen jaquin. Hani pasto jano jaiya, jano tsahopaquecani. Bebobo rahsi toponah ta cinco mil joni janishqui.
Jaatian jaa paan pishca bihxon Papa yocaxon tehcaxon tsahotaibo Jesusen hinanpaquequin. Tsatsa sca jascajaribiquin jaabo queenai tihi.
Yaniscaiboya: —Texejaha teque romishin tsinquitannahue, jahuabi yohyocohyamanon —jahuen haxenicabo Jesusen jaquin.
Jascajaha tsinquicanquin. Pichca cebada paan pihibaan texejahi tequebo tsinquixon, doce tasa bohasacanquin.
Jascajaquin Papan coshiyaxon jan hahcai jisish: —Nea coin ta Papan joi yohinica main joyaxihqui yohicanpahonishqui —hihqui pihi tsahotaibo.
Jaton quiquin hapo sca hihnon jaa bichi jocatsihquibaan bi honanscaax mahchi janin jaa huesti Jesus caribihi.
Bepiscaiya jaton nonti janin jahuen haxenicabo nihpaqueti cahi.
Nontin nanetax Capernaum quiri pohquejahqueti cahi. Yamescaiya jato qui Jesus joriyamahi bi nihuen coshin behchonjaquin.
<range>
Basi huina huinaxon yame jisíbaan bi hahchon hian benichi Jesus jahui, nonti hochoma sca. Hian benichai merahax rahtecani.
Rahtetaibaan bi: —Hea ta hen qui, raqueyamanahue —hihqui Jesus.
Jaatian nontin nanemacatsihquibo bi nococahinscacani, jano jan cahi hoque quexa.
Xaba paquescaiya cahen hoque quexa banetipibaan benahah bi Jesus yamascai. Jahuen haxenicabo betan ta Jesus naneyamahipishqui. Jaabo rahsibi nontin cahi tah non jisipiqui. Jaa huesti nonti res ta jaipishqui, huesta yamahi. ¿Jahuenrahnon Jesus cahipishquin? hihxon benahahbo bi yamahi.
Janoxon jan Papa yocaxon jato paan pimahipi hochoma sca Tiberias janinhax jahui nontibo nocoti.
Jahuen haxenicaboyabi Jesus xahbanjahax, hahan behibo nontin sca nanetax, Capernaum janin jahui becani, Jesus benahi.
Pohquequihrani joxon Jesus meraxon yocacanquin: —¿Jahuentian min neno jahuequin, maestron? —hahcanquin.
—Yohicoin ta hen mato jai: Papan coshiyaxon hen mato hahxonai jisipixon bi tah man jaa copima hea benahi. Paan pihi yanitipixon copi tah man hea benahi.
Queyonica piti copi teeyamanahue. Jahuentianbi queyoyamanox manatai piti copi teenahue. Noquebaque hihxon hen hinanyaxihqui piti ta jascapah qui. Hea jascapa hinannica man honannon hihxon ta jahuen shinanyaxon hen hahnon Papan hea hinanihqui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jan jascahiya: —¿Jahueja non jatihin, Papan tee hahnoxon? —hahcanquin.
—Papan raanai joni nincacointi ta jaa tee qui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
—¿Jahua hahan honanti min hahcain, jisxon non nincacoinnon hihxon? ¿Jahueja min jain, Papan shinanyaxon?
Cahchihoxon ta noquen xenibaan maná piti pipahonishqui. Jaa yohihi ta Naihoh queha piti ta jato hinannishqui, pihabo, hih Papan huisha janin jaiqui —Jesus jacanquin.
—Mato tah hen yohicoinai: naihoh queha piti ta Moisesnin mato hinanyamanishqui. Heen papan caya ta mato naihoh queha piti coin hinanihqui.
Jaan hinanai piti ta naihoh quehax botopaquetihqui, jaa pihax jihuetahbo —Jesusen jato jaquin.
—Jascapa piti noque hinanquin jeneyamaxahnhue, Hihbon —hahcanquin.
—Hea ta hen hahan jihueti piti qui. Hehqui jahuibo ta picatsihyamascatihiqui. Hea nincacoinaibo ta jiricatsihyamascatihiqui, jahuentianbi.
Hea jisxon bi tah man nincacoinyamahi hah cah hen mato jai.
Heen papan hea hinanai tihibi ta hehqui joti qui. Hehqui jahuibo tah hen potatimahi, ni huestibi.
Hea queenai quescajahi tah hen joyamaniqui. Hea raanni queenaijahi tah hen naihoh quehax botopaquetax joníqui.
Ni huestibi manomaxonma tah hen jan hea hinanai jatihibi hean hueniyaxihqui nete queyoscanon. Hean jascajati ta hea raanni queenihqui.
Jahuen baque jisxon jaa nincacoinaibo queyoyamanox manati ta heen papa queenihqui. Nete queyoscanon tah hen jato hueniyaxihqui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascahiya judiobo hahqui renren renreni. Naihoh quehax botopaqueni piti ta hea qui jan jaiya hahqui rainyamacani.
—¿Nea Jesus janeya joni Josepan baquema hin? ¿Jahuen papa, jahuen mama non honanyamahin? ¿Jenquetsahaquin sca Hea tah hen naihoh quehax paquenihqui hah noque jaiquin? —hihcani.
Jaatian: —Mato rahsibi yohuani renren renrenyamanahue.
Heen Papan Johue hahca ta hehqui jahuibo jahuiqui. Jan Johue hahyamaha cahen joti hahtipahyamahan. Hehqui jahuibo tah hen hueniyaxihqui, nete queyoscanon.
Papan honanmahibo rahsi ta jatihiqui; jascajaquin ta Papan joi yohinicabaan huishanishqui. Heen papa yohuanai nincaxon honanaibo jatihibi ta hehqui jotihiqui.
Tsoanbi noquen Papa jisyamani que bi ta Papa janinha huestichin jaa jisnicah qui.
Hihcoinja ta hen mato jai: nincacoinaibo ta jahuentianbi queyoyamanox manatihqui.
Hahan jihueti piti ta hea qui.
Cahchihoxon maná piti pihax bi ta maton xenibo mahuanishqui.
Naihoh queha piti pihax tah man mahuayamascatihi. Jascapa piti ta naihoh quehax botopaquetihqui.
Naihoh quehax botopaqueni piti mohitahpa ta hea qui. Jascapa piti pihax tah man queyoyamanox manascatihi. Hean hinanai piti ta heen yora qui. Mai mehabo jihueyaxahnon tah hen jato hinanai —jato jaquin.
—¿Jenquetsahaxon noque jahuen yora hinantihiquin, non pinon? —hihquish jaabo rahsibi judiobo join bahchinnanscai.
Join rehtenanaiboya Jesusen jato yohiquin: —Yohicoin tah hen mato jai. Noquebaquen yora piyamaxon jahuen jimi rihbi xehayamahax tah man jihueyamahi.
Heen yora pixon heen jimi rihbi xehahi noque ta queyoyamanox manatihqui. Jaabi rihbi tah hen hueniyaxihqui, nete queyoscanon.
Heen yora ta piti coin qui. Heen jimi rihbi ta xehati coin qui.
Heen yora pixon heen jimi rihbi xehahi tah man heen hahberabetibo qui, hea rihbi maton hahberabeti.
Heen papa ta jihuetihqui. Hea ta raannishqui. Hea jaa copi jihuetai quescarihbi ta hea pihibo jihuetihiqui, hea copi.
Jascapah ta naihoh quehax botopaquetai piti qui. Noquen xenibaan piti pihax bi mahuanih quescayamahi. Nea piti pihax queyoyamanox manati, jascabi sca jihuenox manati, —jato jaquin.
Capernaum janin haho tsinquiti xobohoxon ta Jesusen jato jascajaquin yohinishqui honanmaquin.
Jan yohuanai nincaxon: —Honantima tah qui, jan yohuanai. ¿Tsoan nincatihiquin? —hihqui hicha jahuen haxenicabo.
Jahuen haxenicabo hahqui renren renrenai jahuen jointinin honanxon jato yocaquin: —¿Hen yohuanai nincacax man rahtetain?
¿Janohax hen joníton hen hahquirihbi hinahihnatai jisish cahran man hihti rahtetimahin?
Dios Yoshiman ta mato jihuematihiqui. Maton yora betan res tah man jahua bihtimahi. Hen mato yohihi joi ta yoshinyahpa qui, hahan jihueti.
Hahan jihueti joi hen mato yohihah bi tah man caibaan nincacoinyamahi —jato jaquin. Jato jismenoxon ta tsoabo nincayosmabohin Jesusen honannishqui. Paranxon jaa bihmayaxihqui joni rihbi honanquin.
—Jaa copi ta hen mato jascajahipiqui. Papan shinanyamahiya ta tsoabi hehqui jotimahiqui —hahquin.
Jan jascaraiya ta hicha jahuen haxenicabaan jaa potabahinnishqui. Haxehi hahbetan nihyamascacani.
—¿Maton rihbi man hea potabahincatsihquin? —jahuen doce haxenicabo Jesusen yocaquin.
—¿Tsohqui non catihin nan, Hihbon? Mian tah min noque hahan queyoyamati joi nincamahi.
Mia Papan raanai jahuen caisti joni tah non mia honancoinai. Shinanquin sirijaquin tah non honanscai —hahquin Simoman.
—¿Mato doce hen caisyamanihquin? Mato quiha huesti ta tiroma yoshin qui —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jan yohihi ta Judas qui, Simon Iscariotenin baque. Jahuen doce quiha hihxon bi Jesus bihmati shinanai joni.
Jascahipish Galilea mai janin res Jesus nichi. Judea main nihcatsihyamascai, judiobaan rehtecatsihquiya.
Judiobaan tapasohoxon fiestajati nete nea pishcascaiya, jahuen huetsabaan Jesus yohiquin: —Nenohax Judea main carestanhue, janoxon min hahcaibo miin haxenicabaan rihbi jisnon.
<range>
Sirijaquin jisíbo hihxon ta jonexon tsoanbi jahuejayamahiqui. Papan coshiyaxon hahan honanti hahcatsihquin janibixon hahhue, jatihixonbi jisquin sirijahabo —hahcanquin.
Nincacoinyamaxon copi ta jahuen huetsabaanbi jascajanishqui.
Jesusen sca jato yohiquin: —Caritima pari tah hen jai. Mato caya botannahue. Jahua copi hea manatima tah man jai.
Mato jistahihmajati ta mai mehabaan hahtipahyamahiqui. Jaabaan tiromajahi hean hihcoinjaquin yohihiya ta hea jistahihmajacanihqui.
Fiesta janin botannahue, mato. Caritima ta hea jai. Queenax ta hea catihi.
Jato jascajaquin yohihax, Galilea main banetahbi.
Jahuen huetsabo fiesta janin cahipi sca jaa rihbi cahi, caibaan jisnonma sca, janibima.
Jonetax cahi bi fiesta janinxon judiobaan jaa benaquin: —¿Jahuen jaa quin? —hahcanquin.
Hihti caibo jaya baxex baxexi. —Siri joni tah qui —hihqui caibo. —Sirima ta qui. Jonibo ta paranihqui —hihqui caibo rihbi.
Judiobo qui raquetax tsoabi coshin jaya yohuanyamahi, honahaxbi yohuancani.
Fiesta naexbi sca Papan xoboho mapexon Papan joi Jesusen haxemaquin.
Jan jascahiya rahtetax judiobo yohuani: —¿Jenquetsahaxon neatohon huisha joi honanishquin tsoanbi quirica honanmanima bi? —hihcani.
Jascahiton Jesusen yohiquin: —Hen jato honanmahi ta heen joima qui. Hea yononihton joi tah qui.
Papan shinanaijati hahcatsihquibaan ta honantihiqui. ¿Papan shinanaiya honanma hen jain? ¿Heanbi shinanxon honanma hen jain? Jaabaan ta hen yohuanai honantihiqui.
Coshi joni hihqui shinanahbo hihquish ta jaabaanbi shinanax yohuanaibo jaiqui. Hea raanai heen Papa coshi hihqui honanahbo hihquish tah hen hea yohuanai. Jascapa yohuannica ta hihcoini yohuannica qui. Jahuabi tiroma yohuanyamahi.
¿Maton nincati joi Moisesnin hinanyamanishquin? Ni huestichinbi tah man jaa joi nincayamahi, jaan hinanni que bi. ¿Hean mato jahua hahca man hea rehtecatsihquin? —Jesusen jato jaquin.
—Mia rah ta yoshiman hihbojahiqui. ¿Tsoan mia rehtecatsihquiquin? —hihcani.
Jesusen jato yohirihbiquin: —Hen hahcai huesti jisish tah man jatihibi rahtetai.
Jaanbi shinanxonma bi noquen xenibaan pari yohihah ta Moisesnin mato honantiyahpati yohinishqui. Tantiti netenbi tah man baquexo honantijahi.
Moisesnin yohini quescajacatsihquin tantiti netenbi joni huetsa honantijanicaboxon ¿jahua copi sca man tantiti neten hean huetsa joni rohajahiya man hehqui rainyamahin?
Beron jisxon res huetsa jonin shinan honanti shinanyamanahue. Shinanquin sirijaxon pari joni huetsa honannahue —jato jaquin.
Jasca jan jaiya caibo Jerusalen janinhahbo yohuanscai: —¿Neama hin, rehtecatsihquibo joni?
Jistan. Janibi nichish yohuanai bi ta jahua hihyamacanihqui. ¿Cristo hihqui noquen cacannicabaan honancoinscaiquin?
Janobihax nea joni jahui tah non honanai. Cristo joni jahuiya roqui tsoanbi jahuerahnohax jaa jahuiquin hihxon honanyamayaxihcanihqui —hihcani.
Jaa copi cahen Papan xobohoxon jato haxemahi sca Jesus coshin yohuani: —¿Hea man honanain nan? Janobihax hea joní man honanrihbihi nan? Hehme mehax ta hen joyamaniqui. Hihcoinnicahton ta hea raannishqui. Jaa tah man honanyamahi.
Hean tah hen jaa honanai. Jaan hea raanah ta hen jaa janinhax joniqui —hahquin Jesusen.
Jasca jan jaiya xecotancatsihxon bi jaa bihxon rehteti siriyamaparihiya tsoanbi meheyamaquin.
Rehteti shinan caibaan jai bi hicha noquebaan Jesus nincacoinquin. —Neatohon ta hahan honanti hahquiqui, hicha. ¿Cristo joxon, neatohon hahcai quescajaxon bi hashoan hicha rihbi hahan honanti hahtihiquin? —hahcanquin
Jascari baxexaibaan bi fariseobaan nincaquin. Nincaxon, sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobaan sca jaton porisiabo raanquin, Jesus bihtannahue hahxon.
Bihcatsihscaibo copi cahen jato yohiquin: —Basima tahni sca tah hen mato betan hihtihi. Hea raanni janin sca hea cati ta hochoma sca qui.
Hea benaxon bi tah man hea meratimahi. Hea cahi janin tah man cati hahtipahyamatihi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jaabo rahsibi sca judiobo yohuani: —¿Jahuenbi cacatsihquiquin, non jaa merayamascanon? ¿Nahuabo qui caníbo janin cacatsihquiquin, nahuabo sca honanmahi?
¿Benaxon bi tah man hea meratimahi jan hihqui bi jahua hihcatsihquiquin? Hea cahi janin tah man cati hahtipahyamahi. ¿Jan jascari yohuani hen jahua hihcatsihquiquin? —hihcani.
Hahan fiesta queyotai neten, jaton hani netenbi, nichish Jesus coshin yohuani: —Jiricatsihquish hehqui benahue, xehahi.
Hea nincacoinai joni janinhax ta jene mohini huean bahihihcamaxihquiqui, jahuen jointi janinhaxbi, Papan huisha joi jai quescari —hahquin.
Jan jene yohihi ta Dios Yoshin qui, nincacoinaibaan bihyaxihqui Dios Yoshin. Jesus huenihihniriyamaxon ta jahuen yoshin Papan hinanyamaparinishqui.
Jan jascari yohuanai nincacax tsinquijaquetaibo yohuanrihbihi: —Nea coin ta Papan joi yohinica qui —hihcani.
—Noquen hapo hihnon Papan caisai joni tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. —¿Galilea mai janinhax Papan caisai joni jotihiquin?
David xohtahax ta David jihuepahoni janinhax Papan caisai joni picotihiqui, Belen jema janinhaxbi. ¿Jascayamahin, Papan huisha joi janin? —hahcanquin caibaan rihbi.
Jascapa mesco shinanyahpabohax join bahchinnanscacani.
Caibaan Jesus xecotancatsihquin bi tsoanbi meheyamaquin.
Jano sacerdote hapobo betan fariseobo manatai janin jaton porisiabo nocorihbihiton yocacanquin: —¿Jenquetsahpa hin man hihueyamahahquin? —hahcanquin.
—Tsoabi ta jan yohuanai quesca jayamanishqui, jahuentianbi —hihqui jaton porisiabo sca.
—¿Mato rihbi jaan paran paranaxquin?
Maton hapobaan ni huestichin jaa nincayamahi ¿man jisyamahin? Fariseobaan rihbi ta jaa nincayamahihqui.
Nea tsamatai rahsi ta yohitimabo qui, Papan huisha joi honanyamahibo —jato jacanquin fariseobaan.
Nicodemo janeya Jesus qui johuanni joni jato betan hihxon jato yocaquin:
—¿Huetsa joni yohuanquihnxonma bi, jan hahcai rihbi honanxonma bi non jaa casticantihin? ¿Papan huisha joi janin jascajati joi jaiquin? —jato jaquin Nicodemonen.
—¿Mia rihbi tsi ra min Galilea mai meha quin? Papan joi jisquin sirijaxon, Galilea mai janinhax Papan joi yohinica jotima honanhue —jacanquin.
Janohax picotax, jatihibi jaton xoboho bocani.
Olivoyahpa mahchin sca Jesus cahi.
Hihari sca Papan xoboho cahi. Jano sca roqui hahqui jatihibi joni tsinquitaiton tsahoxon jato yohi yohinish.
Jan jato haxemahiya qui jaton haxemanicahbo betan sacerdote hapobaan qui huesti haibo hihuequin, joni huetsa betan hihqui qui meraxon. Jato tocan jaa nichinxon qui Jesus yocacanquin:
—Joni huetsa betan hihqui bi tah non nea haibo merahahqui, maestron.
Huishaxon ta Moisesnin yohinishqui, nescapa non macaman tsacaquin rehtenon. ¿Mian cahran? ¿Jahua min mian yohihin? —hah qui jacanquin.
Jaton hapobo yohinoxon qui Jesus tanaquin jascajacanquin, hahqui yohuanti qui janon. Jasca jaabo jaiya qui cahcopaquexon qui jahuen metotinin mai huishaquin.
Jascabi yocacahbo qui huenixon qui jato yohiquin: —Hohchajomaxon mato janinha huestichin macaman tsacamenonon —hah qui jato jaquin.
Cahcopaquerihbixon qui mai huisharihbiquin.
Jan yohihi nincacax qui yosibobo rahsi pari cahi. Jaa pecaho qui huesti huestibo cahi, jaa xobo janinhax caini. Jesus patax haibo huesti qui banenon.
Huenixon qui haibo Jesusen yocaquin: —¿Jahuen bocanaxquin? ¿Mia tsoanbi casticancatsihyamahiquin? —hah qui jaquin.
—Tsoanbi hihbon —hihqui haibo. —Hean rihbi ta hen mia casticanyamahi. Caresscatanhue. Jahuentianbi hohchayamascahue —hah qui jaquin Jesusen.
Huetsa tian rihbi ta Jesusen jato yohinishqui: —Jatihibi main ta hen hean jato xabajaxonai. Hea chibanaibo ta bahquish chian nihyamahiqui. Hahan jihueti xabapan sca ta mayaxihcanihqui.
Jan jascajahiya: —Mianbi shinanax tah min yohuanresai. Chanicoin tah min jayamahi, noquen nincatima hih —fariseobaan sca hahquin.
Jesusen sca jato pontequin: —Jahuerahnohax jahuex jahuen sca hea catihin hen honanax yohuanai hen mato yohihi ta maton nincati qui, yohicoinai joi. Heabi yohihi hen yohuanai bi tah man nincacointi jai. Janohax jahuex hea jahuerahnon cahin man tah man honanyamahi.
Beron res jisxon tah man joni huetsana jahuen shinan honanti shinanai. Jascajaquin shinanxon tah man casticannoxon Papan rahuibo yohiti shinanai. Hean ta hen tsoabi jascajaquin yohiyamahi.
Yohixon tian tah hen hahcoinquin yohitihi. Hea raanni heen papa betan tah hen jaton shinan honanai, hea huestichin yohixonma bi hahbetanbi yohixon.
Maton nincati joi janin ta nescapa huisha jaiqui. Rabechin yohihah pari ta yohuan coin qui, nincati.
Rabe tah non qui hah ca hen mato jai sen. Hea yohihi heabi hihqui bi ta hea raanni heen papan rihbi hea yohihihqui —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jaatian: —¿Jahuen hin, miin papa? —hahcanquin. —Hea honanyamaxon tah man heen papa rihbi honanyamahi. Hea honanxon cah man heen papa rihbi honanan —jato jaquin.
Janoxon Papa Dios coriqui hinanti chiquehoxon ta Jesusen jato jascajaquin yohinishqui, Papan xobohoxon honanmaxon. Jahuen mahuati hora nocorihyamahiya tsoanbi meheyamaquin.
Jahuen Papa honanyamahibo copi jato hahquirihbi yohiquin: —Hea tah hen cahi. Hea benahax bi tah man maton hohchayabi mahuatihi. Jano hea cahiton tah man catimahi —hahquin.
Nincaxon bi honanyamahax sca: —¿Jano hea cahiton tah man catimahi hihquish bi hahri rehtécatsihquiquin? —hihcani judiobo.
—Mato tah man naman mehabo qui. Hea tah hen bochiquiha qui. Mato tah man nea xabapan meha qui. Hea tah hen nea xabapan mehama qui.
Jaa copi tah hen Maton hohchayabi tah man mahuatihi hah hen mato jaahqui. Hea hihqui shinanyamahax tah man maton hohchayabi mahuatihi —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jan jascajahiya: —¿Mia min jahua quin? —hahcanquin. —Jaa yohi tah hen mato jai.
Mato qui yohiti ta hen hicha jai. Mato casticanti rihbi tah hen hicha jai. Man tiromahibo bi ta hea raanni hihcoini yohuannica qui. Jan yohuanai nincaxon ta hen jaa joi rihbi main jihuetaibo yohihi —jato jaquin Jesusen.
Jahuen papa yohihi jan hihqui bi ta honanyamacannishqui.
Honanyamahiton Jesusen yohiquin: —Hea noquebaque jihuin hueonxon pari tah man hea hihqui honantihi. Hehmebi jahuejaxonma bi papan hea yohini joi rahsi yohi hen jai tah man honantihi.
Hea raanni noque ta hehbe hihquiqui. Jaa queenai quescajaquin hen jai copi ta hea jeneyamahihqui.
Jascajaquin jato yohihah hichaxon nincacoincanquin.
Nincacoin ta jai hihquibo judiobo sca Jesusen yohiquin: —Heen joi jascabijaquin nincacax tah man heen haxenicabo jacointihi.
Hihcoin hen jani quen tah man honantihi. Jaa honanax tah man hinabomascatihi —Jesusen jato jaquin.
—Noque tah non Abrahanen baquebo qui. Tsoanbi ta noque hinajayamanishqui, jahuentianbi. ¿Jenquetsahpahin min noque Hinaboma sca tah man jatihi min noque jain? —Jesus jacanquin.
Jascaraiton jato yohirihbiquin: —Yohicoin tah hen mato jai. Jatihibi hohchataibo ta hina qui, hohchapan hihbojahah.
Hina ta xoboho jascabihi jihue jihueyamahihqui. Xobo hihbaan baque res ta jano jihuenica qui, queyoyamanox mana jihueti.
Papan baquen mato hohcha sohuaxona tah man hihcoini hinabomascatihi.
Abrahanen baquebo man jai tah hen honanai. Jahuen baqueboxon bi tah man hea rehtecatsihqui, maton jointi janin heen joi hihquicasquimahiya.
Heen papan hea jismahi ta hen mato yohihi. Maton rihbi tah man maton papan yohihi quescabijaquin hahcai —jato jaquin Jesusen.
—Noquen papa xeni ta Abraham qui —hahcanquin. Jesusen sca: —Abrahanen baqueboxon tah man jahuen tee hahquehahnai.
Hea tah man rehtecatsihscai, Papan hea yohihi hen mato yohicoinah bi. Abrahanen ta jascajayamanishqui.
Maton papan tee tah man hahcai —Jesusen jato jaquin. —Noquen mama ta tsiniyamanishqui. Huesti res ta noquen papa qui, noquen papa Dios —hahcanquin.
Jesusen sca: —Papa Dios maton papa hihquiya tah man hehon queenquehanai. Papa Dios janinhax jonish tah hen hea jahui. Hehmebi tah hen joyamaniqui. Jaan ta hea raannishqui.
¿Jenquetsahpahin man hen mato yohihah bi man honanyamahin? Heen joi nincayosmaboxon tah man honanyamahi.
Tiroma yoshin ta maton papa qui. Jaa queenai hahti res tah man maton rihbi shinanai. Noquebo jamenohitian rehtemis hihnish ta rahma caman jascabi rehtemis qui, maton papa. Jaabiyahpa quesamisax, jascabihi quesahi. Quesa hihxon ta caibo sca quesamaribihiqui. Hihti quesa, maton papa.
Hihcoini yohuan hen jai copi tah man nincacoinyamahi.
¿Tsoan man hea heen hohcha yohitihin? ¿Jenquetsahpahin man hea hihcoini yohuanai bi man hea nincacoinyamahin?
Papan baquebo ta jahuen joi nincanicabo qui. Jahuen baquemaboxon tah man nincayamahi —Jesusen jato jaquin.
Jan jato jascajahiya: —Mia tah min Samaria mai meha qui. Yoshiman ta mia hihbojahiqui. ¿Hihcoinja non mia jayamahin?
Jascahahbo jato Jesusen yohirihbiquin: —Yoshiman ta hea hihbojayamahiqui. Heen papa qui tah hen siripi yohuanai. Mato tah man hehqui tiromahi yohuanai.
Hehqui siripi yohuanaibo benahi ta hen joyamahi. Jatihibi shinan honannica ta jaiqui. Jaan ta mato yohihihqui, hehqui siripi yohuanxon.
Hihcoinja ta hen mato jai. Heen joi nincacai jonibo ta mahuayamanox manatihqui —jato Jesusen jaquin.
—Mia yoshiman hihbojahi tah non honanscai. Abraham ta mahuanishqui. ¿Papan joi yohinicabo rihbi hihni que bi min jascarain, Heen joi nincacai noque ta mahuayamanox manatihqui, hihqui?
¿Mia min noquen papa yamanica Abraham mentan hashoan coshi quin? Papan joi yohinicabo rihbi ta mahuanishqui. ¿Jahua hihqui shinan mian jain? —Jesus jacanquin.
Jato Jesusen yohiquin: —Hehqui siripi yohuanaibo benaxon tah hen jahuabi bihtimahi. Heen papa ta hehqui siripi yohuanihqui, Jaa ta noquen Dios qui hih man jai que bi.
Jaa man honanyamahi bi tah hen hean honanai. Mato quescapa quesamis hihquish pari ta hen Jaa ta hen honanyamahi hen jatihi. Jaa ta hen honanai. Jahuen joi rihbi ta hen nincacoinai.
Hea neno joyaxihqui honanax ta maton papa yamanica Abraham jenimanishqui. Hea jahui jisish sca ta coin coinnishqui —jato Jesusen jaquin.
Jan jascaraiya: —¿Cincuenta bari jariyamaxon bi min noquen xohta yamanica Abraham jisniquin? —judiobaan Jesus jaquin.
—Hihcoinja tah hen mato jai. Abraham cainrihyamahi bi tah hen hea janíqui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascaraiya, tsacanoxon macan bichibaan bi jonetax Papan xobo janinhax Jesus cainscai.
Jano huinoxon benche joni jisquin, benche jahuen maman bihni.
Jahuen haxenicabaan sca yocaquin: —¿Tsoa tsi ra hohchanishquin, Maestron, benche hoa jahuen maman bihnon? ¿Jahuen papabo nan? ¿Jaabi nan? —hahcanquin.
—Jan hohchani copima ta qui. Jahuen papabo rihbi hohchani que ma bi tah qui. Papan coshiyaxon jaa rohajahi jisíbo ta benche jahuen maman bihnishqui.
Hea raanni heen papan teebo jahti ta noque jai, bari queya parihiya. Tsoabi teeti hahtipahyamascanon ta yametihiqui.
Mai mehabo tocan jihuexon tah hen jato xabajaxonai.
Jascajaxon mai qui toshbanhahxon huaho berojaxon benche betsamxon yohiquin:
—Siloé janeya noaho benashitanhue —hahquin. Siloé ta raanah hihcatsihquiqui. Jascahah, cahax, benashitani joquin jisbenascaquin.
Jan coriqui yocacahtai jispahonibaan sca yocaquin: —¿Neama hin, yoca yocaqui tsahopahoni joni? Jahuen hahbe jihuenihbaan rihbi jascajaquin yocaquin.
—Jaabi ta qui —hihqui caibo. —Jaamahax bi ra ta jaa quescapih qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. —Hea tah hen qui —hihqui jaabi sca.
Honancatsihquin sca: —¿Miabi hihquish jenquetsahax min bero siriscaiquin? —hahcanquin.
—Jesus janeya jonin huaho berojaxon heen bero qui betsamxon hea Siloé janin nashitanhue hahcah tah hen nashihi sca cahaqui jisresscanoxon —hihqui.
—¿Jahuen hin, jaa joni? —hahcanquin. —Hen ta hen honanyamahi —hahquin.
Benche hihpahoni joni fariseobo janin sca bocanquin.
Tantiti neten cahen Jesusen huaho berojaxon jahuen bero rohajanish.
Fariseobaan sca yocarihbiquin: —¿Jenquetsahaxon miin bero rohajaxquin? —hahcanquin. —Jaan heen bero qui huaho tsamanah benashixon tah hen jisresscai —jato jaquin.
—Papa Diosen raanahma tah qui. Tantiti neten jan tantibahinayamahi copi tah non honanai —hihcani caibo fariseobo sca. —¿Jenquetsahaxon hohchayahpa jonin jascapa hahan honanti jatihquin? —hihcani caibo rihbi. Caibo huetsa shinanya hihnon caibaan rihbi huetsa shinanquin.
Benche hahquirihbi yocacanquin: —Mia ta bero rahonaxqui. ¿Mian jisi jenquetsahpa joni quin? —hahcanquin. —Papan joi yohinica tah qui —hahquin.
Jan benche hihpahonixon bi rahma pari jisi judiobaan nincacatsihyamahi. Hihcoinai shinanyamacanquin. Jahuen papa, jahuen mama yocarihyamaxon hihcoini jaa yohuanai shinanyamacanquin.
—¿Nea hin, maton baque, benche ta cainnishqui hih man jain? ¿Jenquetsahaxon sca rahma jisiquin? —hahcanquin.
Jascahah: —Jaa ta noquen baque qui, non tah non honanai. Jan benche cainni tah non honanrihbihi.
Jenquetsahaxon jan rahma jisiquin, non tah non honanyamahi. Tsoan jahuen bero rohajaxquin, non tah non honanyamarihbihi. Jaabi yocanahue. Hani sca ta jaiqui, jaanbi ta mato yohitihiqui.
Judiobo qui raquexon jahuen papan, jahuen maman jascajaquin. Judiobaan cahen jatihixonbi yohinish, Cristo tah qui hihquibo jatihibi tah non potati jai, noquen tsinquiti xoboho mapeyamascaábo, tsoanbi jato yohuanquihnyamascaábo tah non jato potatihi, hahcanquin huesti shinanyaxon.
Judiobaan jascahipi copi raquetax: —Jaa ta haniscai qui. Jaabi yocanahue —hihresi jahuen papa.
Jascaraiya, rabe coti sca benche jahuen maman bihní joni hahquirihbi quenamacanquin. —Papa Diosen caya ta hea rohajahaxqui hihhue. Hoa joni ta hohchamis qui, non tah non honanai —hahcanquin.
