Miin mequeman mehexon jonibo rohajahue. Miin baque Jesusen janen non hahan honantibo hahnon hahan rahtetibo rihbi non hahnon jahue —hahcanquin.
Papa yocaquin janquenja sca jaiboya jaabo jano tsinquitai xobo xayascai. Dios Yoshiman jato jatihibi hihbojaha sca raquexonma Papan joi yohicanquin.
Jaatian cahen nincacoinaibo jaa shinan huestiya hihcani. Jatihixonbi jaa huesti shinancanquin. Jan jaibo yohihi, jaa ta hena res qui, hih tsoabi jayamahi. Jatihibi jaya hihqui.
Papan coshiyaxon hahxon cahen noquen Hihbo Jesus hahquirihbi teehihscai yohicanquin jahuen raantibaan. Jato jatihibi ta hicha shinan Papan hinannishqui.
Jato tocan tsoabi jahuabi pishinyamahi. Xobo jaxon maromacanquin. Mai jaxon jaa rihbi maromacanquin.
Maromaxon coriqui bihxon caxon Criston raantibo hinancanquin. Jaabaan sca pishinaibo hinanpaquenon.
José janeya huesti ta Criston raantibaan Bernabé janenishqui. Bernabé cahen sirijaquin shinanai baquebo hihcatsihqui. Jaa cahen Chipre janinhax joní, levito joni.
Mai hihbo hihxon cahen jahuen mai maromaxon coriqui bichish jaya caxon Criston raantibo hinanscaquin.
Ananías janeya jonin sca jahuen haibo Safira betan jaton mai maromaquin.
Coriqui bihxon, Jascajahue jahuen haibaan rihbi jaah, texe mequecanquin. Texe mequexon texe boxon Criston raantibo taracanquin.
Pedronen sca yocaquin: —Ananin. ¿Jenquetsahaxon Satanasnen miin jointi hihbojahaxquin, min maromahi texe yohuashihxon Dios Yoshin paranti min shinannon?
¿Maroyamaha minabi hihyamahipishquin? ¿Maromaxon sca jaa coriqui hihboxon quesayamaxon min queenai quescajati min hahtipahyamahin? ¿Jahua copi sca min jascajaquin paranain? Jonima bi tah min noquen Papabi parancatsihqui.
Jan yohihah nincacax Ananías racareneni mahuascai. Jaa chanihi joi nincacaibo rahsi sca hihti raquecani.
Beronanbaan sca huenixon Ananías rahcoxon boxon tsahoncanquin.
Quimisha horabo huinohax jahuen haibo sca hihcohi. Jaan cahen jahuen bene jascarax mahuatah honanyamaquin.
Jaa sca Pedronen yocaquin: —Hea yohihue. ¿Man noque hinanah tihi copitai min mai maromahaquin? —hahquin. —Jatihi copitai rahan —hahquin.
Pedronen sca: —¿Jenquetsahpahin man rabexonbi Dios Yoshin tanati shinanahquin? Nincahue. Miin bene tsahontanaibo ta mapescaiqui. Mia rihbi sca ta hioxihcanihqui —hahquin.
Jaatian cahen Pedro taracahrenenax haibo mahuati. Hihcoxon cahen haibo mahuascai meraxon beronanbaan boresscaquin. Boxon jahuen bene janin tsahonscacanquin.
Jaatian ta nincacoinaibo jatihibi hihti raquenishqui. Jaa joi nincacaibo rahsi raqueti.
Jaa jema janinxon ta Criston raantibaan hicha hahan honantibo hahnishqui, hahan rahtetibo rihbi hahquin. Salomonen rechí xoboho sca jatihibi tsinquicani.
Tsinquitaiboya caibo tsoabi jato betan tsinquiyamahi raquetax. Raquexon bi jema janinhahbaan jato hihti siri jisquin.
Nincacoinaibo cahen caícanascai. Bebobo, haibobo rihbi tsamascai.
Hihti caiboscaiya cahen jema bahinbi jaton pishinbo, jaton cacajatibo racanxonxon jaton hisinyahpabo jano racancanquin, Pedro jahuiya jahuen bari yoshiman bocabi jato huinonon hihxon.
Jerusalen hochoma jemabo janinhax sca hicha jonibo jahui. Jaton hisinyahpabo hihuecanquin. Tiroma yoshinyahpabo rihbi hihuecanquin. Jato jatihibi ta Criston raantibaan rohajanishqui.
Jasca sca jaiboya jaton quiquin sacerdote jahuen hahbe saduceobo betan notsi notsiscai.
Notsi notsixon porisiabo bihmaxon Criston raantibo sipo xoboho tsahoncanquin.
Tsahonahbaan bi yame noquen Hihbaan naihoh queha yonoti joxon sipo xobo xehpoti quehpenxonxon jato picoquin. Picoxon:
—Botannahue. Papan xoboho mapexon jonibo nea hahan jihueti joi jatihibi yohitannahue —jato jaquin.
Jan yohihi quescabijascacanquin. Xaba paquetaiya bi Papan xoboho mapexon jonibo haxemascacanquin. Jaatian cahen quiquin sacerdote, jaabo, jahuen hihti janin nocoxon hahbe hapobo tsinquimaquin israelibaan hanibo rahsi. Jato tsinquimaxon porisia sca sipo xobo janin raancanquin jato hihuenon hihxon.
Sipo xobo janin nocoxon sca porisiabaan jato xahbanjaquin. Joribixon sca jan xahbanjatanai yohicanquin:
—Xehpoti jascabi xehpohah tah non meratanai, hihti xehpohah. Sipo xobo coirannicah rihbi tah non jahuen xehqui xehnichai jistanai. Non quehpenxon jisí bi ta tsoabi yamahaxqui —hahcanquin.
Chanihibo nincacax Papan xobo coiranai sontaro hapo betan quiquin sacerdotebo rahtecani, ¿Jahua sca janoxihquiquin? hihcani.
Jato yohihi sca huetsa jahui. —Man sipo xoboho tsahonipibaan ta Papan xobohoxon jonibo haxemahiqui —hahquin.
Jahuen sontarobo betan caxon jaa xobo coiranai hapon sca jato hihuequin. Jan hapo qui hihuehi copi jonibaan jato macaman tsacapaho hihxon coshixonma jato hihuequin honaxonbi.
Hihuexon hapobo tsinquitai naponbi sca jato nichinquin. Quiquin sacerdotenin sca jato yohiquin:
—Jaa janen yohiyamascanahue hah tah non mato jaipiqui, sirijaquin yohiquin. Yohihah bi tah man Jerusalen jatihobi maton honanmati joi jato nincamahi. Jaa joni rehtehoh quen tah man jaa hohcha noque hihbomacatsihqui —jato jaquin.
Hahbe raantibo betan Pedronen sca yohiquin: —Joni mentan tah non hashoan noquen Papa nincati non jai.
Noquen xenibaan Papa Diosen ta Jesus teehihmarihbihoxqui, jihuin hueonxon man rehtehipi que bi.
Jaa ta noquen Papa Diosen huenihihnihoxqui, jaa mecayaho tsahonon quiquin hapo sca jonibo teehihmanicah. Noque israeli baquebo ponte shinan hinanxon noquen hohcha sohuanon ta noquen Papa jaa huenihihnihoxqui.
Noquenbi jisoxon tah non yohiscai. Noque ta jahuen Yoshin siri rihbi Papan hinanihqui jahuen joi nincacoinaibo rahsibi. Noque ta yanapanihqui —hihqui Pedro.
Jascahahbo nincaxon cahen hihti sinaxon jato rehtecatsihscacani.
Jano rihbi huesti fariseo tsahoti, Moisesnin huishani joi honan, Gamaliel janeya. Jatihibi jonibaan siri jisi joni. Hapobo tocan nihrenenxon Criston raantibo jatoma qui picomatahtahxon jaan jato yohiquin:
—Heen caibaan. ¿Jahueja man jaabo jacatsihquin? Sirijaquin shinannahue.
Neateman ta Teudas jonishqui. Hapohihti shinanax yohuanaiton sca ta hicha tahni jonibaan jaa chibannishqui hahbetan nihcatsihquibaan. Cuatrocientosbo. Jaabi hihbocatsihqui bi ta rehtexon jaa chibanaibo rihbi jabamacannishqui, jahuabi sca yamanon.
Jaa pecaho ta Galilea janinhax Judas jonishqui jonibo toponpaquehibo tian. Caibo hiohiton bi ta jaa rihbi rehtexon hahbe cahibo rihbi jabamacannishqui.
Jaa copi tah hen mato rahma yohiscai. Jaabo jenenahue, jenebahinquin. Jaabaan bi shinanxon hahcaiya cahen jahuabi jatimahi.
Papa Diosen shinanmaha hahcaiboya cah man jenquetsahaxon bi jato pantetimahi. Dios betanbi man rehtenanai man meramis —jato jaquin.
Nincacax jeenhihcani. Criston raantibo quenamaxon sca rishqui rishquimaxon Jesusen janen yohuanyamascaabo hihxon tahtijaxon jato camascacanquin.
Picohahbo hapobo janinhax jenimacanahi bocani. Criston jonibo copi ta mato tiromajacaniqui. Tenescaibo tah man qui Papan jaiya jenimacani.
Jatihibi neten Papan xoboho yohuanax jaton xoboho rihbi yohuancani. Jesus ta Papan caisai joni qui hihcani. Honanahbo nete tihibi nincamahi tantiyamacani.
Nincacoinaibo caícanahiya sca ta hebreobo qui helenistabo reren rerencanishqui. Nete tihibi piti hinanpaquehibaan jaton yononmabo hinanyamahiya reren rerenscacani.
Nincacoinaibo tsinquimaxon sca Criston raantibaan jato yohiquin: —Non Papan joi yohiquin jenebahinxon piti metexxona ta tiroma qui.
Jaa copi man honanai siri jonibo caisnahue. Siete caisnahue, Dios Yoshiman hihbojahi rahsi. Shinan siriya rahsi caisquin, piti hinanpaqueti tee non jato hinannon.
Noque cah non yocaxonxon Papan joi yohinicabo sca jatihi —jato jacanquin.
—Jascahah ta siri qui —hihxon sca jatihixonbi caiscanquin. Huetsa cahen Esteban, shinanya siri, Dios Yoshiman hihbojahi joni. Huetsa cahen Felipe. Texe cahen Prócoro, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, Nicolas, jaton nahua hihpahonish bi judioni Antioquía janinhah. Jaa rahsi caiscanquin.
Criston raantibo bebon jato nichinxon mehexon jato yocaxoncanquin.
Hashoan sca cahen Papan joi caícanascai. Jerusalen janin nincacoinaibo rihbi hashoan caícanahi. Sacerdotebaan rihbi cahen hichaxon nincacoincanquin.
Hicha Papan shinanyaxon sca Estebanen hihti hahan rahtetibojaquin. Jonibo rohajaquin. Hahan honantijaquin Papan coshiyahpaxon.
Jaatian sca judiobaan Esteban joi bichincanquin. Hinaboma sca hahcaibo, cirenobo, alejandrinobo, Cilicia janinhahbo, Asia janinhahbo. Jaabo rahsichin Esteban joi bichincanquin.
Dios Yoshiman yanapana hashoan honanax Esteban yohuanaiya sca hahbetan yohinanti hahtipahyamacanquin.
Yohinanti hahtipahyamascaxon jonexon coriqui hinanxon caibo sca yohuanmacanquin, quesahahbo hihxon. —Moises qui tiromahi yohuanai tah non jaa nincaquipiqui. Noquen Papa qui tiromahi yohuanai rihbi tah non jaa nincaquipiqui —hihcani quesahi.
Esteban qui sinatax coro corotahbo cahen jonibo rihbi judiobaan coro coromaquin. Jaton hanibo rihbi, huishani honanbo rihbi sinamacanquin. Jaabaan sca Esteban panterenenxon bihxon jaton hapo tsinquitai janin bocanquin.
Quesamisbo sca yohuanmacanquin hahqui yohuanahbo. —Jaa joni ta nea Papan xobo qui tiromahi yohuanihqui. Noquen Moisesnin huishani joi qui rihbi tiromahi yohuani. Tiromahi yohuani ta tantiyamahihqui.
Joxon ta nea xobo Jesus Nazarenon potojaquetanxon noquen hihti quescayamascai non jihuenon Moisesnin joi rihbi huetsajayaxihquiqui hah ta jaipishqui noquen nincanonbi —hihcani.
Jano tsinquitai hapobaan sca Esteban bejisquin sirijaxon jahuen bemanan naihoh queha Papan yonoti bemanan quesca sca jiscanquin jatihixonbi.
—¿Jascama hin? —hahquin quiquin sacerdotenin sca.
Esteban sca yohuani: —Hea huetsabaan, heen papabaan, hea nincanahue. Xaba Hihbo noquen Papa ta noquen xohta Abraham qui cainnishqui, Haran jema janin jihueti cariyamahax, Mesopotamia mai janin jihuetaiya.
Miin mai, miin jenabo rihbi potabahini catanhue, hen mia jismatihi main sca cahi catanhue hah ca noquen xohta janish noquen Papan.
Papan Cahue hahca cahen Caldeo mai potabahinax Haran janin sca jihueti. Jahuen papa mahuatipi pecaho ta neno sca Papan jaa hihuenishqui. Nea main man neno rahma jihuetai mai janinbi ta hihuenishqui.
Jaabi ta nea mai jaa hihbomayamanishqui. Ni huesti tamanehcahinti hihbomayamaquin. Hihbomayamaxon bi hinantijaquin, jahuena hihyaxahnon jahuen baque yamahi que bi jahuen baquebaana, jahuen chini baquebaana rihbi hihyaxahnon jato hinantijaquin.
Jahuen chini baquebo sca jaton nahuabaan main cahiton jaton nahuabaan jato hihbojaxon cuatrocientos bari jato tiromajayaxihqui ta yohirihbinishqui.
Jaabi ta jato hinajahi jonibo hean casticanyaxihqui. Jaatian ta picóscaxon nenoxon sca hehon shinanyaxihcanihqui hih ta Papa janishqui.
Miin baquebo caijaxon jato jano jihueti hinanah ta heen jonibo hihyaxihcanihqui hea nincacoinaibo hah ta Papan janishqui, Abraham yohiquin. Jaabo honantiyahpabo jayaxahnon hihxon sca ta Honantiyahpa jahue Papan jaa janishqui. Jaa pecaho ta Abrahanen baquejanishqui. Jahuen baquexo Isaaque cainipi huesti semanan huinoxon ta jahuen ocho neten sca Abrahanen jaa jahuen baquexo honantijanishqui. Isaaquen baque sca ta Jacobo janeya janishqui. Jacobonen baquebo rihbi sca ta noquen doce xohtabo janishqui, noquen xenibo.
José qui notsi notsixon ta noquen xenibaan jaa maromaxon hinancannishqui, Egipto mai janin bohábo.
Jaabi ta noquen Papa Dios hahbetanbi nihxon jan yomanahyamascanon yomanahtai tihibi jaa yanapannishqui. Egipto mai janin quiquin hapon José siri joni hihqui shinannon ta José honan joni hihqui jismanishqui. Quiquin hapon sca ta Egipto mai jatihobi jaa José hihbomanishqui. Jahuen xobo hihbomaxon, jahuen xoboho jihuetaibo rihbi jatihibi hihbomaquin.
Jaatian ta Egipto mai janin Canaan mai janin rihbi jahuenbi piti yamascaiya pihan hihcannishqui. Hihti hohmis hohmiscani. Piti merayamabirescanquin noquen xenibaan.
Egipto mai janin tsinquinihbo bimi bero tsama jai joi nincaxon ta Jacobonen noquen xenibo raannishqui marohi cahábo.
Jato raanhohxon raanrihbiquin. Jaatian pari ta Hea tah hen qui, Josepan jahuen huetsabo janishqui. Jaatian pari ta Tsoabo Josepan jenabo quin jaa mai meha quiquin hapon honanscanishqui.
Jahuen huetsabo raanxon cahen jahuen papa Jacobo, jahuen jenabo jatihibi Josepan quenamaquin jano bohábo setenta y cinco jonibo.
Jahuen baquen quenamaha sca Egipto main Jacobo cahi. Canish cahen janohaxbi mahuati. Noquen xenibo rihbi yosibohax janohaxbi mahuati.
Mahuataiton cahen Siquem janin jato boxon jano Abrahanen jahuen coriquinin maroni jano tsahonti main sca jato tsahoncanquin Siquem janinbi. Hamoren baquebo jan maronni tsahon janinbi.
Papan Abraham yohini quesca sca jaonahiya ta Egipto janin noquen caibo caípahonishqui. Hichascai, jaabo.
Huetsa quiquin hapo sca ta jaresscanishqui, José honannihma joni sca.
Jaan cahen noquen caibo paranxon jato tiromajaquin. Jaton baquexobo mahuanon hihxon jato nihi naman potabahinmaquin.
Jaatian ta Moises baquexo jahuen maman bihnishqui. Noquen Papa Diosen jisí, baquexo siri pishca. Quimisha hoxne xobohoxon jaa coirancanquin jahuen papan jahuen maman.
Tahua naman sca jonebahinscacanquin. Jano racanahbo sca jaton quiquin hapon baque haibaan jaa meraquin. Meraxon cahen jahuen baquebi hahcajascaquin hanijaquin.
Haniscaiton cahen Egiptobaan quirica jatihibi jaa honanmacanquin. Haniscaxon hicha honanquin. Jan hahcai hochoxon joi nincacanquin.
Cuarenta bari jaresscaxon ta jahuen huetsabo pasijahi cati shinannishqui jahuen caibo pasijacatsihquin.
Jahuen caibo tiromajahiton egipto joni meraxon cahen jahuen caibo yanapanquin. Jaa tiromajahi joni copiquin rehtequin.
Noque piconon Papan yanapanai joni tah qui hih ta hea yohihi janoxihcanihqui hihqui shinamehti. Hihcax bi jascayamahi.
Hoxashinahax mohiyahxon sca noquen caibo rabe sinacananaiton meraxon cahen jato sina tantimacatsihquin yohiquin: ¿Jahua jenquetsahin man maton huetsabo betanbi tiromahananain? jato jaquin.
Jascahah bi jahuen caibo tiromajahi jonin sca Moises hueranbohanxon: ¿Tsoan yohihah min noquen hapo jacatsihquin? ¿Noque pontenica hihnon tsoan mia yohihiquin?
¿Hoa egipto joni min hahquipi quescajaquin min hea rihbi sca rehtecatsihquin? hahquin.
Jascarai nincacax ta Moises jabascanishqui. Madian mai janin sca jahuen nahua tocan jihuexon rabe baquejaquin.
Cuarenta bari huinorihbi sca jaiya ta Sinaí nihi namanxon sca jihui naman tiha pishca mapohihcamahi janin Papan yonoti jisnishqui.
Jascapa merahax rahteti. Jisquin sirijacatsihquish ta hochoma pishca caxon noquen Hihbo yohuanai nincanishqui.
Hea tah hen miin papabaan Papa Dios qui. Abraham, Isaaque, Jacobo jaton Papa Dios ta hea qui hihqui nincaquin. Nincacax tastahihqui. Jisti raquescai.
Noquen Hihbo sca yohuanrihbihi: Hea janin tah min nichi. Miin tahe xaca potascahue.
Egipto janin heen jonibo hohmis hohmisai tah hen jisi. Jaabo sai saihihcanahi tah hen nincacai. Jaa copi tah hen jato picohi sca botopaquetai. Johue hihcahisen hen mia Egipto mai janin raannon hahquin.
Egipto janin jihuetahbaiton, Tsoan yohihah min noquen hapo jacatsihquin, pontenica mia hihnon tsoan mia yohihiquin hah jaabaan Moises janí que bi ta jaamama jaabi Papan raannishqui jaton hapo sca hihnon. Jato piconica sca hihnon raanquin. Naman tiha jihui mapohi janin jahuen yonoti raanxon ta Papan jascajaxon Moises sca raannishqui.
Egipto mai janinxon sca cahen hahan rahtetibojaxon hahan honantibojaxon rihbi Moisesnin jato picoquin. Hian Joshini janinxon rihbi jascajaquin. Nihi namanxon sca cuarenta bari rihbi jascajaribiquin hahan rahtetibojaquin. Hahan honantibojaribiquin.
Jaa Moisesnin ta noque israeli baquebo yohinishqui: Mato tocan ta hea quescapa jahuen joi yohinica Papan cainmatihiqui maton huetsabo janinhahbi, hahquin.
Jaa Moises ta noquen caibo xenibo tsinquitai tocan nihnishqui. Papan naihoh queha yonoti betan ta nihnishqui. Sinaí mahchi janin rihbi ta Papan yonoti betan yohuannishqui. Noquen xenibo betan yohuanni Papan yonoti betan rihbi ta jaa nihnishqui. Hahan jihueti joi ta Papan jaa hinannishqui, mato sca jaan rihbi nincamanon hihxon.
Jaabi ta noquen xenibaan nincacatsihyamanishqui. Jaa potabahinxon cahen jaton jointinin Egipto shinanrihbicanquin.
Aaron sca yohicanquin: ¿Hoa Moises, Egipto mai janinhah noque picoho Moises, jahuen cahipishquin? Non tah non honanyamahi. Noque bebon jaabo sca canon santobo noque hahxonhue jaabo sca noquen diosbo hihnon hahcanquin.
Jascajaxon toro quescapa santojacanquin. Jascajaxon jaton hinábo jaa santo rehtexoncanquin. Jaton mequemanbi jascapahahax hahan jenimacani.
Jaa copi ta noquen Papan jato potabahinnishqui. Jahuen joi yohinicabaan huishaxon yohini quescajaquin jato potabahinquin, huishi, bari, jaabo jaton dios sca hihnon. ¿Man cuarenta bari nihi namanxon hinábo rehtexonxon hea mapojaxonpahonihquin; israeli baquebaan?
Hea queenyamaxon tah man Moloquen chopa xobo bihniqui. Huishi rihbi tah man chibanpahonihqui, Renfan janeya maton dios jai quen. Santojarihbi tah man janiqui jaa sca yocanoxon. Jaa copi tah hen Babilonia hoque tocan mato potatihi hah ta Papan jato janishqui jahuen joi yohinicabo huishamaxon.
Noquen Papan jato yohini jahan honanti chopa xobo ta noquen xenibo tocan janishqui jaabo nihi naman nihnípahoni tian. Hen mia jismaha quescapahahue hahxon ta Papan Moises yohinishqui jascajaquin jan jaa xobojanon. Jaa copi ta Papan Moises jismani quescapajanishqui.
Josué betan noquen papabaan jaton mai hihbojanon sca ta neno jihuepahoni nahuabo Papan camaxonnishqui jaton mai bichinahbo. Jan camaxona ta Papan chopa xoboyabi becannishqui nea mai hihbojahi sca. David quiquin hapo hihnon caman ta jaa xobo janishqui.
Jaa David cahen Papan jisquin siri joni. Jascapahxon ta Papa Dios xobojaxoncatsihxon Davidinin noquen Papa yocanishqui, jahuen xohta Jacobo yamanicaton Papa Dios.
Queenxon bi ta Davidinin jaa xobojayamanishqui. Salomonen ta jaa hahnishqui.
Jascapa xobo jai bi ta mequeman xobojahibo janin Xaba Hihbo jihueyamahihqui. Papan joi yohinica yohuanni quescari tah qui:
Nai ta heen tsahoti qui. Mai ta heen taracahti qui. Jatihibi janin ta hea jai. ¿Jenquetsahpa xoboja sca min hea jaxontihin? ¿Hea jano hihti jahua jaiquin?
¿Hoa jatihibi hean hahyamaniquin? hih ta noquen Hihbo jaiqui hih ta Papan joi janin jaiqui.
Nincayosmabon, Papan baquebo hihqui shinanax bi tah man jahuen nahuabo res qui. Maton jointinin shinanxon maton pabinquinin nincaxon bi tah man Papa nincayamabiresai. Dios Yoshin tah man jaapantehi, mato jahuen shinan hinanpanan. Maton xenibo janí quescarihbi sca tah man jai.
Papan joi yohinicabo jatihibi ta maton papabaan tiromajacannishqui. Papan ponte joni joyaxihqui yohihibo rihbi ta rehtecannishqui. Maton sca tah man jaa jahuen ponte joni paranxon rehtehohqui.
Hahan jihueti joi Papan yonotinin mato hinanni que bi tah man bihníxon bi nincayamabiresai —jato jaquin Estebanen.
Jascajaquin yohihah cahen sina sinacani. Sinaxon xeta yeres yeresahcanquin.
Jaatian sca Dios Yoshiman hihbojaha jaan nai bejisihniquin. Bejisihnixon cahen Papan xaba jisquin. Papa mecayaho Jesus nichi rihbi jisquin.
—Jisnahue. Nai quehpemehtai tah hen jisi. Papa mecayaho noquebaque nichi tah hen jisi —jato jaquin.
Jascahah bi coshin sai saihihscacani. Mequeman pabepobahini caxon jaa xecotancanquin.
Jemama qui sca boxon macaman tsacacanquin. Jato betan nichi bebo cahen jano jai, Saulo janeya, beronan tahni. Jaan coiranxonnon hihxon jaton chopa pecaxon jaa taracanxon Esteban tsacacanquin rehtenoxon.
Macaman tsaca tsacahibaan bi: —Heen yoshin bihhue, heen Hihbo Jesusen —hahquin Estebanen.
Jascajahax raboxonen nichish coshin sca yohuani: —Hea nescajahax hohchataibaan bi jato casticanyamahue, Hihbon —hihqui. Jascahax cahen mahuascai.
Saulo rihbi cahen jaa mahuati queeni. Jaatianbi ta Jerusalen janinxon noquen huetsabo tiromajamenocannishqui hihti tiromajaquin. Tiromajahahbo jatihibi jabisi. Judea maibo janin, Samaria maibo janin rihbi jabiscani. Criston raantibo res jabayamahi.
Papahon shinanaibaan ta hihti huinixon Esteban tsahonnishqui.
Hoa Saulonen ta noquen huetsabo potojaquetannishqui. Jaton xoboboho hihquicahinxon cahen jato bihquin. Bebobo, haibobo rihbi coshin bi res boxon sipo xoboho jato tsahonquin.
Jabisipibaan sca Papan joi yohibonaquin jaabo jano cahiton.
Samaria jema janin caxon ta Felipenin jato Cristo joi yohibonanishqui.
Jan yohihi nincaxon cahen jan hahan honantibojahi jisxon huesti shinanyaxon nincacoincanquin hahqui tsamajaquetaibaan.
Jaan yohihah ta hicha tiroma yoshinyahpabo janinhax tiroma yoshinbo coshin sai saihihquish piconishqui. Yora honanyamajaquetaibo betan chantobo hihti caibo rihbi rohacahini.
Jaa copi ta jaa jema janinhahbo hihti jenimanishqui.
Felipe nocorihyamahiya cahen jaa jema janin huesti joni janish, Simon janeya. Jahuen yobepan hahxon cahen Samaria mai mehabo rahtehax, Hea tah hen coshi joni qui hihcachihi.
Jaa yobe yohuanaiya ta jatihixonbi nincacanpahonishqui. Jaton jonibaan, jaton patorobaan, jatihibichin nincaquin. Nea joni ta Diosen coshi qui, jahuen hihti coshi hahcaibo, hahcanquin.
Jahuen yobepan basi jan jato rahte rahtepahoni copi jaan yohihah nincacanquin.
Jaabi Papan jato jihuemayaxihqui joi siri Felipenin yohihah nincacoincanquin. Jesucristo joi siri yohihah nincacoinaiton Felipenin jato nashimaquin, haibobo, bebobo rihbi.
Simoman rihbi sca nincaquin. Felipenin nashimaha Felipe manati sca hahbetanbi nichi. Hahan honantibo Felipenin hahcai, jan Papan coshiyaxon tsoan jascajani que ma bi hihti coshin hahcai jisish Simon rahte rahtescai.
Samaria mai mehabaan Papan joi bihcoinai honanscaxon cahen Jerusalen janinxon Criston raantibaan Pedro betan Juan jato qui raanquin.
Raanahbo cahax nocoxon sca Dios Yoshin bichibo hihxon jato yocaxonquin.
Jesusen jane huestichin Felipenin jato nashimahi quen ta Dios Yoshin jato qui botopaquerihyamanishqui. Jaa copi cahen jato yocaxoncanquin.
Yocaxonxon mehehah Dios Yoshin bihresscacanquin.
Criston raantibaan mehehah Dios Yoshin bichibo jisxon Simon jato coriqui hinancatsihscai.
—Hea rihbi jascajati hahtipahmanahue, hean mehehahbaan sca Dios Yoshin bihnon —jato jaquin.
Pedronen sca: —¿Papan hinanresai jahuen yoshin min coriquinin maroti shinanain? Miin coriquiyabi mia queyoyaxihnon.
Min tah min jahuabi bihtimahi. Jahuabi tah min bihyamayaxihqui. Papan jisí ta miin jointi tiromah qui.
Min tiromajaquin shinanai pontescahue. Hihbo yocahue, min tiromajati shinanai jan sohuanon.
Jointi mocapaiya mia notsi notsihi jihuetai tah hen jisi, hohchapan hiná tah hen mia jisi —hahquin Pedronen.
—Maton caya hea yocaxonnahue man hea yohihi quesca jayamanon —hahquin Simoman.
Jaatian sca jaabaan jisobo yohixon noquen Hihbaan joi siri rihbi yohihax Jerusalen janin cahi caribihi. Samaritanobaan jemabo janin joi siri yohibonahi bocani.
Noquen Hihbaan yonotinin sca ta Felipe yohinishqui: —Caresscahue. Jerusalen janinhax Gaza janin cahi bahin picoti catanhue chiponqui —hahquin. Jaa bahin cahen tsoabi jihueyamahan.
Caresscaax jano sca cahi. Picoti cahi jisí bi Jerusalen janin Papahon shinantanipish Etiopía joni jaa bahin jahui. Jaa cahen hapo. Etiopíabaan quiquin haibo hapon coriqui coirannicah. Jahuen hapon jane cahen Candace.
Isaíasnen huishani joi jisanan jahuen taramehtinin tsahotax cabachonen ninihah taramehquirani jahui.
Dios Yoshiman sca Felipe yohiquin: —Behchitanhue. Jahuen taramehti janin nanetanhue —hahquin.
Bishquihihcanahi caxon sca Isaías janeya Papan joi yohinicaton huishani joi jisish jaa yohuanhonahi nincaquin. Nincaxon yocascaquin: —¿Min jisi joi min honanain? —hahquin.
—¿Jenquetsahaxon hen honantihin, huetsan hea yanapanyamahiya? Hea patax tsahoti nanehue —hahquin.
Jan jisbenahi huishani joi ta nea qui: Carnero rehtenoxon hiohah bi neteresai quescarihbihi ta jahua hihyamahiqui. Jahuen rani rahmaxcorohah bi carnero baque sai saihihyamabiresai quescarihbihi ta yohuanyamahihqui.
Jaa rabinmaxon ta pontejayamaquin casticancaniqui. Rehteres ta Tsoa jahuen xohtabo quin hih tsoabi jayamascanon hihqui jaa quirica.
Jaatian: —¿Yohinica jascarai tsoa yohihiquin? ¿Jaabi nan? ¿Huetsa joni nan? Hea yohirohahue —Felipe yocaquin.
Jaatian sca jaa quiricaya yohuanxon Jesusen joi siri Felipenin yohiquin.
Bahin taramehcanahi cahax jano hian jaiton sca nococani. —Jise. Jano ta jene jaiqui. ¿Jenquetsahpahi min hea nashimatimahin, Jesusen joni sca hea hihnon? —Felipe yocaquin.
—Miin jointiboyaxonbi nincacoinaiton tah hen mia nashimatihi —hahscaquin Felipenin. —Jesucristo ta Papa Diosen baque qui. Hen tah hen shinancoinai —hahquin.
Jahuen taramehti janobi racarenennon cahen cabacho rebinica yohiscaquin. Jaton taramehti racarenenaiya cahen bototax rabebi jene nenichi, Felipe betan jaa Etiopía hapo. Janoxon sca cahen Felipenin jaa hihquimatanquin nashimaquin.
Jaabo mapescaiya bi Dios Yoshiman Felipe bihinihniquin. Felipe jisyamascaax bi jaa huesti sca jenimahanan sca caresscaribihi.
Azoto jema janin sca sanarenenxon ta jano jai jemabo janin sca joi siri Felipenin yohibonanishqui, Cesarea jema janin noconoxon caman.
Jasca Felipe jai bi cahen noquen Hihbo qui hinamehtaibo tahtijaxon, Hen tah hen mato rehtetihi, Saulonen jato jaquin. Jato tahtijahax quiquin sacerdote janin cahi.
Caxon, yocaquin: Jayaxon joni bihti quirica hea hinanhue hahquin. Jascajaxon cahen Damasco jema janin tsinquitai judiobo qui hinanti quirica huishamaquin. Criston joi bichibo meraxon jato nexaxon jaa quiricayaxon Jerusalen janin bebobo, haibobo rihbi hionoxon jascapa quirica huishamaquin.
Huishamahax jaya cahi. Damasco qui nocoti hochoma nichibo sca naihoh quehax xabacahinai xabapan jato xabajaquin.
Main paquerenenxon sca yohuanai joi nincaquin. —Saulon, Saulon. ¿Jahua copi min hea tiromajacatsihquin chibanain?
—¿Tsoa min quin, Hihbon? —hahscaquin. —Hea ta Jesus qui, hea tiromajacatsihquin min hea chibanai.
Huenihue. Jema janin catanhue. Jahueja min jatihin, jano ta mia yohinoxihcanihqui —hahquin.
Yohuanai nincaxon bi jahuabi jisyamahax hahbe nichibo rahtetax nihreneni.
Main racatax huenicahuanxon jahuen bero rahcoyamaquin bi Saulonen jahuabi jisti hahtipahyamascaquin. Jisyamahiton sca hahbe nichibaan mehuexon Damasco jema janin sca hioquin.
Quimisha neten sca jano hihqui. Jahuabi jisyamascaquin. Jahua piyamaquin. Xehayamarihbiquin.
Jaa Damasco jema janin cahen Criston joni jai, Ananías janeya. Jaan cahen namaquen noquen Hihbaan quenahi nincaquin: —Ananin. —Neno tah hen qui, Hihbon —hihscai.
—Huenihue. Derecha janeya bahin caxon Judasen xoboho Tarso janinha joni benatanhue, Saulo janeya. Hea ta yocaquihqui.
Namaquen jismahah ta miin janeya joni jisishqui. Jahuen xoboho hihquixon jahuen bero sirinon hihxon jaa mehehi ta namaquen jisishqui —hihscai noquen Hihbo.
—Jerusalen janinxon noquen huetsabo jan hicha tiromajahi tah hen hichaxon yohihi nincarahsihi, Hihbon.
Neno sca roqui sacerdote hapobaan quiricaya jahui, mia yocacaibo rahsi bichí —hihqui Ananías.
—Jaabi cahue. Hen caisax jaya teeti tah qui. Huetsa jonibo, quiquin hapobo, israeli baquebo rihbi jan heen jane jato nincamanon hihxon tah hen jaa caisai.
Hea copi jan hihti teneyaxihquibo tah hen jaa jismayaxihqui —hihqui noquen Hihbo.
Jascahah caresscai Ananías. Jaa xoboho hihcoxon mehexon yohiquin: —Heen huetsa Saulon, min hahan jahui bahin mihqui cainipixon ta noquen Hihbo Jesusen hea raanihqui, miin bero siriscanon. Dios Yoshiman rihbi mia hihbojanon —hahquin.
Jaatianbi jahuen bero janinhax poto quescapa romishin pototani. Jahuen bero siricahinscaax hueniti. Hueniscaiton cahen Ananíasnen nashimaquin.
Pihax Saulo tantiscai. Damasco janinha Criston jonibo betan sca basima tahni jihueti, jahuentihi nete rah.
Jaatian sca judiobo tsinquiti xoboboho mapecanaxon jaan jato yohibonaquin, Jesus ta Papa Diosen baque qui, hahbonaquin Saulonen.
Jaa nincacaibo rahsi rahte rahteti. —¿Jesusya yohuanaibo rahsi neatohon Jerusalen janinxon tiromajayamarahsihiquin? ¿Jato tiromajanoxon neno joyamahipishquin? ¿Jato nexaxon sacerdote hapobo qui hiohi joyamahipishquin? —hihcani.
Jaabo jascarai bi Saulo coshihi. Nete tihibi hashoan coshicanaxon Damasco janinha judiobo netemaquin. Jesus ta Papan caisai joni qui hihxon Papan huishamani joi yohiquin jato honanmaquin.
Basiscaxon cahen jaa rehteti judiobaan shinanscaquin.
Rehtenoxon bariyahpan yame rihbi jahuen xobo xehqui quexecanquin. Mia ta rehtecatsihcanihqui Saulon, hahscaquin caibaan.
Criston jonibaan sca yame jema macan chique huinomaxon tasa qui Saulo nanexon botonpaquecanquin catannon.
Botonahbo cahi Jerusalen janin nocoti. Criston jonibo janin hihquicatsihqui bi raquecani jatihibi. Criston joni hihqui shinanyamacanquin.
Mapemacatsihyamahiboya cahen Bernabé janeya jonin sca Criston raantibo janin Saulo hioquin. Hiohah bahinxonbi noquen Hihbo jisxon jan nincaquipi jato yohiquin. Damasco janinxon jan raquexonma Jesusen joi siri yohirahsihi jato yohiquin.
Jato betan sca jihuexon Jerusalen janin jato pasijapaquexon raquexonma noquen Hihbaan joi siri yohiquin.
Judiohax bi griego joi yohuanaibo judiobo sca huetsayohuani. Joi bichincatsihquibaan bi: —Jascama ta qui —jato jaquin. Jaabaan rihbi jaa rehtecatsihscai.
Rehtecatsihquibo honanxon noquen huetsabaan Cesarea janin sca Saulo hioquin. Janohax sca Tarso jema janin canon raancanquin.
Jaatian jatihibi janin siripih sca jihuecani; Judea main, Galilea main, Samaria main rihbi noquen huetsabo siripi jihuescai. Coshijaquecani. Noquen Hihbo qui hohchati qui raqueti jihueti. Dios Yoshiman rihbi jato sirijaquin shinanmaquin.
Jato tocan ta jatihibi janin Pedro nih nipahonishqui. Lida janin jihuetai Papan baquebo qui nocorihbihi.
Jano cahen Eneas janeya joni meraquin. Ocho bari yora honanyamajaquetax jahuen racatinin racatai meraquin.
—Enin, Jesucriston ta mia rohajahiqui. Huenixon miin cacajati bihhue —hahquin Pedronen. Yohihah cahen hueniscai.
Jaa jisxon ta Lida jema janin jihuetaibo Cristo qui hinamehnishqui jatihibi. Saron jema janin jihuetai jatihibi rihbi Cristo qui hinamehti nincacoinax.
Jaatian ta Jope jema janin rihbi Criston joni janishqui, haibo. Tabita jahuen jane. Tabita ta chaxo hihcatsihquiqui. Jaa haibaan ta caibo siribojaxonpahonishqui hicha. Jato yanapanquin jatohon shinanxon.
Jascapahax bi hisinax mahuati. Mahuascai bi nashimaxon bochiquiha tapon racancanquin xoboho.
Jope ta Lida hochoma qui. Lida janin Pedro jai honanxon cahen Noque janin histon jorihue yohihi canon, Criston jonibaan rabe joni raanquin.
Yohihahbo cahen jato betan Pedro cahi caresscai. Nocotaiton jano haibo racanahbo chique janin Pedro hiocanquin bochiquiha tapo janin. Jano yononmabo rahsi tsahoti mayacahuani. Huinihi tsahocani. Cotonbo, sahuetibo jan jihueparixon jato quehxexonrasihi jismahi tsahocani.
Jato jatihibi picomaxon raboxonen nihxon Papa yocaxonquin Pedronen. Yocaxonxon mahuatah haibo jisxon sca: —Tabitan, huenihue —hahquin. Jascahah jahuen bero peehahtanxon Pedro jisish tsahohihnascai.
Tsahoscai bi mehuetanxon Pedronen huenihihniquin. Papan baquebo quenaxon yononmabo rihbi quenaxon teehihqui jato jismaquin.
Jan jascajaha Jope janin jihuetaibo jatihibi yohiscacanquin. Nincaxon hichaxon nincacoinax noquen Hihbo qui hinamehti.
Basi tahni sca Jope janin Pedro jihueti, Simoman xoboho. Simon ta yohina bichi poconica hihpahonishqui sapatojatijaquin.
Cesarea jema janin ta sontaro hapo japahonishqui Cornelio janeya. Cien sontaroboyahpa hapo. Italiano hahcaibo cahen jahuen sontarobo.
Jaa sontaro hapo cahen Papahon shinanai joni. Jahuen xoboho jihuetaibo jatihibi hahbetan Papa qui hohchati qui raqueti. Jema janin jahuajomabo coriqui hinanresquin. Papa Dios jaayocaquin.
Bari racapaquescaiya cahen Papan yonoti hahqui nocoti jahui jisquin namaquen jisijaquin. —Cornelion —hahquin Papan yonotinin.
Jaa jisish hihti raquetax: —¿Jahua min queenain, Hihbon? —hihscai. —Min yocaxonai ta Papan nincaquihqui. Min joni huetsa yanapannoxon coriqui hinanresai ta shinanihqui.
Jope janin canon jonibo raanscahue, jano jai Simon neno hihuehahbo. Jahuen jane huetsa ta Pedro qui.
Huetsa Simoman xoboho ta jihuetihqui, yohina bichi poconicaton xoboho, quebijistima hian quexabi —hahquin Papan yonotinin.
Papan yonoti yamacahinscaiya rabe jahuen hahxontibo quenaxon Papahon shinanai sontaro rihbi quenaquin jahuen xobohoxon teexonai jahuen sontaro.
Jan rahma jisibi jato yohixon Jope janin jato raanscaquin.
Raanah becani. Nichish bahin hihshinahax mohiyahtax nihnichi jema hochoma sca jaabo jahuiya jaa xobo champani pemacanyaxon Papa yocaqui Pedro mapeti barin manan tsacahiya.
Pihan hihquish picatsihscai bi cahen xobohoxon pitijaquin janquenjariyamacanquin. Jaatian namaquen jisijaquin jisquin.
Nai quehpemehtai jisquin. Hani sábana quescapa hoquen panexbehcoinxon main caman botonai jisquin.
Jaa chicho cahen jatihibi yohinahbo main ninotaibo rihbi, hihsabo rihbi jai.
—Huenihue, Pedron. Rehtexon pihue —hihqui nincascaquin.
—Hen tah hen pitimahi, Hihbon. Jahuentianbi tah hen rishtayabo piyamaniqui, pitimabo —hahquin.
Yohuanai nincarihbiquin: —Siri sca ta qui Papa jaiya tah min tiroma ta qui hih min jatimahi —hihqui.
Quimisha coti jascahahnani. Jaatian jisi bi naihohxon sábana bihinihnirihbiquin.
Jan namaquen jisibi jahua jenquetsi jascarihquin hihxon shinanscaquin. Shinan shinanaiya bi Cornelionen raanipibo xehqui janin nocoscai. Simoman xobo yocacahcani.
—¿Simon Pedro hahcaibo neno jihueyamahiquin? —hihcani yocacahti.
Jan jisíbo Pedronen shinanparihi bi Dios Yoshiman yohiquin:
—Hoa ta mia benahi jahuibo qui. Huenihue tahca. Bototax basihaxma jato betan caresscatanhue. Hean horixon raanah ta becanihqui —hahquin.
Botoxon sca: —Hea tah hen man benahi joni qui. ¿Jahua queenax man jahuin? —jato jaquin.
—Noquen hapo ta Cornelio qui, cien sontaroboyahpa. Sirijaquin shinanai joni tah qui. Noquen Papahon shinanai. Jatihibi judiobo ta jahan jenimahiqui. Jaa ta Papan yonotinin yohihipishqui, Jonibo raanhue, hahquin. Mian yohihi joi jan nincanon hihquish tah non mia bichi jahui jahuen xoboho min catannon —hahcanquin.
—Mapenahue —hahxon sca jano jato hoxamashinaquin. Hoxashinahax mohiyahtax sca jato betan caresscai. Caibo Jope janinha noquen huetsabo rihbi ta jaa manahi bocanishqui.
Nihbahinahipish huetsa neten sca Cesarea janin nococani. Pedro nocoti manahahnan jahuen jenabo jatihibi quenamaxon, jahuen hahbe rabeti siribo rihbi Cornelionen jato quenamaquin.
Pedro mapescaiya cahen behchihi cahax jahuen tahe naman betihihpaqueti.
Jaa hueniquin Pedronen yohiquin: —Huenihue. Hea rihbi tah hen mia quescapa joni qui —hahquin.
Jaa yohuanquinhanan xoboho hihcoxon hicha jonibo nocohihnascai meraquin.
Jato meraxon: —Nahuabo pasijatima joi ta noque judiobo jai. Nahuabaan xoboho mapetima joi cahen noque jai. Jaa cah man honanai. Jaabi ta Papan hea jismahipishqui, mehetima rishtayahi hen tsoabi jayamanon. Jato yohuanquihnax noque rishtaya jai ta tsoabi yamahihqui. Hen honannon hihxon ta Papan hea jismahipishqui.
Jaa copi tah hen joresscai, Caresscatanhue Papan hea jaáh. Hea yohiscanahue tahcah. ¿Jahua copi man hea quenamahipiquin? —jato jaquin.
Cornelio sca yohuani: —Chosco nete sca nescaran bari racapaque sca jaiya tah hen heen xobohoxon Papa yocaxon pehneni chopaya joni hea bebon sanarenenai hean jisipiqui.
Hea ta yohihipishqui: Cornelion, min yocaxonai ta Papan nincaquihqui. Min joni huetsa yanapannoxon coriqui hinanresai ta shinanihqui.
Jope janin jonibo raanscahue, Simon Pedro hahcaibo quenamaquin. Yohina bichi poconica Simoman xoboho ta jihuetihqui, quebijistima hian quexabi, hah ta hea jaipishqui.
Jaatianbi tah hen mia quenamanoxon raanipiqui. Jahuerohahi tah min nocoscai. Neno tah non noquen Papan noque jisiya noque tsinquitai, noquen Hihbaan mia yohihi joi nincacatsihqui —hahquin.
Pedronen sca jato yohiquin: —Rahma tah hen honancoinscai. Papan ta caibo mentan huetsabo hashoan siri jisyamahiqui.
Papahon shinanxon ponte hahcai nahuabo ta Papan siri jisiqui. Hen tah hen honancoinscai.
Noque israeli baquebo qui ta jahuen joi raannishqui. Jatihibi jonibaan Hihbo hihxon ta Papan rahuiboma sca noque janon Jesucristonen noque hihbojahiqui.
¿Judea mai jatihobi janin jahua jahoxquin? Man tah man honanai. Galilea mai mehax ta joi behna jamenonishqui, Juaman yohixon nashimahipi pecaho.
Nazaret janinha Jesus ta Papan caisai joni qui, non honannon hihxon sca ta jahuen Yoshin siri Papan jaa hinannishqui, jahuen coshi rihbi hinanquin. Papan yanapana sca ta jonibo sirijabonahi nihninishqui, tiroma yoshiman hihbojaha jonibo rihbi jato jatihibi sirijabonaquin. Man tah man honanscai.
Neno noquen judiobaan mainxon jan hahpahoni, Jerusalen jema janinxonbi rihbi jan hahpahoni jatihibi tah non jisnixon yohinica qui. Jihuin hueonxon rehtehibo rihbi jisoxon tah non yohihi.
Jan hihquipi jahuen quimisha neten sca Papan huenirihbixon jisíbo hihxon noque qui cainmahi jisoxon tah non yohirihbihi.
Jan hihquipish bi hahquirihbi teehihquipi non hahbetan pixon xehacahchihi ta Papan noque caisoxqui, Cristo jihuerihbiscai joi yohihibo sca noque janon. Jatihibichin jisnon hihxonma bi noque jan caisaibaan jisnon hihxon ta noque janin jaa cainmahoxqui.
Jahuen joi siri non jonibo yohinon ta noque yohihoxqui. Jihuetaibo betan mahuanihbo jan siri hin tiroma quin hihxon jisnon hihxon ta Papan jaa yohinishqui. Jaa joi rihbi non yohinon ta noque yohihoxqui.
Cristo nincacoinai jonibo jatihibi ta jaan jaton hohcha sohuaxoniqui. Jatihibi Papan joi yohinicabo ta jascari yohuannishqui —jato jaquin.
Jascari Pedro yohuanparihi bi nincacaibo jatihibi Dios Yoshiman hihbojaquin.
Judioxon bi nincacoinaibo Pedro betan jahuex rahtescai. Jaton nahuabo que bi Dios Yoshiman jato hihbojahi jisish rahtecani.
Huetsapahi yohuanai jato nincacanquin. Papa Dios qui jaabo hihti siripi yohuanai nincacax rahte rahtecani. Jato sca Pedronen yohiquin:
—Non haho quescajaribiquin ta neabaan Dios Yoshin bichiqui. Non jato nashimanon. Tsoanbi ta Jato nashimayamanahue noque jatimahiqui —Pedronen jato jaquin.
Jascajaxon Jesucriston janen jato nashimanon Pedronen yohiquin. Nashimaha sca: —Huetsa neten cayanoxon noque qui banetahhue —Pedro jacanquin.
Jaa pecaho cahen Judea mainxon Criston raantibo betan janoha noquen huetsabaan nincaquin. Jaton nahuabaan rihbi Papan joi bichipi nincaquin.
Jerusalen janin nocotaiton sca Pedro pontecatsihquin, Jato honantijati ta jaiqui hihnicabaan Pedro yocaquin:
—¿Jahua jenquetsahin min noquen nahuabo janin hihcohipiquin? ¿Jahua jenquetsahin min jato betanbi pihipiquin? —hahcanquin.
Jan jisipibo sca Pedronen jato yohiquin sirijaquin:
—Jope jema janinxon noquen Papa yocaxon tah hen namaquen jisijaquin hihtihosi sábana quescapa jisipiqui, hoquen panexbehcoinxon naihohxon botonai. Hea bebonbi ta botonipishqui.
Jisquin sirijaxon tah hen yohinahbo, nami pinicahbo, ninotaibo, hihsabo rihbi jisipiqui.
Yohuanai sca hean nincaquin, Huenihue, Pedron, rehtexon pihue, hea jaquin.
Hen tah hen jascajatimahi, Hihbon, jahuentianbi tah hen pitimabo rishtayabo piyamaniqui, hahquin hean.
Jaabi hahquirihbi naihoh quehax yohuani, Siri sca ta qui Papa jaiya tah min tiroma ta qui min jatimahi, hihqui.
Quimisha coti non jascahahnanai bi naihohxon jatihibi hahquirihbi ninihihniquin.
Jaatianbi ta noque jano hihqui xobon quimisha joni nocotipishqui Cesarea jemanxon raanipi.
Nahua tah qui hihquishma hen jato betan catannon ta Dios Yoshiman hea yohihipishqui. Nea seis noquen huetsabo rihbi ta hea manahi bohipicanaxqui. Jahuen xoboho tah non hihcohipiqui.
Jaan ta noque yohihipishqui. Jan jisi bi jahuen xoboho nichi Papan yonoti jahui. Nihrenenxon cahen Jope janin joni raanhue Simon Pedro hahcaibo hihuenon, hahquin.
Hahan mia Papan teehihmahi joi ta mia yohixihquiqui miin xoboho jihuetaiboyabi, hah ta Papan yonotinin jaa jaipishqui.
Hean jato yohimenohiya bi ta Dios Yoshiman jato hihbojahipishqui non yohimenohi tian jan noque hihbojaho quescajaribiquin.
Jaatian tah hen noquen Hihbaan noque yohini joi shinanscaipiqui, Juaman jenen nashimahi bi tah hen jenen nashimaquin hahcajaquin mato Dios Yoshin hinanyaxihqui, hah jan noque janí tah hen shinanscaipiqui.
Noquen Hihbo Jesucristo nincacoinaiton Papan noque hinanho Yoshin jato rihbi jan hinanaiya ¿jahua hihxon hen Jascajayamahue Papan hen jatihin? —jato jaquin.
Nincacax netecani. Papa qui sca siripi yohuancani: —Nahuabo rihbi ta shinan pontemaxon jato teehihmahihqui, hicahisen —hihcani.
Hoa Esteban rehtexon jato tiromajaha jabisaibo ta Fenicia main caman bocannishqui. Chipre mai janin, Antioquía janin rihbi ta nococannishqui. Caquin bi judiobo rahsi Papan joi yohibonacanquin.
Caibo Chipre mai janinhahbo hihxon, caibo rihbi Cirene janinhahbo hihxon, Antioquía janin nocoxon sca jaton nahuabo rihbi noquen Hihbo Jesusen joi siri yohiquin.
Noquen Hihbaan ta jato yanapannishqui. Jaabaan yohihah ta hihti caiboxon nincacoinxon noquen Hihbo bihnishqui.
Jascajahibo nincaxon ta Jerusalen janinxon noquen huetsabaan Bernabé raannishqui Antioquía janin canon.
Nocoxon Papan jahuen shinan jato hinanai jisish jenimahi. Noquen Hihbo jeneyamahahbo hihxon cahen jaan jato yohiquin sirijaquin noquen Hihbaan yohihi quescabijaquin hahcabo hihxon.
Janohahbo hicha joni sca noquen Hihbaan hihbojaquin. Bernabé ta siri joni janishqui Dios Yoshiman hihbojaha joni. Papan jato hahxontihi cahen jaan shinancoinquin.
Saulo benahi sca Tarso janin Bernabé cahi sca cahi. Saulo meraxon Antioquía janin hihuequin.
Huesti bari Papan caisaibo betan tsinquixon cahen rabechin hicha jonibo haxemaquin. Jano pari ta Criston jonibo cristianobo janemenocannishqui.
Jaatian Jerusalen janinhax Papan jismaha yohihibo nocoti Antioquía janin.
Agabo janeya sca jato tocan nihxon jatihibi main piti pishinscaax pihan hihyaxihquibo jato Dios Yoshinyaxon yohiquin. Jan jascani cahen jascacoinscai, Claudio quiquin hapo hihqui tian.
Jaa copi cahen Judea main jihuetai noquen huetsabo qui coriqui raanti Criston jonibaan shinannish.
Jatihixonbi hahtipahnoxon caman raanti shinancanquin. Shinanxon jaabaan shinanai quescabijacanquin. Jaton pastorobo qui hinantannon hihxon Bernabé betan Saulo jaya catannon hihxon raancanquin.
Jaabo cahiya ta jaton quiquin hapo Herodesnin caibo Papan joi nincacoinaibo bihnishqui, jato tiromajanoxon bihquin.
Juaman huetsa ta Jacobo janishqui. Jaa ta Herodesnin rehtenishqui.
Jaa rehtehiya judiobo jenimahi jisxon Pedro rihbi bihquin chahoma paan fiestajahiboya.
Bihxon sipo xoboho tsahonquin. Chahoma paan fiesta pecaho rehteyaxahpan costanahbo hihxon jahuen sontarobo Pedro coiranmaquin. Chosco coiranti janahue, huesti coiranti cahen chosco sontaro, jato jaquin.
Sipo xoboho Pedro tsahotaiya cahen noquen huetsabaan noquen Papa hihti yocaxonquin.
Jisibo hihxon bahquish Pedro rehtenoxahpan hih Herodes jai bi sipo xoboho Pedro hoxahi. Jaa yamebi rabe cadenanen jato qui menexah rabe sontaro napon Pedro hoxahi. Xehqui janin rihbi sontaro coirani xehqui janichi.
Jaatian noquen Hihbaan raanah jahuen naihoh queha yonoti sanareneni jahui. Sipo xobo chicho xaba siri jaresscai. Rahpasxon Pedro mohinquin. —Huenihue histon —hahquin. Huenitaiya hahan menexipi cadena mepequehti.
—Miin chopa sahuexon tahe xaca rihbi sahuehue —hahquin Papan yonotinin. Jascajaha sahuequin. —Miin tarin rahcoxon hea chibanhue —hahquin.
Jascahah hahbe cahi picoscai. Papan yonotinin hahcoinai honanyamaquin. Namaquen jisija tah hen jai hihqui.
Huetsa coiranai sontaro huinoxon huetsa rihbi huinohax yami xehpoti qui nococani, jano jema qui cati. Hahmebi xehpoti quehpemehti. Picotax bahin sca bocani. Cahiya bi Papan yonoti yamacahinscai.
Shinanscaax: —Herodesnin hea rehteyamanon hihxon ta jahuen yonoti Papan raanaxqui heen caibaan hea jacatsihqui jatihibi rihbi hea jayamanon hihxon. Rahma tah hen honanquin sirijascai —hihqui Pedro.
Honancoinscaax Marian xobon cahi. Jaa María ta Juaman mama qui. Juaman jane huetsa cahen Marcos. Jaa xoboho tsinquixon ta Papa yocacannishqui hichaxon Pedro yocaxonquin.
Jemanhihti xehpoti Pedronen tontonhahcai nincacax Rode janeya xontaco jisi jahui.
Pedro joi nincaxon honanax hihti jenimahax quehpenxonti shinanaxma bishquihihcanahi caribihi xobon. Hihcohax: —Pedro ta jemanhihti janin nichiqui —hihqui.
—Min tah min tehquehihqui —hahcanquin. —Hihyama tah hen jai. Jaa coin tah qui —hihresi. —Jahuen yoshin rah ta qui —hihscacani.
Pedronen xehpoti tontonhahquin jeneyamaquin. Quehpenscaxon jisish rahte rahtecani.
Netetahbo jahuen mequen sanaxon sipo xobo janinhah noquen Hihbaan jaa picohah jato yohiquin. —Jacobo, noquen huetsabo rihbi yohiscatannahue —jato jabahini huetsa xoboho caresscai.
Xaba paquescaiya sca rahtetax sontarobo coro coroti, hihti corocani. ¿Jahuen Pedro cahaxquin? hihcani.
Jato Benatannahue hahca bi benacasquimahiboya coirannica sontaro yocapaquexon, Nea coirannicahbo rehtenahue hahscaquin Herodesnin. Jascajahax Judea mai janinhax Cesarea jema janin jihueti sca Herodes cahi.
Jaatian sca Tiro mai janinhahbo qui Herodes sinati. Sidon janinhahbo qui sinarihbihi. Jaa copi huesti shinanyahax hahqui nococani. Nocoxon jahuen xobo coirannica Blasto yohuanquihnxon jeenhihmacanquin jan jato yanapannon. Quiquin hapo sca hihti yocacanquin jan jato qui sinayamascanon hihxon. Jahuen mai janinhax jaton piti jahui copi raejacatsihcani.
Jaa neten yohuanyaxahnpan hih jan jaipi jaa nete nocotaiya jahuen quiquin hapo tari sahuehax, jahuen quiquin hapo tsahotinin tsahoxon basi yohuanquin Herodesnin jato yohi yohiquin.
Herodes yohuanai nincacax: —Diosax tah min yohuanai. Joni yohuanaima ta mia qui —hihcani coshin.
Jaatianbi, Jascama ta qui, Papa Dios huesti ta Dios qui, hih jan jayamahi copi noquen Hihbaan yonotinin Herodes rishquiquin. Rishquihah xenahax mahuati.
Herodes mahuataiya sca Papan joi caícanascai. Hashoan hocho sca nococanahi.
Jaatian antioquiabaan coriqui hinana Jerusalen janin noquen huetsabo qui jaa coriqui hinantanax Bernabé betan Saulo joribiscai. Juan rihbi becanquin, Marcos cahen jahuen jane huetsa.
Antioquía janin ta Papan caisaibo tocan haxemanicahbo betan Papan jismaha yohinicabo japahonishqui, huetsa cahen Bernabé, huetsa cahen Simon, joni huisoni hahcaibo, huetsa cahen Cirene janinhah Lucio, huetsa cahen Manaen jaton gobernador Herodesnin yanapannicah, huetsa cahen Saulo. Jaabo rahsi.
Piti tenehahnan Papahon shinanaiton Dios Yoshiman jato yohiquin: —Hen jato yohihi tee jatannon Bernabé betan Saulo raannahue —jato jaquin.
Jascajaha piti tenehahnan Papa yocaxon jato metsoncanquin, mato tah non yanapantihi hahxon jascajacanquin. Jascajaxon jato camacanquin.
Jascajaquin Dios Yoshiman camahah Seleucia jema janin cahax Chipre mai pishca caman quebijistima hian nontin pohquejaqueti.
Salamina jema janin mapexon judiobaan tsinquiti xobohoxon Papan joi yohicanquin. Juaman rihbi ta jato yanapannishqui.
Jaa mai pishca nabebacahini cahax Pafos jema janin nococani. Jano ta yobe joni meracanishqui, Barjesus janeya. Judio. Papan jismaha yohinicahicamahi.
Jaa ta janoha tininti teexonai joni hihpahonishqui. Tininti ta Sergio Paulo janeya janishqui, honan joni. Papan joi nincacatsihxon jaa tinintinin Bernabéya Saulo quenamaquin.
Jaa yobepan jane huetsa cahen Elimas, yobe hihcatsihqui. Jaan jato Jascama ta qui, hahquin, tinintinin nincacoinmis hihxon.
Jaatian Pablo hahcaibo Saulo Dios Yoshiman hihbojaha jaa yobe bejisquin sirijaxon yohiquin:
—Mia tah min tiroma yoshiman baque qui. Jatihibi pontejaquin shinanaibaan rahui ta mia qui. Paran paranmis. Hihti tiromajaquin shinanai ta mia qui. ¿Papan ponte bahibo min mayamahi tanticatsihyamahin?
Jisresscahue. Noquen Hihbaan ta mia mehehihqui, benchescaxon min bari basi tahni jisyamascanon —hahquin. Jan jascahiya bi jahuen bero coropax bahquishcahinscai. Tsoan hea mehuetanxon hiotihiquin, hihquish joni benahi huea hueacanahi cahi.
Jaa jascahi jisxon noquen Hihbaan joi nincacax rahtexon jaton tinintinin nincacoinquin, jahuen jointiboyaxonbi nincacoinquin.
Jaatian Pablo, jaabo, Pafos mai potabahini nontin caresscaax Panfilia mai janin nocoti Perge jeman. Jano jato potabahini ta Jerusalen janin sca Juan caribinishqui.
Perge janinhax cahax Pisidia mai meha Antioquía qui nococani. Jaton tantiti neten sca janoha judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho hihcohax tsahocani.
Moisesnin huishani joi nincamaxon Papan joi huishaxon yohinicabaan joi nincamaxon tsinquiti xobo coirannicahbaan jano tsahotai bi jato quenaquin: —Noque huetsabaan, jonibo yohiti joi jaxon nihhinaxon noque yohirohahue —hahcanquin.
Jascahahbo nihhinaxon mequen sanaxon Pablon jato yohiquin: —Heen caibon, noquen Papa Diosohon shinanaibon, hea nincanahue.
Noque israelibaan Papa Diosen ta noquen xenibo caisnixon Egipto main jaabo jihuetaiya jato caíjanishqui. Jahuen coshi jismaxon ta janohax piconon jato hionishqui.
Cuarenta bari sca ta jato tenenishqui nihi naman nih nichaiboya.
Canaan mai janin sca siete quiquin hapobo jaton jihuetahboyabi camaxon ta jaa mai israelibaana sca hihnon hihxon jato hinannishqui.
Cuatrocientos cincuenta bari jano jihuescanon jato jaa mai hinanquin. Jahuen joi yohinica Samuel janon caman ta jato pontenicabo hinannishqui.
Quiquin hapo sca noque hinanhue, hah sca ta jacannishqui. Yocacahbo cahen Cisin baque Saulo jato hinanquin. Jaa ta Benjamin baquebo janishqui, Saulo. Cuarenta bari ta jaan jato coirannishqui.
Jaa potascaxon ta Davidinin sca jato coirannon hihxon jaa sca quiquin hapomanishqui. Jaa yohihi ta Papan nescajanishqui: Isaín baque David tah hen heen shinanya jisi. Hea queenai quescabija ta jaan jatihiqui hea hahxonquin.
Jaa Davidinin chini baquebo janinhah ta noque israelibo teehihmanica Papan cainmascanishqui, Jesus, jan yohini quescabijaquin.
Jaa jonon ta jaton shinan pontexon nashimati Juaman jato yohinishqui, jatihibi noquen caibo yohiquin.
Jato yohiquin queyoti hochoma sca: ¿Hea jahua quin shinan man jain? Hea ta jaama qui. Hehchon ta huetsa jahuiqui. Jaa hihti siri copi tah hen jahuen sapato risbi pecaxonti hahtipahyamahi hahquin jaan.
Heen huetsabaan, Abrahanen baquebaan, Papahon shinanaibaan. Noquen nincanon hihxon ta Papan noque jaa joi raannishqui, hahan teehihti joi non nincanon.
Jaa teehihmanica jisxon bi ta jaa honanyamacannishqui. Jatihibi tantiti neten Papan yohinicabaan joi nincamaha bi nincayamarihbixon ta Jerusalen janin jihuetaibaan jaton hapobo betan jaa rehtemacanishqui, jayaxihquibo Papan yohini quescabijaquin.
Jahua copi rehteti yamahi bi Pilato yocacanquin jaa rehtemanon.
Jaa yohihi huishani joi jai quescabijaxon jihuin hueonahbo mahuascai botonxon ta tsahoncannishqui.
Hihquipi bi ta Papan teehihmarihbinishqui.
Hahquirihbi teehihquish ta hahbetan Galilea janinhax Jerusalen janin cahipibo qui cainnishqui, jaabaan sca jan teehihribihi jisnicahboxon caibo sca yohinon.
Joi siri tah non mato yohihi, hea huetsabaan. Noquen xenibo jan hahxontijani quescabija ta Papan jaiqui.
Jesus hihquipi bi hahquirihbi teehihmaquin ta jan hahxontijani quescabijaquin Papan noquen xenibo hahxonihqui, noque teehihmanica janon. Jahuen rabe behua huishaquin Davidinin yohini quescabi ta qui: Mia tah min heen baque qui. Nea neten tah hen heen baque mia hihqui jato honanmascai.
Jaa hihquipish bi jahuentianbi yora pisiyamascanon hahquirihbi teehihmahi ta nescajaquin rihbi yohinishqui: Hen jahuentianbi huetsajatima joi siri hen David yohini quescabijaquin tah hen mia hahxonscai, hih ta jaiqui huetsa quirica janin rihbi.
Jaa yohihi ta huetsa behua janin rihbi nescarihqui: Min caisai miin baque tah min pisimatimahi hihqui.
Jihueparixon ta Papa queenai quescajaquin Davidinin hahnishqui. Mahuatai tsahonahbo ta jahuen yora payoscanishqui.
Papan hahquirihbi teehihmahi joni ta jascayamahihqui: jaa ta payoyamanishqui.
Jaan ta maton hohcha sohuaxonti hahtipahiqui. Man honannon hihxon tah non mato yohihi, hea huetsabaan. Moisesnin noque yohini quescabijaxon bi man potati hahtipahyamahi hohcha jatihibi ta jaan sohuahihqui nincacoinaibo rahsi.
Jaa nincacoinaibo jatihibi ta Papan siri jisiqui.
Papan joi yohinicabaan ta nescajaquin huishaxon yohinishqui:
Jisnahue, hea hosanaibaan. Rahtenahue queyoscanoxon. Man jihuetai netenbi hen hahan rahteti hahcaiya bi tah man hihcoinai shinantimabiresai. Papan ta jascajaaxqui hih huetsa jai bi hih ta jahuen huisha jaiqui. Jistahi man. Jan yohihi quescabija jan mato jamis —jato jaquin.
Jascahax cainscaiton huetsa tantiti neten rihbi noque yohirihbiyaxahnhue hihxon jato hihti yocacanquin.
Tsinquixon yohuanaibo nincaquin queyoxon sca, jaton nahua hihpahonish bi Papahon shinanax judioscaibo betan judiobaan hichaxon Pablo, Bernabé chibanbonaquin. Chibanahbo Papan shinanai quescari jihuetahbo hihxon jato sirijaquin yohiquin.
Huetsa tantiti neten sca Papan joi nincaqui jaa jema janinhahbo jatihibi tsinquicani. Huestibo res pishini.
Pablo yohuanai nincacaibo hihti caibohi jisish notsi notsixon: —Jascama ta qui tiroman —hahcanquin judiobaan.
Pantecatsihquibaan bi raquexonma Bernabé betan Pablonen jato yohiquin: —Mato pari tah non Papan joi nincamati jai. Queyoyamanox manataibomaxon man jaa joi potascaiya tah non nahuabo sca yohihi.
Non jascajanon ta noquen Hihbaan noque yohinishqui: Nahuabo min xabajaxonnon tah hen mia yohihi jano nai chibechijaquetancahuanaiton caman hahan teehihmati joi min jato nincamanon hah ta noquen Hihbo janishqui —jato jaquin.
Jan jascarai nincacax judiomabo jenimacani. Papan joi hihti siri jiscanquin. Queyoyamanox jihueyaxihquibo rahsi noquen Hihbo qui hinamehti, Papan caisnibo rahsi.
Janohax sca cahen janoha maibo janin Papan joi caícanahi.
Papahon shinanax bi haibo patorobo sca ta jaa judiobaan Pablo qui sinamanishqui, jaa jema janin jihuetaibo haibo patorobo. Janoha patoro rihbi sinamacanquin Pablo Bernabé rihbi picohahbo hihxon. Sinamahabo cahen jato jaa mai janinhah picocanquin.
Jaabaan picohah yohitimabohi honanahbo hihxon jaton sapato poto jato quiri tahabahini Iconio jema janin sca boresscacani.
Jaabi Jesusen jonibo hihti jenimahi. Dios Yoshiman hihbojaha jenimahi jihuecani.
Iconio janin sca judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho mapexon jato yohiquin nincacoinahbo. Yohihah hichaxon nincacoincanquin judiobaan, judiomabaan rihbi.
Nincacoinaiboya cahen nincayosma judiobaan judiomabo sinamaquin. Noquen huetsabo jistahihmanon hihxon jato tiroma shinan hinancanquin.
Jaabi ta janobi basi tahni jihuescacannishqui raquexonma noquen Hihbaan joi jato yohihahnan. Jatohon shinanxon Papan hahxonai joi nincacoinahbo hihxon ta noquen Hihbaan rihbi yanapanquin hahan honantiboya hahan rahtetibo jato jaxonnishqui.
Jema janinhahbo sca caibo huetsa shinanya hihnon caibo rihbi huetsa shinanya hihqui. Judiobo res caibaan nincaquin. Caibaan rihbi Criston raantibo res nincaquin.
Jasca sca jaiya cahen jato tiromajaxon macaman tsacanon benahue hihcani judiomabo, judiobo, jaton hapobo rihbi.
Macaman tsacacatsihquibo honanax jabascacani. Licaonia main, Listra, Derbe, jaa jemabo janin bocani.
Jano sca Papan joi siri yohicanquin.
Listra janin ta chanto joni meracannishqui, jahuen ponobo yosmahi cainnish jascabiscai. Jahuentianbi nihti hahtipahyamani.
Jaan cahen Pablo yohuanai nincaquin. Jaa Pablonen bejisquin sirijaquin. Jisanan Papan mehehah rohatihi jan shinanai honanxon coshin sca yohiquin:
—Huenihue. Nihrenenhue —hahquin. Jascahah cayahihnatax nichi tana tanascai.
Pablonen jascajaha jisish tsinquijaquetaibo coshin yohuanscai: —Yorayahpa quescapahax ta dios rabe noque qui botopaquetaxqui —hihcani jaton join, Licaonicabaan join.
Bernabé ta Júpiter janecannishqui. Pablo cahen Mercurio janecanquin, yohuan hihbo hapo quen.
Júpiter hiná rehtexonnicah sca hicha jonibo betan cahi. Pehi toronjaxon ganado tejomaxon jema xehqui janin jano Júpiter hahcaibo jaton diosen xobo jaiton jaton ganado rehtecatsihscai, Pablo hinancatsihquin, mapojaxonnoxon.
Jascajahibo nincaxon Criston raantibo Bernabé betan Pablonen jaton chopa huaxabahinxon tsamatai jonibo tocan cayatanxon jato coshin yohiquin:
—¿Jahueja man jacatsihquin, jonibon? Noque tah non mato quescapa jonibo qui. Nescapa tiroma shinan potabahinxon jihuenica Dios man bihnon hihxon tah non jahuen joi siri mato yohihi. Nai, mai, hian, jano jai jatihibi ta jaan hahnishqui.
Neateman jihuepahonihbo ta jaabo jihueti queenai quescari jaan jihuemanishqui.
Jaabi ta hahan honanti jato pishinmayamanishqui jato yanapanquin naihohxon hoi paquemaquin, bimibo hinanquin, piti mato hinanquin, hahan jenimati mato hinanquin —jato jaquin.
Jascajaquin yohi yohihah pari ta jaabaan jaton ganado jato rehtexonquin bi rohajacanishqui.
Jaatian Antioquía janinhax judiobo jahui. Iconio janinhax rihbi nocoxon judiobaan janohahbo sinamaquin, Pablo rehtehahbo hihxon. Sinaxon Pablo macaman tsacacanquin. Jemama qui ninibonaxon mahua sca ta jaiqui hihxon janobi potabehnancanquin.
Criston jonibo jaa mayajaquetaiya hueniscaax jema janin caribihi. Jano hihshinahax Bernabé betan caresscai. Derbe jema janin cahi caresscai.
Nocoxon Papan joi siri jato yohicanquin. Yohihahbo hichaxon nincacoinquin. Janohax sca Listra janin caribihi. Janohax sca Iconio janin. Janohax sca Antioquía janin.
Criston jonibo coshi hinanbonahi cahi, shinancoinquin jeneyamaxahcabo hihxon jato hihti yohiquin. —Papan jihuemati janin noconoxon tah non hicha teneti jai —hahquin.
Piti tenehahnan mequeman mehexon Papa yocaxon nincacoinaibo jano jaiton tihibi siri jonibo caisxon Mia pastorohue, Mia rihbi pastorohue hahcanquin. Jascajaxon jaabaan nincacoinipi quen noquen Hihbaan jato coirannon hihxon Papa yocarihbicanquin.
Pisidia mai sca nabebacahinax Panfilia mai janin nococani.
Perge janin sca caxon joi siri yohiscaax Atalia janin cahpaquehcani.
Janohax sca Antioquía janin cahi nontin boribicani. Hoa chai yohitanahbo hihxon janoxon Papa jato yocaxonnibo janin nocorihbiscacani, janohax jaabo catanni janin.
Nocoxon noquen huetsabo tsinquimaxon jato betan Papan hahrasihi jatihibi yohicanquin. Judiomabo jan jascajaquin nincamamenohi jato yohiquin.
Basi sca jano Criston jonibo betan jihuecani.
Jaatian Jerusalen janinhahbo sca joxon noquen huetsabo yohiquin: —Moisesnin yohini quescabijaquin honantijayamahah tah man hahquirihbi teehihtimahi —hahcanquin.
Jaamajahibo copi ta Bernabé betan Pablonen jato pontequin sca yohinishqui. Yohihah bi hahbetan sca yohinanresi. Join bahchinani. Criston raantibo yocacahti ta jaiqui, hihxon sca Jerusalen janin bohábo sca raancanquin Pablo, Bernabé, caibo rihbi. Jerusalen janin caxon Criston raantibo yocacahbo cahen raancanquin. Noquen huetsabo shinanyahpabo yocacahti canon raancanquin.
Noquen huetsabaan sirijaquin camahah cahen bocani. Judiomabaan shinan pontexon Papan joi bichi jato yohihahnan Fenicia mai nabebacahinax Samaria mai rihbi nabebacanahi bocani. Yohiha janoha noquen huetsabo hihti jenimacani.
Jerusalen janin nocotaiton sca Criston raantibaan jato Benahue hahquin. Janoha pastorobaan jatihixonbi jato Benahue hahcanquin. Benahue hahcabo jato betan Papan hahrasihi jato yohirihbicanquin.
Fariseoboxon bi nincacoinaibo sca nihrenenxon yohiquin: —Jato honantijaxon Moisesnin yohini quesca jaahbo tah non jato yohiti jai —hahcanquin.
Jaa joi sca shinanquin sirijanoxon cahen Criston raantibo betan pastorobo rihbi jano huesti tsinquiti.
Basi yohinannan sca jaiboya nihrenenxon Pedronen jato yohiquin: —Heen huetsabaan, neateman ta Papan hea mato tocan mehax canon hea yohinishqui jahuen joi siri hean yohihah noquen nahuabaan nincacoinnon. Man tah man honanscai.
Jonin jointi honanxon ta Papan jaabo siri hihqui noque jismanishqui, noque jahuen Yoshin siri jan hinanai quescajaribiquin jaabo rihbi hinanquin.
Noque ta jascapa rabe jisnishqui. Jaabaan nincacoinai copi jaabo rihbi jaton jointi sohuaxonquin.
Non papiti hahtipahyamani bi noquen xenibaan rihbi papiti hahtipahyamani hihue papimaquin hahcajaquin tah man Criston jonibo judionahue hahcai. ¿Jahua copi man jascajaquin noquen Papa Dios tanahin?
Noquen Hihbaan noquehon shinanxon noque teehihmatihi quescajaribiquin ta jaabo rihbi teehihmatihiqui. Jaa tah non shinancoinai —jato jaquin.
Jaatian pari netexon Bernabé betan Pablo yohuanai nincacanquin. Nincacaiton judiobaan nahuabo janin caxon hahan honantibo hahan rahtetibo jato betan Papan hahquipi jato yohipaquequin Pablonen, Bernaben rihbi.
Yohiquin queyoscaiya Jacobo sca yohuani: —Hea nincanahue, hea huetsabaan.
Jahuenahbi jaabo hihnon hihxon jahuen joi siri noquen nahuabo Papan nincamamenoni ta Simoman noque yohiscaaxqui.
Papan yohinicabaan rihbi ta huishaxon jascajaquin yohinishqui. Nincanahue:
Jaa pecaho joribixon tah hen Davidinin xobo poxoni huenirihbixon hahcajaquin jahuen jihuetahbo hinanrihbitihi. Payonihbo hahribixon hahcajaquin tah hen jahuen jihuetahbo hinanrihbiyaxihqui.
Texe jonibaan jaton Hihbo benahahbo hihxon tah hen jascajayaxihqui. Maton nahuahax bi hehqui hinamehtaibo jatihibichin hea benahahbo hihxon tah hen jascajayaxihqui.
Nea joi neateman yohinihxon ta noquen Hihbaan jascajahiqui.
Hean shinanah tah non jaton shinan pontexon noquen Papan joi nincacoinaibo noquen nahuabo non jatsanjatimahi.
Jato qui raannoxon quirica huishati ta jaiqui, santoya rishtayamahahbo joni huetsa betan tsiniyamahahbo, hahsataibo piyamahabo, jimi rihbi piyamahabo.
Jatihibi jema janinxon ta neateman Moisesnin joi nincamanixon rahma caman nincamacanihqui. Nincamaxon ta jaa jahua hihcatsihquiquin hihxon yocarihbicaniqui, tantiti nete tihibi jaton tsinquiti xobobohoxon. Jaa copi tah non jato qui joi raantihi —jato jaquin.
Jeenhihxon sca jonibo raanah ta siri qui hihxon Criston raantibo, janohahbo pastorobo, jatihibi noquen huetsabo, jatihixonbi sca Bernabé betan Pablo manahi cahabo mananicabo caiscanquin, Antioquía janin jato raannoxon. Judas Barsabas hahcaibo, Silas rihbi, caiscanquin. Jaabo hihti shinanya noquen huetsabo copi jato caiscanquin.
Jato betan raanti quirica sca huishamacanquin: Maton huetsabo, Criston raantibo, pastorobo, noque rahsibixon tah non mato qui joi raanai, man jascabi jayamahin, hahquin. Antioquía, Siria, Cilicia maibaan jihuetai noquen caibohaxma bi noquen huetsabo qui tah non raanai.
Noquen raanahma bi noque quihax caxon yohixon mato masa shinanmahibo joi tah non nincacai.
Nincaxon tah non jatihixonbi sca shinanquin sirijaxon noque quiha jonibo caisai, Bernabé betan Pablo manahi mato janin canon. Bernabé betan Pablo ta hahan non shinanai noquen huetsabo qui.
Caibaan jato rehtecatsihquibaan bi ta noquen Hihbo Jesucriston joi siri yohihi caresscahoxqui.
Jaa copi tah non Judas betan Silas raanai, jaabaan sca non mato yohihi joi mato yohiquin sirijanon.
Judiobaan mato jisi copi man jascajati jai joi res tah non mato yohihi, jahuabi hashoan mato hihuejayamanoxon. Non jascahah ta siri qui hihxon tah non yohihi, Dios Yoshiman rihbi noque jascajaquin shinanmaha.
Jaa copi tah non mato yohihi, santo rehtexona nami piyamanahue, jimi rihbi piyamanahue, terehahxon rehtehibo rihbi piyamaquin. Joni huetsa betan tsiniyamanahue. Non mato yohihi quescarax tah man siritihi. Jaa res tah non yohihi, hahcanquin huishaquin.
Raanahbo Antioquía janin bocani. Jano noquen huetsabo tsinquixon jaa quirica jato hinancanquin.
Jaa quirica bihxon jisxon shinanquin sirijascacanquin.
Papan jismaha yohinicaboxon Judas betan Silasen jato hicha yohixon noquen huetsabo coshi hinanquin.
Jano jihuetahbax cacatsihscaiboya jato raanipibo qui caribinon sirijaquin jato camacanquin.
Hihcax bi Silas cayamahi. Baneti jan shinanaiya Judas huesti cahi.
Antioquía janin Pablo betan Bernabé baneti. Banexon jato honanmaquin. Hicha noquen huetsabo betan jaa joi siri yohicanquin.
Jahuentihi ra nete jano hihxon: —Jano non noquen Hihbaan joi non jato yohiniton caribinon cahue jato jisi. Jenquetsahpi jacanihquin jisnon cahue jatihibi jema janin —Bernabé Pablonen jaquin.
Juan Marcos hahcaibo Bernabenin hiocatsihqui bi Pablo queenyamahi.
Panfilia janin jato potabahini jato betan Papan joi yohihi cayamani copi cahen jaa hioti Pablonen shinanyamaquin.
Huesti shinanyamascaax cahchinanbehcoini. Chipre janin Marcos betan canoxon cahen Bernabé nontin naneti.
Pablo cahen Silas betan cahi, noquen huetsabaan noquen Papa yocaxonah.
Siria nabebacahinax Cilicia mai rihbi nabebacahini cahi noquen huetsabo shinan hinanbonaquin.
Derbe janin nocotax janohax cahax Listra janin nocorihbihi. Jano Timoteo janeya Criston joni jai. Jahuen mama judiohax bi nincacoinnica. Jahuen papa cahen judiobaan nahua.
Jaa Timoteo qui ta Listra janinha noquen huetsabo siripi yohuannishqui. Iconio janinhahbo jascarihbihi yohuani.
Jaa hiocatsihxon bihxon janobo judiobo jai copi Pablonen jaa honantijaquin. Nahua papayahpa jaa honanaiboya jaa honantijaquin.
Jemabo sca nabebacanahi caquin jato yohibonaquin. Jerusalen janinxon Criston raantibo betan jaton pastorobaan yohihipi joibo jato yohibonaquin. Jaa joi nincaxon jascari jihuetahbo hihxon jato yohiquin.
Jaa copi ta noquen huetsabaan hashoan sca nincacoinnishqui. Nete tihibi caícanahi.
Frigia mai sca nabebacahinax Galacia mai rihbi nabebacahini bocani. Asia mai janin cacatsihquibo bi Dios Yoshiman jato jano yohimayamaquin.
Misia main nocotax, Bitinia main sca cacatsihquibo bi Papan Yoshiman jato panterihbiquin.
Misia mai huinojaquetax Troas jema janin sca cahpaquehcani.
Huesti yame cahen namaquen Macedonia janinha joni Pablonen jisquin. Jaa bebon nihrenenxon jaa macedonio jonin hihti yocaquin: —Macedonia janin noque yanapani johue —hahquin.
Namayama sca jan jaiya jenquetsahax non Macedonia janin caman pohquetihin hihxon hahan pohqueti benaquin noquen. Non jano jahuen joi siri yohihi canon Papan noque quenahi tah non honanquin sirijaniqui.
Nontin nanexon Troas potabahinquin noquen. Samotracia quiri ponte res cahi. Nihshinahax huetsa neten sca Neápolis jema janin taxnati.
Mapetax Filipos jema janin cahi. Filipos ta romanobaan tsahonni jema qui, jano jai jemabo mentan hashoan hani. Jano tah non jahuentihi ra nete hihniqui.
Tantiti neten sca tah non jema jemanhihtinin caniqui, huean quexabi. Janoxon ta judiobaan noquen Papa Dios yocaquihqui hihquish tsahopaquetax non jano behchinanai haibobo betan noque yohuani.
Huesti haibo ta Lidia janeya jano janishqui. Papahon shinanai haibo. Yancon chopa maromanicah. Tiatira jema janinhah haibo. Jaan cahen nincaquin sirijaquin. Pablonen yohihi joi nincati shinan noquen Hihbaan hinanah nincaquin.
Jatihibi jahuen xoboho jihuetaibo betan nashimaha sca noque hihti yohiquin: —Noquen Hihbaan joi hen nincacoinai shinanax heen xoboho botannahue. Jano sca banenahue —hahxon jano sca noque hioquin.
Janoxon jaabaan Papa yohihi janin sca non cahi bi huesti hiná haibaan noque behchiquin. Tiroma yoshinyahpa haibo hihxon ta jayaxon jonibo yohipahonishqui. Honancatsihquin yocacah jaan yohiquin. Jascajaxon ta jahuen hihbobo hicha coriqui cananxonpahonishqui.
Jaa haibaan cahen Pablo chibanbenaquin. Noque rihbi chibanbenaquin. Noque chibanhahnan coshin yohuani: —Nea jonibo ta Xaba Hihbo Diosen jonibo qui. Hahan teehihti joi ta mato yohicaniqui —hihqui.
Hicha neten jascarihbihi. Jatsanscaax mayacahuanxon Pablonen jaa yoshin yohiquin: —Jesucriston janen tah hen mia yohihi, jaa haibo janinhax picohue —hahquin. Jan yohihah cainscai.
Hahan coriqui cananti yamascai jisxon jahuen hihbobaan Pablo bihquin. Silas rihbi bihcanquin. Bihxon tinintinin jemanhihti janin hioxon jaton hapobo quenacanquin.
Jaton hapobo jahuiya: —Neabo ta judiobo qui. Noquen jema ta tiromajacaniqui.
Noque jascatima joi ta noque yohihihqui, jascapa noquen nincatimahi bi. Noque jascatimahi joi tah qui. Noque tah non romanobo qui —hihcani.
Jano tsamajaquetaibo rihbi jascari jato qui yohuani. Jascaraiboya jaton chopa potamaxon, jihuin jato cahrishqui cahrishquinon jaton hapobaan yohiquin.
Tsehue tsehuejaxon sipo xoboho jato tsahonxon sipo xobo coirannica yohicanquin sirijaquin jan coirannon.
Jascajaquin yohihahbo chicho queha chiqueho jato niaxon hahan tabitaxtinin jato tabitaxpaquequin.
Yame pochinicon sca Pablo betan Silasen noquen Papa yocaquin. Papa qui siripi behuahi. Hahbe sipojahipibaan cahen jato nincaquin.
Jaatian mai coshin mihuanreneni. Xobo jihuibo taxca taxcahihqui. Jatihibi xehpoti quehpemehscai. Hahan jato menexipi cadenabo mepequehcahini.
Sipo xobo coirannicah sca mohixon jaa xobo xehpoti jatihibi quehpemehtai jisish machitonen nacocatsihscai. Hahmebi rehtecatsihqui sipojahipibo jabascai shinanax.
Nacocatsihqui bi Pablonen coshin quenaquin: —Jascari tiromayamahue. Neno tah non qui jatihibi —hahquin.
Jascajahah: —Johué quetejanahue —hihquish sipo xobo hihcocahinax tastahihcanahi cahi Pablo betan Silas janin taracahreneni.
Hueniscaxon jemanhihti janin jato picoxon yocaquin: —¿Queyoyamanox mananoxon hean hen jahuejati jain, jonibon?
—Noquen Hihbo nincacoinax tah min queyoyamanox manatihi. Miin xoboho jihuetaibo jascaribihi —hahcanquin.
Jascajaxon jahuen xoboho jihuetaibo rihbi Papan joi yohiquin sirijacanquin.
Jaatianbi yamebi jato hioxon jaton tsehue chocaxon: —Nincacoin tah hen jai. Hea nashimanahue. Heen xoboho jihuetaibo rihbi nashimanahue —jato jaquin.
Jahuen xoboho jato mapemaxon sca jato pimaquin. Papa nincacoinax jaa, jahuen haibo, jahuen baquebo, jatihibi hihti jenimahi.
Xaba paquescaiya sca jaa jema hapobaan porisia raanquin, yohihi cahabo. —Hoa jonibo picotanhue botanahbo —hahcanquin.
Sipo xobo coirannicahton sca jascajaquin Pablo yohiquin: —Hapobaan ta joi raanihqui hen mato piconon. Picoscanahue tahca. Siripi catannahue.
Jascahah bi Pablonen jato yohiquin: —Noque romano jonibo que bi ta jatihixonbi jisnon hihxon noque rishqui rishquimahipicanaxqui non jahuejahipi honanxonma bi. Jisíbo hihxon ta noque sipojahipicanaxqui. ¿Jonexon tsoan honannonma sca noque picocatsihcanihquin? Jascajatima ta jaticaniqui. Jaabobi joxon noque piconon —hahquin.
Hapobo yohihi sca bocani porisiabo. Romano jonibo ta qui hihqui nincacax raquescacani.
Jaabo sca joxon jato raejacatsihquin jato sirijaquin yohuanquinquin: —Honanyamaxon tah non mato jascajahipiqui —hahxon jato picoxon sca Noquen jema potabahinrohanahue —hahcanquin.
Jascari sipo xobo janinhax picotax Lidia jisi bocani. Noquen huetsabo jisxon sca jato yohiquin. Nincacoinquin jeneyamaxahnahue jato jaax caresscai.
Anfípolis jema nabebacahinax Apolonia jema sca nabebacahinax Tesalónica jema janin nococani. Jano cahen judiobaan tsinquiti xobo jai.
Jahuen hihti quescarax jano Pablo mapeti. Quimisha tantiti neten jato betan yohinani, tsoa noquen teehihmanicah quin hihqui yohinani.
Papan huishamani joiboyaxon cahen Pablonen jato honanmaquin. Papan caisai jahuen baque hohmis hohmisax hihquipish bi teehihribiti jaa janí jato jismaquin sirijaquin, Jaa Papan caisai jahuen baque ta Jesus qui, jaa hen mato yohihi, hahquin.
Nincacoinmaha Pabloya Silas manahi sca caibo cahi. Judiohaxma bi judiocatsihquibaan rihbi hichaxon nincacoinquin. Patoro haibobaan rihbi nincacoinquin hicha tahnixon.
Jaa copi ta notsi notsixon shinanjoma tiromabo tsinquixon jema janinhah judiobaan jato coro coromanishqui. Jasoman xoboho sca jaa corotaibo mapeti, Criston raantibo benahi. Corotaibo bebonbi jato nichincatsihquin jato benacanquin.
Criston raantibo benacasquimaxon Jason sca bihxon caibo noquen huetsabo rihbi bihxon jema hapobo janin jato ninitancanquin. —Jatihibi janin tiromajaquin jonibo coromabenani ta neno sca neabo nocotipishqui. Jasoman rihbi ta jahuen xoboho jato hoxamahiqui.
Jatihixonbi ta noquen quiquin hapo Cesaro nincacatsihyamascacanihqui, huetsa quiquin hapo Jesus jaresscai shinanxon copi —hihcani.
Jascajaxon jonibo coromacanquin. Nincaxon jema hapobaan masa shinanscaquin.
Jaabi Jason cobranxon caibo rihbi cobranxon: —Boresscatannahue —jato jacanquin.
Jaa yamebi ta Pablo, Silas rihbi noquen huetsabaan hionishqui Berea jema janin cahábo. Berea janin nocotax sca judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho mapecani.
Jaabo ta Tesalónicabo mentan hashoan shinanya janishqui. Hihti honancatsihxon Papan joi nincacanquin. Jasca coin hin hihxon jatihibi neten Papan huishamani joi jisquin honancatsihquin.
Hichaxon ta nincacoinnishqui. Jaton nahua patoro haibobo rihbi hicha. Bebobo rihbi huestima.
Papan joi Berea janinxon rihbi Pablonen yohihi honanscaax Tesalónica janinha judiobo jano rihbi bocani. Nocoxon jonibo sinamaxon jato coro coromacanquin.
Jaa copi histon sca noquen huetsabaan Pablo camacanquin. Quebijistima hian quiri hiocanquin. Jema janin sca Silas betan Timoteo baneti.
Pablo hiohibaan ta Atenas jema caman jaa nocomanishqui. Janohax jaabo caribinon ta Pablonen jato joiya raannishqui, Silas betan Timoteo hahqui histon jonon.
Atenas janin jato manahahnan jatihibi janin santobo jai jisxon Pablonen masa shinanquin.
Judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho jato betan yohinanax Papahon shinanai judiomabo betan rihbi yohinani. Jatihibi neten rihbi jaton janoxon maroti jemanhihti janin jano jaibo betan yohinani Papan joi nincamacatsihqui.
Jaton honan joi honanaibo rihbi ta jano nihnínishqui, caibo epicúreobo, caibo estoicobo. Jaabaan ta Pablo yohuanquihnnishqui. Yohuanquihnax: —¿Jahua yohuan nea paranmis jaiquin? —hihqui caibo. —Nahuan dios joi yohinica ra tah qui —hihqui caibo rihbi. Jesus hihquipish bi hahquirihbi teehihqui joi jan yohihiya jascacani.
Jaatian sca jaa bihxon Areópago janeya mahchi janin hiohax yocacahcani: —¿Nea min honanmahi joi behna min noque yohirohatimahin?
Min noque yohihi nincacax tah non rahtetai. Jahua min yohirohatimahin hih tah non jai honancatsihqui.
Jatihibi Atenas janinhahbo betan huetsancohax johox jano jihuetaibo ta jahuabi teeyamapahonishqui. Joi behna yohixon nincaqui jihueresi.
Areópago mahchi naponbi nihrenenax sca Pablo yohuani: —Atenas janinhahbon, hicha diosbo man shinanai tah hen jisi.
Jema janin huinoxon tah hen maton diosbo huishaxon man tsahonxonni macanbo jisbonaxon hen nea huishayahpa huesti merahipiqui. Non honanyamahi diosenah hihqui jaa quirica. Jaa honanyamaxon bi hahan man shinanai Dios tah hen mato yohiscai.
Nea naiyahpa mai, jano jaibo jatihibi rihbi hahní Dios ta nai hihbo qui, mai hihbo. Jaa ta jonin mequeman xobojahi janin jihueyamahihqui.
Jaa ta jonibaan hahxonti pishinyamabiresiqui. Noquen mequeman tah non jaa jahuabi hahxontimahi. Jaan caya ta jatihibi jihuemaxon noquen piti, jatihibi noque hinanihqui.
Huesti jonijamenonixon ta jahan sca jatihibi jonibo cainmanishqui jatihibi main jato jihuemanoxon. Janobi jihueyaxahnahue. Jaatian pari jihueyaxahnahue hih ta jaa janishqui.
Noquen Papa Dios benahahbo ta jascanishqui. Mehebonaquin meraxon hahcajaquin merahahbo ta jascanishqui, noque hochoma jan hihqui bi.
Jaan ta noque yora jihuemahiqui. Hahan jatihibijati coshi hinanxon ta hahan jihueti shinan rihbi noque hinanihqui. Caibo maton quirica huishanicabaan rihbi ta jascajaquin huishanishqui: Noque tah non jahuen chini baquebo qui, hihqui.
Papan chini baquebo hihxon tah non noquen Papa Dios oro quescapa hihqui shinantimahi. Yami pehneni quescapahma, macan quescapahma, jonibaan mequeman sirijaquin hahcai quescapahma, jonin shinanai quescapahma ta jaa qui.
Honanmabo jai bi ta Papan jato tenepahonishqui. Jato tenenixon bi ta rahma jatihibi jonibo sca jatihibi janin jaan yohiscaiqui shinan pontehahbo hihxon.
Jahuen hahan casticanti nete janoxahnon ta yohiscanishqui. Jahuen hahan casticannicah ta jaribiscaiqui, Mia tah min jonibo pontejaquin casticannicah qui hah cahen jaa janish. Jahuen casticannicah tsoa quin non honannon ta hihquipi que bi jaa hahquirihbi teehihmanishqui —jato jaquin Pablonen.
Hihquipi bi hahquirihbi teehihmahi yohihi nincacax bitsa bitsacani. —Huetsa tian min noque yohirihbinon tah non nincayaxihqui —hihqui caibo rihbi.
Jascahiya jato janinhax Pablo picoscai.
Caibaan rihbi nincacoinax Pablo manahi bocani. Huesti cahen Dionisio Areopagito, huetsa cahen haibo, Dámaris janeya. Caibobo rihbi jato betan cahi.
Jaa pecaho ta Atenas janinhax picotax Corinto jema janin Pablo canishqui.
Jano ta huesti judio meranishqui, Aquila janeya. Jaa ta Ponto mai janinha joni hihpahonishqui, jahuen haibo betan Italia janinhax jahuex nocotipi. Claudio quiquin hapo hihxon Roma jema janinhax jatihibi judiobo picoti jaan yohihiya janohax Aquila jahuipi. Jato jisi sca Pablo cahi.
Jaa Aquila cahen chopa xobojanicah. Pablo rihbi ta jascajanica janishqui. Hahbe chopa xobojanicah honanax jaton xoboho jihuetax hahbetanbi Pablo teescai.
Tantiti netebo nocoscaiya judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho caxon jato betan yohinanxon judiobo, jaton nahuabo rihbi Papan joi nincamaquin.
Macedonia janinhax Silas betan Timoteo nocoscaiya Papan joi yohihi sca jihueti. Jesus ta Papan caisai joni qui hihxon judiobo honanmaquin.
Honanmaha bi nincacatsihyamacani. Pablo qui tiromahi yohuancani. Jascaraiton jahuen chopa peren perenhahxon jato yohiquin: —Nincacatsihyamahax tah man hohchaya mahuatihi. Min tah min noque honanmayamaniqui hah tah man hea jatimascai. Nahuabo sca tah hen yohitihi —jato jaquin.
Jato jascajabahini cahax jaa tsinquiti xobo patax jihuetai jonin xoboho mapescai. Jaa joni ta Justo janeya janishqui judiocatsihqui joni.
Jaton tsinquiti xobo coirannicahton ta noquen Hihbo nincacoinnishqui, Jahuen jane cahen Crispo. Jahuen xoboho jihuetaibaan rihbi nincacoinquin jatihixonbi. Hihti caibo rihbi corinto jonibaan Papan joi nincaxon nincacoincanquin. Nincacoinaiton jato nashimacanquin.
Yame namaquen sca noquen Hihbo yohuanai Pablonen nincaquin: —Raquexonma yohireshue. Neteyamahue.
Mia tah hen manahi cahi, tsoanbi mia tiromajaquin jahuejayamanon. Nea jema janin tah hen hicha joni jai —hihqui.
Huesti bari seis hoxne rihbi ta jano jihuenishqui jato tocan jihuexon Papan joi honanmaquin.
Acaya main Galion sca gobernador hihquiya judiobo rahsi tsinquiscai. Tsinquixon jatihixonbi Pablo bihti shinancanquin. Bihxon jaton hapo janin hiocanquin.
—Noquen xenibaan yohini quescajayamaquin bi ta huetsajaquin Diosohon shinanahbo hihxon neatohon jonibo yohihihqui —hahcanquin.
Pablo sca yohuancatsihscai bi judiobo Galionen yohiquin: —Huetsa joni jan tiromajahiya tah hen jaa copi mato nincaquehanai, judiobon. Jan tiromahiya tah hen nincaquehanai.
Man yohuanresai joi tah hen nincacatsihyamahi. Janebo, maton xenibaan joibo, jascapa joibo copi man yohinanai tah hen nincacatsihyamahi. Botannahue. Bexonahue, matobi. Jascapa joi copi tah hen tsoabi pontecatsihyamahi.
Jascajaxon jahuen ponteti xobo janinxon jato cainmaquin.
Cainmaha jaton tsinquiti xobo coirannica bihcanquin, Sóstenes janeya. Bihxon hapon ponteti xobo xehqui ponte nihxon rishqui rishquicanquin. Jascajahibaan bi Galion jahua hihyamahi, jisresquin.
Basi tahni jano jihuetahbax, Hen ta hen caresscai noquen huetsabon, hah jato jaax Pablo caresscai. Hen yohihipi quescabija tah hen jai hihxon honanahbo hihxon Cencrea jema janinxon sca jahuen boo maxcorohamabahinquin. Siria main caman nontin pohquejaquenoxon janohax nanecani. Priscila betan Aquila rihbi cahi hahbetan.
Efeso jeman pari taxnatax jato potabahini cahi, judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho mapeti. Janoxon judiobo yohuanquihnquin.
Basi pari banetahhue hahcabo bi Pablo queenyamahi.
—Hen tah hen caresscai. Noquen Papa queenaiya tah hen joribitihi —jato jaquin. Nanerihbixon Efeso jema potabahinquin.
Cesarea jema janin sca mapetax Jerusalen janinha noquen huetsabo pasijatani joresscaax Antioquía jema janin cahpaquehcahini cahi.
Jano ta jihuenishqui basima tahni. Janohax sca cahax Galacia mai nabebacahini cahax Frigia mai rihbi nabebacahini cahi. Noquen huetsabo shinan coshijabonahi cahi.
Huesti Apolos janeya judio ta Efeso janin noconishqui Alejandría janinha joni. Joi yohinica. Papan huishani joi honanquin sirijahi.
Criston joi honanmahabo hihti yohicatsihxon jaan jato yohiquin. Jesus joi jato yohiquin sirijaquin jaamama. Hihcax bi jatihibi honanyamaquin. Juaman nashimati joi honanxon Criston janen nashimati joi honanyamaquin.
Raquetaxma ta jaton tsinquiti xoboho yohuannishqui. Jan yohuanai nincaxon jaton xoboho boxon Priscila betan Aquilanen hashoan sirijaquin Papan joi honanmaquin.
Acaya main jaa cacatsihquiton, Catanhue, hahxon noquen huetsabaan quirica huishaquin, jaya cahiton Criston jonibaan sirijaquin bihnon hihxon. Cahi nocoxon nincacoinaibo hicha shinan hinanquin.
Papan huishani joi jismaxon ta Cristo ta Papan caisai joni qui hihxon judiobo yohinishqui. Jatihixonbi nincacahbo hihquish ta janibi nichish yohuannishqui. Sirijaquin jato yohihiya ta nincacoinaibaan shinan bihnishqui.
Corinto janin Apolos jaiya manan cahpoquetax Efeso janin sca Pablo cahpaqueti. Jano Papan joníbo huestibo meraquin.
—¿Nincacoinxon man Dios Yoshin bihyamahin? —jato jaquin. —Dios Yoshin joi tah non honanyamaparihi —hihcani.
—¿Tsoan janen mato nashimacannishquin? —jato jaquin. —Juaman nashimapahoni quescajaquin rahan —hihcani.
—Jaa hahchon jahui joni nincacoinahbo hihxon yohixon ta Juaman nashimapahonishqui shinan pontehiton. Jaa hahchon joní joni ta Jesus qui —jato jaquin.
Jaa honanscaxon cahen noquen Hihbo Jesusen janen sca jato nashimanon yohicanquin.
Pablonen jato mehehiya Dios Yoshin jato qui nocohihnati jahui. Jaa bichish huetsapahi yohuancani. Papan honanmaha yohuanscacani.
Doce joni rah ta jaabo janishqui.
Judiobaan tsinquiti xoboho mapetax sca tsoanbi chihtehahma Pablo yohuani. Quimisha hoxne jato betan yohinani, Papan jihuemayaxihqui joi yohinani. Yohuanquihnannani.
Jaatian ta nincayosma jointi chahomayahpabo noquen Hihbaan joi qui tiromahi yohuanscanishqui, janibi sca hichaxon nincacahbo. Jaa copi ta janohax Pablo picoscaxon Criston jonibo hioxon jatihibi neten Tiranno escuela xobohoxon jato yohinishqui.
